story:
DreamScreen creates an immersive home theater experience using color LED lighting. Designed to adjust to any size television and work with any HDMI source, DreamScreen's Smart LED lights react to the color pixels on your screen. The effect is incredible, it enlarges your television, softens the picture and makes  your favorite tv, games and movies bigger and better. 

Enjoy DreamScreen with all of your favorite shows, movies and video games!

DreamScreen HDMI Stick connects to LED lights behind your TV

DreamScreen LED Strips on a 50 inch TV

 

Responsive Television Back Lighting at 60 Frames a Second!

This technology analyzes the HDMI Video (a wide range of resolutions and formats) and matches the pixel color of what you are watching to the LED lights behind your TV. At a responsive rate of 60 frames per second, DreamScreen brings a new viewing definition in home theater.

DreamScreen Uses any TV Configuration with HDMI. All Cable setups such as Comcast, DirecTV, Time Warner Cable, Xfinity, Dish Network, Verizon FiOS, Satelite, Media players like  AppleTV, ChromeCast,  Amazon Fire, Roku. Slingbox, Nexus Player, Wii, DVD or Bluray Player, and gaming consoles like PlayStationadn Xbox can be used with DeramScreen. Simply plug in the DreamScreen HDMI stick, connect your lights and start the show!

The DreamScreen HDMI stick below connects to LED light sticks that are placed behind your television. Everything you need to enjoy this product comes standard and all Rewards give Backers the option of any size selection.  

DreamScreen's effect is incredible, it enlarges your television, softens the picture and makes TV, gaming and movies incredibly immersive. At a responsive rate of 60 frames per second, your favorite movie or game just went to the next level in home theater.


The Lights on the Back of Your Television

React to the Color Pixels on Your Screen!

Watch DreamScreen on any HDMI Video Source!

 

Control everything on a DreamScreen with the DreamScreen App, available free at Google Play and iTunes store!

DreamScreen isn't just a responsive lighting system for what you're watching, we also include a Music Mode (4 Audio Visualizers) and an Ambient Lighting Mode to enhance your home or venue.

The LED lights react to the colors you are watching! Backlighting is derived from content on the television screen.  Watch your favorite movies, TV shows or video game stretch into the background creating a one-of-a-kind home theater experience!

 

In Video mode, LEDs respond to the peripheral colors on your TV

Connect your DreamScreen to music and watch the responsive lighting dance to your favorite beats, by selecting one of the four different Audio Visualizers! DreamScreen uses digital signal processing to identify the frequencies and amplitudes in the audio stream. The frequency or pitch of the music controls the color and the amplitude of the music controls the amplitude. This allows for a stunning audio visualization effect when using your television to play music from an HDMI source. DreamScreen works with the stereo audio data on HDMI. The lights on the left side respond to the left channel audio and the right side respond to the right channel audio.

 

How Music Mode reacts to audio content on HDMI

Set the mood in your home or venue with an array of ambient light colors or scenes. We have created nine unique Ambient Scenes to choose from. Enjoy full control over colors and brightness on the DreamScreen App via Bluetooth. Enjoy setting your personal ambient tone to your television or the dynamic and fun scenes. The app's color wheel allows you to select from a wide range of colors easily.

Ambient Mode sets Custom Colors or "Scenes" behind TV

No matter what mode you enjoy, DreamScreen will enhance your TV and offer a unique immersive experience in your home or venue. Turn the lights on to the new wave of technology that it coming to your home theater.

DreamScreen's LED Strips are offered in three different sizes and are retro-fitted for a range of sizes, see diagram below to select which size best fits your TV.

Universal HDMI Design for all Sizes!

Unlike other systems DreamScreen requires NO Computer, NO Software, NO Updates and is entirely programmed inside an HDMI stick. It is also responsive to the content on the screen at 60 Frames Per Second making this the ideal product for responsive ambient back lighting in your home or venue! 

Our DreamScreen can run with ANY HDMI TV: All Cable setups, Comcast, DirecTV, Time Warner Cable, Xfinity, Dish Network, Verizon FiOS, AppleTV, ChromeCast, Xbox, PlayStation, Amazon Fire, Roku. Slingbox, Nexus Player, Wii, DVD or Bluray Player, etc., simply plug in our DreamScreen HDMI stick, connect your lights and start the show!

Turn Your Favorite Movie Into So Much More!

Read more about DreamScreen on our Press Page.

D

DreamScreen comes in three different sizes: Classic - 32” to 45’’, Mega - 45’’ to 65’', Xtreme - 65’’ to 80’’. Select the size DreamScreen that fits your TV in the reward section. 

The instruction manual contains detailed information on using and setting up your DreamScreen. Download the free DreamScreenTV App at the iTunes or Google Play store and enjoy full control via Bluetooth.

Enjoy full control of your DreamScreen(s) with the App via Bluetooth. 

Easily toggle through Modes, Adjust Brightness, Zone Control, plus many Advanced Settings.

 

Enjoy full control on iOS or Android

 

In addition to controlling via Bluetooth, the DreamScreen stick can also be used, if your phone or tablet isn't handy!

We've

DreamScreen has added some amazing new features to DreamScreen

since it's inception, see below!

 

 

Testimonials

"DreamScreen is such an amazing product! It was so easy to set up and install and the mobile app is very user-friendly as well. It really does make the TV screen bigger and more fun to watch. We will never watch TV or movies without it again!"              

- Brie McInerney, Director of User Experience, Promet Source

"This is an excellent HDMI LED Backlighting System!"

https://youtu.be/ejmGfn4wdBI

- Ash Tailor, Cinematographer / YouTube Content Creator

"DreamScreen magically enhances your television's visual experience by decreasing higher order aberrations and reducing eye strain at night while simultaneously making your back wall an extension of your viewing experience. Simply watch your favorite movie with DreamScreen on and in the middle of the movie, cut it off... Your family and friends will demand, for their visual pleasure, dreamscreen be turned back on! My parents with cataracts even demand it!"

- Dr. Brent Brown, Atlanta-based Optometrist preforming Digital Eye Strain Study via TV backlighting

"DreamScreen is THE BEST TV enhancement product I've bought! Love the simplicity of the DreamScreen LEDs, they gave my 6yr old TV a new and modern makeover with lights that react to the colors or sounds on the TV."   

- Gagan Luthra, Product Marketing Mgr., Cypress Semiconductors

"I am a huge fan of this and have been waiting for something like this to come to market for 2-3 years now!"

https://youtu.be/jnezsbm4PRU

- Frank Passalacqua, You Tube Tech Reviewer

"I watch EVERYTHING on DreamScreen now and it has changed my entire home theater setup. I really love having people over to the house when the Music Mode is on, creates a great party scene."  

- Adam Williams, Design Review, EdgeCast Media

"DreamScreen has reinvented my TV viewing experience! I love how customizable it is through the App and with one tap on the screen I can change the input from video, to audio, to any specific color I want. I even leave it on when I turn the TV off. Fair warning, once you have DreamScreen, watching TV without it is like regressing to black and white, still enjoyable, but you know what you’re missing out on, and it’s just not the same."

- Rachel Haber, Director, Afligo

"The DreamScreen is an absolute hit for myself and my family, as it adds an element of elegance to my living room that it was previously lacking. I look forward to cozying up at night to enjoy a nice show or a sports game, when the effect is the most vivid. And believe it or not, one of my favorite features is the effect it leaves on my TV when it is off, as the perimeter ambient glow around the tv makes the entire wall look like a fancy movie theater."

- The Akbasli Family, South Florida

"I have been lucky enough to already test this product and can't imagine using my TV without it now!! Whenever I have guests over it is definitely a conversation piece. :-). Here are some videos of my setup. I have a 50" 4K TV."

https://youtu.be/N6MpZzVHhD0 

https://youtu.be/7J0KjmV27zM

- Nick Rodriguez, SEM Analyst, Elite SEM

DreamScreen in a Box

DreamScreen Packaging

Included components with DreamScreen (shown with US Power Supply)

Region-specific Power Supplies will be shipped to International Backers

Our engineering team designed the DreamScreen Stick to simply connect with any HDMI system. This universal approach to responsive TV lighting allows the entire world to enjoy this product, no matter what you're watching. 

NO Computers Needed! NO Software! Simply Plug and Play to turn on the awesome!

 

HDMI Resolution 

DreamScreen(TM) interfaces with standard 1080p, 1080i, 720p and 720i HDMI resolutions.It supports content at 60Hz, 50Hz. During the HDMI handshake, the television communicates directly with the source and dictates the available HDMI resolution and frame rate. DreamScreen will automatically switch to the correct frequency and resolution within a few seconds. DreamScreen is HDMI 1.4 capable and works with HDCP-encrypted content. 

Splitter Technology

An HDMI splitter is used to provide the source signal to both television and DreamScreen. Any off-the-shelf HDMI splitter can be used to provide content to DreamScreen. Don’t worry our standard package includes your very own HDMI splitter. It incorporates an HDCP repeater that ensures that high-resolution HDCP content is available to television and DreamScreen.

Smart LED Strips

Each of the DreamScreen LEDs contains a driver chip that allows for it to be controlled to 16 million colors. A high-speed communication from the stick passes through all the LEDs bringing high resolution and fast response to your television backlighting. The LED Strips have been custom designed for use in this application and are coated with a  polyurethane coating to make them dust and moisture proof while keeping them flexible for installation. 

Flexible LED Strips

Three different sizes of DreamScreen are offered and each works for a range of television sizes. The flexible LED strips are easy to route around a television even when it is wall mounted. The wires connecting the strips are at right angles so that they do not stick up causing shadows.

 

Flexible Mega size can be installed on televisions from 45" to 65".

Each model is designed to stretch between a range of television sizes.

Adhesive Strips

The LED strips placed on the back of your television are designed to be repositionable during installation. Easily adjust to properly fit your screen and enjoy a truly responsive home theater experience. The adhesive used is a 3M 300LSE that allows for excellent adhesion of the LED strips to your television. The adhesive features a built in polyester film liner that resists breakage during removal or repositioning. The adhesive strip also features a small tab for easy removal of the protective liner and application.

 

Adhesive is strong and will not leave residue on television.

60Hz Update Speed

 DreamScreen reads the HDMI frame 60 times a second (typical frame rate of an HDMI stream). The content is analyzed, the backlighting content is calculated and the LEDs are updated at 60 times a second. This allows for rapid response when DreamScreen is used to dynamically enhance the content. As the color processing does not use an attached computer, the dedicated product produces the vivid backlighting without any delays. Call of Duty or your favorite Scifi movie will never be the same!

 DreamScreen incorporates a Bluetooth Low Energy device to allow it to be controlled via a smartphone or tablet. The wireless link allows switching modes, changing brightness and other settings. 

Wide Screen Format Detection

Movies are often available in a widescreen letter boxing format. DreamScreen automatically identifies black spaces in the video stream on the top and bottom of the screen and uses color content below black spaces for LED light illumination. The detection is automatic. DreamScreen switches back to normal mode as soon as non-widescreen format is detected on the HDMI stream.

DreamScreen automatically detects WideScreen Letterboxing

High Resolution

Most HDMI televisions have 1920 x 1080 pixels. That’s a lot of pixels! A backlight with two or a dozen addressable channels will not show the required detail. With DreamScreen, each light source is addressable and even the smallest size (Classic) has 48 addressable points (LEDs). (Mega has 72 LEDs and Xtreme has 96 LEDs) This ensures that more detail on the screen is carried to the backlight. 

Mega Size has 72 Individually Addressable LEDs

 Brightness Control

DreamScreen allows users to select between four brightness settings that are based on an array of ambient lighting. The brightness settings can be applied to video, music and ambient mode.

Zone Control

Each DreamScreen ships with enough light strips to line up the complete periphery of your television. However, the DreamScreen App and/or stick allows you to select which zone is activated. You can light up the top, the sides, or the whole TV. 

Low Standby Power

DreamScreen places all backlighting and HDMI components on a low power standby state when HDMI stream is not detected (i.e. when cable box, ChromeCast or gaming console is turned off) or when Standby/Sleep mode is enabled on the App. In other words, in Video or Music Mode, turning off your HDMI source will turn off all the lights behind your television. 

For More

International Shipping/Customs

DreamScreen will send a trackable link once your order has shipped so you can closely monitor your package's trip overseas. Depending on your country's international customs/tariff laws you may be charged for fees and taxes applicable to your region as your order passes through customs. Any charges on a parcel must be paid by the person receiving the parcel. These charges are beyond our control or prediction. 
Please also note that it may also affect delivery time estimations and cause unexpected delays. In addition, there are instances where customs may refuse to process orders, impose unanticipated customs or duties on International shipments at their discretion, or even in rare cases, lose product. If needed, we do provide a Declaration of Conformity. To easily download the Declaration of Conformity click here, it is located in the Documents tab on the page.

For More Information Visit Our Website www.dreamscreentv.com

Visit our Forum: http://dreamscreen.boards.net/

story:
Please share this campaign and receive free Beads.

In order to receive the free Beads, please send us the screen shots or links of your shared message to info@aqal.co.uk and add your Indiegogo e-mail address in the subject for us to help us identify you.


Risks & Challenges

With any manufactured product there are risks and potential obstacles. 

During the prototyping period, we overcame many challenges to bring about the final design that we have today to share with the world.

As most of the effort has been completed to mass produce the product, we just require the investment to hand it over to the manufacturers to get started with production however manufacturing a product is complex involving many people, parts and tools all dependent on each other to keep things running smoothly. If one thing doesn't go as planned, it can lead to any number of disruptions along the production line and result in delays. If anything does come up along the way, we promise to handle it like the pros we are and will keep our supporters informed of any changes.

We expect nothing else must go wrong other than one thing, that is the exact delivery time. If the campaign is successful, we plan to finish the production, quality checks and packaging by early August, thereon the products must be ready to be shipped to the backer however delays at customs, port closures, etc. can prolong the time in which the delivery is expected.

We are confident in our experience and the efficiency of our suppliers to ensure pledges are made and shipped on time. Thank you so much for your support!

story:
It was bound to happen, and now the Raticator brings mobile technology and serious voltage to the world of pest control. View CNBC video

Rats and mice are a pain. But some people would rather not kill the little animals in a violent manner. Enter Raticator. This California company makes traps that electrocute rodents and kills them in a quick and “humane” manner, says company president Robert Noe… It also sends out a signal saying that it has done its job, so somebody can retrieve the unmangled carcass. Read full Newsweek article

My favourite product I found at CES is a Wi-Fi-connected rat trap. The Internet of Things is the big topic of the show this year, with Samsung using its keynote to lay out its vision of a connected future – without any detail – and hundreds of products on show for the connected home, car and person.

Taking this to its illogical conclusion is the Raticator, a rat trap which electrocutes the rodents and… there’s one less rat in the world.

The guys at the stand at CES said it was perfectly safe for children, and what could be better than opening your inbox to find a message from your Raticator saying: “We got ’em.” Read full IBT article

Meet the RATICATOR, a mesh-networked rodent trap that… zaps the unfortunate vermin with 10,000 volts of electricity (for two full minutes), and then sends a text saying where to find your crispy critter. It’s more humane than snapping their necks, poison, or a slowly starving them to death on a glue pad, says the Raticator’s inventor. We are not convinced the rats would agree. Read full Yahoo! Tech article

  • The Raticator Bluetooth sends you a text when it has been successful. It’s time to empty the unit and reset it, all without having to come in contact with the rodent.
  • The Raticator Bluetooth also sends a text if batteries need replacing.
  • The Raticator Bluetooth needs only 4AA batteries (Alkaline or Lithium) to deliver enough electricity to instantly dispatch a rodent once it enters the unit.
  • Humane, no poisons, no contact!

  • Bait the Raticator with any dry food product you have on hand: trail mix, nuts, cat or dog food, etc. If using moist food like peanut butter, cheese or canned pet food, place it in a plastic bottle cap and push to the back of the unit.
  • When the rodent enters the Raticator and makes its way for the bait, the system senses its presence and delivers enough electrical energy to quickly and humanely kill the rodent without blood or gore.
  • Tip the Raticator over an appropriate trash receptacle. Voila, the dead rodent is in the trash without having been touched!

We found that the devastation rodents cause in terms of disease and destruction of food supply runs farther and wider than we could have imagined.

Every year, thousands of humans suffer and die from the over 25 diseases that rats and mice transmit directly and indirectly, such as: Hantavirus, Lyme Disease, West Nile Virus, Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever and the Plague. Food loss due to rodents is staggering. International agricultural agencies estimate that in Asia alone, the annual food loss due to rodents could feed 200 million people a year. Rodent outbreaks can wipe out entire harvests and lead to famine like conditions.

The poisons and chemicals used for rodent control introduce equally devastating results: there are about 15,000 reports per year to the Center for Disease Control regarding children who have consumed rodenticides. Further, the poisoning of pets and secondary poisoning of wildlife is increasing.

Our Raticators are built in the USA. We have completed all development work on electronic components, design, and final plastic mold production; all parts can now be acquired to build the units. We have also completed software and programming for the Bluetooth feature of our product.

With the proceeds received from backers, we are going to expand our production capacity and buy more inventory.  We hope to be a strong influence in the rodent control marketplace.

In addition to our production goals, we plan to continue to build this innovative product in America.

We are an established company with reliable vendors and tested prototypes. Expansion of production with a new product can always offer challenges. We want to be very careful not to make unrealistic promises and not be able to deliver the Bluetooth Raticator on time. Our factory in the United States is ready to immediately commence manufacturing at the conclusion of the Indiegogo campaign. We would hope to actually have deliveries commenced before Christmas. We need your early support so that we can start making Bluetooth Raticators before the holiday season ends. We are launching the introduction and distribution of this very novel and useful product on Indiegogo. Supporters of this project will be the first to receive delivery of Bluetooth Raticators. Of course, there can always be unforeseen obstacles along the way which we cannot anticipate at the outset of this campaign. Quality production is very important to us. Thank you.

story:
Our Story                                                            

Vox Vapes is a small design house dedicated to creating amazing vape gear, and we love what we do. It's who we are. As a collective of family and friends we've continued to grow and mature, to evolve into what we are today. Most days, Vox Vapes is a labor of love.

Vox Vapes started as an internet retailer nearly three years ago with a very limited inventory, a small home office, and an eBay store. Honestly, we didn't expect much to come out of it, but were pleasantly surprised when our shiny, new (understaffed and underfunded) startup took off. Since our inception, we've transitioned from retailer, to wholesaler, and now into a fully functioning design house.

Our goal is to design and fabricate new vape products that are conceptually interesting, innovative, and easy to use. Selfishly, we design devices that we'd be ecstatic to use ourselves. It's a pretty sweet perk, but as fellow vapers, we hope you love our creations too.


The Mora RDA                                                      

When we set out to create a new RDA, our goal was a no-compromise design that produced exceptional flavor, colossal clouds, and appealed to a wide range of vapers and coil builders. After nearly two years in design and development and almost a dozen RDA samples, we are proud to introduce the Mora RDA, one of the best atomizers ever created.

The Mora RDA appears simple to the eye, but is packed full of nerdy engineering goodness. We started with the best materials available, medical-grade 316 stainless steel and PEEK insulators. The airflow is placed low on the RDA barrel in relation to where the coils sit, creating a stream of air that flows above, below, and around the coil, ensuring uniform cooling even on the hottest builds, maximum vapor production, and intense flavor. Each airflow slot on the Mora RDA opens sequentially, allowing an almost infinite number of possibilities.

Due to its unique design and airflow placement the Mora RDA produces incredible flavor on par with the best bottom-airflow atomizers on the market today, but is less prone to leaking and more adjustable to each individual's preferred vaping style.

If cloud chasing is your thing, the Mora is right for you. If flavor chasing is your thing, the Mora is right for you. If you're all about single coils and/or temperature control, then the Mora is right for you.

Features

  • Constructed from medical-grade 316 stainless steel
  • Triple-tier infinity airflow design with single coil option
  • 16mm wide-bore drip tip (insert included to use standard-size tips)
  • Large build deck, but small overall chamber size
  • 6mm deep juice well
  • PEEK insulators
  • Copper positive center pin



Our Partner, Pink Cloud Vape Shop             

With our sole focus on design and development of new vape products, Vox Vapes has excitedly jumped on the opportunity to partner up with Pink Cloud Vape Shop to distribute and sell our creations.

As fellow vapers, we turn to Pink Cloud first when needing new gear, juice, or accessories. Pink Cloud has a killer selection, great prices, and a sweet web store. Their staff and customer service is the best in the business and their support and commitment to the vaping community is unparalleled.

Pink Cloud will be the first store carrying the Mora RDA (both retail and wholesale) as well as future creations by Vox Vapes.



Our Campaign

The best part about our campaign is the Mora RDA is already in production! What this means is we have already locked down manufacturing and a supply chain, and will be able to fulfill any and all perks in a timely manner. But that doesn't mean we don't need any help.

Our goal is to raise at least $10,000 with this campaign. Your contributions will bolster our ability to run smoothly and efficiently during the Mora RDA roll-out, get a head start on future production runs, and lessen the financial burden brought on by research, design, and development of new products.

At Vox Vapes, we prefer to do things the right way the first time around. We don't cut corners and we don't expect anything for free. That's why we've come up with some seriously great perks for you to take advantage of.

The Perks

Our goal when designing perks for this campaign was to make them irresistible. At every level, you have the opportunity to pick up some crazy cool stuff (including the Mora RDA) at an unbeatable price. We want you to feel great about your contribution and about us here at Vox Vapes.



Risks & Challenges

Vox Vapes started out much smaller than it is today, but still has a lot of growing to do. As a small company of family and friends, we have poured our blood, sweat, tears, and most of our life savings into getting this far. We need your help to continue to move forward.

Speaking for myself and the rest of the staff on a personal level, Vox Vapes represents more than just a business. We depend on its success to put food on the table, pay off student loans, and take care of our families (humans and furry critters alike). We are proud to serve the vaping community. As all involved are avid vapers, this company is truly a labor of love. The companies in the vape community aren't just out to make a buck, they support each other. We're a part of this support. We want the best products for you, because we use them too.

  • Our employees really are the best of the best in their respective fields with tons of experience. We employ successful entrepreneurs, engineers, graphic designers, and artists. Even our accountant is a rockstar. Our staff has the experience, skills, tools, and vision to make Vox Vapes a rousing success. What we don't have is an extra $10,000. That's where you come in!

  • Help us help you. You want top of the line vape products at very reasonable prices? So do we. Help us fund this project and we'll continue to provide you with innovative, high-quality products and devices to bring you the tastiest, most mouthwatering clouds possible for many years to come.



Get Social With Us!

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help us grow and reach our goals (and score some sweet swag in the process).

Connect with us on social media! During the campaign we will be running regular giveaways for free devices and gear on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter so give us a follow to stay in the know. Extra cool points will be given for any sharing on blogs or websites.

  • Instagram: www.instagram.com/VoxVapes
  • Twitter: www.twitter.com/VoxVapes
  • Facebook: www.facebook.com/VoxVapes

And that's all there is to it.

We depend on its success to put food on the table, pay off student loans, and take care of our families (humans and furry critters alike). We are proud to serve the vaping community. Get Social With Us!
 Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help us grow and reach our goals (and score some sweet swag in the process). Connect with us on social media! Instagram: www.instagram.com/VoxVapes


Twitter: www.twitter.com/VoxVapes


Facebook: www.facebook.com/VoxVapes


   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hello. As i have already said I am Hata-tan or "Ramon Gerhards" and with this fundraiser i try to collect some money for a lot of purposes concerning my life.

1. A new PC has to be bought.

This is pretty obvious because without a good PC i can't stream or pretty much do anything, because I am really internet reliant nowadays and my CPU and RAM is far too low to do something productive with it.

2. I need money for starting off my life.

I am starting to go working up next month but I am afraid it won't be enough to pay all my expenses

(Internet,Gas,Electricity,Food etc.)

especially if my parents actually decide to kick me out of the house and stop supporting me as soon i will go to university.

3. I need a bit of money to visit my Girlfriend

I know.

That sounds like a horrible way to give valid reason for this fundraiser,but if i can i want to visit my Girlfriend Lola in the Netherlands at least one time in the near future.

For this i need money and with all the extra expenses i probably can't afford this.

4. Singing Equipment & Stuff

Also as people may know i love singing and being entertaining,but with my current setup i just cannot bring a lot of quality into it.

My Videos are mostly badly recorded and my soundquality sucks too, so i need the money for something better, like a TBone Mic & other sound devices.

-------------------------------------------------

What will i do in exchange for supporting this project?

We'll if i actually manage to get together a new PC and components then i promise to stream at least 3 -5 days a week.

I will stream a variety of games if i can get it to work (Osu,Darksouls,Isaac,speedrunning etc.)

At a defined schedule which will change when university begins.

Also I will make sure to play all your requests in osu! whenever i can.

Also i'll give you my whatsapp if you want to contact me privately just to talk with me and be friendly with me.

I am a pretty contact friendly guy so

I don't mind it at all.

If you are actually ready to fundraise my trip to my girlfriend then i will probably stream at her place and we will do a bunch of couple stuffs together and try to entertain you.

Also my stream will always have a singing time where you can request songs i'll do and just sing alcapella then.

(This may have a value for the people that actually feel entertained and like to deal with cringe in streams.)

i take any request then. So even if its super embarassing or Eighto DT..i'll try to do it for you then ♡

That would be everything.

I am not pretty optimistic with this fundraiser and i would be surprised if it actually worked out, but if i am successful with it then you guys will have my love anyday and i'll add you all and try to fulfill your wishes, because you showed me that you care for that one random person on this wide internet that is me.

Thank you and feel free to help.

I will try to be top motivated and engaging so you won't regret if you actually donate something ♡

Greetings

Hata-tan.

Actually.

i don't think at all that 2000 Dollars are doable

It sounds so utopic.

My expectations are maximum 100 $ from maybe my best friends...but maybe you can surprise me. :3

i'll will work to give it back to you...i promise!

story:
Meet Thumby

Thumby is the world’s first smart device controlled secure data storage device. Thumbyprotects your important data from prying eyes and thieves. It can be useable with any kind of Bluetooth supported Smart Phone , Smart Watch and Tablet devices . 

Thumby For Everyone

We believe in privacy. More or less, everyone keep their critical information in digital environments, therefore, protecting that information is essential. Identity information, bank accounts, credit cards, passwords of all kinds, private messages, corporate data, important project files, financial records, know-how information, chat logs, secret photos, private videos, sound records, etc. You can extend this list easily.

For a brief moment, think of losing your laptop , flash drive , hard drive or any storage device which holds all kinds of valuable sensitive data. You would be at the mercy of anyone who stumbles through it. Thanks toThumby, there’s no need to worry anymore. Your data remains to be secure even if your drive falls into the wrong hands.




Easy to Set Up and Use

Thumby is designed to replace your standard unsecure external hard drive enclosure. It’s not just compact and stylish it’s also extremely easy to set up and use, in just a few steps.

Each Thumby pack comes with a USB 3.0 cable, an instruction manual and a unique Unlock Pin.

You simply install your any 2.5” size hard drive into Thumby and connect it to your computer through the USB port. Finally pair your smart device with the Thumby Drive. That’s all there is to it! Now you’re ready to safely store your valuable data.

Automatic Locking/Unlocking Feature

Thumby drive uses Bluetooth connection for lock and unlock operations.When you inside the Bluetooth connection range with your securely paired smart device ,  Thumby automatically unlocks your drive and you can access your sensitive data directly. When you go to the out of this range , Thumby locks your drive automatically and stored data inside of your drive can not accessible after that. This lock/unlock process done in the background , You don’t need to do anything to manage this process.


Manual Locking/Unlocking Feature

Sometimes may you want to lock or unlock your data manually.Thumby only unlock your encrypted data if your securely paired smart device inside of the Bluetooth connection range , if you turn off Bluetooth connection of your smart device , Thumby automatically locks your data. This mean you can stay it lock position even when you inside of the unlock range.

You can simply control your Thumby drive with your smart device by turning on or off your smart device’s Bluetooth feature.


Elegant Design

After designing a fair amount of different prototypes, we finally made Thumby that is beautifully and minimally designed. It is stylish and lightweight.


Technical Specifications

Thumby uses Bluetooth technology in order to communicate with your Smart Device. Thumby encrypts your data on-the-fly, using a hardware encryption chip. For that reason, encryption/decryption process does not slow down your data transfer. Thumby supports USB 3.0 protocol.



Compatibility


Computer
Windows , MACOS , Linux

Smart Device

Phone : IOS , Android , Windows Phone , BlackBerry OS , Tizen , Symbian …

Tablet : IOS , Android

Watch : Android Wear ,Apple Watch



Perks for Our Contributors

In early bird period, shipment is FREE and the single unit price is $20 OFF.
Thumby costs only for $49 at the moment.
Do not miss out this chance.




Thumby Project Timeline


Shipment Details

* We will ship Thumby all around the world without any exceptions.
* If you order Thumby in earlybird period , shipment is free.
   After this , you will be charged.
* International Registered Air Mail will be used for deliveries.
* You will be able to track your package with the provided tracking number.
* Delivery takes 8 to 20 working days depending on your destination. 

Risks & Challenges

We know what it takes to deliver on schedule. We know that every project has it’s challenges. We’re confident that our experience in design, engineering and manufacturing helps us know what to expect and how to handle the unexpected.

A lot of time and effort is spent on developing Thumby. We’ve come a long way and now we need your help to finalize our development and go into mass production.

We understand that given the opportunity to be here on Indiegogo and to get support within the community is also an obligation. We will update you frequently as well as we always will appreciate any input on our project.


Our Team

We’re an independent team passionate about creating innovative technologies through collaboration. We are passionate about utilizing technology to make lives simpler. Our team has designed, manufactured many devices before.


Spread the Word

Even if you can’t contribute, we kindly ask for your help to spread the word around. We’re grateful to you for sharing Thumby Drive project on social media with the Indiegogos haring tools or e-mailing the page link to someone you think could benefit from the convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that we provide. Thanks in advance.

Website      : www.thumbydrive.com
Twitter        : www.twitter.com/ThumbyDrive
Facebook   : www.facebook.com/ThumbyDrive
Vimeo          : www.vimeo.com/ThumbyDrive
Youtube      : www.youtube.com/ThumbyDrive


Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Do I need to buy a new hard drive for Thumby?

A: Not necessarily if you have a spare one.

Q: I don’t have a storage drive. What would you recommend?

A: Mechanic drives best choice for price/performance.

Q: If I remove the hard drive from Thumby, can I access the data elsewhere?

A: No, you can’t. That’s the whole point of having Thumby.

Q: If I lose my Phone or Smart Device , will I be able to recover my data?

A: Yes. You can connect to your Thumby with unique Unlock Pin with any Smart Device

Q:Thumby specifications can change before delivery?

A: Only minor changes are possible.

Q: Can I use multiple Thumby Drives with my Smart Device?

A: Yes. Multiple Drives are supported.
story_txt:
Meet Thumby
Thumby is the
world’s first smart device controlled secure data storage device. Thumbyprotects your important data from prying
eyes and thieves. It can be useable with any kind of Bluetooth supported Smart
Phone , Smart Watch and Tablet devices . Thumby For Everyone
We believe
in privacy. More or less, everyone keep their critical information in digital
environments, therefore, protecting that information is essential. Identity
information, bank accounts, credit cards, passwords of all kinds, private
messages, corporate data, important project files, financial records, know-how
information, chat logs, secret photos, private videos, sound records, etc. You
can extend this list easily.
For a brief
moment, think of losing your laptop , flash drive , hard drive or any storage
device which holds all kinds of valuable sensitive data. You would be at the
mercy of anyone who stumbles through it. Thanks toThumby, there’s no need to
worry anymore. Your data remains to be secure even if your drive falls into the
wrong hands.



Easy to
Set Up and UseThumby is designed to replace your standard
unsecure external hard drive enclosure. It’s not just compact and stylish it’s
also extremely easy to set up and use, in just a few steps.

Each Thumby pack comes with a USB 3.0 cable, an
instruction manual and a unique Unlock Pin.
You simply
install your any 2.5” size hard drive into Thumby and
connect it to your computer through the USB port. Finally pair your smart
device with the Thumby Drive. That’s all there is to it! Now you’re ready to
safely store your valuable data.

Automatic
Locking/Unlocking Feature
Thumby drive
uses Bluetooth connection for lock and unlock operations.When you inside the Bluetooth connection range with your securely paired smart
device ,  Thumby automatically unlocks
your drive and you can access your sensitive data directly. When you go to the
out of this range , Thumby locks your drive automatically and stored data
inside of your drive can not accessible after that. This lock/unlock process
done in the background , You don’t need to do anything to manage this process.



Manual
Locking/Unlocking Feature


Sometimes
may you want to lock or unlock your data manually.Thumby only unlock your
encrypted data if your securely paired smart device inside of the Bluetooth
connection range , if you turn off Bluetooth connection of your smart device ,
Thumby automatically locks your data. This mean you can stay it lock position
even when you inside of the unlock range.
You can
simply control your Thumby drive with your smart device by turning on or off
your smart device’s Bluetooth feature.



Elegant
Design


After designing a fair amount of different prototypes, we
finally made Thumby that is beautifully and minimally designed. It is
stylish and lightweight.


Technical Specifications
Thumby uses Bluetooth technology in order to
communicate with your Smart Device. Thumby encrypts your data on-the-fly, using a
hardware encryption chip. For that reason, encryption/decryption process does
not slow down your data transfer. Thumby supports USB 3.0 protocol.




Compatibility



ComputerWindows , MACOS , Linux

Smart Device
Phone : IOS , Android ,
Windows Phone , BlackBerry OS , Tizen , Symbian …
Tablet
: IOS
, Android
Watch
: Android
Wear ,Apple Watch



Perks for Our Contributors




In early bird period,
shipment is FREE and the single unit price
is $20
OFF.
Thumby costs only for $49 at
the moment.
Do not miss out this chance.





Thumby Project Timeline






Shipment Details


* We will ship Thumby all around the world without any exceptions.* If you order Thumby in earlybird period , shipment is free.   After this , you will be charged.* International Registered Air Mail will be used for deliveries.* You will be able to track your package with the provided tracking number.* Delivery takes 8 to 20 working days depending on your destination. 


Risks & Challenges
We know what
it takes to deliver on schedule. We know that every project has it’s challenges. We’re confident that our
experience in design, engineering and manufacturing helps us know what to
expect and how to handle the unexpected.
A lot of time
and effort is spent on developing Thumby. We’ve come a long way and now we need your help to
finalize our development and go into mass production. 
We understand
that given the opportunity to be here on Indiegogo and
to get support within the community is also an obligation. We will update you
frequently as well as we always will appreciate any input on our project.

Our Team
We’re an
independent team passionate about creating innovative technologies through
collaboration. We are passionate about utilizing technology to make lives
simpler. Our team has designed, manufactured many devices before.

Spread the Word
Even if you
can’t contribute, we kindly ask for your help to spread the word around. We’re
grateful to you for sharing Thumby Drive project
on social media with the Indiegogos haring
tools or e-mailing the page link to someone you think could benefit from the
convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that we provide. Thanks in
advance.
Website 
    : www.thumbydrive.com
Twitter        : www.twitter.com/ThumbyDriveFacebook   
: www.facebook.com/ThumbyDrive
Vimeo          : www.vimeo.com/ThumbyDrive
Youtube      : www.youtube.com/ThumbyDrive

Frequently
Asked Questions
Q: Do I need
to buy a new hard drive for Thumby?
A: Not
necessarily if you have a spare one.
Q: I don’t
have a storage drive. What would you recommend?
A: Mechanic
drives best choice for price/performance.
Q: If I
remove the hard drive from Thumby, can I access the data elsewhere?
A: No, you
can’t. That’s the whole point of having Thumby.
Q: If I lose
my Phone or Smart Device , will I be able to recover my data?
A: Yes. You
can connect to your Thumby with
unique Unlock Pin with any Smart Device
Q:Thumby specifications can change before
delivery?
A: Only minor
changes are possible.
Q: Can I use
multiple Thumby Drives with my Smart Device?
A: Yes.
Multiple Drives are supported.

story:
"Flat Attack is a Revolution in emergency mobile phone and other device charging "


Flat Attack is a revolution in disposable AA battery, mobile phone charging.

It is the most powerful,  technologically advanced, single AA battery operated, mobile phone charger (Portable Power Stick) in the World, using state of art circuitry.

Other Rechargable types will go dead, just like your mobile phone if NOT constanly charged over and over again.

Flat Attack's battery will last up to 10 years if not used !!!!!!!

Also : There are many cheap AA battery operated chargers in the market now. They do not work at that best you will be lucky to get 10% charge. Also they do not charge all smart phones especially Apple phones. Flat Attack charges ALL smart phones

Flat Attack has a very advanced circuit board that has been developed over 4 years.



Flat Attack will give you  7 or more hours of extra standby time on all smart phones (android and Apple) 4 hours of constant texting and over an hour of constant talking.  Not bad for a AA battery ?

Flat Attack is ready to use from the box, unlike rechargeable power sticks on the market now, that require a top up charge for 6-8 hours or more.

Works instantly and has NO LEADS TO CARRY AROUND.


Do not waste your money on rechargeable power sticks, they run out of juice within 2-6 weeks, if not constantly charged, like your mobile phone. Flat Attack will not go dead like rechargeable power sticks. AA batteries last for years when not in use.

AA batteries are available  24 hours a day and work instantly to charge your phone. Problem solved.



This is the problem


 


This is the solution



Note the Apple adapter (30 Pin - Apple 4 / Ipod)  held securely in place with the key ring holder, when not in use. Flat Attack can go on your key ring or bag, its so small.


This is another current problem


 U.S. Tightens Security on Electronics at Overseas Airports

WASHINGTON — The Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will not allow cell phones or other electronic devices on U.S.-bound planes at some overseas airports if the devices are not charged up.

Officials are concerned that a cellphone, tablet, laptop or other electronic device could be used as an explosive device.

New Focus on Electronic Devices for U.S.-Bound Airline Passengers — Reuters First published July 7th 2014, 1:49 am.

Imagine you had a flat - dead mobile phone and  a flat - dead recharger. This could mean you will lose both devices, on the spot at the security check point.


This is the solution


Leave a Flat Attack in your travel bags. The battery can last well over 2 years  or more. It is a must pack item.


Flat Attack charging a Samsung Galaxy S2 Android (Micro USB) on the left and a Apple Iphone 5S (8 pin Lightning) on the right. Also note the Apple adapter (8 Pin Lightning) held securely in place with the key ring holder, when not in use.

Flat Attack is far more than a phone charger. Look below and see what else it can charge.


Flat Attack charging a GoPro Camera, using a Mini USB B adapter clipped onto the Micro USB Port.

All 3 colours of Flat Attack available on our pledges



New Perk - Full Trauma First Aid Kit


Being in the Australian Fire and Rescue for 10 years, I know a great first aid kit when I see it.


This is the must have for your:

1.  Home, Car and Camping

This kit will treat the smallest cut to a major bleed.  Put one Flat Attack inside of it and you are complete for any situation.


Normally this kit will RRP at $60 AUD you get it for almost half price.





Refer a friend and and make money at the end of our fund raiser


We're giving to a slice of the pie ! Flat Attack  Referral Rewards Program enables you to make money just by sharing our project.

We're now offering a 10% commission on every pledge you bring in. The baseline for this program starts at $250. Once you've referred $250 worth of pledges via your IGG unique URL, you'll automatically be eligible for participation and set to receive your payout at the end of the campaign.

For example: Say you bring in $10,000 in referrals that's $1000 in your pocket and all you had to do was get people to click your link and pre-order any of the Perks.

How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! You can even track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."



Add On Extra Item Just Released

Key Chain Cable

Due to overwhelming demand we have been asked to release our key chain cable early.

The key chain cable is just  a key that is a shorter version of your current Android or Apple lead, but without the bulky charger and the leads.

You just carry it around on your key ring and when you have power, such as a USB port from a laptop computer or any USB port, you can charge your phone and download as well, via this key.

Comes in an Apple version and Android.  $18 AUD Only cheaper than every other version on the market now !



Thanks for the support so far:





Deb-tone Enterprises is a new technology company specializing in Mobile phone charging soloutions. From Perth, Australia, we decided to use the Indiegogo to launch Flat Attack and ship our first products to you, our backers !

We loved the idea that you can pledge and regardless wether we make the Minimum we have asked for - we keep the funds so YOU GET YOUR PLEDGE 100%, unlike KIckstarter.

With your support, the funds raised will be used to reach minimum order quantities ASAP, even before the campaign has finished, with our factory and go straight into the first full production run, package and ship it to you. 

You get Flat Attack FIRST in the World, so you can give Flat Attack to your friends and loved ones. We ship direct from the USA to all over the World.

Your money will also help design our next generation Flat Attack - Festival Pack, which will be a special use charger, for when you go to long fesivals, 2 days camping away from power and also long power outages in your house.

This will be contained in a small cardboard box the size of your phone and will contain 3 long life powerful batteries.

Don't put your children, friends, loved ones, elderly and yourself at risk of not being able to contact each other by their mobile phones.

 


Flat Attack weighs  .035 Kgs or 35 grams including the battery - length is 100 mm Width is 20 mm.

The driver delivers a 500mAh 5v output required for most mobile devices on the market to date. Power source = 1 x AA battery 1.5V (3100mAh).

Real Techy  Stuff:

Flat Attack Technical Specifications - by Jake King - Security Engineer Hootsuite Canada and Design and Electrical Consultant, R&D. Debtone Enterprises (some information has been omitted to protect IP)

The Flat Attack charging device, is a slim form factor multi platform emergency charging device, that utilises SMD components and multi-layer PCB construction to minimise footprint and increase efficiency. The initial design and implementation of Flat Attack has changed over a number of revisions and has been refined into a device capable of use in a variety of environments with regular use.

Flat Attack uses the common AA size battery, to allow for maximum compatibility with cutting edge lithium cells (used in cameras, phones, mobile gaming devices, etc) while retaining compatibility with existing Alkaline or Layer-Construction batteries with great efficiency. Depending on phone model and specifications of the internal battery of the mobile device, gains of up to 57% have been recorded in test environments with Lithium Cells, and up to 25% in Alkaline. (Data available by request).


The circuit is simple in nature removing many of the pitfalls of devices in similar categories - By reducing the component count to a minimum bare bones solution, points of failure are decreased and efficiency is maintained. Simple indicator LED’s have been chosen to maximise the current able to be delivered to the battery and reduce the complexity of interfaces associated with typical products of this nature.

The driver delivers a 500mAh 5v output required for most mobile devices on the market to date. This not only meets requirements for EMI and CE certification, but also provides a low noise output with sensitive electronics in mind.

Power source = 1 x AA battery 1.5V ( 3100mAh).





Why We Went Green


“There will be 2.3 billion smartphone users in 2015 which will contribute to the 4.75 billion people worldwide using a mobile phone” Source: Emarketer.com

Flat Attack has been designed to comply with the new (green) environmental standards that have been implemented for charging devices to the European Standard, which have been the standard in Europe since 2010. (Micro USB Port).

This standard has been implemented to save the hydrocarbon waste which is produced by having multiple chargers or leads and adapters for different phones. Hence the reduction of excessive hydrocarbon wastes eg: plastics being discarded.

Flat Attack (Trade Marked) has been designed to comply with the new environmental standards and has a Micro USB port. This Micro USB port is 50% more energy efficient and will now be the preferred charger pin for all devices. This means no leads that end up in rubbish fills and damage the environment.


"Always Stay Connected”



Flat Attack is the idea of former Full time Fire-fighter, Anthony Peacock, who saw the need for an emergency phone charger
that was compact, small and did not require power cables.

Fighting fires as well as a long stint in the Regular Army Airborne, often meant Anthony went long periods of time away from a power source, which rendered his mobile phone useless in the field.

The resulting idea was to create a keyring sized universal device charger which was powered by one AA battery and didn't need an initial charge.


Meet My Amazing Aussiie Team


Malcome Bull - Director (Spring Web Designs)

Robert and Stuart ( Electrical Gurus and Audit team)

Ed and Sharon Kourey and Team Form Designs (Industrail Designers)

Jake King - Computer Scientist - Aussie ex pat, now in Vancouver with Hootsuite



Miguel - Video Guru

Michael - Video Guru

Paul "POM"  Australia Special Forces - field testing of Flat Attack


Element Hydrographics - Field testing in Australia Bush


Arna - Bussiness Women and mentor




  Pay it Forward


We as Aussies like to pay our way as well. So we would like to help anyone that helps us by paying it forward.

Can you please help spread the word further ?

Share this page socially with your friends and loved one or just copy this link:

http://igg.me/at/FlatAttack/x




FAQ

  • Can one AA battery really power my phone?
  • It sure can, we have world leading electronics, developed by our cutting edge technicians. They have worked for 4 years to ensure Flat Attack is one of a kind.

  • What do I do once the AA battery goes Flat ?

  • When Flat Attack runs out of power, you just unscrew the top and put in a new AA battery. Instant power, no recharging time.

  • How does Flat Attack charge Apple iPods and other Apple devices ?

  • Easy as, we made a special connector securely clips on the key ring, that holds your particular Apple product connector.

    These adapters are available with every Flat Attack sold in all pledges.

    This way everywhere you go, you can charge either an android phone with the Micro USB connector that comes with the Flat Attack, Apple product or other devices.

  • Can a AA battery really power my phone?”, As I think there may be a perception out there that AA batteries don’t hold much charge ?

  • Sure can as long as you use a lithium battery you can get up to 57% charge.

  • What devices can Flat Attack charge?

  • Flat Attack will charge any device that charges via Micro USB or a Lightning Connector: smartphones, tablets, mp3 players, most point and shoot cameras, rugged video cameras such as GoPro, eReaders, Bluetooth devices and much more.

  • How does it work?

  • Its ready to go, it comes with a AA battery. When the battery is flat you put another in and works instantly.

  • Can I use Flat Attack anywhere?

  • Yes! Flat Attack is designed for everyday use and is adventure proofed. But not waterproof.

  • How will Flat Attack connect to my device?

  • Each Flat Attack will come with an inbuilt Micro USB and you can put a Apple 4, 5,5c, 5s or 6 small adapter (included in the purchase) on the end of the Micro USB. So in effect you can charge all smart phones.

  • What type of AA battery can I use ?

  • You can use any AA battery of preference including lithium, rechargeable and alkaline.


    ADDING POSTAGE THE SIMPLE WAY


  • What is the best way to add postage for the USA and Rest Of The World

  • Once you have selected your perk you will go to the check out and see your selection.

  • Below you will see contributions section. This is where you can add postge with out using the Perk Postage area.

  • For the  USA simply select the custom button in Blue and put in $6 and $10 for Rest of The World.  You only need to add postage once even for multiple perks.

shoot cameras, rugged video cameras such as GoPro, eReaders, Bluetooth 
devices and much more.





How does it work?


Its ready to go, it comes with a AA battery. When the  battery is flat you put another in and works instantly.





Can I use Flat Attack anywhere?


Yes! Flat Attack is designed for everyday use and is adventure proofed. But not waterproof.





How will Flat Attack connect to my device?


Each Flat Attack will come with an inbuilt Micro USB and you can put  a 
Apple 4, 5,5c, 5s or 6 small adapter (included in the purchase) on the 
end of the Micro USB. So in effect you can charge all smart phones.





What type of AA battery can I use ?

You can use any AA battery of preference including lithium, rechargeable and alkaline.ADDING POSTAGE THE SIMPLE WAY



What is the best way to add postage for the USA and Rest Of The World

Once you have selected your perk you will go to the check out and see your selection. 

Below you will see contributions section. This is where you can add postge with out using the Perk Postage area.

For the  USA simply select the custom button in Blue and put in $6 and $10 for Rest of The World.  You only need to add postage once even for multiple perks.

story:
Kyrgyzstan has long been considered the “Switzerland of Central Asia.”  The vast alpine regions of the country contain an incredible array of biodiversity with many endangered and endemic species of flora and fauna, both within national parks and across the extensive landscapes.  However, the resources available to help inform and educate the public about the importance of biodiversity and of conservation in Kyrgyzstan are extremely limited. With support from Plateau Perspectives, the aim of this project is to build a smartphone app that will provide people with a means to learn about the country's wildlife and interact with its network of national parks and other protected areas.  Local people and regional/international travellers alike will thus find new opportunities to learn about the importance of biodiversity through enjoyment of nature - simultaneously raising environmental awareness and promoting the conservation of biodiversity in Kyrgyzstan.   

Map of Kyrgyzstan, with "Mountains of Central Asia" biodiversity hotspot indicated in pale green and protected areas in darker green. (Source: Global Forest Watch)

Project Location

The initial app project will focus on the Ala Archa National Park in the Tian Shan Mountains south of Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan.  Ala Archa NP covers approximately 200 square kilometres of alpine terrain and ranges in elevation from 1,500 metres to nearly 5,000 metres at its highest peak.  Due to the varied elevation and rugged topography, there are many different bio-zones throughout the park, allowing for a great diversity of habitats and rich biodiversity to be present within its boundaries. Current estimates for butterflies, for example, indicate approximately 100 species within the relatively small area of Ala Archa National Park. 

Ala Archa National Park is a beautiful example of Central Asian mountain ecosystems.  This view looks towards the Ak Sai Glacier area in the south.

Short-Term Goal 

We plan to make a wildlife identification guide available as an iPhone app by the end of 2015. This app will allow users to easily identify the main butterfly species that are known or expected to occur in the Ala Archa area. Species identification will be based on family/shape and a summary of their natural history, conservation status and other key features will also be included.  Users will also find the tools necessary to allow them to become “citizen scientists” - specifically, they will have the means to upload their own photographs of butterflies and thus to contribute to a growing wildlife monitoring database via the app.  This citizen science will be complemented with location data provided by the phone’s GPS system, to build a better picture of each butterfly species' distribution.  Data collection will be an important aspect of this app (as well as serving as a field guide) as it will allow new information that is collected by citizen scientists to be used by research scientists interested in how environmental changes may be impacting the geographic distribution, altitudinal range and population of different species.  Of particular interest is the situation of the Apollo butterfly, Parnassius apollo, the only species of butterfly in Kyrgyzstan currently listed in the International Red Book of Endangered Species published by IUCN - The World Conservation Union.

The Apollo butterfly (Parnassius apollo) is listed as a vulnerable species. Data that is collected by the app's users will allow research scientists to learn more about this species. Butterflies are increasingly recognised as 'indicators' of climate change.

Project Implementation

This conservation field guide project will be carried out in two parts, which often will occur simultaneously. The first component is app development, while the second will be data acquisition.  We have already begun some aspects of this innovative project.

App development:  The app will initially be developed with an exclusive focus on butterfly identification. However the internal architecture of the app will allow for future addition of other taxonomic groups, as well as a broader geographic scope.

Data acquisition:  Data acquisition will be undertaken in two parts.  Original field observations and collections will take place in Ala Archa National Park. Butterfly specimens will be sought and photographed in situ, and if necessary collected for later identification.  Secondary data will also be collected from published sources including books and journals as well as other field reports.  This dual approach will allow for the best possible descriptions to be written for each butterfly species, including narrative sections and photographs of clearly identified specimens.


Project Timeline


How You Can Help

Research and app development require both time and money.  Our initial aim is to launch a beta version of the iPhone wildlife field guide app by November 2015 - but we cannot do this on our own, and there are several ways that you can help! 

We are seeking to raise at least $7,500* for the following project components:

  • App development:  This takes time, time, and more time.  Hours add up quickly! We will be providing much of the graphic design elements for the project in an effort to keep costs down, but will be hiring a professional app development team to take care of the main app structure.
  • Data collection equipment:  Ranging from simple insect pins for laboratory based identification to more specialised GPS-enabled data collection units... everything costs something!
  • Print resources:  The strange thing about buying published materials about the butterflies of Kyrgyzstan is that rarely are such important resources actually available in Kyrgyzstan!  Available resources are difficult to find, sometimes expensive, and must be shipped from abroad.
  • Field work expenses:  Park entrance fees, transportation, lodging and food costs also are an unfortunate reality of any conservation project. Many days will be spent at elevations over 3,500 metres above sea level in a tent eating canned food.  Please help us stay warm and fed!

Unable to support us financially, but still want to help make this project a reality?  Share this campaign through social media with people you know who may be interested in butterflies and/or environmental education and conservation efforts in developing countries like Kyrgyzstan.  Help us get the word out!


Biodiversity conservation and environmental education are more important now than ever before.  Hopefully you will choose to be a part of our effort here in the mountains of Central Asia - and to help make knowledge about the flora and fauna, the mountain habitats, and the national parks of Kyrgyzstan more accessible than ever before. This special project will be greatly appreciated by anyone who wishes to learn about and contribute to a more sustainable future for one of the most incredible places on the planet.


* This campaign is specifically to raise funds for the first phase of a larger scale project.  Any additional funds that are raised during this campaign will be applied towards future phases of this project.  Phase 2 will focus on extending the app to android devices. Phases 3+ will allow us to add more taxonomic groups such as birds, mammals, and plants, as well as more regions in Central Asia.  The more we can raise now, the better this project will be from the start!

story:
Apple iPhone users can now join Android users in enjoying the benefits of using Micro-SD card drive with their Apple iPhone, iPad, & iTouch. With the DrivePlus users can: add photos, videos, and files from the DrivePlus(Drive+) directly to their Apple devices and save them to the DrivePlus to conserve space on their devices.

The Drive+ comes with an integrated Apple Lightning connector and a regular USB connector. Supports most Apple iOS file types and all the common file types in use today.

FEATURES:

  • With replaceable Micro-SD card ,8GB,16GB,32GB,up to 64GB(FAT32 format).
  • Free universal iPhone/iPad/iPod touch App.
  • Copy/Move files between Apple Device and Drive+.
  • Open files directly from the Drive+ without the need to copy to the Apple Device.
  • Playback Videos/Music directly from Drive+.
  • File Management (Create ,Copy ,Move,Delete ,Rename ,Open in ,and many more ).
  • Backup Photos/Videos from iDevice Camera Roll to Drive+.
  • Secured file Encryption for private files.

Compatible with:
iPhone 6Plus/6/5/5s/5c
iPad (4th Generation) & iPad Air
iPad mini & iPad mini with Retina display
iPod touch (5th Generation)
All Macs and PCs

Many users know the value of using USB hard drives to transport data from one device to another,it’s easy, fast, and convenient. Other phones can transfer data through memory card, but the iPhone has never had this feature until now,with the DrivePlus (Drive+).

The DrivePlus (Drive+) allows you to move all your movies, music, documents, and files quickly and safely to all your other devices (computers, iPhones, iPads, and iTouches) with ease. No need for cellular data, Internet, wireless networks, or Cloud access when using the Drive+.

EASY-TO-USE APP:

STREAM MUSIC&MOVIES:

Drive+ also allows music and movies to be streamed directly from Drive+ to an iPhone or iPad, making it a perfect travel accessory.Now you can watch movies INSTANTLY anywhere, anytime!

Risks and Challenges:

We have established a close relationship with our manufacturing partner in Hong Kong, who has been manufacturing grade A quality products for us. We also have another manufacturer in Shenzhen. both have been proven with high production capability, therefore manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

Anything can happen to cause delays: (i.e: production delays, parts delivery, Carrier delays, Holidays etc.)  We will do everything to make sure your perks arrive on time.

Please SHARE if you like our product ,there are sharing tools at main image below :

Your help:

We are really excited about this, and we hope you are, too. Now we need your help to bring DrivePlus into your pocket.
As a supporter you will get your DrivePlus at a very special price! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends. Every price includes shipping!

About us:

story:
NiftyKey is a USB hardware token that secures your PC when you are away. It is more secure than Windows Login, similar software and is password-free. The principle is simple: Unplug the USB key if you go away and plug it back in to continue work. Just like your front door!

NiftyKey was designed in collaboration with professional hackers and provides protection against common tools used to bypass Windows Login. It is completely autonomous and does not interact with the standard Windows tools, so it will still run, even when the Windows authentication was cracked (using KonBoot, for example).


NiftyKey is convenient. It is easier than using a password, yet you still have the ability to secure your PC. By the way, you can set an optional Master Password to ensure access even when you lost your physical key. You can also assign multiple PCs to one key / multiple keys to one PC.

NiftyKey is cheap. Only $15 for your personal key including international shipping. Updates and Upgrades (additional features) are free and will always be.

NiftyKey is safe. This does not only include the security aspect. NK is completely Made In Germany under safe working conditions. All used materials are free from harmful substances.


How do I get my NiftyKey?

Choose the $15 perk "NiftyKey". Your NK will be shipped by the end of this campaign.

Do i have to pay shipping?

No. International shipping is included :)

Can I use my NiftyKey at my Mac?

No, not at this moment. There are plans to further develop the software to be usable with other OS when the campaign was successful.

What if someone pulls out my key while I'm working on the PC?

Nothing will be lost. The NiftyKey does not use the Windows Logout. You can continue your work when your key is back in.

What if I lose my key?

Don't worry. You can set a backup password for when you lose your key.

I broke my key?

We provide a warranty of 1 year. If your key was damaged (not purposefully), we will replace it.

The campaign ended, how do I get one?

If the campaign ended successfully, you'll be still able to buy one on this very site. We take advantage of Indiegogos awesome InDemand program, which enables post-campaign sales.

I don't need one, but I'd still like to contribute. What can I do?

To help us out, you can share this site with your friends. Show them how easy and cheap security can be ;)

story:
Short Summary

Phonecaseclub.com was born over beer with friends and the simple human need to want change! While Holly (my wife) was sharing "ooooo's & awwwww's" at a baby shower, I was hanging out at a nearby bar with the daddy to be. He was telling me that he breaks his brand name case (rhymes with shottertox) every other month. He just mails in his case and gets a new replacement. But in order to do that, he was willing to spend $60 for the original buy! 

That was my light bulb moment and Phonecaseclub.com was born. Simply put Phonecaseclub is the modern day Netflix for cell phone cases. It's as easy as logging on toPhonecaseclub.com and signing up. You pay $8/month and receive a new case EVERY month. No signup fees, No shipping costs, No annual contracts! You also have the option to pause and/or cancel your subscription if need be. You may change the frequency from a new phone case every month to, every other month, every 3 months, every 6 months, etc. Our cases are made of, the best quality and style!

It's time we stopped paying high prices for something that is not just functional but also essential. Phonecaseclub.com is our answer to those name brand companies!

What We Need & What You Get

We need to get $25,000 to bring this project to life. The money will go accomplish the following goals:

  1. Create a custom E-Commerce platform. 
  2. Procure inventory. 
  3. Online marketing & promotions. 
  4. Running the day to day operations. 

Risks & Challenges

Our team has 15 years of combined experience in management & leadership. We are confident in Phonecaseclub.  However, Phonecaseclub is a new market within the subscription industry. We have never built a custom E-commerce platform from scratch. Indiegogo funding will give us validation & confidence to launch phonecaseclub.com, invest in building the E-comm platform and purchase the inventory required to full fill monthly orders.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for stopping by! Please remember to share this with your friends/family/co-workers/pets! Word of mouth is the best form of promotion. Every little bit helps. It's time to change, because now we can!
