story:
Introducing The Smart Iron. Proof That The Smart Iron is a Smart Idea.

Most of us can remember a time when we turn off our iron after we were doing ironing our clothes or worried if we did after we left the house.  An iron left on for long periods of time definitely wastes a lot of energy and could possibly cause a life-risking fire.

We've solved that problem with  auto shut off thanks to our patented technology that detects  when the iron is idle for a while leading to it safely shutting it self down. 


How Our Smart Iron Works.

We have an accelerometer chip installed in the Iron. It detects the idle state of the iron  by detecting the absence of ironing motion and switches off the Iron  after a set time. Since it completely shuts off Iron , it is safe and avoid the use of power.

More Features
 We are not just stopping there with Auto -Switch off. In addition to that we are also including features to manage Iron from a smart phone



Mobile and Home Automation Mesh Connectivity
Iron box is equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 Enabled micro controller. Bluetooth Mesh network enables the Iron  to advertise its status over the home automation Mesh network. Phone and Home automation consoles can display Iron status and parameters like temperature,  power usage, water level etc.

Temperature Control
Precise temperature control with the use of a semiconductor temperature sensor and micro-controller. The iron's temperature can be set from your mobile phone . When the temperature reaches the set level and ready to use it give you an audio alert on your smart phone.  No waiting by the iron while it's warming up; you can be about your business around your home taking care of other things until your iron tells you it's ready.

Auto switch off idle time for Horizontal and Vertical positions
Conventional irons are designed sit in a vertical position when not in use even for a short while. The Smart Iron  detects the position of the iron and allows the user to set an idle time at different positions. It's customary to allow for a longer idle time when our smart iron is in the vertical position so the iron doesn't get cold if you need to take a phone call or check on your dinner cooking on the stove. There are factory-set idle times for both positions  of 5 minutes but can be changed to any time up to a maximum of 15 minutes.

Block Diagram (Simple Mode)


Voice Alerts on Your Smart Phone; Your Iron is Calling!
 Smart Iron is equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 to advertise its status to a home's network or to any connected mobile phones that have Bluetooth. This allows it to generate voice alerts on mobile apps announcing status.

Usage History and Power Consumption
Smart Iron keeps track of the usage history allowing the user to collect the power consumed during any given time period. If you're like most people, you want to lower your monthly bills and the Smart Iron app helps you monitor electricity consumption which can help you lower your monthly electric bills. 


The Story It is the era of IOT, we as a Home Automation Company did our brain storming to connect every single appliance and equipments and make our system a complete IOT enabled Home Automation System which makes a smart home even smarter. We have included every possible type of equipment in our plan and our Iron  is not an exception. When we thought about Iron  we ended up with a new innovation. We haven't left out the pressure cooker, the light bulb, a wall clock etc. and soon we will come out with a complete IOT campaign.  We made an unexpected decision to come out with Iron first to make a little fund for our R&D efforts.


Risks & Challenges
We have already developed the Basic Dry Iron version of SmartIron. We kept the thermostat active and it can override the temperature settings of the mobile app. This is kept like this to make the device independent of mobile phones. Other settings can work by default or once set value is remembered by the iron. Though we made it a connected device we are also keeping it as a stand alone device with out any dependance to the Mobile Phones or Home automation Network.

Welcome to the world of Internet of Small Small Things-The MetaBox
When you are ordering a perk , you are stepping in to the world of IOT. All of us here at the Meta Innovation team is working on array of IOT devices. All compatible to our Meta Box platform. If Interested to contribute and be part of our next campaign please contact us !!!

 
What's Coming Out Next From Our Stable of Products?
As mentioned above we are planning to launch an  array of products all connected and IOT enabled and Meta Box compatible. We request our supporters to get ready to build a completely connected home. All our devices are expected to be running on Bluetooth Smart Mesh network. We will keep the BT profile open for developers to extend the capabilities of the Home Automation Network.

Home Automation Tablet

Planning to buy another tablet!!! Wait for a while and buy a tablet with Lollipop  and BT 4.0 . We are soon introducing our Home Automation Gateway runs on tablet .
http://smartgardtab.blogspot.in/2015/01/bluetooth-low-energy-home-automation.html

Meta LED Lamp


Meta LED lamp is a new generation LED lamp which is equipped with BLE controller to enable remote control from Mobile. Compatible  with MetaBOX . To know more about it read below
http://smartgardtab.blogspot.in/2015/01/smartled-bulb.html

Meta Box Gateway :Cloud Based Home Automation Gateway


http://smartgardtab.blogspot.in/2014/12/smartgard-gsm-cloud-based-home-security.html

Power Measurement


Electricity Bill is a concern? ? We are  Introducing a non Invasive Power Measurement tool to attach on the power line connecting to your Power Meter or equipments. This device will keep track of your power usage and produce warning on your mobile. It will also predict your power bill to keep a check on your power usage.

An Open Invitation to Manufacturers
We Meta Innovation is an R&D company and not a full-time manufacturer. We usually make the products introduce to the market and pass it over to interested manufacturers. We use this opportunity to invite manufacturers  to join hands with us.

Timeline
April 2015 - SmartIron Campaign Launch
July  2015 - SmartIron Production
August 2015 - Shipping SmartIron
story_txt:
Introducing The Smart Iron. Proof That The Smart Iron is a Smart Idea.
Most of us can remember a time when we turn off our iron after we were doing ironing our clothes or worried if we did after we left the house.  An iron left on for long periods of time definitely wastes a lot of energy and could possibly cause a life-risking fire.We've solved that problem with  auto shut off thanks to our patented technology that detects  when the iron is idle for a while leading to it safely shutting it self down.  

How Our Smart Iron Works.

We have an accelerometer chip installed in the 
Iron. It detects the idle state of the iron  by detecting the 
absence of ironing motion and switches off the Iron  after a set time.
 Since it completely shuts off Iron , it is safe and avoid the use of
 power.
More Features We are not just stopping there with Auto -Switch off. In addition to that we are also including features to manage Iron from a smart phone





Mobile and Home Automation Mesh Connectivity
Iron box is equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 Enabled micro controller. Bluetooth Mesh network enables the Iron  to advertise its status over the home automation Mesh network. Phone and Home automation consoles can display Iron status and parameters like temperature,  power usage, water level etc.
Temperature ControlPrecise temperature control with the use of a semiconductor temperature sensor and micro-controller. The iron's temperature can be set from your mobile phone . When the temperature reaches the set level and ready to use it give you an audio alert on your smart phone.  No waiting by the iron while it's warming up; you can be about your business around your home taking care of other things until your iron tells you it's ready.
Auto switch off idle time for Horizontal and Vertical positionsConventional irons are designed sit in a vertical position when not in use even for a short while. The Smart Iron  detects the position of the iron and allows the user to set an idle time at different positions. It's customary to allow for a longer idle time when our smart iron is in the vertical position so the iron doesn't get cold if you need to take a phone call or check on your dinner cooking on the stove. There are factory-set idle times for both positions  of 5 minutes but can be changed to any time up to a maximum of 15 minutes.
Block Diagram (Simple Mode)



Voice Alerts on Your Smart Phone; Your Iron is Calling! Smart Iron is equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 to advertise its status to a home's network or to any connected mobile phones that have Bluetooth. This allows it to generate voice alerts on mobile apps announcing status.
Usage History and Power ConsumptionSmart Iron keeps track of the usage history allowing the user to collect the power consumed during any given time period. If you're like most people, you want to lower your monthly bills and the Smart Iron app helps you monitor electricity consumption which can help you lower your monthly electric bills. 



The Story It is the era of IOT, we as a Home Automation Company did our brain storming to connect every single appliance and equipments and make our system a complete IOT enabled Home Automation System which makes a smart home even smarter. We have included every possible type of equipment in our plan and our Iron  is not an exception. When we thought about Iron  we ended up with a new innovation. We haven't left out the pressure cooker, the light bulb, a wall clock etc. and soon we will come out with a complete IOT campaign.  We made an unexpected decision to come out with Iron first to make a little fund for our R&D efforts. 
Risks & Challenges 
We have already developed the Basic Dry Iron version of SmartIron. We kept the thermostat active and it can override the temperature settings of the mobile app. This is kept like this to make the device independent of mobile phones. Other settings can work by default or once set value is remembered by the iron. Though we made it a connected device we are also keeping it as a stand alone device with out any dependance to the Mobile Phones or Home automation Network.


Welcome to the world of Internet of Small Small Things-The MetaBoxWhen you are ordering a perk , you are stepping in to the world of IOT. All of us here at the Meta Innovation team is working on array of IOT devices. All compatible to our Meta Box platform. If Interested to contribute and be part of our next campaign please contact us !!! 
What's Coming Out Next From Our Stable of Products?As mentioned above we are planning to launch an  array of products all connected and IOT enabled and Meta Box compatible. We request our supporters to get ready to build a completely connected home. All our devices are expected to be running on Bluetooth Smart Mesh network. story:
WHAT WE WANT

  • SAVE GEORGIAN, INSTRUMENTS, SOUNDS AND FOLKLORE!!!
  • Record High quality ethnographic audio library of Georgian instruments;
  • Create Professional, innovative, flexible VSTi for musicians and sound engineers;
  • Implement recorded library into our software, supporting all kind of DAWs for Recording, Arranging, Composing and Mastering;
  • Create Georgian music instruments software for Android, Windows & Apple platform smartphones.
  • Reconstruct some ancient Georgian folk instruments, make 3D copies and include their unique sound into the library.
  • Create Documentary film about this project.
  • Georgian culture promotion.
  • Edit world's ethnographic audio libraries with Georgian, Caucasian old and ancient instruments.
  • Create instrument restoration & Vsti development LAB.
  • We have already created VSTi for PC, without library.

WHAT YOU WILL GET

  • After development students and teachers will get limited software for free. 
  • Early Bird 30% discounted, Full version Boxed package of GNI with Bonus Folk presets and melodies.
  • Full, unlimited upgrades & updates of software.
  • License for universities with specific manuals.
  • Various discounted HQ packages of Georgian native instrument.
  • Printed / E-book (downloadable) Software manuals, Instrument manuals, Ethnographic-Historical Journal, Postcards & Instrument cards.
  • Documentary Film: Full HD for personal use; 4K with broadcasting license.
  • Visit Georgia and working with our team.

GEORGIAN NATIVE VIRTUAL INSTRUMENTS

History & culture of Georgia mesmerize everyone who will discover it. Beyond the beautiful sights and nature lays hidden rich and colorful culture of Georgia. The most unique and playful is Georgian Folklore. Songs, dances, rhymes, games combined altogether represents the ancient Georgian soul.

The main subject of below article will be Georgian native instruments. From historical sources are known over 100 Georgian musical instruments. Most part of which is now long-lost or forgotten, buried in the sands of time. Each region has their specific musical instruments, they might resemble each other, but the sound is different for each of them.

 ​​

What is Virtual Instrument?

Virtual instrument (VSTi) is a 3rd party plug-in for Digital Audio Workstations (DAW) nowadays used in every recording, mastering and mixing studios. Different from the synthesizers, - sample players (ROM players) give the user opportunity to use, high quality prerecorded, tuned, filtered & corrected sounds (notes, chords, etc.) Under creating the virtual instrument lies the huge work of professional instrument players, acoustic engineers, sound engineers, recording engineers, software developers and scientist. It is impossible for you to record better sound with better gear & team.The VSTi user interface gives the user all recorded libraries, notes to the piano keyboard, compatible to be played from midi, touch-pad, DAW or other.

INSTRUMENTS INCLUDED IN THE PROJECT

(SOFTWARE VERSION 1.0)

STRINGS -

  • Chonguri: Megrelian, Imeruli.
  • Panduri: Classical, Folk, Kakhuri, Mountain...
  • Changi: 32, 16, 10, 7 and 6 string.

BOWED STRINGS -

  • Tchuniri
  • Tchianuri
  • Abrkhtsa

DRUMS & PERCUSSION -

  • Doli: 3 type
  • Diplipito: 3 Size
  • Daira with Jingles (ancient) Metal
  • Metal Instruments: Tsintsilebi, Lini,Ezhvani

WOODWINDS -

  • Salamuri: Unreeded, Reeded I & II Voice.
  • Swan bone salamuri (ancient)
  • Larchemi: Megrelian, Guruli, Lazuri
  • Buki (ancient)
  • Pilili

BAG WINDPIPES -

  • Gudastviri
  • Tchiboni
  • Stviri Of Gudastviri (no bag)
  • Stviri Of Tchiboni (no bag)


To view detailed instrument information with sound samples, click here.


                          


RECONSTRUCTION OF THE INSTRUMENTS
  • We will research and reconstruct some ancient Georgian Instruments which were lost in past centuries.
  • Each new reconstructed instrument will be added as a new pattern to software. 
  • Each update of software will be available for free for our customers who purchased this software through Indiegogo campaign.
In 1930 a Swan bone Salamuri (flute) was found together with other relics in ancient burials of "Samtavro" in Mtskheta. Supposedly it dates back to the 15th-13th centuries B.C. It appeared, that it is possible to issue 10 sounds from it not by the over-blowing, but by inclining the instrument under different angles, and in this way we get seven different tetra chords that, as the final result, it represents sound system.
For 1st time a couple of plates (i.e. “Tsintsila”) were found during archaeolo- gical excavations in a Sepulchre, dated back to the 4th century A.D. The comparison of the old and new plates showed that the Tsintsila has a better design and sound reproducing than the simple plates used in the modern (military) orchestras which do not have girdles of sound distributing and holes of sound balancing. 

​  

Feel free to share, like, comment GNI on social networks and inform the folks. Believe you are helping the project to success not less than others.


RISKS

If the funding will not reach announced amount, there will be high risk of project timeline enlargement; Due to the same problem also not all instruments might be included in first version of the software. (We are not going to give up this project)  

       ABOUT US             

“Constantin Fetter” Studio is motivated to launch high quality entertainment and engineering projects in and out of Georgia; On the other hand we wanted to bring already existing standards to our region.

Our studio unites Musicians, Composers, Drawers, Game developers, Software Developers, Physicists, Architects, Engeneers and other professionals; People, who are interested to combine nowadays knowledge of the leading fields to meet raising innovative needs of mankind. 

At the moment we are focusing on Software, Hardware and Game development; We have many interesting & inovative projects, but we will bake them with you, one after another.

We want to share our different, attracting culture and misteries, which astonishes people all around the world.

Our producsts will give you new experience and knoweledge of caucasus region: culture, nature, art and more...


FAQ

 1.  What is the difference between a real instrument and a virtual instrument?
VSTi is used to easily write & edit notes, chords, melodies of multiple instruments in real time; It doesn't need long time playing and recording process to get the sound you want.Virtual applications, are worldwide standard in recording studios, which enables customers to purchase a higher quality product for a much lower price than it would cost them to record on their own at the studio; it Will also save time for them. 
   2.  Is this software hard to use?
GNI VSTi has very user friendly interface, people who are familiar to any DAW software, will easily get used to it; Beginners can follow user manual for software installation, setting and any further information.
   3.  What are the benefits for other Countries and people?
The benefits for other Countries will be that, they will gain knowledge on other instruments that were unknown to them. These instruments will inspire them to write new kind of music and who knows, they might even create new styles too. Georgian Native Instruments can be combined with other well-known instruments to create a completely new tune and a new polyphonic music; There are many compositions written in XVII-XX century using Georgian native orchestra.
   5.  Where can I find Caucasian/Georgian musical Instruments library?
There is no professional, high quality complete audio Library of our regions out now. Our product will be available on our official site and Indiegogo campaign. 
   6.  Budget of 250 000 $ is enough to fulfill this project?
Just said, this is not enough to fulfill such project. We ask for the minimum, which includes purchasing necessary hardware , customs clearance, other material costs and not the studio team member's salaries. Our team has  great enthusiasm for this project and it will be only doubled by hardworking: only documentary might cost 200 000 $ if not mention the audio recording, gift packages and the necessary resources for project. Our interest in the first place is to introduce ourselves to Georgian and foreign people and represent our culture in deserved manner.
   7.  Why no one has done it before?
Many nation's ethnic instruments are revived in studio programs and libraries. Such programs' demand raised since 2000,  when powerful, high quality digital hardware changed their ancestors.  Our studio has the knowledge and passion to create this product... (see question 6 and you will guess)
   8.  What makes our partnership interesting?
Such  project is not implemented in Georgia so far. It will be historic, glorious, meaningful presentation of our culture, the creators and promoters of this project, will leave their trace in our inheritance.
   9.  What are the opportunities of this project?
Georgia documentary and future films, commercials and others  mostly accompanied by  Asian music because there are no  opportunities and  resources to write a new Georgian-style melodies and  decor video  with traditional  Georgian music. The project will allow the composers to write the music without leaving homes. We will implement a number of projects in entertainment industry, where  we will use the Georgian culture, and we need a library to describe/record it.

story:
WHAT is Swipe it Fwd?

Swipe it Fwd is a mobile based penny donation platform that matches individual donors with the charities of their choice donating as little as a quarter to NGO's of their choice.

What if you could pay it forward with a simple swipe, donating as little as a quarter to charities of your choice. it's the little things that can make a difference. Swipe It FWD. The Future of Giving. Today.

WHY should Swipe it Fwd exist?

Online fundraising is skyrocketing around the world, especially in North America. The trends are in our favour. Swipe it Fwd's penny mobile donation concept has the potential of changing the world of giving by providing charities and donors a modern, friendly tool that allows better interaction, transparency, social awareness, world wide accessibility, sustainable donations, as well as visibility based on a user's chosen category.

HOW will Swipe it Fwd work?

By matching individual donors with real charities that share their philanthropic interests, allowing them to swipe forward and donate as little as a Swipe Coin (equivalent to a quarter).
The next time you face donation limits or uncertainty about a charity's end goal, open Swipe it Fwd on your mobile, get matched, swipe forward to donate, or swipe backwards to ignore and move to the next charity matching your interests and categories.

THE STORY BEHIND SWIPE IT FWD

The idea behind Swipe it Fwd began with Sam Kawtharani, who like the rest of the Swipe it Fwd team, is interested in philanthropy and technology. Sam was getting annoyed with donation limits set by charity sites and groups. Sam wanted a new platform that revives penny donations and help him find charities out there that matches his philanthropic interests. He voiced this problem to the rest of the team and of course, it resonated deeply with each one of us! 

We put on our thinking caps and conceptualized a simple solution to this universal problem – Swipe it Fwd. 

The philosophy of Swipe it Fwd is simple. We believe the best way to donate effectively and efficiently is by finding charity groups that are affiliated with projects and campaigns that are of interest to us. Instead of having donation limits with charity groups, being stopped in the street, or receiving campaigns from groups that we've never heard about or of interest to us, we wanted a platform that proactively finds all the groups out there that matches our categories and allow us to split our donations among them. Swipe it Fwd encourages users to rate, like, and promote charity groups leaving a mark in the world. We want to build a socially aware community through Swipe it Forward, where we empower charities, in real time, to make informed and confident choices based on our donations and help.

So join us on this journey and help us make Swipe it Fwd a reality! Swipe it Fwd, The Future of Giving. Today.


So, WHO are we?

Swipe it Fwd, Inc (Swipe it Fwd) is a startup specialized in building a modern mobile donation platform to be launched by the end of 2015. Utilizing the strengths of digital currency, the Swipe it Fwd application will be changing the way people and charitable organizations connect, donate, and receive funds. Based on the concept of penny donations, the Swipe it Fwd application uses a matching algorithm that connects users (the donors) with charities that meet their interests, allowing them to donate as little as a quarter to a charity of their choice using simple swipe gestures on their mobile device.

Swipe it Fwd is a Canadian incorporated company based in Montreal, Quebec, whose mission is to change the world of giving by providing charities and donors a modern, friendly tool that allows better interaction, transparency, social awareness, world wide accessibility, sustainable donations, as well as visibility based on a user's chosen category. 

Swipe it Fwd is established as a limited liability company (LLC) under the Canada Business Corporations Act (CBCA) owned by its three co-founders.


THE SWIPE IT FWD APP

1. Get matched with a charity of your choice, swipe forward, and donate.
The Swipe it Fwd application will match your philanthropic interests with charities of your choice. Simply swipe forward and a donation is automatically sent to the charity of your choice.

\


2. View a charity's profile, donate, like it, share it, and refine your matching preferences.

View any charity's page, check what they do, who they are, where they work, their team, and financials. Like it and share it with friends.

At any time, access your profile and change your charity matching preferences.


3. See who your friends donated to and liked.

Connect the application to you social media accounts, check if your friends donated or liked a charity of your interest.


4. Fill your account wit Swipe Coins, donate, and compete with your friends.

Swipe it Fwd has it's own internal donation currency. Recharge/Refill your account with your Credit Card, donate, compete with your friends and have fun.


GENERAL SWIPE IT FWD APP FEATURES AND INFO

1. MATCHING ALGORITHM - Swipe it Fwd has it's own in-house matching algorithm that finds the relevant charities.
2. CHARITY GENERATED CONTENT - All content and information on Swipe it Fwd are generated and owned by the charities themselves.
3. PRIVACY - With Swipe it Fwd you can create your user profile, add friends, and donate; you can also choose to disconnect your social media integrations.
4. SEAMLESS SOCIAL MEDIA EXPERIENCE - All donations and likes can be seamlessly shared on you other social media channels.
5. FREE APP - Finally, Swipe it Fwd is going to be an absolutely free app for individual donors. No donation deductions or hidden costs. Charities will be charged a processing fee per withdrawal and a membership plan starting with a free basic account.


HOW YOU CAN HELP US

1. Contribute to this campaign

Support our dream of empowering individual donations and charities by contributing whatever you can. Be it a few spare pounds/dollars or a big chunk of money, we assure you that every contribution matters in making Swipe it Fwd a reality for the very many of us who need it. (Little drops of water make the mighty ocean. Cheesy, but true!) So, please contribute and we thank you in return!

2. Share our Story

Please share our Swipe it Fwd App IndieGogo Campaign via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, text messages, phone calls and the good ol’ in-person conversations - the more people we reach, the more impact Swipe it Fwd App can make. So spread the word, you. Go, go, go!

3. Beta Test the Swipe it Fwd App

Subscribe to our newsletter on www.swipeitfwd.com and become Beta Testers of the Swipe it Fwd App. You’ll be among the very first ones to use the Swipe it Fwd App. You will also be giving us feedback on where we’re excelling and where we need to tweak things for improvements. You’ll be shaping the journey of Swipe it Fwd!

HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED

  • All funds will be spent on the development of the cross platform Swipe it Fwd App and on costs surrounding the development.
  • Included costs are personnel costs, hosting, user interface design, experience design and app maintenance costs.
  • App maintenance includes regular feature addition and enhancement based on user community feedback, bug fixes, etc.
  • Legal Fees and costs.
  • The rest of the funds will be spent on the promotion of Swipe it Fwd App and in making it accessible to many more users worldwide.
story_txt:
WHAT is Swipe it Fwd?Swipe it Fwd is a mobile based penny donation platform that matches individual donors with the charities of their choice donating as little as a quarter to NGO's of their choice.What if you could pay it forward with a simple swipe, donating as little as a quarter to charities of your choice. it's the little things that can make a difference. Swipe It FWD. The Future of Giving. Today.WHY should Swipe it Fwd exist?Online fundraising is skyrocketing around the world, especially in North America. The trends are in our favour. Swipe it Fwd's penny mobile donation concept has the potential of changing the world of giving by providing charities and donors a modern, friendly tool that allows better interaction, transparency, social awareness, world wide accessibility, sustainable donations, as well as visibility based on a user's chosen category.
HOW will Swipe it Fwd work?By matching individual donors with real charities that share their philanthropic interests, allowing them to swipe forward and donate as little as a Swipe Coin (equivalent to a quarter).The next time you face donation limits or uncertainty about a charity's end goal, open Swipe it Fwd on your mobile, get matched, swipe forward to donate, or swipe backwards to ignore and move to the next charity matching your interests and categories.THE STORY BEHIND SWIPE IT FWDThe idea behind Swipe it Fwd began with Sam Kawtharani, who like the rest of the Swipe it Fwd team, is interested in philanthropy and technology. Sam was getting annoyed with donation limits set by charity sites and groups. Sam wanted a new platform that revives penny donations and help him find charities out there that matches his philanthropic interests. He voiced this problem to the rest of the team and of course, it resonated deeply with each one of us! 
We put on our thinking caps and conceptualized a simple solution to this universal problem – Swipe it Fwd. 
The philosophy of Swipe it Fwd is simple. We believe the best way to donate effectively and efficiently is by finding charity groups that are affiliated with projects and campaigns that are of interest to us. Instead of having donation limits with charity groups, being stopped in the street, or receiving campaigns from groups that we've never heard about or of interest to us, we wanted a platform that proactively finds all the groups out there that matches our categories and allow us to split our donations among them. Swipe it Fwd encourages users to rate, like, and promote charity groups leaving a mark in the world. We want to build a socially aware community through Swipe it Forward, where we empower charities, in real time, to make informed and confident choices based on our donations and help.
So join us on this journey and help us make Swipe it Fwd a reality! Swipe it Fwd, The Future of Giving. Today.




So, WHO are we?

Swipe it Fwd, Inc (Swipe it Fwd) is a startup specialized in building a modern mobile donation platform to be launched by the end of 2015. Utilizing the strengths of digital currency, the Swipe it Fwd application will be changing the way people and charitable organizations connect, donate, and receive funds. Based on the concept of penny donations, the Swipe it Fwd application uses a matching algorithm that connects users (the donors) with charities that meet their interests, allowing them to donate as little as a quarter to a charity of their choice using simple swipe gestures on their mobile device.
Swipe it Fwd is a Canadian incorporated company based in Montreal, Quebec, whose mission is to change the world of giving by providing charities and donors a modern, friendly tool that allows better interaction, transparency, social awareness, world wide accessibility, sustainable donations, as well as visibility based on a user's chosen category. 
Swipe it Fwd is established as a limited liability company (LLC) under the Canada Business Corporations Act (CBCA) owned by its three co-founders.

THE SWIPE IT FWD APP
1. Get matched with a charity of your choice, swipe forward, and donate.
The Swipe it Fwd application will match your philanthropic interests with charities of your choice. Simply swipe forward and a donation is automatically sent to the charity of your choice.




\

2. View a charity's profile, donate, like it, share it, and refine your matching preferences.
View any charity's page, check what they do, who they are, where they work, their team, and financials. Like it and share it with friends.
At any time, access your profile and change your charity matching preferences.


3. See who your friends donated to and liked.
Connect the application to you social media accounts, check if your friends donated or liked a charity of your interest.



4. Fill your account wit Swipe Coins, donate, and compete with your friends.
Swipe it Fwd has it's own internal donation currency. Recharge/Refill your account with your Credit Card, donate, compete with your friends and have fun.





GENERAL SWIPE IT FWD APP FEATURES AND INFO

1. MATCHING ALGORITHM - Swipe it Fwd has it's own in-house matching algorithm that finds the relevant charities.

2. CHARITY GENERATED CONTENT - All content and information on Swipe it Fwd are generated and owned by the charities themselves.

3. PRIVACY - With Swipe it Fwd you can create your user profile, add friends, and donate; you can also choose to disconnect your social media integrations.

4. SEAMLESS SOCIAL MEDIA EXPERIENCE - All donations and likes can be seamlessly shared on you other social media channels.

5. FREE APP - Finally, Swipe it Fwd is going to be an absolutely free app for individual donors. No donation deductions or hidden costs. Charities will be charged a processing fee per withdrawal and a membership plan starting with a free basic account.





HOW YOU CAN HELP US
1. Contribute to this campaign
Support our dream of empowering individual donations and charities by contributing whatever you can. Be it a few spare pounds/dollars or a big chunk of money, we assure you that every contribution matters in making Swipe it Fwd a reality for the very many of us who need it. (Little drops of water make the mighty ocean. Cheesy, but true!) So, please contribute and we thank you in return!
2. Share our Story
Please share our Swipe it Fwd App IndieGogo Campaign via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, text messages, phone calls and the good ol’ in-person conversations - the more people we reach, the more impact Swipe it Fwd App can make. So spread the word, you. Go, go, go!
3. Beta Test the Swipe it Fwd App
Subscribe to our newsletter on www.swipeitfwd.com and become Beta Testers of the Swipe it Fwd App. You’ll be among the very first ones to use the Swipe it Fwd App. You will also be giving us feedback on where we’re excelling and where we need to tweak things for improvements. You’ll be shaping the journey of Swipe it Fwd!

HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED

All funds will be spent on the development of the cross platform Swipe it Fwd App and on costs surrounding the development.
Included costs are personnel costs, hosting, user interface design, experience design and app maintenance costs.
App maintenance includes regular feature addition and enhancement based on user community feedback, bug fixes, etc.
Legal Fees and costs.
The rest of the funds will be spent on the promotion of Swipe it Fwd App and in making it accessible to many more users worldwide.

story:
​About this project At Combo Studio we decided to make charging and syncing your Apple devices so easy you could do it with your eyes closed!

How? 

By designing a reversible (MFI certified) Lightning to USB cable. No more fumbling around to see if your USB connector is plugged in right, just pop it in and GO!

 


Apple users know Lightning can connect either way when plug on your iPhone, iPad or iPod… which is very convenience. BUT when you connect the USB-A (Big USB connector), always plug to the wrong way or read the logo before insert…. NOW…. You can have MFI approval Apple Lightning cable that you can plug either way on BOTH CONNECTORS…

 

 

The benefit of Combo Studio Lightning cable:

• Reversible (Double Sided) USB connector

• High current charging flow

• High quality aluminum casing

• Tangle free Nylon braided

• Durable USB cable


Get bored of traditional woven braided cable, get the latest design 


- Nylon braided…. More reliable and quality looks 


Flexible Tangle Free Nylon Cable 

• Much stronger and more flexible than standard and woven braided cables 

• The woven braided will be easier to get wear and tear with damage woven 

• More durable when you blend the cable 

• Better looking, better style – the latest design



High quality Aluminum Case

• Cable that match your Apple devises

• Much stronger and more durable

• Cool look, just better than standard cable


Specification:

Apple Approval MFI Lightning cable  

Length: 1M  

2.4A current flow (High Charging Flow)  

Nylon Braided cable in black color Gold or Black aluminum case Reversible USB-A connector

Laser marking logo  



Apple Lightning connector compatibility:


Where we are  

Our cables have been approved by MFI and ready for production.

story:
Short Summary

We are starting a weekly/daily fantasy soccer website that caters specifically to soccer fans in the United States. The expanding market of soccer fans in the United States shows that more and more people are starting to take an interest in the worlds largest sport. Our company seeks to make the fantasy soccer market in the US more streamline and convenient for fans in the States. No monetary conversions, a domestic company, and a specific focus on soccer will separate our company from our competition. We also strongly believe in giving back to the world and look to donate 10% to Haitian children orphaned from the 2012 earthquake that devastated the country. We want to have an outreach and make an impact through our business. We hope you will back our project and would like to thank you for your time and interest in us.

What We Need & What You Get

Our plan is to use the funds to create our website, fund our prize pools, and advertise our startup company. We strive to provide only the highest quality fantasy experience and our website will be consistently monitored to ensure customer satisfaction. The plan to start our website is to use the funds raised from this website to outsource the web development to an outside company, leaving us to focus more on the customer's wants and desires on how to improve our process as well as promotion and advertisements.

The Impact

Your donations will provide us with essential funds to start our website, fund our prize pools, and advertise to attract members. We also are looking to hire a website developer to make our website and have greater gaming options to better suit our customers. Your donation will also help us reach the Haitian orphans we plan to help with our business.  

Risks & Challenges

Our risks that we foresee are a lack of customers but we will advertise to our target market to ensure that we have ample customers. We will distance ourselves from competition by making more interesting game modes to play and add variety to the site.  


Other Ways You Can Help

Please tweet, share, pin and tell your friends about our project!

story:
We have exciting news we are introducing something new! We are releasing three wooden iPhone cover which made by REAL wood. Like our other MOOS products you can use this to charge your iPhone wirelessly.


Do you want to re-charge your iPhone without using a cable? Would you like to re-charge your iPhone by simply placing it on to a charging dock? 

It's time to re-charge your iPhone wirelessly, charge it without any cable by using our wireless charging sticker. MOOS does not provide you with wireless charging but also fashionable designs; bringing you a brand new charging experience with both technology and fashion. 


WE'VE BEEN FEATURED IN:



HOW DOES IT WORK?

1. Simply stick the wireless charging sticker at the back of the iPhone and plug-in to the lightning port.

2. Place the iPhone on any QI charging dock. 

Our sticker works with QI wireless technology which is the standard for all kinds of wireless charging. The sticker can work on any dock with QI wireless technology, even the latest IKEA wireless charging series.


WHY CHOOSE US ?

There are many different types of wireless charging cases for iPhones, but our wireless charger is not an add on bulky plastic case. It’s just a sticker. IT’S THE WORLD'S THINNEST WIRELESS CHARGER and comes in numerous STYLISH DESIGNS.

Our team designed different stylish pattern to match your special personal style. You can always find your style at MOOS !


The STICKER

Our removable sticker is printed on material of the highest quality. Each sticker contains QI wireless charging chips. You can stick it easily on the back of your iPhone. Currently the stickers come in different sizes for the iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6S and iPhone 6S Plus.

THE DESIGN

WHAT DO YOU GET?

As a backer, you will receive everything necessary to charge your iPhone wirelessly. You can choose between the following three:

1)  MOOS Sticker

2) MOOS Sticker plus

3) WOODEN MOOS

4) MOOS Wireless Charging Set with ECO Friendly Cardboard Charger. 


SUPPORT US NOW , IF you choose the sticker only, we can provide FREE SHIPPING

HAPPY 2016 PROMOTION

TIMELINE

SCRETCH GOAL

We currently offer 3 patterns now. However once we have reached our stretch goals we will incorporate more designs, starting from 30k USD.

OUR TEAM

We are a team of designers in Hong Kong, having experience on designing and producing various products for over 10 years. Over the past year we have created a brand new concept for your charging experience with existing technology. All the MOOS products on this page are functional prototypes. Changes may also occur in the final solution of MOOS based on the feedback we receive during this campaign.


FAQ

Do I need a sticker so my iPhone can charge wirelessly?
Yes but you also need a QI compatible charger, either from Samsung or IKEA. If you do not have these kinds of wireless chargers, we suggest you to purchase our MOOS charger set. 

How do I choose the graphic design of the sticker? 

We will send you a survey after our campaign has ended. 

How is MOOS packaged? 

MOOS comes in a simple and economic plastic bag. We don't want to raise the price for you to add some complicated packaging which cannot be recyclable. A premium packaging option may be available later on in the campaign. 

How fast will it charge? 

This depends on your power supply. As we use Qi technology, it has around 70% of the energy as an ordinary charging cable. 

Is it safe to use MOOS? 

Yes it is absolutely safe to use MOOS. Our sticker does not contain any battery or harmful materials. 

Can I get a refund? 

Sure, but please let us know before the end of campaign!

story:
Free Award Posters are still available! 

The first 100 people to sponsor a child will get this personalized award poster for free.


What We Need

  • Tuition for children who cannot afford course fees. 
  • $3000 for computers for each additional 100 kids per week.
  • A larger location with multiple classrooms.
  • Training for more instructors and teaching assistants.
  • Did we mention tuition for children? 100% of donations go towards the kids tuition!


What You Get

This is a chance to give something that is truly valuable because it can change a child's life. You will get sincere appreciation from the child or children you are helping. It's an amazing feeling to receive a heartfelt thank you from a child who has been inspired to learn, imagine and create.

For each person who sponsors a child, you will receive 

  • A personalized video of the child thanking you for helping make their dreams a reality.
  • A video of the child's presentation to their class of their project.
  • A personalized Tech Kids Project award poster.

Every dollar helps - Please donate whatever you can


If the child were right in front of you, most people would take the time to help. It's the children that get lost between the cracks and don't have anyone to provide the means for them to take classes in technology that we are helping.


Most people don't think twice about spending a few dollars every day on coffee, watching movies or TV, connecting to the internet, talking on their phone, or any of the other numerous things we spend $2-5 on every day. The amount you spend in one day on any one of these things can help a child's future dreams come true.


Learning about technology will help children in every career. Kids being left out of opportunities is one of the hardest things for them to comprehend. This can quickly lead to loss of optimism, decreased self esteem and hopelessness.


The best help you can give is to sponsor a child for $79. If this is prohibitive, you can still be a part of changing lives! Every dollar helps, and every person who donates counts since this helps our campaign trend higher and get in front of more people. 

Background Information

How The Idea Was Formed

The idea of The Tech Kids Project was born from the simple fact that I could not find a quality after school computer programming course for my 8 year old son. You may be thinking "So what? Couldn't I just find something else for him to participate in?" I think once you understand a bit more of my reasoning behind this, you will agree with the importance of this for all kids, and for the future of our country, 

  1. First, are children making good use of their time outside of school? The amount of time most children spend playing video games, tells me that they are not. I found that I spent a lot of my time just monitoring my son's video game playing time. I had already put him in other after school programs such as Art, Chess and Taekwondo. While these programs are all great, he still goes straight to play video games as soon as he gets home.  In addition, several classes were cancelled because families could not afford the tuition.  If children are going to spend a lot of time on video games, why not make it something that will help them in life, and teach them to code their own games.

  2. Second, skills in technology and computer science will help all children regardless of their career choice. My reason for wanting him to learn about computers and specifically programming is because of     my own life experiences. In my teens, I taught myself computer programming.  I began at Intel Corp. as an application developer, and worked my way up to managing an IT Business Solutions department at Intel Corp, being responsible for world wide applications.  I left Intel to start my own successful company providing Websites, Applications and Search Engine Optimization to small businesses. My own in depth knowledge of how computers truly work through understanding computer programming has helped me immensely in every position I have held. While I expected younger generations to enter the job force with in-depth knowledge of technology that would surpass my own skills, it's become apparent that this is not the case.  Although kids are experts at spending hours playing video games and navigating social media,  the kids of the Tech generation are not learning valuable computer skills.

  3. There is no doubt that     in the future, technology will be far more integrated into our lives than it is even today. Computers and Technology will play a pivotal role in the future in almost every profession. Regardless of the career choice of any child, an in depth knowledge of how computers work will help them immensely. The value of inspiring children to believe in themselves, dream big, and build confidence that they can make those dreams come true is priceless.
  4. Numerous studies show that participation in quality, experiential after school programs result in:
  • Increased academic achievement
  • Improved school attendance
  • Higher levels of student engagement and motivation to learn
  • Increased likelihood of high school graduation
  • Higher self-esteem
  • Enhanced social skills
  • Reduced delinquency.

The Tech Kids Project, Inc. Was Put Into Action

With the goal in mind to truly educate our future leaders in Technology, and give them the skills to not only be successful in their lives, but to inspire them to dream big, and give them the tools and confidence to make their dreams a reality, I approached colleagues in the Tech industry and in the Education field.

The Tech Kids Project Inc. was incorporated as an Arizona Non-Profit Corporation in September 2015.


Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from donating, the biggest help you can give is to help get the word out. 

  • Share this page on Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus.
  • Like our Facebook page, share our posts, and ask others to do the same.
  • Tell anyone you think might be interested in helping to check us out:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TechKidsProject
Website: The Tech Kids Project

Improved school attendance
Higher levels of student engagement and motivation to learn
Increased likelihood of high school graduation
Higher self-esteem
Enhanced social skills
Reduced delinquency.


The Tech Kids Project, Inc. Was Put Into Action



With the goal in mind to truly educate our future leaders in Technology, and give them the skills to not only be successful in their lives, but to inspire them to dream big, and give them the tools and confidence to make their dreams a reality, I approached colleagues in the Tech industry and in the Education field.
The Tech Kids Project Inc. was incorporated as an Arizona Non-Profit Corporation in September 2015.


    Other Ways You Can Help Aside from donating, the biggest help you can give is to help get the word out.   Share this page on Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus.
Like our Facebook page, share our posts, and ask others to do the same. Tell anyone you think might be interested in helping to check us out: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TechKidsProject

Website: The Tech Kids Project

story:
Update (3rd December 2015)

The campaign is now finished but we still have plenty of the LCD adaptors available in the AusThai Shop.

My name is Tom and I've been fiddling with electronics since I was 12. Nowadays electronics is my business. AusThai Solutions is where I make my ideas happen.

At AusThai we use a lot of LCD displays in our designs. Traditional LCD character displays come in a package that has 16 pins. That’s a lot of pins on a microcontroller sacrificed for the display.

So we came up with this Serial Adaptor Board. We’ve made it as flexible as we can. So it doesn't just work with a UART connection or an I2C connection or an SPI connection. It works with all three.

In most cases you don’t need to read from the LCD so if you are using the UART you can operate the LCD with just 1 pin, TX (not including 5V and ground). It only takes 2 pins if you use I2C or 3 or 4 pins for SPI. So this little board will free up lots of pins on the micro for other uses in your project.

The best bit is we know we can do it for $6 a board.

We already have a working prototype and can start production now. All we need is some funding for the first run. To get the cost down to $6 we need a medium sized run.

We are excited about this project. We’ve looked around and found stores selling LCDs with serial capabilities. There are one or two out there already but none that will give you all three serial capabilities and none that match our price.

What do you get?

If you contribute we will thank you by giving you one of the boards. For a contribution of $6 you get the PCB and controller with the list of parts. This is for those of you who like to do it all yourself.

For a dollar more we supply all the parts and you build it. For one extra dollar we will build it for you.

For a bit more we will supply it already attached it to a display of your choice. (For details see the perks)

What do we need?

The main costs in this project are the PCBs and the on-board controller. Both of these are cheaper when bought in bulk. We can meet the $6 a board with an order size of $600 or more, so that is our funding target.

We know what you’re thinking….

Can we really deliver?

When I finished high school I studied engineering and made electronics my profession. In 2002 some friends and I set up AusThai Solutions to design and develop electronic solutions for all sorts of applications from industry to education and hobby electronics. Our industry designs are sold exclusively to the client while our educational and hobbyist kits are sold online under our AusThai Educational and Maker’s Corner brands. This is the sort of project we are designing all the time.

How long will it take?

We have the PCB design ready to go. As soon as the campaign is over we will order the PCBs. These will take two weeks to arrive. We have a supplier who has the controller in stock so we will have them before the PCBs arrive. Then we assemble and ship. The whole process wont take longer than 4 weeks.

What will we do if we don’t hit the $600 target?

With a deep sigh we will reach into our pockets and make up any difference needed to make it happen.

There's more coming....

We don’t intend this to be our only project for crowd-funding. We have lots of ideas in the works and we will be rolling them out over the next few months. If you have an idea for a project you haven’t seen on the market then click here and let us know. If it fits with our capabilities we’ll put it on the list and when we develop it we’ll give you one for free.

If this project doesn’t match your current needs but you’re a Maker or an electronics enthusiast then keep an eye on us and check out our future projects. You can follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook.

Tell your Friends

If you know someone who might be interested in this project please feel free to spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
What Mood Are You In?

All you need is the Party Bulb, our App to set the mood with music and light!  Its integrated speaker gives you great sounding music where you need it, making it the perfect "other bedside" companion.

 

Dial it In

With just a turn of the dial, you will find the Party Bulb is easy to set up, control and fun to operate. Just screw the Party Bulb into any light fixture, download the free App, set the mode, turn on some music and get the party started.

 

 

 

Our Modes

 

 

 

 

Mode Controls

This diagram explains the major functions of the different modes of the application.  The app was designed to be easy to use and allow you to change most of the bulb and music functions with limited page navigation.

 

The Technology

 

The Timeline

Current Prototype

In the News

The party Bulb has proudly been featured in the following places:

 

Founders Story

Products that rise to meteoric success are usually based on solving a simple consumer desire. The next part is designing it to be so simple that once people try it, they don’t know how they lived without it before. I had the idea years ago and kept searching for ways to bring it to life. Now that it’s come to fruition I invite everyone to enjoy my vision. It started when I was at a party in college. The music was great, but there was NO lighting to amp up the energy. My initial thought was, “why can’t someone make a normal sized light bulb that threads into a light socket that has a strobe effect?” All we had were those big, ugly and heavy strobe boxes. I did some research and discovered there was nothing out there. It kept nagging at me, so right after college, I bought the domain PartyBulb.com and started working on my idea. I had plenty of vision. However, money was an issue. Fortunately, the necessary technology caught up with my idea then the component pricing came down. At that point, Team Party Bulb was able to take it to the next level. The Party Bulb is now patented with a functioning APP, Bluetooth connectivity and the ability to match the beat of any song. Oh...did I mention it also has a speaker! We are proud to pre-launch on Kickstarter and can’t wait until everyone can share our dream being the first to have “The Bulb that Parties”. 

 

Risks & Challenges

We have a proven track record of delivering life-saving medical products to a billion-dollar medical company manufactured in both China and Taiwan. This experience has taught us how to bring products to market in a timely and cost effective way without losing any quality. When you’re dealing with the strict policies and standards of the FDA, international customs, and the complicated shipping logistics that are required, as an organization, you learn to be connected and work fluidly at all times. It goes without saying that there are never any easy moments developing the supply chain of a new device. You are always instituting and maintaining quality control measures, staying on top of shipping timelines, anticipating inventory requirements based on forecasts, and dealing with customs. Our team has been involved in multiple product launches in the past and have hit our share of road blocks across many platforms. The key is, we have always learned from those obstacles. Launching this product has involved multiple prototype reviews and App functionality tests. But that is a vital aspect because if the App does not function properly, the product won’t perform. The team has also visited the manufacturers multiple times to review the entire production process to ensure that the quality control standards of Party Bulb redefine the definition of “superior”.
We are committed to creating a seamless experience for the end user by delivering the highest quality product possible.
With your help, we can “Turn Every Room into a Party”.

Cheers! 
Party Bulb Team

story:
The New ZOBO LED Spotlight !

It's for people who expect their lighting

to make a great impression.

 

music groups, DJ's, singers, dancers, actors, lighting designers, videographers, presenters, event planners, party hosts, interior designers, concert producers, directors, theater technicians and more.

 

WHY ZOBO?

Anyone putting on a show wants it to look fantastic!

Until now you'd need to be an expert with a big budget to produce an amazing looking show using sophisticated stage lighting equipment.

We are going to change that - we believe all performers and designers deserve great results with:

That's why we're developing ZOBO - a new type of LED light that can do more.

 

INTRODUCING ZOBO !

Fantastic full-color spot lighting to transform the experience of any occasion!

Our big idea is to rethink high performance theatrical grade lighting and create a new kind of smart LED lamp with better color mixing and smooth built-in dimming.

We add Bluetooth® control to work with a phone app.

We fit this into an efficient and compact lamp so anyone can make their show look great.

USER BENEFITS

  • Beautifully blended beams of colorful light
  • Fantastic looking reds, greens and blues, magenta, fuchsia, yellow, amber
  • Selectable color temperatures from warm to cool with vivid color rendering
  • Smooth dimming all the way to zero and soothing flicker free illumination
  • Directional lighting that highlights only what you aim for
  • Remote operation with an easy-to-use Bluetooth® mobile app
  • Controllable as groups of lights or individually
  • Automatic color sequences and effects with built-in modes
  • Rapid installation into light fixtures or clamp sockets or track lights
  • Extra energy savings with breakthrough efficacy

 

 

FOR ANY KIND OF SHOW

From highlighting the performers on stage to back-lighting the scenery, or for adding fun colors to a party - ZOBO creates just the right effect for all occasions.

 

Not only for show and event places, 

good for the home too!

Holiday Lighting

Dinner Parties

 Video Work

Interior Accents

 Mood Lighting

Highlighting Works of Art

and many more applications!

 

PRODUCT OVERVIEW

ZOBO is a PAR30 size adjustable full-color LED floodlight with Bluetooth® control.

ZOBO uses an innovative 6-color LED light engine from Luxium.  

It is the only narrow-beam lamp using high intensity LEDs that combines full-range color adjustment with multiple white CCT (warm to cool) settings and convenient mobile app control.

The efficient design uses one-tenth the power of old-style color-filtered bulbs.

With built-in presets and modes, it's ready to rock when you turn on the app.

 

Anyone can learn to use ZOBO with the free app:

 

 

WHAT'S AVAILABLE ?

 

 

 

 

Special Rewards for Our Campaign Supporters

We are working hard to make ZOBO a reality and plan to  ship products in February 2017. 

To help you get excited we've put together a wide variety of rewards.

 

ABOUT THE TEAM

At Luxium we've built our reputation on making high performance stage lighting instruments that are popular with lighting professionals.

Our founding team: Arlie Conner, Jon Farley, Thomas Roth, Rogers Hicks and Oke Tammik have a combined 50 years of experience in LEDs, stage lighting and electronics manufacturing.

The inventor of ZOBO, Arlie Conner, is a veteran of several successful high tech companies.  He was the principal founder of Lightware, which brought a series of lightweight projection systems to market and grew sales to $25M within their third year. The company was acquired by Plus Japan and Corning Inc in 2000.  As a co-founder of Lumencor, Conner developed product lines of high performance light engines obtaining several patents in the process.  Lumencor is now the market leader in the lighting for life science applications. Previously he had joined InFocus and invented a color projection LCD method that propelled that company to an early IPO. 

With awards such as Innovator of the Year and over 60 US patents to his name, Conner is an acknowledged expert in electro-optics including various specialties such as color science, non-imaging optical methods and LED technology.

People love the lighting experience they get from going to the theater, and we think it would be awesome if everyone and every place could create the same experience!

We design and build our products in Portland, Oregon USA

Meet: Jon, Arlie, Oke, Tom, Roger

TIMELINE

Since the beginning our mission has been very simple. 

We will push the boundaries of affordable performance to make compact, adjustable and powerful LED lights

Luxium was born in 2014 when its founder, Arlie Conner heard about the phase-out of incandescent bulbs used in stage lights and thought that making a small retrofit LED lamp for border-light sockets would be a wonderful upgrade for old theaters.

In 2015, we launched the ZR30, a PAR30 size DMX-controlled directional stage light with a proprietary additive-color LED light engine. It is the smallest and lightest and most power efficient retrofit stage lamp in the market.

In 2016 we began the ZOBO development to reinvent theater lighting technology and make it easy to use and affordable so everyone can have a colorful life.

We ask for your support to spread the word and help us make the ZOBO a big success.

We expect to begin shipping the first ZOBO products in early 2017.

POTENTIAL RISKS

There are a few components that have long lead times, so if demand is very high, we may have a delay in building inventory to fulfill all of the rewards.

The phone app is ready now for use with the iPhone but the Android version is still in development.  We will continue to add new features to delight our customers so some capabilities may not be ready when the first products begin to ship.

The ZOBO Z1 version will be submitted for UL approval which may take longer than we expect. We have already obtained UL approval for the ZR30 and this covers the Z2 product.

 

QUESTIONS and ANSWERS

Q. How do I get started using the ZOBO?

A. Simple.

  • ZOBO screws into a standard socket. 
  • Download the free app from Luxium
  • Pair with the new lamp and put it into a group
  • Select the colors you want

Q. How much power does ZOBO need?

A. Zobo uses regular AC power from a wall outlet.  The Z1 uses 12 watts. The Z2 uses 24 watts.

Q. How long will ZOBO last?

A. ZOBO is made to operate maintenance free for more than 50,000 hours. 

Q. How many units can I control at the same time?

A. Using Bluetooth the application can control up to 7 lamps at one time in a group. Multiple groups can be created in the app.

Q. Do I need an internet connection to use ZOBO?

A. No. ZOBO is made to work with a wireless Bluetooth® control signal that comes from your phone or tablet.

Q. Is ZOBO compatible with other LED lighting controls?

A. ZOBO will work on a regular lighting circuit with an on-off switch. To control dimming and color selection use the Luxium app from your phone or tablet.

Q. Can ZOBO be used outside?

A. ZOBO is built to work in normal indoor environments. It is not waterproof.

Q. Can different ZOBO models be controlled with the same app?

A. Yes. The Luxium Bluetooth® app is made to control all versions of ZOBO.

Q. What is the email address for getting answers to other questions.

A. We are happy to get inquiries from anyone and will do our best to answer questions about our products and how they can be used. Please send an email with your contact info and questions to: sales@luxium.co

story:
T-BLADE

The World's First Back-typing Bluetooth Keyboard for iPad.

T-BLADE brings another evolution to the iPad.

 

Before using T-BLADE, you may feel some difficulties to input long texts like over one page on your iPad in the mobile situations. iPad itself is an extremely useful, and it’s actually easy to use. However, in case of inputting longer texts, you may feel it’s not perfect.

T-BLADE is a final solution for typing on iPad easily at anywhere and anytime. When you are in the car, in the train or in the airplane, you will be able to type on your iPad easily and comfortably by mounting T-BLADE. You can enjoy typing even in the narrow spaces.

 

 

 

T-BLADE EDITOR (under development) is the editing software of the dedicated T-BLADE.During the input, it looks like the back-typing keyboard is transparent.

The text you type can be shared with other applications. In easily and timely manner, you will be able to send emails and also upload SNS like Facebook and Instagram.

You can use various applications on your iPad with greater ease anywhere and anytime. If you have higher skills of input, the keyboard image on your screen can be smaller. You can switch off the function of the keyboard image on your screen if you want.

Just using the software for a few days, and you will find yourself typing on T-BLADE with ease.

 

Why We Try to Develop T-BLADE?

Atsushi Miyajima, founder of T-BLADE project and T Solution Japan, usually spends one third of the year for overseas business trip. Through the business trip, he always felt that typing on iPad at the mobile situation is not easy and needs more efficient device for typing. He actually investigated compact and functional keyboard through the Internet. However, he could not find anything satisfactory. He bought a lot of keyboards but could not find best one.

He reached the idea of back-typing keyboard through his business trip, and he found there is nothing like that. Finally, he decided to develop the back-typing keyboard by himself. He established T Solution Japan Corporation and T-BLADE project in 2015.

Under the strong leadership of Atsushi Miyajima, more than ten people joined the T-BLADE project. Members of the project include hardware engineer, software engineer, industrial designer and other creators.

Notably, Shige Aoki, chief industrial designer of the project, significantly contributed the overall product concept of T-BLADE. He created the stylish designs and superior operability of T-BLADE based on the thorough research of human engineering. As a result, T-BLADE is easy to use and functional enough with super stylish design.

We have been developing  T-BLADE since 2015 and now we have first proto-type products.

Next Step

Then in the next step, we need to prepare our mass-production line including molds of each components of T-BLADE since it is purely our original product.  That is why we conduct our campaign this time here at INDIEGOGO.

Your warm support makes our project successful. At the same time, you are able to become the launch users of the world’s first back-typing Bluetooth keyboard for iPad.

 

We were interviewed by IDG Connect. We talked about our development history of T-BLADE through the interview. We also discussed about the reason why we are doing crowdfunding.    For details, please refer to following URL link.

http://www.idgconnect.com/abstract/19297/crowds...

-- "Here is an iPad keyboard that lets you type things on your tablet more conveniently."--

 

 

Back-typing keyboard

The biggest feature of “T-BLADE™” is the QWERTY keyboard installed on the back. By adopting the same key arrangement with the existing QWERTY keyboard, users feel nearly the same with typing a normal keyboard. In addition, by arranging the keys on the back, it enables an effective way of utilizing dead space in the rear of iPads. For tablet users, external keyboard is a must item, but it requires some space for typing and lacks mobility as a proper mobile device.

By adopting back keys, “T-BLADE™” balances both mobility and operability, improving the typing environment of tablets in a dramatic fashion.

 

Keys (thumb typing keys) located in the front

Without impairing the recognition performance of iPad display, “T-BLADE™” offers the keys that can operate using a thumb on both sides (left and right) of a screen. Return key, space key, back space, shift key, cursor key and specific keys are located in the front. Since there is no need to operate a tablet’s screen using fingers, all keys are operable with both hands holding a tablet. It provides overwhelmingly fast and stable tablet operation than using an on-screen keyboard. Moreover, with no on-screen keyboard displayed, the display area will be overwhelmingly wider. Furthermore, operation of dedicated software is possible with the specific key arrangement.

 

Advanced design and lightweight

A chic form that gently wraps iPad and a QWERTY keyboard on the back is an innovative style of Bluetooth keyboard ever. The design of “T-BLADE™” is highly compatible with unique iPad designs and gives a stylish impression by mounting.

“T-BLADE™” is lighter than iPad itself and its portability is assured. By mounting “T-BLADE™,” users can hold iPad firmly with both hands providing substantial enhancement of safety compared to holding iPad with one hand and type in with the other.

“T-BLADE™” is capable of evolving iPad into a device that allows users to type in “anytime” and “anywhere.” In business situations such as editing emails, Excel or Word as well as SNS or games in personal life, “T-BLADE™” enhances and extends the capabilities of iPads.

 

Future development of “T-BLADE™”

TSJ is scheduled to have “T-BLADE™” available to general consumers at the beginning of the launch in autumn 2016. However, TSJ is confident that the mobility performance of “T-BLADE™” will further enhance the utility value to tablet devices used in various business situations such as in construction, medical services and education fields.

Therefore, TSJ is willing to reinforce alliances with various companies in the area of B-to-B in the future as well.

 

Specifications

Product name:                           T-BLADE™

Compatible iPad models:       iPad Air 2/ 9.7 inch iPad Pro

Release date:                              Autumn 2016 (subject to change)

Dimensions:                                175 mm x 273 mm x 20 mm wide (subject to change)

Weight:                                          Approximately 370g (subject to change)

Key switch:                                  Pantograph method

Connection method:                Bluetooth

 

Be the First User of the World’s First Back-Typing Bluetooth Keyboard for iPad!

 

 

Atsushi Miyajima, Founder of T-BLADE project and T Solution Japan Corp.

Shinnosuke Taguchi, CEO of T-BLADE project and T Solution Japan Corp.

Shige Aoki, Chief Industrial Designer of T-BLADE project, CEO of Aoki Design Corp.

Nobuyuki Tsuboi, Chief Marketing Officer of T-BLADE project, Independent Consultant

Kiyoshi Tsuzuki, Chief Creative Director of T-BLADE project , Photographer

 

Q1. The keyboard is located on the back. I am afraid whether I could type well because I can't see the keys from the front.

A1. You don’t have to worry about that. We will provide the free software to help you practice using the T-BLADE keyboard. After practicing for a few days, you will be able to type on T-BLADETM with ease.

 

Q2. It looks somewhat heavy. Is it possible to use at the mobile situation?

A2. T-BLADE will be only 370grams in our current plan. You can bring T-BLADE anywhere. You may feel it’s much lighter than expected to be.

 

Q3. Do you have any plan to develop the compatible product for other tablets?

A3. It is possible that we may try to develop such products in the future. However, currently we do not have any concrete plan for expanding our product line.

 

Q4. Do you have a plan to add more color variations to T-BLADE in the future?

A4. If we receive more requests from our supporters, we will consider to add new colors. At the moment, we believe our color variations is good enough.

 

Q5. Do you have any plan about  providing the carry case dedicated to T-BLADE?

A5. If the fund raising from supporters to exceed our target, we would like to produce the original case for T-BLADE.
Proceeds of the campaign in the range of initial target will be spent for the development of several variation of T-BLADE.

 

Q6. Is there any possibility to develop mobile applications and game software in the future?

A6. T-BLADE is the innovative user interface of iPad. We believe the performance of the interface will significantly improve the usability, if we create such applications and software dedicated for T-BLADE.
However, our management resource is limited, and thus we are seeking the possible partners that can develop such new applications and game software together with us.

 

Q7. At which countries and region do you plan to sell the T-BLADE?

A7. We have already decided to sell the T-BLADE in the United States and in Europe. But we will finalize our plan after seeing the results of this campaign. Basically, we will sell the T-BLADE at the place where the demand is strong.

However, in case of inputting longer texts, you may feel it’s not perfect.T-BLADE is a final solution for typing on iPad easily at anywhere and anytime. When you are in the car, in the train or in the airplane, you will be able to type on your iPad easily and comfortably by mounting T-BLADE. You can enjoy typing even in the narrow spaces.   T-BLADE EDITOR (under development) is the editing software of the dedicated T-BLADE.During the input, it looks like the back-typing keyboard is transparent.The text you type can be shared with other applications. In easily and timely manner, you will be able to send emails and also upload SNS like Facebook and Instagram.You can use various applications on your iPad with greater ease anywhere and anytime. If you have higher skills of input, the keyboard image on your screen can be smaller.
