story:
Who am I

My name is Gary Palma. I am a contractor by day and a family man when I am off. I am building the American dream with the help of people just like you. I believe in helping folks be more efficient in their lives, not just using my services, but other ways such as providing them a product that they will appreciate for life.

What's the campaign

In this era of emerging technological inventions, people want to do things faster and more efficiently without losing time and money, while using all of the features of their device. With PalmsFree, you can:

  • Save time by continuing to use your smart device without putting it down to finish important tasks on the device and...
  • Save money by purchasing your very own PalmsFree for a lower price than the actual retail price!

We would love you to back our project! Thank you very much for your support!

How do you benefit from this campaign

Maybe you run a business from your smart phone, check your twitter feed or social media accounts, check e-mail, schedule important activities, or even watch online videos to better yourself or your family. Whatever the case maybe, it is inconvenient to have to drop or put down your device every time you need to switch to another activity. Don't drop it! Just wear my harness and strap your device to it. It is that simple.

I want you to try it and let me know what you think! I am honest and listen to feedback as it helps me improve my product and services. This is a first of it's kind product. 

What We Need

By backing this product, the funds will be used to cover production  & shipping costs estimated to be $20,000.  The unit retails for $39.99 each. However, if you buy through our campaign, you will be the first to receive it only for $20 (50% off!) Be the first to use the Palms Free Harness!

What You Get

By raising funds for the palms free we are giving backers the unique opportunity to be one of the first ones to own this ingenious device. Freedom and Safety is Everything!

This unique device has a multitude of uses

  • Wear on your body
  • Strap to the inside of your car, motorcycle or boat
  • Use your cell phone as a personal protection device
  • Easily make and receive calls
  • Know where your friends are

Giving them the opportunity to have a free hand. It also can  affix or attach it to virtually everything.

Think about how many times a day you need an extra hand (cycling walking, running, driving, fishing, sporting, shopping, holding the kids, mowing the lawn, washing the car, climbing a ladder or just showing off your favorite skateboarding tricks). Now it's possible with PALMS FREE.This device is worn and loved by a broad range of consumers from the hardworking carpenter or mechanic, to the house wife with children as well as any teenage boy or girl.

 

Freedom and Safety is everything and everyday people are relying more

and more on their cell phone devices for work and pleasure.

With a multitude of attachments, PALMS FREE replaces all other hands free devices currently on the market.

Features and Benefits:

  • Allows for personal protection
  • Fits all sizes of mobile devices
  • Adjusts/Swivels to any angle
  • Never misplace your device again
  • Small, lightweight and durable
  • Retractable stainless steel coils allow for years of enjoyment
  • Use in your home, car or office
  • Great for sports enthusiasts
  • Great for indoor & outdoor use
  • Can be customized with a lanyard or slogan
 

Great for businesses:

  • Keep work sites safe with hands free communication
  • Continued workflow without interruptions
  • Discount on bulk orders
  • Keeps phones handy at all times for emergencies (911)
  • Easily keep track of and access inventory in real time
  • Keep employees safe by keeping track of their whereabouts
  • Easily Skype/Facetime/video conference employees while on site
  • Brand/advertise your business on each employee PalmsFree
  • Give the gift of Palmsfree to your employees

One really nice feature is the ability to wear your phone with the camera facing out, for personal protection.  You can wear it when jogging, your child can wear it when they are walking home alone on a dark night or it might come in handy while in your car. 

Plus if your phone has a flashlight, which most do, you now have a flashlight which you don't have to hold or when you're taking a video of your family, friends or favorite places, your hands can still be free. Of course the same applies when using your new go pro, which is also able to be harnessed by your Palms Free device.

The Impact

The response to the prototype is overwhelming and when it is worn in the community, "everyone wants one."  One of our favorite quotes from someone in the community who saw our inventor wearing it, sums it up in one word,,,, "Smart!" It takes the place of all other hands free devices combined and it's uses and versatility are unsurpassed.  It can be worn everyday by anyone who needs a free hand.  The possibilities and  scenarios in which it can be worn are endless.

Risks & Challenges

The engineering is completed the tooling is done and the final prototype is finished. The product is made of the finest materials and special consideration has be made in this area including the use of stainless steel to provide customers with years of enjoyment. The idea is to have the product manufactured the "right way" the first time around and no known delays are anticipated. We strive for perfection and expect that every Palms Free harness will be free of imperfections and will be perfect in every way. In the strive for excellence,and the highest quality assurance, challenges could arise. If necessary, we have additional manufacturers lined up to meet and exceed customer expectations in this area and have additional resources set aside to ensure production is comprehensive and delivery is swift. Our backers are our priority. 
Our team of entrepreneurs encompasses a combined 40+ years of experience in the areas of operations, sales, and marketing, giving us the leading edge when it comes to providing products and services and an unsurpassed customer experience.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign page and website with your friends and family! Please use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with anyone you like! We are open to any communication and will accept your feedback wholeheartedly. We would love to hear from our backers and customers, please contact us anytime!

palmsfree@gmail.com

516-721-6959

story:
Great Success So Far - 

Last year our readers contributed $20,125 and built our StockOdds app 1.0 for Android.  You can download the app now for FREE at Google Play: 
https://play.google.com/store/search?q=stockodds&hl=en

The public has run 48,700 stocks through StockOdds this year. 

Details on our stock market and app development pros, Pat O'Neil and Adam White, and our MIT/Cornell math team, Michael Corfman and Steven Bloom, at: 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/stockodds-app/x/6446032#/

  • This campaign pays to finish the FREE iPhone version of StockOdds.
  • We have already been accepted by Apple, but need to finish the code, add new iPhone images, and test the iPhone software. 
  • Our old beta webpage is still open at: www.StockOdds.com/prototype/

Join us and make a contribution to get some great perks!  More importantly, get our unique Android and iPhone apps open to worldwide markets!   

What We Need & What You Get

We need $5200 to complete our iPhone version of StockOdds. 

Our perks are unique: Adam is offering a technical projection for the 2016 stock market, and Pat is offering his "How To" Stockbook research formulas of finding stock prospects for: 

  • a) IRA dividend stocks
  • b) Stocks for a one year trade
  • If we don't reach our full goal, Pat will underwrite the balance. If we exceed our $5200 goal, 100% of all the additional money will go into our StockOdds social media promotion, upgrades to StockOdds 1.0, and other development expenses associated with the launch of the StockOdds app.

Your Impact

In a single click StockOdds lets people get ONE NUMBER daily to see the 60 day trend of their stocks. StockOdds software has successfully run 48,700 stocks. 

Your contribution will help put StockOdds app 1.0 on iPhone.

What Happens Next

  • We are excited to begin social media promotion once we have both our FREE Android and iPhone versions open and running.
  • Revenue-earning versions of StockOdds will follow.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Thanks in advance for passing along StockOdds info to your friends!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Muraho! that is the rwandan way to wish you ''Welcome"!

My name is Muhire Louis-Antoine, founder and CEO  of MERGIMS. When I left my well paid job in Canada late 2014 to start MERGIMS in Rwanda it was because I realized that African Diaspora is stuck in a passive mode toward the economy of Africa, due to outdated traditional money transfer systems.

For example,  the expensive and complicated process of sending money back to Africa won't allow African migrants to contribute efficiently to the well being of their relatives back home.

Therefore, MERGIMS' mission is to directly connect diaspora to merchants in Africa, thus allowing instant transactions between them. Our vision, is to turn African migrants into true active players in the prosperity of Africa, thanks to internet. This can only be achieved by offering them convenient and affordable tools like our platform "mergims", available online and on mobile applications. (visit www.mergims.com)

In Rwanda, we started in 2015 with payment of urgent basic needs such as electricity or airtime and ever since we have more than 1000 active users taking care of their relatives in a convenient manner.

This year, following many requests from our existing clients, we are launching disruptive and innovative services like payment of hospital bills and product called ''Instant Loans''.  

How "instant loans" will work?

The migrant will be the guarantor of his relative in Rwanda, by simply making a deposit or using his debit or credit cards as collateral in our system. Once, his request submitted, "mergims" will instantly (literally in  less than a minute) send the money to the beneficiary via mobile money wallet (with terms and conditions such as interest rate and date to pay back the loan).

The beneficiary will have 30 to 60 days to repay back the loan to mergims' system using mobile money wallet (MTN, Tigo, Airtel) like if he or she was paying for any other service in Rwanda. If he or she has a smart phone or access to a computer, local credit and debit cards will be accepted by our mobile and online platforms. Once, the transaction is successfully closed, the guarantee will be released.

 With this concept, not only we are enabling everyone in Rwanda to have access to quick and instant loans but our interest rate will always be 50% lower compared to the market.

What We Need & What You Get?

Technically, we are 90% ready. However we need $5000 USD minimum to launch our testing period from May to July 2016 with our existing clients. This is where the money raised from you will go!

As our way to thank you, you will be mentioned, if you want, on the cover page of that service, as the people who made it possible. Also, we will keep you informed in priority of new fundraising campaigns, in case you want to be more involved.

The Impact

Myself I lived outside Rwanda for more than 20 years and I had many of my cousins that wanted to start small business and needed small amount of money. I always felt bad when I couldn't help all of them because of limited funds. With this platform, people like me will be able to help more because one credit card can support more than one relative at affordable interest rate.

Risks & Challenges

The way it is structured, there is no way we will lose your money, because when the relative defaults, there will always be a deposit or card to be charged. However, this product is new in Rwanda and regulation may take longer to approve our full launch after the testing period. Also, we may face a high demand of loans and not be able to serve all requests because of limited available funds in our system.

Other Ways You Can Help

Murakoze ! (thank you very much) for reading and supporting us. Please, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign and together, let us give access to easy loans, at affordable interest rate, to everyone in Rwanda.

story:
Hello!

My name is Kiola George and I am an entrepreneur from Brooklyn, NY. I am the mother of a spunky two year old by the name of Zoe! She is the light of my life! Everything I do in this world is for her. That includes my latest venture. I have invested my savings into this project, which I believe will change the way people search for a new residence and the way we live!

Heybor! is a mobile app that allows users to add, rate, and review residential properties based on attributes like safety, facilities, amenities and management. In a nutshell, you are able to search a property by its address and gain access to residents who have lived or currently live on site! At a glance, you will gain firsthand knowledge about the property as a whole and you can even get granular info by reading the reviews left by tenants to learn about the ins and outs of the neighborhood as a whole. 

Heybor! is going to change the way that we view moving. It will open the lines of communications between potential neighbors and businesses. Once those interactions are created, we'll be able to come together to strengthen our communities. After all, we share our space and want to feel comfortable in it. 

Heybor! app has launched and is currently available on both the App Store and Play Store. I am  looking to expand the app to include more states in the coming weeks. I would like to launch nationally by 2017. Your contribution would be helping towards the expansion, marketing, and further development of the of the mobile app. I have invested most of my own savings and have reached a point where the success of the app now depends on the help of my community. The same community that I am hoping will benefit from Heybor! I am determined to make this app a success and with your help, you can make my dream a reality! 


Other Ways You Can Help

While I appreciate any contributions made towards the goal, it is your support that means the most to me! Please feel free to share this with your friends and family. Together we can do anything! I truly appreciate you taking the time to read my story and look forward to giving this to the community. For more information on the Heybor! app, please visit heyborapp.com. For questions or to just to throw me a message of support, please email kiola.george@gmail.com.

story:
"Easily find the  perfect length by button press."

 

”It keeps going!"

 

"The Most Fantastic selfie experience ever!"

 

“This is the perfect one I want!"

 

Built with aircraft-grade aluminum, stylish

 

 

 By ColinsClub.
 
 Thanks for [Jimmy is Promo].
 

What can you do with an MP Mypole if you are seeing someone

 

 
 
 

 
 

Compatible with most of action  cameras like GoPro and other accessories such as mini fan and LED light

 

 

 

 

Our team was inspired to come together because of a common frustration—Selfie sticks have never seemed to be able to extend automatically and can ruin the moment with all their manual handling. With that in mind, we set out to design a selfie stick with valuable features that all our customers can enjoy and highlight their experiences.

 

MP MyPole’s Products are designed in the U.S. and manufactured in mainland China. US Patent Pending designed.

We believe that when bonded together, everything is possible. We create products with the mission of helping people live better experiences. We are not only entrepreneurs but also innovators and designers. When all of us comes together with one idea, we make it come true.

 

Our team came up with the notion after a business trip to Las Vegas, one of the most beautiful cities in the world. We appreciated the selfie stick (a traditional one) that one of us brought on the trip when we were touring around the city taking group selfies in front of those stunning sceneries in the city. Those selfies turned out to be pretty impressive. We were able to hold it out in front of us and get a quick snap to catch a passing by the cool scene when we were walking or in the car. We were able to raise it above our head and get the unique bird’s-eye view and also include everybody in the picture because you can lower it in front of you to show what's above you. You can use it to get a great shot of any significant event or experience. This trip inspired us that if the entire function of the selfie stick can be done with a touch of a button, it could change the world of selfie taking.  

After we had returned home, we started this project and turned this idea of a motorized selfie stick into a reality. We made it easy to control and wireless. Comparing with other selfie sticks, MP MyPole is user-friendly and straightforward. Anyone with the auto-extension selfie stick can take selfies in the best angle. Our team wants everyone in the world to be able to take the perfect selfie!  

We appreciate all support; it truly means that we all can take the perfect selfie together!

 

Risks and challenges

We want to talk about the risks and challenges in a little more detail than is typical for most Kickstarter projects. A lot of times teams default to high-level paragraphs without outlining what exactly might go wrong. We want to make sure our backers understand the complexity of manufacturing and the associated risks beforehand.

We’ve built and shipped hardware products before, and are familiar with the problems that may arise that could cause delays and impact delivery times. We’ve tried to make our delivery estimates as close to reality as possible by including ample buffer time into our timeline to take into account of unforeseen circumstances that could arise, but we can’t predict the future and foresee everything that might occur. Here are some of the most obvious potential risks, although the list is certainly not exhaustive.

1. Tooling: Tooling is the process of making molds that eventually become pieces of the product. For us, tooling will be used to create the frames of the glasses. We’ve done our best to build room for tooling adjustments as well as mistakes into our timeline. It is possible that a part’s design may need to be adjusted, and that may take additional weeks or months to resolve. 3D printed and CNC prototypes are too different to perfectly represent an injection molded piece, and there may be unique challenges that we are unable to foresee. Tooling will also be happening around holiday season, which means factories may wind down production until after the holidays which could add to production time. We’ve already included buffer time to take this into account.

2. Supply chain logistics: If we partner with a factory and order specific components to build a PCB (for example), it is possible that the factory may run low on parts or have long lead times for their inventory. This can hold up assembly, as you may imagine, since we can’t build a product if pieces are missing. Sometimes market forces change and can affect the supply of various components. If it is something we were waiting on, we will see longer lead times, and therefore delays.

3. Certifications/Regulations: Since we are manufacturing electronics, there are various tests, including FCC and CE, that we will need to test. These tests often reveal design flaws that require changes in the design. Our timeline takes into account the potential need for retesting.

4. Mistakes: At the end of the day, a lot of risks manifest from plain old mistakes. If we pick a plastic that ends up warping or becomes brittle during molding, we’ll have to change it. If we discover that a component fatigues during testing, it means we have to source a new one. If we fail various certifications, there may need to be redesigns in our electronics. We aren’t perfect, but we’re going to try our hardest to be as perfect as possible. We learned a lot from shipping our previous electronic devices, and we are confident that these experiences will help keep us on track.

Every company faces these challenges, but rarely do consumers see these challenges. Our biggest tool for battling these risks is having previous experience bringing prototypes from concept to full production, including working with contract manufacturers and shipping internationally. We know that building physical goods is a dynamic process with lots of room for hiccups along the way. We will keep an open dialogue with all of our backers through frequent, transparent, and thorough updates.

story:
The world's most useful phone cable now available in miniature! 

Echo are proud to present the IronWire Mini - the most useful phone cable on the market now coming in an extra compact and light-weight version, making this the perfect charging companion for all those that live life on the go!


Multiple Options:

Available in 4 options making the IronWire Mini compatible with almost all modern wireless devices - iPhones, iPads, Tablets, Kindles, Androids, Cameras, Portable Speakers, Battery packs, etc.


IronWire Mini Versions:

  • Apple Lightning to USB (male)
  • MicroUSB to USB (male)
  • USB-C to USB (female)
  • USB-C to Apple Lightning

IronWire Original 5ft Versions:

  • Apple Lightning to USB (male)
  • MicroUSB to USB (male)
  • USB (male) to USB-C
  • USB-C to USB-C


In December 2015, London Tech company Echo, produced the most useful iPhone cable on the market - the IronWire. They demonstrated its strength with a series of entertaining videos (available on YouTube) including towing a car, matching the weight of the Powerlifting World champion and facing the claws and teeth of ferocious miniature Tiger! 



IronWire by Echo: still available via InDemand
Off the back of the success of the IronWire campaign and after listening to your ideas, Echo are now offering this incredibly popular product in a new, smaller and more travel friendly form. 
The IronWire Mini is the pocket size cable which can attach to your keys, slip in your purse or wallet and be to hand when you and your device need it most. The IronWire Mini is the most reliable solution to charging and syncing wherever and whenever you need it.

How much is shipping? Well, shipping starts at $10. Someone's already said, "that's extortionate"... the $10 covers shipping, taxes, and duties from the factory to our warehouse, where it's then sent to you. All of a sudden $10 doesn't seem so much at all!

For a limited time only, the IronWire Mini will be available at the lowest price possible, so be quick and grab it before we sell out!


Campaign Recap:

Product: IronWire Mini
Versions: 
  • Apple Lightning to USB (male)
  • MicroUSB to USB (male)
  • USB-C to Apple Lightning
  • USB-C to USB (female)
Product: IronWire 5ft
Versions:
  • Apple Lightning to USB (male)
  • MicroUSB to USB (male)
  • USB (male) to USB-C
  • USB-C to USB-C
Price: $10
Shipping: June 2016

About Echo:

Our aim at Echo is to make tech work better, and compliment your lifestyle rather than provide eternal frustration. We’ve had previous success on Indiegogo, which included a world-firsts to the market - the first ever Apple licensed charge key that can also charge micro-USB devices - and not forgetting the original IronWire.

story:
The Introduction Beelink
Beelink was established in Shenzhen, China in 2011. Beelink focuses on the definition, research and development, production, and sales of home entertainment equipment and productivity tools. TV BOX and MINI PC products have been loved by users for a long time, Last time the crowdfunding of our MINI PC product on Indiegogo has been loved by nearly 500 users and raised 250,000 US dollars.

Expand X is the first multifunctional gadget designed by Beelink. This is a special product of Beelink. Its emergence allows the mobile phone to be easily connected with the display, without any software, to achieve the screen projection effect, and can be connected with a keyboard, mouse, and gamepad  to operate the mobile phone interface. There are many funny ways to use it.

 

Main features

  • Full metal body

  • Screen mirroring projection

  • Expand peripheral connections

  • Support 4K output

  • One-key switch between mode

  • Extendible with Mobile phone, Computer, Laptop, and Tablet PC

  • Four colors

 

 

1. Function
a). Devices such as mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, etc. can be connected with the display through Expand X for screen expansion, and all machines are used in the same way, easy and convenient.
Expand X can break the limitations of the screen, all you need is a Type-c cable and an HDMI cable. Then you can enjoy it on the big screen.

 

b). Expand X supports connecting USB peripherals, such as mobile hard drives, keyboards, mouses, handles, remote control, and 2.4G equipment, etc.

c). Use Expand X to connect peripherals such as keyboard, mouse, and handles to operate mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, game consoles, and other devices.

d). All-metal body frame structure, suitable for mobile phones and tablet computers.

e). One set of peripherals can operate two devices, just press the switch

 

2. Usage scenarios
a). Connect the mobile phone with the monitor, use the keyboard and mouse to operate the mobile phone, and handle the work as on the host computer.
Computer mode supports hammer TNT, Huawei EMUI, Samsung DEX.  Computer mode and mobile phone mode can be switched at will.
When you have a set of mouse and keyboard, you can completely use it as a normal computer. Whether you are on a business trip or traveling, as long as you bring it, you can turn your phone into a computer anytime, anywhere.

 

b). In the living room, watch the video on the mobile phone or other devices through the TV，You can connect a 2.4G remote control or 2.4G keyboard and mouse for operation.

 

c). Connect with a mobile phone or game console to play games on the large-screen display.
During the connection process, because it is connected by cable, there is no delay and the transmission speed is very fast, so you can get all the information about the device in real-time.

 

3. How to use
Expand X port is multiple, a total of 6 ports, can meet many of your needs.


HDMI OUTPUT*1:
Connect to a monitor, which can output up to 4K resolution
USB 2.0*2:
You can connect USB peripherals, such as a mouse, keyboard, gamepad, 2.4G remote control, mobile hard disk, and so on.
Type-C*2:
Type-C INPUT supports the input of video and audio signals. It can be connected to mobile phones, tablets, notebooks,  Xbox, PS4, and other devices through dual Type-C cables. The connected device needs to support DP Alt mode so that the extended functionality can be used.
Connect the power adapter through Type-C (lightning) to supply power to the device. If the power adapter is not connected, it can be used normally, but the mobile phone provides power support.
Micro USB(PC)*1
Connect to the host via Micro USB to USB, the USB peripherals connected to Expand X can operate the host, the mode switch button selects whether the peripherals operate the computer or operate the equipment connected with the dual Type-C cable.

GADGETS is a new product category of Beelink

 

4. Material
It adopts a magnesium-aluminum alloy full metal body, and a silicone pad is prepared on the surface to support the phone to protect the phone. The dual-axis design allows 360° free adjustment to free hands.

 

5.Selection of color
Expand X has four colors for you to choose, and you can choose the color you like according to your preferences.

 

6.Support device
Please note that your mobile phone or other device needs to have a Type-C port, and the Type-C port needs to support DP Alt mode to use Expand X.

 

7. Delivery
We will start free shipping worldwide on April 1. If the target is not reached, we will still deliver, so don’t worry.

8. Warranty and return service
Since receiving the product, Beelink provides Expand X with a one-year warranty and one-month return service.

9.Other
Order Beelink Expand X, you can get these accessories for free in the picture below.

 

Risks and challenges

We are a company specializing in the production of MINI PC and TV BOX, GADGET is a new product category of Beelink, and we have our own Amazon and Official store. Since we have our own R&D department and factory, we have great advantages in quality control and after-sales service. Our reason for crowdfunding is to build our brand awareness and connect with computer enthusiasts. Our Expand X is preparing for final commissioning. We will ship it in April 2021. In the meantime, we will always optimize the product, so stay tuned.

 

Contact the US
Email: beelink@bee-link.com
Skype: beelinkservice
whatsapp: +8618165710592
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Beelink.fans
Twitter: www.twitter.com/Beelinkofficial
story_txt:
The Introduction BeelinkBeelink was established in Shenzhen, China in 2011. Beelink focuses on the definition, research and development, production, and sales of home entertainment equipment and productivity tools. TV BOX and MINI PC products have been loved by users for a long time, Last time the crowdfunding of our MINI PC product on Indiegogo has been loved by nearly 500 users and raised 250,000 US dollars.
Expand X is the first multifunctional gadget designed by Beelink. This is a special product of Beelink. Its emergence allows the mobile phone to be easily connected with the display, without any software, to achieve the screen projection effect, and can be connected with a keyboard, mouse, and gamepad  to operate the mobile phone interface. There are many funny ways to use it.
 
Main features

Full metal body
Screen mirroring projection
Expand peripheral connections
Support 4K output
One-key switch between mode
Extendible with Mobile phone, Computer, Laptop, and Tablet PC
Four colors


 
 
1. Functiona). Devices such as mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, etc. can be connected with the display through Expand X for screen expansion, and all machines are used in the same way, easy and convenient.Expand X can break the limitations of the screen, all you need is a Type-c cable and an HDMI cable. Then you can enjoy it on the big screen.
 
b). Expand X supports connecting USB peripherals, such as mobile hard drives, keyboards, mouses, handles, remote control, and 2.4G equipment, etc.

c). Use Expand X to connect peripherals such as keyboard, mouse, and handles to operate mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, game consoles, and other devices.
d). All-metal body frame structure, suitable for mobile phones and tablet computers.
e). One set of peripherals can operate two devices, just press the switch

 
2. Usage scenariosa). Connect the mobile phone with the monitor, use the keyboard and mouse to operate the mobile phone, and handle the work as on the host computer.Computer mode supports hammer TNT, Huawei EMUI, Samsung DEX.  Computer mode and mobile phone mode can be switched at will.When you have a set of mouse and keyboard, you can completely use it as a normal computer. Whether you are on a business trip or traveling, as long as you bring it, you can turn your phone into a computer anytime, anywhere.
 
b). In the living room, watch the video on the mobile phone or other devices through the TV，You can connect a 2.4G remote control or 2.4G keyboard and mouse for operation.

 
c). Connect with a mobile phone or game console to play games on the large-screen display.During the connection process, because it is connected by cable, there is no delay and the transmission speed is very fast, so you can get all the information about the device in real-time.

 
3. How to useExpand X port is multiple, a total of 6 ports, can meet many of your needs.
HDMI OUTPUT*1:Connect to a monitor, which can output up to 4K resolutionUSB 2.0*2:You can connect USB peripherals, such as a mouse, keyboard, gamepad, 2.4G remote control, mobile hard disk, and so on.Type-C*2:Type-C INPUT supports the input of video and audio signals. It can be connected to mobile phones, tablets, notebooks,  Xbox, PS4, and other devices through dual Type-C cables. The connected device needs to support DP Alt mode so that the extended functionality can be used.Connect the power adapter through Type-C (lightning) to supply power to the device. If the power adapter is not connected, it can be used normally, but the mobile phone provides power support.Micro USB(PC)*1Connect to the host via Micro USB to USB, the USB peripherals connected to Expand X can operate the host, the mode switch button selects whether the peripherals operate the computer or operate the equipment connected with the dual Type-C cable.
GADGETS is a new product category of Beelink
 
4. MaterialIt adopts a magnesium-aluminum alloy full metal body, and a silicone pad is prepared on the surface to support the phone to protect the phone. The dual-axis design allows 360° free adjustment to free hands.
 
5.Selection of colorExpand X has four colors for you to choose, and you can choose the color you like according to your preferences.

 
6.Support devicePlease note that your mobile phone or other device needs to have a Type-C port, and the Type-C port needs to support DP Alt mode to use Expand X.

 
7. DeliveryWe will start free shipping worldwide on April 1. If the target is not reached, we will still deliver, so don’t worry.

8. Warranty and return serviceSince receiving the product, Beelink provides Expand X with a one-year warranty and one-month return service.

9.OtherOrder Beelink Expand X, you can get these accessories for free in the picture below.
 

Risks and challenges
We are a company specializing in the production of MINI PC and TV BOX, GADGET is a new product category of Beelink, and we have our own Amazon and Official store. Since we have our own R&D department and factory, we have great advantages in quality control and after-sales service. Our reason for crowdfunding is to build our brand awareness and connect with computer enthusiasts. Our Expand X is preparing for final commissioning. We will ship it in April 2021. In the meantime, we will always optimize the product, so stay tuned.
 
Contact the USEmail: beelink@bee-link.comSkype: beelinkservicewhatsapp: +8618165710592Facebook: www.facebook.com/Beelink.fansTwitter: www.twitter.com/Beelinkofficial

story:
A Video Game Console for Mobile Games

 

We believe in two guiding ideas:

1. Your smartphone is a supercomputer and has the potential to achieve more.

2. Big screen video gameplay should be less expensive and more accessible.

How do we make those ideas a reality?

You are likely already carrying around super-computing power in your hand that rivals many traditional game consoles. AnyConsole™ can unlock that computing power and lets you play Android mobile games on a TV/monitor - with no visually perceptible latency.

With the AnyConsole, you can play mobile games on big screens with a controller or keyboard/mouse. It feels similar to a traditional video game console or a PC gaming experience, but you are actually playing your smartphone’s games! 

This also means that you no longer need to pay $29-$59 for every video game. You now have the ability to play hundreds of thousands of free Android games on big screens!

 

Many people have attempted playing mobile games on big screens with other technologies. However, two technology shortfalls prevented this from happening: 

 • Screen mirroring latency problems (> 1000ms) 

 • Peripheral device limitations (you have to use your phone for the controls) 

We solved these issues with:

1. Zero-latency ESM™ Technology

Yes, there are other technologies that can mirror your phone to a big screen, including Apple Airplay, Google Chromecast, and smart TV. But those methods all have significant latency issues. 

As gamers ourselves, we know every millisecond matters when it comes to serious gaming. So we developed our own patented Electrical Spine Mirroring™ (ESM) technology that eliminated the latency problem. So you have immediate control of the battlefield.

2. Game Controller and Keyboard Support

Very few mobile games have integrated external controller support, which means even when you play mobile games on a TV with other technology, you still have to use your phone for the on-screen touch control. To solve this problem, we developed reverse control technology, which empowers you to play mobile games with a game controller (available for another $29) or keyboard & mouse. 

Our AI algorithm learns how your fingers control your phone, and it simulates the same actions (it's like virtual fingers floating on your phone's touchscreen).

 

We love mobile games because we can play them on the go. We love console video games because we like to enjoy the immersive big-screen gaming experience. With the AnyConsole, you can have the best of both worlds. Enjoy a continuous gaming experience, no matter where you are.

With our AnyPNP™ technology, you can start a mobile game on your phone when you're outside and continue playing it on a TV when you get home in a seamless way.

AnyConsole works with all Android devices. Since AnyConsole uses your phone for computing power, every time you upgrade your Android phone, you also get your AnyConsole ready for the latest games.

While the price of most technology is steadily declining, we seem to keep paying more and more to big video game console companies for new hardware. Case in point, the new PlayStation 5 costs $100 more than the PlayStation 4. Besides, we need to pay $29-$59 for every new game.

We think it shouldn't have to be that way. We want gaming to be economically accessible for everyone. AnyConsole costs a fraction of what you'd spend for traditional consoles. And since most mobile games are free to play, you can also save hundreds on new games.

          

Many major game studios have already went “all-in” to design high-end gaming experiences for mobile (they make more from mobile games than they make from the console and PC games combined). Call of Duty: Mobile may have been the first of these big titles, but 2021 is already scheduled to be the year of big-name game titles from major game studios being designed for your phone. Expect mobile titles like "Diablo Immortal, Apex Legends Mobile, Tomb Raider Reloaded, Path of Exile Mobile, and NieR Re[in]carnation to look great on your phone. We want your gaming experience to be better with a big screen and great sound.

 

 

Emulators are PC software that lets you run Android apps on a computer. Your computer is providing computing power. 

The AnyConsole uses an AI algorithm that learns how your fingers control your phone, and it simulates the same thing to the game (it's like virtual fingers floating on your phone's touchscreen). In other words, the game is still running on your phone, so you don't get banned. 

 

 

We partnered with the experienced audio engineers at Kali Audio to develop the optimal sound for gaming. These respected industry veterans developed an entire acoustic system specifically for gaming and tuned the AnyConsole’s speakers into the optimal way to get the immersive sound for gaming. 

These speakers pack a punch for their size. In terms of specs, they have two 40-millimeter transducers and each of them delivers 8 watts of output (if you are not an audiophile that means AnyConsole is 5x more powerful than a JBL Clip 3). 

These speakers are small but "mighty"

You can also use the AnyConsole as an attractive desktop phone charger/speaker. Want to use it as a smart speaker? Just enable your phone for voice commands with Google Assistant and say “Hey Google: play my “ Chill Super Mix” or other smart-speaker commands. The same could be done by enabling Alexa Hands-Free mode on your phone. 

 

Hardcore PC gamers swear by the ability to use keyboard and mouse control because of the speed and preciseness. Some mobile gamers wish to use a gamepad controller, so their thumb won't hurt from prolonged gaming. With the advent of the AnyConsole,  gamers now have the option of utilizing both types of control for their mobile games.

Use a Game Controller

 

Game Like the Pros With a Mouse & Keyboard

AnyConsole isn’t just for gaming. It has screen mirroring capabilities too for much of the content you love to watch on your phone. You can use it as a streaming box to play your favorite YouTube videos, stream Twitch, browse TikTok, watch TV shows** – all on the big screen in 4K*.

*AnyConsole supports up to 4K resolution in theater mode. The final resolution might be limited by your phone's resolution.

**Platforms like Netflix and Amazon Prime Video do not allow Digital Rights Management Content to be screen mirrored.

Our engineers take a great deal of pride in the innovative design details on the AnyConsole and that innovation didn’t stop with the development of the AnyConsole’s new speakers. They also considered chord storage and came up with a clever and unique way to store the AnyConsole’s power chord’s for a cleaner look and easier transportation. 

 

 

 

The AnyConsole has been in the design and prototype phase for the last 16 months. We've put a lot of work and thought into making it. Backing it will allow us the capital needed for manufacturing and bringing it to the retail market.

 

 
 
 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are an established company with a history of delivering computer hardware on a large scale worldwide. We are confident not only in our team, but also in our partners, supply chain, and logistics providers. We bring proven experience in designing, manufacturing, and fulfilling products (both crowdsourced and otherwise) to the table.

That said, even the biggest companies have some risks with bringing a new product through production and into the market. A shipping container could get hit by a storm. A natural disaster could take out one of our suppliers. Even in the event of a disaster, we are confident we have the experience and resources to overcome it. COVID-19 previously delayed our production schedule for our PhoneBook product fulfillment, but we beat the challenges presented and mass-produced our product.

During the fulfillment of all our crowdfunded products, we updated our backers regularly with our progress and challenges. We know how important communication is, and we pledge to be open and transparent with you to the best of our ability. We also commit to resolving fulfillment issues as rapidly as possible with all our resources.

We need your help to put AnyConsole into large-scale mass production, and we sincerely thank you for your support.

story:
Today’s parents want their kids to be in touch and reachable at all times for safety reasons, but they hesitate to give youngsters smartphones at too early an age. Kids are always attracted to fun electronic gadgets but regular smartphones can be a distraction or expose them to unhealthy internet content. What is needed is a device that has the reliable connectivity of a smartphone along with sensible parental controls and features kids love such as camera, multimedia, and more. 

That is why we made Novus, the perfect 3-in-1 modular gadget for kids that can be used as a phone, a watch or a home assistant. It is the perfect solution to keep kids entertained and parents connected with their kids and enjoy peace of mind. 

  • Novus Phone

Novus Phone is ergonomically designed to fit small hands, easy and fun for kids to use. The battery can last three days with one full charge which is three times longer than Novus Watch. It is also suitable for children, who may need more privacy and don't want others to hear their calls, to talk through the phone.

  • Novus Watch

In the watch mode, Novus becomes a sleek, useful smartwatch for daily wear that stays put and won’t get lost or left behind when kids are playing in the park, going to school or on-the-go. The battery can last for one day with one full charge.

  •  Novus Home

The home module has a built-in 4400 mAh battery and Bluetooth speaker. When Novus Phone or Novus Watch are plugged into the home module, they will immediately get charged and turn into an AI speaker. Equipped with Google Assistant, Novus can play music and multimedia by voice command. 

  • Simple Transformation

The modular design makes Novus easy to transform into a phone or a watch to suit the different needs of the child.

  • Stay Connected Anytime and Anywhere

Parents can make a video call, phone call or send voice/text message to Novus via the Novus App, keeping in touch with their children at all times. Children can use Novus to connect with their friends, or reach their parents in times of need or to just say hello.

 

  • Always Know Your Child's Location

Multiple positioning methods including GPS, A-GPS, LBS, Wi-Fi, and more, allows parents to track their kid's location activities at any distance via the Novus app. Precise, secure, and always connected, the Novus App gives parents peace of mind, knowing exactly where their little ones are at.

  • SOS Mode | Asking for Help in an Emergency

Safety first! In an emergency, kids can trigger the SOS mode by pressing the power button 3 times continuously. It’s like having help along at all times.

In addition to its onboard safety features, the Novus app allows parents to manage their kids’ device in a number of useful ways, including contact filter, disable period, home-school reminder and more. It provides a good solution to know your child is safe and prevent them from overdoing with screen time. It is available on the App Store and Google Play. 

  • Connectivity

Novus is an unlocked smart device. It supports nano-SIM card on the extremely fast 4G network. Technically, it can work over any 4G LTE network and we have tested it on most of the major mobile carriers' networks. And it supports adding a line to the existing phone plan as well.

  • Fascinating LED Light Effect

When the slide motion of the touch wheel is used, a cool LED will light up as an attractive visual cue. Use the touch wheel to scroll up or down the menu and control the volume of the phone. It’s a simple and intuitive way for kids to control Novus.

  • Perfect Companion and Helper for Kids

Novus Home allows children to accomplish any number of things, such as calling a friend, asking questions, playing music and even turning on or off the nightlight by using simple voice commands. Children can access useful information or get help with homework simply by asking when parents are not at home.

  • Time | Calendar | Alarm Clock

The home module shows the time and date when Novus Phone or Novus Watch isn't placed in the charging hub. It can even set an alarm clock that will get kids up on time. It is an entertaining and useful companion for kids. 

  • Smart Nightlight with Infrared Body Temperature Control

After dark, the Novus Home module becomes a pleasing nightlight. It supports infrared remote control and can turn off automatically when people are absent and turn on again when people approach it. It provides a comforting light to brighten children’s’ rooms at night.

  • Portable Multimedia Player

The phone module has a 3.5 mm jack, allowing children to listen to music by connecting earphones. Both Novus Home and Novus Phone include a stereo speaker that can play music or multimedia independently. 

How We Created Novus?

Abardeen is a professional team that has more than 10 years of experience in designing and manufacturing of kids’ smartwatches. We’re on a mission to create the best smart devices for children at affordable prices.

When we came up with the concept of Novus, we knew that it would be necessary to satisfy the unique needs of both parents and kids. The idea is simple…give kids a wearable that is packed with fun features and useful apps while providing parents the peace of mind and security of knowing that they can always keep in touch with their children. 

Novus is a revolutionary new gadget that does it all and both kids and parents love!

story:
SolarBar features 4（or 8 best solar panels on the market that absorb and convert sunlight to the power you need for all your devices at extremely high efficiency. It also comes with a detachable 10000mAh power bank that reserves the solar to charge your gadgets when there is insufficient sunlight. The power bank offers 10W Qi wireless and up to 18W QC3.0 charging to a maximum of 4 devices simultaneously. It has a built-in LED light that serves as a nightlight for emergency situations. SolarBar is rugged, portable and weather-resistant, designed to charge while you are on the move.  

 

 

 

          

 

 

SolarBar is made with quality monocrystalline solar panels from LG or Sunpower using an innovative Interdigitated Back Contact (IBC) solar cell technology to achieve higher efficiency of up to 22.5%, which makes SolarBar capable of providing up to 30% more power compared to traditional cells. It is powerful enough to harness solar energy with diminished sunlight.  

We offer 2 solar power versions: 10W Portable & 20W High Power Edition. The 20W solar panel will provide a charging speed comparable to wall charging. 

 

       

 

 

SolarBar comes with a removable 10000mAh power bank which can be fully charged through the 4 solar panels at a total of 10W in about 5~5.6 hours and through the 8 solar panels at a total of 20W in about 3.5~4 hours. Four LED flash to indicate the battery life remaining. You can leave SolarBar on the windowsill while you are seeing to other tasks, on the dash of the car for your morning commute, or on the ground when you are enjoying outdoor activities. During night on your camping trip or tackling adventures in thick woods, you can always keep your devices charged using the power bank in case of emergencies. 

 

 

SolarBar’s battery has built-in Lightning, USB-C and Micro-USB charging cables, one USB output port and an internal Qi wireless charging mat, so it can charge up to four devices at the same time while it is being recharged using the solar panels. 

 

 

Its charging port and cables support Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0, which are able to power up your devices at a whopping 3A/18W max. 

 

 

Its embedded Qi wireless charger enables compatible devices to wireless charge up to 2x faster at 10W. 

 

 

 

SolarBar provides a clean, sustainable, environmentally friendly and free source of energy to your mobile phone, tablet, GoPro, kindle, camera, drone, speaker, headphone, almost all your devices. 

 

 

When the battery is removed, it can be conveniently carried around to provide wired & wireless charges to your devices on the go. It can also be recharged by plugging a cable into its Micro-USB input port which supports QC3.0 at 3A/18W max. Its integrated charging cables preclude you from carrying extra cables. 

 

 

 

The built-in smart IC chip helps identify each device plugged in and helps determine the optimal charging speed, which maximizes overall battery life, as well as intelligently prevents devices from overcharging or overheating. 

 

 

 

SolarBar 4 panels weighs 0.67 pounds and measures only 3.7” x 6.9” x 1.5” when folded. SolarBar 8 panels weighs 1.17 pounds and measures only 3.7” x 6.9” x 2.1” when folded. Power bank weighs 0.68 pounds. SolarBar is an ideal combination of portability and power that can keep you going for days.  

 

 

The incorporated LED light is a desirable addition that can double as a torch giving you adjustable visibility or an emergency SOS-strobe light with two flashing modes. 

 

 

 

SolarBar’s rugged canvas can withstand high humidity and splashes. The panels are PET laminated for high light transmission, water-resistant, scratch-resistant and attractive appearance and are tolerant of withering and warping during long exposure to the sunlight. 

 

 

 

SolarBar is an effective and reliable charging solution specifically for outdoor use, such as when you are camping, hiking, backpacking around the country or just having lunch in the park. SolarBar gives your gear an energy boost before you head out on your adventure.  

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

Portable electronic technology co., ltd. is specialized in research, design, production and marketing outdoor solar and power products with strong R&D ability to develop new solar application products with more than 10 years. Portable covers around 8,000 square meter plant and 238 employees. We have produced over 10 million products since beginning. We established Wholly owned subsidiary in Dongguan, China in 2017-Maodi Solar Technology(Dongguan)Co.,ltd which mainly produce photovoltaic modules/solar panel and solar products. They are widely used for UAV, medical devices, cellphones, laptops, batteries, game players, printers, digital cameras, household appliance, etc. Company monthly capacity is up to 100,000pcs.The annual output value of the company reaches 30 million USD.

story:
The BikeShield is a Road Safety App that prevents collisions by sending acoustic warnings to motorists when bicycles or motorcycles are nearby.

The BikeShield is a First Layer Crash Avoidance Technology adding a preliminary and additional protection layer to any other safety system incorporated in your vehicle.    

Take a look to the great coverage of the BikeShield on ABC 7 News and other amazing media platforms:  



        

   

Why a Mobile App?

Smart phones have all the required technology to connect different vehicles on the road: GPS, internet, accelerometer, device-to-device communication systems, etc. Most importantly, it doesn't matter if you are driving an old car or riding an old bicycle, almost everyone carries one. Phone technology has become a Universal Communication Platform.



Who are we?

The BikeShield was developed by the TDG Company, a startup created in 2014 by a group of enthusiastic people who love bicycles, motorcycles, and above all safety. The TDG Company includes people from Los Angeles (California, US), Guadalajara (Jalisco, MEX) and Barcelona (Catalunya, Spain) who rode all over the world.

Version 1.0 was launched in September 2014 on iOS and Android platforms. It evolved to version 2.1 which includes automatic activation, trip reports and interactive maps to help determine safer routes.  The BikeShield Community is over 3,000 street users.

                         


Why do we need your help?

The BikeShield is FREE and will remain free. But we need your help to keep going. 

We need your collaboration to achieve wide scale adoption and to develop the BikeShield Version 3.0, which will be even more reliable. The new version will use minimal battery power and it will connect bikes with more types of vehicles on the road: cars, taxis, buses, etc. It will also include really cool features like real-time visualization of your friends on the map to check their ride, meet up with them and make sure they are safe. 

                                 


We believe that road safety is as much of a right as it is a responsibility so there is no room for exclusivity. Therefore, it is important for us to open the BikeShield communication channel to existing community efforts and infrastructure. These programs and communities include:

BIKE SHARE PROGRAMS: Bike share programs with their own apps can be equipped with the BikeShield.  We have partnered with MiBici in Guadalajara, Mexico, which will become the most advanced bike share program in the World by incorporating the BikeShield B2V Communication System. With your help, we will expand this model to your city's bike share program and programs across the world.


ROAD APPS AND NAVIGATION SYSTEMS:  We are now opening our Bike-2-Vehicle (B2V) communication channels to the most popular road and navigation apps so everyone using them will sense you when riding nearby. This is one of our ultimate goals and with your help we'll get there.  


PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:  Buses prove to be a unique challenge for sharing the road because they often drive in and out of bike lanes to reach sidewalk bus stops. Their large size and limited view often makes it difficult for bus drivers to cyclists. That’s why we have developed the BikeShield BUS for bus drivers.     


                                


BikeShield Backers' Rewards 

With your contributions the BikeShield will continue to improve and the BikeShield Community will continue to grow. In return, we want to give you something memorable.

Linus Bike Bell Side Striker - $20

Because safety is also cool and pretty. Get one of the bells from our good friends at Linus Bike and contribute to this campaign:   

                     

Our Favorite Perk - The Pouch - $35

No need to say much. Isn't it beautiful?

                                 


BikeShield Goes CASUAL - $50

Show your support to all your friends with our stylish BikeShield t-shirt.


                                


Available Sizes: S, M, L, X and XL.


BikeShield Goes RACING - $100

Join the BikeShield Team and look like a super hero at the same time with our BikeShield Racing Jersey.

                           


Let's bike to the Market - $150

Take advantage of this opportunity and get a beautiful Market Bag from our good friends at Linus Bikes. You'll be contributing to our campaign and making your life better.

                         

  

Dimensions of each compartment: 11"(w) x 12.5"(h) x 4.75" (d)

Volume: 23.5 Liters

Colors: Navy, Army Green, Sand and Camel. Pick yours!


BIG TIME PERKS

We have partnered with some of the most cutting-edge and innovative companies in the cycling industry who understand the need for the BikeShield as much as you do. These companies have been extremely supportive by giving us a deal. We are pleased to pass this deal onto you. Enjoy. 

LINUS BIKES - BikeShield Goes Classic - $700

Inspired by French bicycle design of the 50s and 60s, Linus has created a bicycle that preserves the simple elegance and pure form of that golden era, but has all the benefits of modern comfort and reliability. Models available:



MARTONE CYCLING CO - BikeShield Goes Fashion - $1,100

All Martone Cycling Co. bicycles have fashion in their gene pool, and quality engineering in their DNA. Their parts are solid and reliable. Their look is distinctive. And their mission to bring the sustainability of cycling to the world drives their work in projects like the BikeShield.


CURRIE TECH eBIKES - BikeShield Goes Electric - $2,400
Currie Tech is renowned for its large selection of stylish, premium quality and technologically advanced electric bicycles.  They offer electric bike models that meet every rider's need for cost-effective transportation alternatives, recreation, exercise and just plain fun!


 Other Ways You Can Help

Besides your generous contribution, we need you to download the BikeShield, use it, share it and tell your friends to use it. You will keep people you love safer out there!

And "stop using the words pedestrians, bicyclists or drivers. We are all people” (Seleta Reynolds, Los Angeles DOT General Manager).


Special thanks to:

This campaign would have not been possible without the incredible talent of Santi Valldeperez (FILMSNOMADES) who made and produced our campaign video with tons of love and passion. 

We also want to thank Larry Pizzi (Currie Technologies), Lorenzo Martone (Martone Cycling CO) and Linus Bikes for their generous contributions and support to the campaign.

And all our family & friends who believe in the project as much as we do. We love you all.

BikeShield Team

Carlos López-Zaragoza, Pepe Arévalo, Carl Burnstein & Pere Margalef.
