story:
TURN ANY DEVICE INTO A POWER BANK

Our smartphones are crucial to our everyday lives. We use them for near enough everything, so why are all the options to charge them so bulky or awkward to use?

At Zuo Charge we're always trying to invent ways to overcome the biggest problem we have with our smartphones, keeping them charged up.


S2 allows you to charge any device or accessory using a Micro-USB OTG device anywhere.

The cable acts like a USB so you can move pictures, videos, music etc between devices.


Make sure you never lose your cable by attaching it to virtually anything.

Instead of forgetting your cable at home, you can take it with you on your keys.


The small bendy cable helps prevent damage to the wires inside during use and while it's on your keys.

With such a tiny cable, you won't ever have a tangled mess.


You can take it with you even if you don't have any keys and you'll never have an empty battery again.

It'll keep your earphones free from tangles with the enclosed magnets .


The two types of cable will allow you to charge two types of devices from a Micro USB OTG smartphone.

It'll charge an iPhone using Lightning...

...and an Android using Micro USB.


S2 comes in two awesome colors.

Midnight Black and Iris Blue



From its conception last year, we've been going non-stop to get the S2 perfect. As we have experience with the manufacturer for our original cables, we're confident you'll receive your key ring before the end of August.


Our mission is to make the process of charging simpler and more convenient, so with the Zuo Charge S1 we took it down to its roots by offering the most portable keyring charger available, now with S2 we've perfected that design and offered a completely new way of charging your devices.

 Zuo Charge S2 is the simplest and tiniest solution to get some juice from your friends on the go. Help us make it a reality.


As we've successfully sold Zuo Charge S1 for over a year, we don't anticipate any problems delivering this campaign ahead of schedule. 

We will use the same manufacturers we used for S1. So we're nearly there, we just need to fine tune the design and pay the upfront mould cost and we're ready to go.

In regards to shipping, we don't anticipate there will be any delays as we've been using  the same fulfilment centre for over a year without a hitch.

Should anything arise that affects our shipping schedule, we will let you know as soon as possible.


How much is delivery?
We provide Tracked Shipping across the globe, free of charge.

Is the Lightning version MFi certified?
No, it has not been certified due to the presence of a Micro USB end where you are getting power from. See next point for clarification

Will it stop working like my other smartphone cables do?
We stand by our products so we issue a 3 year functional warranty with every one of them so should they stop working we will happily send another.

Will it fall off my keys?
We've improved on our original design and made the magnets a lot stronger!
We use our S2's  everyday for a few months and we still have them on our keys standing strong.
story_txt:
TURN ANY DEVICE INTO A POWER BANK
Our smartphones are crucial to our everyday lives. We use them for near enough everything, so why are all the options to charge them so bulky or awkward to use?


At Zuo Charge we're always trying to invent ways to overcome the biggest problem we have with our smartphones, keeping them charged up.

S2 allows you to charge any device or accessory using a Micro-USB OTG device anywhere.
    


The cable acts like a USB so you can move pictures, videos, music etc between devices.



Make sure you never lose your cable by attaching it to virtually anything.


Instead of forgetting your cable at home, you can take it with you on your keys.



The small bendy cable helps prevent damage to the wires inside during use and while it's on your keys.


With such a tiny cable, you won't ever have a tangled mess.



You can take it with you even if you don't have any keys and you'll never have an empty battery again.


It'll keep your earphones free from tangles with the enclosed magnets .



 The two types of cable will allow you to charge two types of devices from a Micro USB OTG smartphone.
It'll charge an iPhone using Lightning...


...and an Android using Micro USB.





S2 comes in two awesome colors.


Midnight Black and Iris Blue




From its conception last year, we've been going non-stop to get the S2 perfect. As we have experience with the manufacturer for our original cables, we're confident you'll receive your key ring before the end of August.






Our mission is to make the process of charging simpler and more convenient, so with the Zuo Charge S1 we took it down to its roots by offering the most portable keyring charger available, now with S2 we've perfected that design and offered a completely new way of charging your devices.
 Zuo Charge S2 is the simplest and tiniest solution to get some juice from your friends on the go. Help us make it a reality.



As we've successfully sold Zuo Charge S1 for over a year, we don't anticipate any problems delivering this campaign ahead of schedule. 
We will use the same manufacturers we used for S1. So we're nearly there, we just need to fine tune the design and pay the upfront mould cost and we're ready to go.
In regards to shipping, we don't anticipate there will be any delays as we've been using  the same fulfilment centre for over a year without a hitch.
Should anything arise that affects our shipping schedule, we will let you know as soon as possible.







How much is delivery?
We provide Tracked Shipping across the globe, free of charge.
Is the Lightning version MFi certified?
No, it has not been certified due to the presence of a Micro USB end where you are getting power from. See next point for clarification
Will it stop working like my other smartphone cables do?
We stand by our products so we issue a 3 year functional warranty with every one of them so should they stop working we will happily send another.
Will it fall off my keys?
We've improved on our original design and made the magnets a lot stronger!We use our S2's  everyday for a few months and we still have them on our keys standing strong.

story:
What is ?


My project is a stand for a smartphone, simple, safe, functional and economical for everyone!

It's a very simple product, yet so useful that we believe everybody should own one. That's why one of my main goals was to keep it affordable.

360° ROTATION - Adjust your phone position the way you like. With this phone mount, you can easily adjust to any angle with a single push. Easy on, easy off, attach and detach your mount with ease on just about any edge defined surface. Since the LOBSTER 360 rotates a full 360 degrees you are sure to end up with the viewing style you desired. Or simple lay the LOBSTER 360 on a table and use it like a cradle or stand for your smartphone.

                                  LOBSTER 360 FOR ALL LOCATIONS

Cell phone holder that can be mounted on different locations and surfaces including car air vents, bike handlebars, office desks, tables, shelves, air vents and many more edge defined surfaces.

                    

You don't have to use a different mount for every place you go, just take with you the portable mount everywhere: in your car, on your bike, at the gym, in your office, you can go shopping with and keep it on your baby stroller, even on your shop.

FITS ALMOST ANY SMARTPHONE OR GPS DEVICES

The grip expands and allows you to fit up to 6 Inch screen smartphones and plenty of other GPS devices. Fits with IPhone 6 Plus, 6, 5S, 5C, 5, 4, 4S, Samsung Galaxy S6, S5, S4, and other.

                   

STURDY DESIGN, CONVENIENT AND SECURE

The sturdiness of LOBSTER 360 comes from its combination of premium quality rubber reinforced with extra strong spring stainless steel.

The combination of these two materials gives LOBSTER 360 the much needed strength to resist road vibration, minor impacts and lots more, extremely convenient because of its simple design. The mount is generally lightweight and very portable making it extremely handy and useful anywhere and anytime.

Take it along with you for use on the go.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN

Colors:    red                             yellow                                 grey                             black     . 

WHY WE NEED YOU!

I’ve turned to Indiegogo to open my idea to you. With your support, we will get this product to market that much faster. Our product components are ready for and then mass production, but only your help will get us there. We have expertise in manufacturing products, and we have partnered with experienced producers. All together, we can make this happen.

WHAT'S NEXT?

June: Indiegogo campaign and begin manufacturing for the injection molds!

July: Finalize the assembly process and begin order fulfillment!

July/August: Delivery!


On the indiegogo will save USD 8 on the future price


PACKAGING SOLUTION

Below you can see my current e-commerce idea.

             

Thank you

Thank you all for taking your time to view this project . We hope that you are as passionate and excited as we are about LOBSTER 360.

Please spread the word and share this project with your friends and loved ones.

If this project will not be funded at 100% all the supporters will be refunded!!!

story:
FAQ (we have tried to collate and answer some of the most common and frequent questions asked by our supporters and hope its helps answering your quires).


What hapens if the campaign does not reach its goal?

A lot of backers do ask this question or atleast it does cross ones mind when backing the campaign.

Even if this campaign does not reach its goal, your pledges will be delivered and MAXphone will be launched. As a business we are going to release this device as a end of the year new release anyways however the objective of the campaign is to create a large community of owners that will help create a global brand and a global benefit. 

Reaching 100% is not a big target and needs just a few pledges more to success and its possible. So no need to worry and pledge your support now with confidence.


Will The MAXphone work on my network?

MAXphone is designed with a World 4G LTE network modem and it supports almost all available 4G, 3G and 2G mobile world networks. As long as you are in a supported network and your service provider supports such a network, yes your MAXphone will connect to the best available network at that point in time and it may switch from 4G to 3G for example, as per the network area you are in.

However its recommended that you check the MAXphone specifications for the wireless and network bands supported with your mobile network provider.


Will it work in Australia, USA, UK, Asia, Europe, Canada, Russia or any where in the world?

Yes, as long as you are in an network area that is supported by MAXphone and your service provider (your sim card provider) provides the service to such a network, then yes it will ,whether its 4G LTE or 3G WCDMA or 2G GSM.


Will the MAXphone work on US networks like Verizon?

MAXphone supports 4G LTE -3G wcdma and 2G GSM networks (please refer to the specification and details)

Verizon has an extensive 4G LTE coverage network all over USA.
If one wanted to be on their network, all you need to do is buy one of their 4G SIM cards and use it on the MAXphone, to easy.

However if you are already using a Verizon network locked phone or network locked sim thats on a plan for example, its best to talk to them and get more information.


Will the MAXphone work on Indian networks?

MAXphone supports 4G LTE -3G wcdma and 2G GSM networks (please refer to the specification and details) and India has an extensive network coverage between its carriers. Yes your MAXphone will work on Indian band networks as an where its available. 


Does the MAXphone come with any contract or lock?

None what so ever. Your MAXphone is unlocked and contract free. You are free to use any supporting Sim card to connect to a supported network however your sim card is subject to your sim card and network provider terms, conditions and plans.


What is a Dual Sim phone?

A Dual sim phone has 2 sim card slots and supports 2 sim cards at 2 different networks and dual standby (both the sim card networks are active) so that you may receive or make calls or connect to networks with any of your sim cards. MAXphone is a dual sim phone and has 2 separate sim card slots, 2 phones in 1...Max advantage.


What is the RRP of MAX after launch?

The recommended retail price of the MAX is estimated to be $449/- available via the mymaxphone.com website after launch.


What is the invite price of the MAX after launch?

The recommended invite price is $349/- for anyone who wants to buy the MAX via an invite from an existing MAX owner.


What is VAT and custom duty?

Some countries charge VAT (value added tax) or a custom duty for any goods/parcels that are imported into a certain country. As far as we are aware there is not VAT or custom duty for Australia or USA however customers in  Canada, UK, Europe and other countries may be charged a VAT and should check with their custom or postal departments for more details. Any VAT/Custom Fees/Duty charges charged to your parcel is paid by you.

However shipping is free for EU, UK, USA, AU, CA, Germany and for the rest of the world there is a small shipping fee of $30 because the cost of shipping is higher as per shipping zones.


How many colors are there?

At the moment the default color for the MAXphone is set as Matte Black however depending on the success of the campaign we may be able to include more colors ,at this point of time its too early to confirm.


Why do you have examples of photos taken under cloudy conditions, low light or at night time?

Any camera sensor can capture better photographs or videos under bright and sunny days however the true measure of the camera is to capture amazing pixel and distortion free images under low light conditions, hence these examples. Actual raw images are 20 times better however we have to limit the size of the files to smaller bytes.

The MAXphone name is subject to trademark approval. Device, packing and specifications are proposed and subject to change.


Any idea on what the invite price?

Invites are designed to drive success with pure organic growth and deliver you a share of that success. To make this possible anyone you invite will be eligible for to by the MAX at an invites only price, proposed at $349. Anyone who claims your invite also gets a set of 20 invites worth the value of their order when all of them are claimed. However the estimated RRP is $449/- without invites.


 What is the estimated RRP?

The estimated RRP is $449/- without invites via the website.


Will the MAX be available on sale via any dealers?

If dealers are appointed, you may be able to book your MAX at a dealership however the order will always be placed via the central website.


Your Book now pay later offer, how does that work?

The backer only pays $99/- a NON refundable and NON transferable amount that entitles the backer for all the limited campaign offers like all the in the box extras, 24 months warranty and 40 Invites worth upto $1200, when the backer completes the order within 30 days from 20th November by paying their balance of $250 and confirming their shipping details.


Why should I buy the MAX?

The same reason why you would buy your next phone, for all the best features, technology and quality you expect from a global brand. And by buying the MAX you not only get an awesome phone, you also get all the exclusive limited campaign benefits. Plus you help support the launch of a global brand with a very honest, simple and practical objective...to benefit you.

Sooner or later you will be buying a new phone anyways, we all have to...make MAX your next phone and support the campaign.

story:
NoRadi – is an insert that protects you from electromagnetic radiation of the phone. It is placed in the inner of the case. The insert is made of the material that absorbs harmful electromagnetic radiation and does not effect on the phone operation in the network area. Thanks to its fineness it will easily be placed in your case together with your phone.

IN TNE PRESS!

           


On May 31, 2011, World Health Organization and International Agency For Research On Cancer classified radiation of cell phones as a suspected carcinogen and identified it into 2B group of “suspected carcinogen for man” agents.

As far as a phone transmits electromagnetic radiation and is close to a man’s body, there is danger of that radiation harm to health. This radiation can cause local rise of the living tissue temperature and according to statements of some scientists, it can cause appearance of chromosome aberration in cells. Cancer (encephaloma) is considered as the main possible effect of radio-frequency fields’ long-term influence. Also there is danger of potency problems emergence because of phone carrying near genitalia.

Harm adherents often express version that financial interest of phone manufacturers is the cause of their hiding or “glossing over” the results of researching on the subject.

We know about electromagnetic radiation of the phone for 13-15 years. And till now we can’t say exactly how this radiation influences on a human being, because this is a long-term perspective. I want to notice that the same thing happened with smoking, people didn’t know where it’d led to for a long time. And only 10 years ago smoking hazards were proved by science.

France:

Legislative body of the country has approved legislative draft according to which pupils of junior and middle classes cannot carry and use phones within the walls of educational establishments.

The cause of such decision is children protection from electromagnetic radiation. Besides, Senate has raised children age from 12 to 14 years old to whom phone manufacturers can apply with advertisement.

Great Britain:

Using of cell phones in schools was forbidden in the country in 2001; during their sale informative brochures are being put into the box concerning possible consequences of communications by cell phones.

Bangladesh:

Parents bear criminal responsibility for giving to use cell phones to their children.

Apple:

It is written in Iphone manual that one must carry the phone in 10 mm away from the body.


The insert absorbs electromagnetic radiation due to Z-type exoferrite; as it is a powder silicone serves as a binding agent. The technology as well as composing substances are patented by TSU. This insert reduces radiation from phone and makes it harmless for everyday usage. The insert use does not influence on signal strength. The technology is patented and certificated. Our insert absorbs about 50-60% of electromagnetic radiation, and that is not a marketing. Unlike the competition who sell incomprehensible things and indicate that their cases and insert absorb 90-99% of electromagnetic radiation. That is an absolute lie, because with such insert phone operation in the network area is impossible. Our insert does not remove electromagnetic radiation completely, but reduces its power making it harmless for human body. If the insert removed electromagnetic radiation for 90-99% the phone wouldn’t tune the network.

Additionally a phone with reducing electromagnetic radiation insert resists external wiretapping.


  We don’t offer you cases with built-in insert, because we understand that every person wants to be personalized. And so we have decided that it would be much more practical and convenient to place the insert in the inner of your favourite case than to buy a new one.

Smartphone cover-up – 5.5 inches

For comparison: iphone 4/5

Phablet cover-up – 7.5 inches

For comparison: Iphone 6s

Tablet PC cover-up – 10.5 inches

For comparison: Ipad


Will my phone with the insert fit into the case?

Yes, it will, because the insert is slim enough. Additionally it will reduce phone abrasion in the case that prevents scratch appearance.

When will the goods arrive to me?

You will receive the goods in December.

What will happen if I cut the insert in a jagged way?

That doesn’t matter. The insert is hidden under the phone case and will not do any harm to the exterior view of your phone. And above all that will not influence on the insert effectiveness.

What are your plans after completion of the company on Indiegogo?

We want to develop “Noradi” and to place the goods on AMAZON, plus we want to create a site – on-line shop. Also we will popularize application of “Noradi” among population by means of partnership with retail networks of phone sales.

story:
About this project

Boltivate Lock allows you to monitor, lock and secure your home from anywhere in the world using your smart phone device. Boltivate will notify you of any disturbances via an email and phone call, asking "Are you safe?" If the answer is yes, no action will be taken. However, if you are not safe, Boltivate will immediately alert the police. Boltivate uses VPN for a secured connection between your phone, and Boltivate lock.

Featured on...

 

 

https://www.boltivate.com/wp-content/uploads/20...

Swipe to Lock and Unlock Doors

 

Inside Boltivate:

Swipe to Activate LockDown Feature

 

Inside Boltivate:

 

LockDown Alert Steps:

 

LockDown allows you to lock all connected devices at one time with a push of a button. Simply log in to the Boltivate application, click LockDown, and initiate the LockDown. The LockDown alarm is initiated, and if any disturbances occur while you are away, you will be immediately notified via phone notification and email. Leave your home in comfort knowing your home is safe and secure.

The virtual keys feature is a simple way to share access to your home to an expected visitor. In three quick and easy steps, a friend or family member can have access to a specified door for a specific amount of time. This is a great solution for Airbnb hosts or home rentals.

Having 24/7 live support is an absolute essential at Boltivate. We believe that if our customer's can't contact us at anytime of the day, no matter what the circumstances are; then we have failed. No matter what time it is, or what day it might be, we are dedicated to serving our customers no matter what. 

Questions, comments or concerns? Contact our support team that is available 24/7, all year round. Additionally for customers who have spent $200+ at Boltivate, we offer Dedicated Support; this is a department with fewer calls, and shorter wait times. Dedicated Support is a "Fast-Pass" to speak with an agent, or get any issue resolved almost immediately. Dedicated Customers also have the option to renew warranty plans, and add a plan to an exiting Boltivate.

How You Can Help

If I cant contribute, but still want to help, what can I do? 

Share our Website - www.Boltivate.com 

Like us on Facebook - Click Here 

Follow us on Twitter - Click Here

I grew up in Saddle River, New Jersey. Ever since I was 11 years old, I have developed an extreme passion for technology and programming. At 11 years old, I taught myself (With the help of YouTube) how to program and code. Since then the skills have stuck with me and I use them almost every day. I founded Boltivate Technologies back in 2014, and I am now ready to take this company to the next level. I have always been fascinated by technology - and the smart lock was definitely a challenge, but not one I couldn't conquer. Now, at 14 years old, I am the proud inventor and CEO of Boltivate.

www.Boltivate.com   

Call us toll free: 1-800-202-7366 

Email us: support@boltivate.com or 

Like us on Facebook - Click Here 

Follow us on Twitter - Click Here

Risks and challenges

We work extremely hard to get to this point and intend to do everything within our power to deliver Boltivate to you as seamless as possible. The following are risks and challenges that could occur: 

MANUFACTURING: There is a 10 week delay from the end of the campaign until Boltivate will ship to your doorstep. This time is dedicated for testing, production, and configuration. All of it is for your security, and benefit. 

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: In the case we would like to alter Boltivate and create any adjustments, it will only delay the launch by an expected 1 week. You will be notified if this happens, but we are trying to make any adjustments before the campaign is over so we do not create a delay.

FULFILLMENT: If the funding goal is reached, we will do all we possibly can to fulfill.
story_txt: About this projectBoltivate Lock allows you to monitor, lock and secure your home from anywhere in the world using your smart phone device. Boltivate will notify you of any disturbances via an email and phone call, asking "Are you safe?" If the answer is yes, no action will be taken. However, if you are not safe, Boltivate will immediately alert the police. Boltivate uses VPN for a secured connection between your phone, and Boltivate lock.Featured on...  https://www.boltivate.com/wp-content/uploads/20...Swipe to Lock and Unlock Doors Inside Boltivate:Swipe to Activate LockDown Feature Inside Boltivate: LockDown Alert Steps: LockDown allows you to lock all connected devices at one time with a push of a button. Simply log in to the Boltivate application, click LockDown, and initiate the LockDown. The LockDown alarm is initiated, and if any disturbances occur while you are away, you will be immediately notified via phone notification and email. Leave your home in comfort knowing your home is safe and secure.The virtual keys feature is a simple way to share access to your home to an expected visitor. In three quick and easy steps, a friend or family member can have access to a specified door for a specific amount of time. This is a great solution for Airbnb hosts or home rentals.Having 24/7 live support is an absolute essential at Boltivate. We believe that if our customer's can't contact us at anytime of the day, no matter what the circumstances are; then we have failed. No matter what time it is, or what day it might be, we are dedicated to serving our customers no matter what. Questions, comments or concerns? Contact our support team that is available 24/7, all year round. story:
Short summary 

Kepler is a social networking site which aims to serve as a platform for online activism and the propagation of social initiatives. 

Users can follow specialized pages of charities , NGO's and social enterprises which tackle issues most relevant to them . This would thus allow the concentration of communication when using an app of an NGO/Charity to be replicated on a wider and common platform.

Users can also create and/or follow campaign,activist pages ,blogs,pledges,and petitions for campaigning and activism at an individual level , taking on issues most which matter most to them in society . An activist on the platform may also choose to organise a rally/campaign to support his/her campaign in real life .  

Where We Are & What We Need 

  • We have currently designed the wireframe , sharpened our vision and business model and have progressed to creating the first half of the first version ( front end designing ) 
  • We need a minimum of $25000 to hire extra developers to complete the first version and to update/ re-iterate in the near future . The funds would also be used to cover legal fees and setup cost amounting to roughly ($10,000)

The Impact  

Prior to the creation of Kepler , I , the founder , was very involved in issues such as the Syrian civil war and climate change and would look for various ways to help and raise awareness. However , as time passed , it slowly dawned on me that some issues cannot be solved by an individual , rather they require the collective 'power of the people'. This served as the motivation and base for creating the social network . 

Funding and backing this campaign would mean taking the proactive steps into the creation of the platform. This would allow people form across the world ,  to come together to solve and tackle issues and problems in society ; in both a local and a  global scale.

Rewards ( k-points)

For individual users 
Kepler points or K-points are reward points issued out based on the usage of the platform. These points once accumulated can be redeemed from Charities , NGO'S and Social enterprises . Forms of  potential redeems could be the example of a charity organisation offering a free volunteer trip for 1000 k-points or a social enterprise offering a coupon for 100 k-points. 
For rewards of Charities / NGO's / Social enterprises please email me on : mtamimi33@gmail.com for the complete presentation and benefits .

Landing page





Product features 

 Public platform 

The kepler site would be divided into two platforms, a private platform and a public platform. The private platform would be similar to having an account on Facebook, where a user would be able to have a network of friends, follow campaigns/businesses/activists and where the user’s activity would be limited to their pool of friends. The public platform ,on the other hand, would be accessible to all kepler users .Crowd funding campaigns, charity appeals, petition polls  , trending campaigns can all be posted on the public platform by users (from their personal accounts).Similarly a user may opt to share an interesting campaign/poll from the public platform to their private platform.  

Crowdfunding ability 

Kepler users would have the ability to initiate a crowdfunding campaign within the site. The campaign can then be shared either with friends or/and posted to the public platform.

Smart friend search

The smart friend search would be one of the differentiating factors of kepler from other social networks. This would allow a user to make new friends on the platform by searching on the basis of mutual interests, campaigns, activism, gender, location, etc... As a result of this feature a user would have a larger pool of friends of similar nature and would also lead to campaigns and activist having bolstered support.

Online virtual store 

A Virtual store would be integrated in to the platform. Items such as virtual flowers, teddy bears, gift cards, etc. would be sold. A user could purchase an item and send it to a friend on the platform. A group of users could also choose to crowd fund an item from the store (I.e. a voucher) and send it to an intended recipient. 

Direct donation platform 

Users of kepler would have the ability to donate directly from the platform to charity organisations, fundraising campaign and urgent appeals.


Social features 

Community pages 

Kepler intends to bring people of similar character/objectives together via its community pages, where users can have discussions ,post pictures , share ideas etc 

Virtual neighbourhoods 

The social aspect of virtual neighbourhoods aims to bring people of the same  geographical location together virtually.users can then inform neighbours on on going activities such as ; garage sales , babysitting services , celebrations ,funerals,etc.

Our plea 

On behalf of the the entire kepler team , we sincerely ask you for your donations and support of the campaign. The success of this campaign is very important to the completion and realisation of the site . We would also very much appreciate you sharing the campaign link with your friends and family on social media platforms . We thank you in advance for you cooperation. 


Link to first draft of prototype

http://kareem.i360hub.com/

story:
Time is precious.

Running out of power in your power bank and devices? Find yourself sitting around cafes, hotel lobbies and airport lounges, waiting for your SLOW power banks to charge? 

Some of us try to overcome this by buying larger capacity, BULKY & UGLY power banks. 

To make matters worse, many power banks in the market are UNSAFE and are prone to accidents.

That is why the team behind IRISx came up with the world's fastest charging power bank, which is slim & sexy at the same time.

The magic behind IRISx

Instead of using lithium-ion batteries to store power, IRISx is equipped with high-density Graphene polymer batteries, which allows the 10,000mah battery to charge in just 30 minutes.

                       

Goodbye to mediocre power banks.

A typical lithium ion power bank: 

  • requires 5-6 hours of charging (10,000mah),
  • has short battery life (300-500 charges),
  • is bulky and ugly,
  • and may be prone to short circuits and explosions.       

IRISx is better, in every way.

    Perfect for emergencies.

If you ever find yourself in a situation, when both your mobile phone and power banks have ran out of juice...(I'm sure we all have =)

All you need is 7mins and 30 seconds of charging on IRISx, to fully charge your mobile phone. You could do this over a coffee break. 

Rewards

We have came up with a few perks to reward our early backers. Grab yours now to enjoy early bird discounts!


Our Production 

As of today, we have completed the necessary stress tests and safety certifications. We have moved into the production stage, and are preparing to fulfil sample orders from various retailers around the world.

Grab your Early Bird discounts now!

FAQ

 

When will IRISx be shipped? When will I receive the item? //
We will ship out IRISx between 1 to 2 weeks after the campaign ends. Depending on your location, you will receive the item between 3 to 20 days after. 
Is there warranty for IRISx? //
Yes, there is a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects and loss in battery capacity. Kindly contact us at hello@irisxdesigns.com  
I am confused. Does IRISx charge extremely fast, or can IRISx charge our devices extremely fast? //
The answer is both.
IRISx, which has 10,000mah battery capacity, can be fully charged in 30 minutes. This is the input.
For charging of your devices (output via Qualcomm 3.0 USB port), it has a maximum of 3A output, thereby allowing your devices to receive juice form IRISx extremely fast too. 
Is graphene polymer safe to use? //
Definitely. We have done extensive testing for IRISx, including drop tests, electrical tests and over 10,000 charge cycle testing under multiple stressful conditions.

IRISx comes with over-charge protection, over-heating protection, short circuit protection and voltage surge protection, to ensure you and your loved ones a safe product.

story:
A tiny, powerful Arduino compatible board

The successor to the 8-bit AVR powered Femtoduino - FemtoUSB.

An Arduino compatible with 8 times more storage that the original, FemtoUSB sports 256KB of storage, and runs at 48MHz. 

FemtoUSB has an RGB LED, a push button, USB Host capabilities, and a very small form factor. This is ideal for projects that require a small footprint, yet maximum performance.

The FemtoUSB design is open source hardware, and the source code for the Arduino core + bootloader is available on github (derrived from the Arduino Zero)

FemtoUSB has various interactive examples, including stuff for Unity3D, Node.js, and more!

What We Need & What You Get

We would like to work with the maker community to get more folks into ARM microcontrollers:

  • Funds will be used to buy the parts needed for the first batch.
  • $20 gets you a FemtoUSB as a thank you (retails for $29.99).
  • In the (unlikely) event we don't reach our paltry goal, we will simply ship rewards to people who backed us a few days later than scheduled.

The Impact

The maker eco-system could really benefit from your support. Your pledge will:

  • Support continued development of easy-to-use tiny ARM boards, and our open source integration into different environments (Unity3D, ThreeJS, Smartphones, etc).
  • Help us continue to raise funds successfully and launch new products. (See our previous crowd-funding for IMUduino and FemtoBeacon.)
  • Your pledge will help us maintain and develop OSHW designs, enabling folks to finally switch to 32-bit ARM boards while still working with Arduino.

Risks & Challenges

We currently have the PCB panels, and tested prototypes. The only remaining risks are:

  • Sudden shortage of a part. Should this happen, we will be delayed until the supplier has some more (can be a 2 to 4 week delay). We've checked our supply chain, and appear to be OK.
  • CNC Pick and place maintenance. We assemble in-house using a low-volumn LitePlacer CNC PnP. Should we need to replace something, shipments may be delayed by 24-48 hours (ordering a replacement part, fixing something, etc)

Other Ways You Can Help

We have been around four (4) years, and counting! Let others know about the awesome FemtoUSB via:

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Whatever that other thing is
  • Interpretive dance

It's your choice. We appreciate any and all feedback!

Femto.io - An SF startup!

story:
Picture this.

It’s 8am, you’re up, showered, breakfast done - ready and raring to go for a day of Pokémoning the city looking for the rarest of little rascals you can find. 

With 100% battery you’re confident you’ll have enough juice to get a full day’s gaming. 

However with continuous play, constant data usage and GPS draining your battery even the best smartphones will struggle to last more than a few hours , let alone all day.

11am you’re down by the river looking for Magikarp and disaster strikes! 

Just 3 hours of enjoying yourself has killed your battery. There’s 1% left and you’ve just spotted a Pikachu! 

What do you do? 

You pull out the PokéBall Charger you purchased on Indiegogo that’s what! 

 

 

 

Shaped like your favourite pokemon catching ball, the PokéBall Charger gives you all the juice you’ll need for a full day of Pokemon adventuring! 

Equipped with speed charging, in a lightweight, small, easy to carry durable casing, USB connection and fully Apple compatible: Your PokéBall Charger is your number one Pokémon Go accessory for continuous, day long play. 

Don’t miss another rare Pokémon due to a dead battery and enjoy countless hours of your favourite Pokémon game!

We’re ready to bring the PokéBall Charger to your pocket, pre-order yours now and we’ll start shipping in August 2016! 

Make sure you "Catch 'Em All!" 

Buy your PokéBall Charger now.

 

Tech specs:

Capacity : 10000Mah 

Size : 73x73mm 

Battery : Lithium 

Input : 5V-1A 

Output : 5V-1.5A 

Circle life : over 500 times 

Certification : CE FCC ROHS

We've got multiple levels of rewards for you to buy. Ranging from a single  PokéBall Charger power bank up to 500 or more. 

Choose how many PokéBall Charger's you'd like from the rewards list. 

There are 40 different PokéBall designs. We've picked our favourite ones and have made them into PokéBall Charger's! 

We'll release a new design for you to choose if we hit milestones as below:

 

 

 

What capacity is the PokéBall Charger power bank? 

Our PokéBall Charger has high powered 10,000 mAh capacity lithium ion battery with enough juice to last you a full day's playing. 

How do I choose my PokéBall Charger design? (If you hit those milestones)

We'll be in touch after the Indiegogo campaign has finished so you can pick your  PokéBall Charger designs. 

When will you ship my PokéBall Charger? 

We'll start shipping PokéBall Charger's towards the end of August 2016

Have you ever made a product before? How can I trust you? 

Yes. We have over 20 years combined experience in sourcing, developing, manufacturing and releasing products/brands to the public. We have extensive knowledge in logistics and fulfilment to be able to handle any volume of PokéBall Charger sales. We currently run multiple brands and have the team in place to comfortable satisfy any demand for our PokéBall Charger.

Where does the PokéBall Charger ship from?

We ship primarily from the UK, however if demand is sufficient we will set up order fulfilment from the USA and Canada as well. 

How long does it take for my PokéBall Charger to arrive?

Once shipped (August 2016) delivery will vary depending on where in the world you are. 

1-3 days for the UK, 7-10 days for the Rest of the World. 

As already discussed, we have a strong team of people in the UK currently working under our existing brand network. 

You will receive excellent customer care and support if you have any problems with your PokéBall Charger and we will happily support and advise during and after our Indiegogo launch. 

 

We'd like to take this opportunity to thank you for your support! We're ready to bring the Pokémon Go PokéBall Charger to the masses and with your help we'll be able to keep people enjoying Pokémon Go for longer! Keep them outside longer, in the fresh air longer, getting more exercise and seeing the great outdoors! 

Thank you!

Ranging from a single  PokéBall Charger power bank up to 500 or more. Choose how many PokéBall Charger's you'd like from the rewards list. There are 40 different PokéBall designs. We've picked our favourite ones and have made them into PokéBall Charger's! We'll release a new design for you to choose if we hit milestones as below:   What capacity is the PokéBall Charger power bank? Our PokéBall Charger has high powered 10,000 mAh capacity lithium ion battery with enough juice to last you a full day's playing. How do I choose my PokéBall Charger design? (If you hit those milestones)We'll be in touch after the Indiegogo campaign has finished so you can pick your  PokéBall Charger designs. When will you ship my PokéBall Charger? We'll start shipping PokéBall Charger's towards the end of August 2016Have you ever made a product before? How can I trust you? Yes. We have over 20 years combined experience in sourcing, developing, manufacturing and releasing products/brands to the public. We have extensive knowledge in logistics and fulfilment to be able to handle any volume of PokéBall Charger sales. We currently run multiple brands and have the team in place to comfortable satisfy any demand for our PokéBall Charger.Where does the PokéBall Charger ship from?We ship primarily from the UK, however if demand is sufficient we will set up order fulfilment from the USA and Canada as well. How long does it take for my PokéBall Charger to arrive?Once shipped (August 2016) delivery will vary depending on where in the world you are. 1-3 days for the UK, 7-10 days for the Rest of the World. As already discussed, we have a strong team of people in the UK currently working under our existing brand network. You will receive excellent customer care and support if you have any problems with your PokéBall Charger and we will happily support and advise during and after our Indiegogo launch.  We'd like to take this opportunity to thank you for your support! We're ready to bring the Pokémon Go PokéBall Charger to the masses and with your help we'll be able to keep people enjoying Pokémon Go for longer! Keep them outside longer, in the fresh air longer, getting more exercise and seeing the great outdoors! Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Hayden, I'm the founder of Tech Cure. I'm a lover of Apple products and I love to see them in good working order.
    Through a few different jobs I have had experience with basic accounting, social media management, video production and marketing. Not to mention I'm studying my Bachelor of Behavioral Sciences (Psychology).
    I like to aim high and for success, I'm currently an internationally represented model. With the mindset of a young entrepreneur I believe anything is possible if you set your mind to it.
    I'm currently working two jobs to get the funds to launch Tech Cure as well as crowdfunding for a portion of the costs!
  • Through your donations I will be able to launch Tech Cure as one of the best and most affordable apple repair services on the Gold Coast. Our prices are unbeatable, in fact we have made sure to be the most affordable Apple repair service in the entire South East Queensland region! We have the highest standard when it comes to repairs, that's why we use OEM parts supplied from licensed Australian Apple re-sellers, no faulty Chinese parts here!

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funds raised from this campaign contribute to about 60% of the costs associated with getting Tech Cure up and running. The majority of these funds will be going towards stock and equipment, any spare budget will be used for advertising across social media (Facebook and Instagram) as well as flyers and business cards.
  • Tech Cure offers a unique Ship In Service, this means no matter where you are you can also reap the benefits of our amazing prices! We are offering a FREE Ship In service to those who donate a certain amount! How cool!
  • If the entire goal is not reached the main priority is equipment, this accounts for the majority of the crowdfunding budget, anything over the cost of equipment goes to stock (repair parts and accessories).
 

Risks & Challenges

  • Due to myself doing iPhone repairs since 2014 out of my home as a hobby I have built a large client base and brilliant reputation. I am known for my quality, good prices and great customer service.
    With my knowledge in marketing, video production, social media management and basic accounting I am well equipped and ready to take on any challenge that comes my way.
  • I'm a planner, everything has been set out and all the possible complications have been squashed! I'm prepared for any unexpected challenges to come my way and to work through them while managing my own business.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • It would be great if you could give our Facebook page a like! (click on 'Facebook page' to be taken there).
  • Our website will be up very soon, so any attention to our social media will help us with heaps with the big launch! The more following we have the better and bigger the official launch will be.
  • Don't forget you can use Indiegogo's share tools to share this campaign with your friends, family and co workers!

story:
Magatron came to life when the Founder of the company, Kit was on holidays, in hopes to travel to a few different countries with his wife and 2 year old daughter. He is a designer by trade, running his own branding agency. Naturally (as all businessmen would), he brought along his trusty Macbook, his Magsafe, and 3 different adapters for the countries he was visiting. 

Kit packed up after their first destination and headed to the next. As soon as they reached the next, he realized that his adorable baby girl was playing hide and seek with the other two adapters. To his misfortune, the adapters hid and will never be found. Exasperated, he ran to the nearest Apple store the very next morning to replace the two bulky adapters for the rest of his travels.

After returning from his trip, he tried looking for something that would be more travel-friendly and he could simply slip in his pocket when he wasn’t using them. Surprised that he found nothing available on the market, he decided to design one himself. For this very product, he enlisted this design to a product designer, an electrical engineer expert and a team of seasoned marketing specialists to bring this baby to life.

Today, thanks to Kit, say goodbye to bulky adapters! You will always have a Magsafe adapter that will be compatible no matter where life takes you.

We hope Magatron will be your travel companion for a long time to come. To make this long lasting and durable, we need to source premium injection steel molds and tooling to ensure the quality of the product.  Your pledges will help us enable this, creating a Magsafe adaptor that can be used essentially anywhere in the world! We have put our initial investment into the design, prototype and getting our design patented and internationally certified.

After 7 months of design, tests and factory visits and strategy meetings, we are so excited to bring you Magatron!  We believe this will make your daily commute and travels so much easier. Now it’s up to you to make this happen.

Take a look at some of our product photos and how it works.

 

 

What is Magatron?

Product details:

Premium product, thoughtful design, Great for all. Magatron is a Macbook adapter that works anywhere in the world. 

 

Design

We completed multiple design and prototype testing and settled on a design that we think best serves the user and minimizes potential manufacturing problems.

A full working prototype of Magatron has been created and tested, so we have full confidence in the design’s feasibility.

Shipping and Customs

We have done our research for both the shipping and import duty and they have been included in the estimated delivery time and price.

We need your help to build the product, spread the word, and grow the community. But most importantly, we want to engage with the amazing community of early adopters here and get everyone's feedback and ideas.

Q&A

Who are we?

Magatron started off with Kit, an owner of a branding agency. His troubles with traveling and having to bring around different magsafe compatible plugs inspired him. Together with their multi-national team of experts, they have created Magatron, soon a necessity for anyone who uses Apple laptops.

Where is the project up to?

Check our updates for latest developments. Up to the point of launching the Indiegogo page, we have already designed Magatron, made the improved prototype and visited potential factories. Now it’s up to creating the tooling and molds for the product.

When is the expected delivery date?

December 2016

Are you sure we will get it on time?

It’s almost all done, so yes! You’ll get it by Christmas.

What will the pledges be used for?

The pledges will be used directly towards the production, assembly and shipping of the MAGATRON converters. It will also be used to cover costs such as:
·       indiegogo processing fees
·       Legal fees
·       Marketing
·       Packaging

More questions? Feel free to comment/pm us.

Thanks for your support!

Make a pledge to help us make MAGATRON a reality.

story:
This is true, that to create something really great is extremely difficult. However, you need to start with something. Such a beginning for us was the first version of Bordo mini in 2015. It was a very simple, but at the same time, quite a good wallet, which many liked.

    We successfully delivered all the rewards and with new forces rushed into improvements and perfections. That way the second version was born. This project also became successful, but our product didn’t receive great popularity. But I had anticipation ... A feeling, that it was just the beginning. This is not just “another wallet”. This is probably the best wallet in the world, it just needs to be improved a little more. And we got to work again...

    As a result, in 2017 a new wallet was born, which received great support. It was amazing! Honestly, we even stopped the advertising campaign after the first two weeks. Why? We were just afraid not to cope. In contrast to our past project, when we had only 130 backers, there were more than 100 in the new one only for the first day! But despite all the difficulties, we coped with this and delivered the best wallets to each of our backers. Then we organized sales through our website. Our business was going not bad :) But we can’t live in peace. What do you think we did? We again started to improve and refine our favorite wallet.

    To tell the truth, the creation of this project was not very easy for us. In total, we spent almost a year on all the works. The tasks that we faced were more difficult than we thought, and some seemingly trivial things were very difficult to accomplish. What motivated us all this time? It's you! The person, who writes that can’t wait for our wallet. The one, who says that his son has taken away his own wallet because it is so cool and he wants to order another one. All your feedback is a huge charge of motivation and energy for us.

Where are our backers from!

    Bordo mini is a wallet that has many advantages! Let's find out about each of them in order :) Its size is the first thing that surprises people who see this miracle for the first time. It isn’t bigger than a credit card. Only 7 cm x 9.5 cm ≈ 2.76 inch x 3.74 inch.

 

    You remember how pockets fully packed with different staff don’t look nicely. With Bordo mini this won’t be possible. With Bordo mini you can go both to the beach and to the official reception. And don’t worry! You can always find a place to hide it.​

    

    The size of Bordo mini allows you to place any world currency. If in doubt, don’t worry, just email us and we will make a test video for you.

   

    Bordo mini is very convenient to use even in a half-open state. It makes it even easier and faster to interact with the wallet.

 

    It may seem to you that it isn’t very convenient, but it is not true. You quickly get used to it and after a while, you even don’t understand how it was before!

    

    Even when the Bordo mini is closed, you have quick access to any of your cards. This minimizes the time to search for a desired card. 

 

 

 

     We should also pay attention to the spaciousness of the Bordo mini. At first glance it may seem that this baby doesn’t place much, but you are mistaken: you can even carry 20 bills and 10 cards without problems.

    Therefore, both right-handed and left-handed versions are available. We think it is very unfair that most wallets are made only for right-handers.

    

    This wallet is the most functional. You have the choice between two additional slots: a card slot or a coin slot. Choose what you like more!

 

    And another nice bonus! Bordo mini can be used easily with one hand! It's so convenient! 

 

    Bordo mini is developed in two designs, which differ not only in materials, but also in structural elements. Let's learn more about each of them.  

    Leather design. The wallet is made of genuine high-quality Italian leather with a thickness of 1.4 - 1.6 mm. It is made in four calm colors: black, gray, brown, beige. It will perfectly supplement your outfit and can be combined with other leather products of your wardrobe. A sophisticated appearance will allow to take it even for a very official and solemn event.

 

    Fabric design. The wallet is made of dense wear-resistant fabric with a polyurethane water-repellent finish. It is ideal for outstanding outfits, or vice versa - in a strict style it will create a bright highlight. This wallet attracts attention, it will be a key element of your image.

    Manufacturing BORDO mini consists of many processes and stages. Some of them, of course, we try to replace by machine work, only if it is appropriate. But still, how many moments are done by the master! Furthermore, the most important thing in BORDO mini are the best materials and accessories. No need to say that a good impression of a nice design can be easily spoiled by cheap materials. 

    Genuine Italian leather (leather design). All the time of our existence we work with this material. And during this time it didn’t let us down once. This is really beautiful and at the same time very practical material.

    High quality fabric (fabric design). Dense fabric with a water-repellent finish. You don’t need to worry about its durability, because it is mainly used for the tailoring of special working clothes in high-intensity labor conditions.

    Felt (fabric design). A semi-natural material that is used in BORDO mini to give it density and desired shape. We tried a lot of materials on this role, but felt coped best.

    RFID protection. This is something that must be in every wallet. With BORDO mini you can be confident in the safety of your personal data. The entire wallet, except for the extra card slot or coin slot, is RFID protected!

    High-quality fabric with a pattern of «tartan». Well, this is the brand element of BORDO mini.

    High-quality fittings. We experimented a lot with the world brands of fittings, but now we stopped at the zipper from the company YKK and buttons of Prime. After all, this is one of the most important parts of Bordo mini, which will provide a long period of use of the wallet!

 

    Tastes differ. We don’t know your preferences, so we give you the complete freedom for creating something perfect for you! You can choose between fabric and leather design, which have their own colors. Your wallet can be opened to the right or left. Moreover, there is a choice of an additional slot: a card slot or a slot for coins. All this you can choose in the survey after the completion of the project!

 

 

    We are a small but purposeful team of like-minded people from Ukraine, who work every day, creating without modesty the best wallet in the world. Now is our time. We have a lot of experience, successful projects behind us and thousands of satisfied customers around the world. And I think our journey is just beginning! We need a little more of your support!

    Join now! The most interesting is yet to come!

   To tell the truth, the creation of this project was not very easy for us. In total, we spent almost a year on all the works. The tasks that we faced were more difficult than we thought, and some seemingly trivial things were very difficult to accomplish. What motivated us all this time? It's you! The person, who writes that can’t wait for our wallet. The one, who says that his son has taken away his own wallet because it is so cool and he wants to order another one. All your feedback is a huge charge of motivation and energy for us!
