story:
AS SEEN ON

 

MOD-3 is proud to have shipped tens of thousands of RADIUS cases. Read what our customers had to say.

The RADIUS X case is a slim and minimal iPhone X case that showcases the design elements Apple designers intended and covering as little as possible.

The X-frame technology along with innovative and premium materials provide real protection from drops, impacts that other plastic cases can't match.

 

Each RADIUS X case is made up of 5 parts: 4 corner pieces connected by a thick aluminum X-frame.

 

FEATURES:

Every detail and aspect of RADIUS case is painstakingly considered, engineered and manufactured to our highest specifications in our factory in California, USA, using the best materials and process.

The result is a beautiful and highly protective case while maintaining the overall beauty of your iPhone X.

Slim and lightweight, feel free to carry it anyway that fits your style. Say goodbye to bulky cases.

Don't let the minimalist design fooled you, RADIUS X case has been engineered for impact and drop protections, able to withstand drops and prevents cracked screens.

With X-core technology and a unique patent pending design, the architectural X-frame is engineered to disperse impacts from the corners.

 

 

Unique X-frame design smartly disperses impact and vibrations drops and the robust  aluminum corners along with the proprietary inner liners work together to provide highly effective protection you'd expect from RADIUS case.

 

The RADIUS X case works with any wireless charging pads for convenient charging. The X frame while robust, does not interfere with the charging functionality of your iPhone X. We have thought of everything.

Pat. Pending camera frame module protects your sensitive iPhone X camera and lens array from damages. It is cleverly engineered to surround the raise part of the new iPhone X camera designs without interfering with the flash and other features.

    Feature packed in a sleek, minimalist package

     

    RADIUS X is a product of our love for great designs and beautifully engineered products.

    Despite it's minimal look, RADIUS case has the built-in protection technology and every dimensions and material thickness is optimized for strength, durability without sacrificing our design intent.

     

    The RADIUS X consists of 4 corner modules and an X frame that holds them together.

     

    Unlike other aluminum cases which adversely effect reception, the RADIUS X does not affect iPhone’s cellular or Wi-Fi reception due to its design.

     

    As shown on Silver iPhone X

     

     

    As shown on Space Gray iPhone X

     

     

     

     

    Our Partners:

     

     

    Shipping Details:

    Ships from California, USA via USPS First Class. Tracking provided.

    Risks and challenges:

    The challenge is to maintain and improve in production the original form and quality intended in the design. While the prototype has shown us that the case works extremely well, however the production process for the production run requires a different process and much higher speed and efficiency.

    We have discussed this extensively since the very beginning of the design with the manufacturer which is also the company that made the prototypes. Both them and the mod-3 team have the expertise, resource and combined experience to produce the case with very high-level of quality control. Steps and procedures will be in place in order to achieve the quality standard we set.
story_txt:
AS SEEN ON
 

MOD-3 is proud to have shipped tens of thousands of RADIUS cases. Read what our customers had to say.


The RADIUS X case is a slim and minimal iPhone X case that showcases the design elements Apple designers intended and covering as little as possible.
The X-frame technology along with innovative and premium materials provide real protection from drops, impacts that other plastic cases can't match.
 

Each RADIUS X case is made up of 5 parts: 4 corner pieces connected by a thick aluminum X-frame.

 
FEATURES:





Every detail and aspect of RADIUS case is painstakingly considered, engineered and manufactured to our highest specifications in our factory in California, USA, using the best materials and process.
The result is a beautiful and highly protective case while maintaining the overall beauty of your iPhone X.




Slim and lightweight, feel free to carry it anyway that fits your style. Say goodbye to bulky cases.


Don't let the minimalist design fooled you, RADIUS X case has been engineered for impact and drop protections, able to withstand drops and prevents cracked screens.
With X-core technology and a unique patent pending design, the architectural X-frame is engineered to disperse impacts from the corners.
 


 
Unique X-frame design smartly disperses impact and vibrations drops and the robust  aluminum corners along with the proprietary inner liners work together to provide highly effective protection you'd expect from RADIUS case.

 



The RADIUS X case works with any wireless charging pads for convenient charging. The X frame while robust, does not interfere with the charging functionality of your iPhone X. We have thought of everything.


Pat. Pending camera frame module protects your sensitive iPhone X camera and lens array from damages. It is cleverly engineered to surround the raise part of the new iPhone X camera designs without interfering with the flash and other features.





Feature packed in a sleek, minimalist package



 



RADIUS X is a product of our love for great designs and beautifully engineered products.

Despite it's minimal look, RADIUS case has the built-in protection technology and every dimensions and material thickness is optimized for strength, durability without sacrificing our design intent.
 

The RADIUS X consists of 4 corner modules and an X frame that holds them together.


 


Unlike other aluminum cases which adversely effect reception, the RADIUS X does not affect iPhone’s cellular or Wi-Fi reception due to its design.

 
As shown on Silver iPhone X

 
 
As shown on Space Gray iPhone X

 
 
 
 



 
Our Partners:

 
 
Shipping Details:
Ships from California, USA via USPS First Class. Tracking provided.
Risks and challenges:
The challenge is to maintain and improve in production the original form and quality intended in the design. While the prototype has shown us that the case works extremely well, however the production process for the production run requires a different process and much higher speed and efficiency.
We have discussed this extensively since the very beginning of the design with the manufacturer which is also the company that made the prototypes. Both them and the mod-3 team have the expertise, resource and combined experience to produce the case with very high-level of quality control. Steps and procedures will be in place in order to achieve the quality standard we set.

story:
Our Journey

It all started started in 2011 when Rohan (CEO - Elixier Tech) was finishing his MBA from IE Business School, Spain. He and his colleagues needed their electronic devices charged all day; however, were unable to do so despite having their chargers with them. The crux of the problem was finding sockets to connect the adapters. To add on, even if the socket was available, either there were too many devices for one socket or the socket was inconveniently placed. This observation planted an idea in his mind about the need of a stand alone charging device that people can conveniently carry with them. This simple idea evolved into a business plan when Rohan came back to India in 2013 and shared the concept with us (Co-founders of Elixier Tech). 

Since the inception in 2013, we have realized that apart from the problem mentioned above and irrespective of the geography and culture, there are some common issues faced by most of the urban dwellers in their day to day lives.

So what are these issues..?

How we developed a Solution:

We at Elixier Tech Innovatis LLP. want to make a difference in the lives of the people as well as the environment. We have managed to contain the extensive power of the sun in a device so compact that it practically fits in your pocket. Hence, after almost 18 months of hard-work and dedication, team ET has finally developed the 'ET-Stone™'.

ET-Stone™ is a seamless integration of state of the art technology and revolutionary design, making it by far the smartest solar power bank ever made. The super efficient & powerful lamp and torch ensure that you never face dark situations again. It is capable of charging almost every device that can be charged through a USB cable and providing hours of high intensity light output. The product is designed with only one aim - To optimise user experience.

We want to ensure that people stay connected irrespective of the location and circumstances so without any inhibitions one can EXPLORE different possibilities, ENDURE new experiences & EVOLVE into a greener and sustainable generation. Basically, our product not only offers break-through technology, but also guarantees mobility, easy accessibility and independence. Solar charging gives you the freedom to travel hassle free without any "wires" attached.

We believe that, our product will not only create an awareness of the use of green energy amongst the masses but also revolutionize the way people charge their electronic devices.

The Evolution of ET-Stone™

ET-Stone™

Specifications:

  • Battery - 3100 mAh Li-Po
  • Input Current - 2A
  • Output Current - 1.5A
  • Material - Special grade engineering polymer
  • Solar Panel  - 2.75V / 550mA
  • LED (3 Nos) - 110mA i/p current
  • Dimensions - 84mm x 135mm x 16.8mm
  • Multipurpose Kickstand - 360˚ Rotation (Patent pending) 
  • Lens (3 Nos) - Wide-angle, Anti-glare
  • Convenient User Interface
  • Buttons with application symbols (3 Nos)
  • Lanyard Holes (3 Nos)
  • Female inserts (2 Nos) - Universal 1/4” 20 UNC (For FCM / Tripod Attachment)


The Technology [Patent Pending]

  • Pre-Charge - Fast Charge - Natural Charge - Charge Termination – It basically protects your power bank battery & increases battery life
  • Constant boosting @ 5v giving extremely stable output
  • Low voltage boosting for solar (Low light charging)
  • During solar charging, power bank provides safety against current spiking and excess sun
  • Dual Charging while charging through AC & DC
  • Lamp - Brightness remains constant even when battery voltage drops                                - Increased efficiency using High Efficiency Controller (HEC) to give more                light hours                                                                                                                                     - Emergency SOS feature 
  • Compatible with wide range of adapters, It smartly senses between PC & AC and accordingly adjusts the current
  • Temperature sensing – Senses the battery temperature & automatically adjusts the current in case the temperature rises abnormally

(*Detailed explanations given below in 'Features')

Features (in brief)

Main Features

1. Solar Charging


Charging Time

The portable solar products available in the market are equipped with obsolete technology which leads to higher charging time (4-5 days for approx. 2000mAh battery) thus making the usage impractical and boring.

Our company is focused on changing this stereotype by providing a product with ground breaking technology which enables a user to charge the product in less than 14 hours.

Low Light Charging

ET–Stone™ not only charges under strong sunlight but also charges in ambient (low light) / cloudy atmosphere thus ensuring that the product charges in all weather conditions.

No need to look at the weather forecast EVER

The Super Efficient Solar Panel

We have used a super efficient Solar Panel made from Sun Power Cells, thus differentiating ET–Stone™ from the other portable solar power banks available in the market. Believe it or not, the cost price of our solar panel is almost equivalent to the cost of regular power banks thus giving you an idea regarding the quality of the components used in ET–Stone™

2. Revolutionary 3D Design & Kickstand

For us, every minute detail matters. ET-Stone™ sports a never seen before ergonomic design that symbolizes a combination of rigidity, smoothness and strength which are the inherent properties of a stone. We wanted our customers to experience technology in the most natural form.

The revolutionary kickstand developed and patented by us, has been made after months of research, keeping in mind usability, convenience and durability as the main aspects to redefine user experience. It also provides protection to the main body thus facilitating additional rigidity.

The kickstand allows the user to rotate the product a full 360⁰ which facilitates:

  • Solar charging depending upon the angle of the sunlight
  • Light output in each and every angle
  • Hanging the product whenever needed

The kickstand boasts two ¼” 20 UNC brass thread inserts giving the user an option to attach the product to a car mount (provided with the product), tripod, gorilla kickstand etc.


3. Fits in your pocket

One of the main challenges we faced was to compress this cutting edge technology into something that fits in your pocket. Portability is the key today and we ensured that ET-Stone™ perfectly blends with your daily routine.

4. Wall-mount (Adapter) Charging

ET-Stone™ can be charged through any wall adapter in addition to Solar charging.

5. Laptop / Desktop Charging

Dual Charging is one of the most unique features of ET-Stone™. It means that, if your product battery is low and so is your device (eg. mobile) battery and you have only one adapter or PC / laptop connection, you will no longer have to choose between charging of your device and charging of ET-Stone™.

Your mobile will start charging first and once it's sufficiently charged, the charging will shift to ET-Stone™. This feature is feasible with adapter & PC / laptop connection.

An ideal situation for overnight charging.

6. Dual Charging

Dual Charging is one of the most unique features of ET-Stone™. It means that, if your product battery is low and so is your device (eg. mobile) battery and you have only one adapter or PC/Laptop connection, you will no longer have to choose between charging of your device and charging of ET-Stone™. 

How it works:

1. Connect any wall-mount adapter to ET-Stone™

2. Connect USB Cable from ET-Stone™ to your device

3. Switch on the wall-mount adapter and charging button on ET-Stone™

(*Disclaimer: This feature is not applicable during solar charging of the product ) 

7. Smart Charging 

  • ET–Stone™ smartly detects which device it is charging and accordingly provides output current and avoids forcible charging at higher currents (which is done by most of the power-banks in the market) so as to increase the battery life of the device. This does not mean that the product will charge the device slowly, it can charge devices up to 1.5A. 
  • It's Smart Algorithm manages all the functions using a high performance  microprocessor
  • ET-Stone™ has a provision for Low light Charging
  • During solar charging, the power bank provides safety against current spiking and excess sun
  • Pre-Charge - Fast Charge - Natural Charge - Charge Termination – It follows this process and simultaneously protects your power bank battery & increases battery life
  • Constantly boosts product battery voltage at 5V thus giving extremely stable output to your device
  • ET-Stone™ is compatible with a wide range of adapters. It smartly senses between PC/Laptop & Wallmount adapter and accordingly adjusts the current


8. Lamp & Torch

The next most important feature of ET-Stone™ is the highly efficient lamp & torch. The Lamp, which can be seen on the front face of the product comprises of 2 powerful led’s whereas the Torch, which is placed at the bottom side comprises of a single led. To enhance and to provide a wide angle dispersion of the light output, we have used customized anti – glare lenses.

There are 3 intensities of light for the lamp which can be adjusted by the user according to his/her requirements, enabling longer hours of light. It gives..

a)  14 hours of light at the 1st intensity

b)  22 hours of light at the 2nd  intensity

c)  35 hours of light at the 3rd  intensity

The torch has a single intensity.

9. Emergencies

ET-Stone™ has an inbuilt SOS Light feature which can be activated by a 2 second long press of the lamp button. This feature is extremely helpful in emergency situations such as car breakdowns, camping and hiking incidences where you want to signal for help or any other dire conditions where signalling becomes a lifesaving option.

Applications 

Apart from being an ideal device for daily use, 
ET-Stone™ is also, an extremely handy device in the following scenarios:

Your perfect travel companion

ET-Stone™ gives you the freedom to roam and travel by actually staying completely unplugged. No more worrying about carrying additional chargers and wires and no more hunting for charging sockets. ET-Stone™ is compatible with almost all devices that can be charged by a USB cable. The solar charging feature ensures that you can visit the most remote or exotic locations without having to be concerned about staying connected. If you are a camping or a hiking junkie, our extremely efficient & powerful in-built lamp can become your ideal partner for those adventurous nights.

We all know that mobiles and tablets have become extremely critical for the smooth functioning of any business today. People now check their emails, presentations, project reports etc. on these portable devices. Keeping these devices charged on the go has become a persistent issue. Our 3100 mAh battery ensures that this issue is minimized and business travellers can conveniently focus on their business and nothing else.


Disaster Management


During any natural disaster such as earthquakes, floods, hurricanes etc., the two major issues that surface out are connectivity and power outages. People are stranded for days together without any access to light thus making them completely helpless. Also, having mobile phones without any charge, keeps the people disconnected from the rest of the world. This is a genuine problem faced by any disaster struck area. At such times, a powerful tool like ET-Stone™ can prove to be extremely handy.

ET-Stone™ being a standalone solar device, can provide essential ‘mobile charge’ to make those emergency phone calls and almost ‘35 hours of powerful light’ to help you survive the night, without having to rely on any other source of electricity.

ET-Stone™ can become an ideal addition to your personal Disaster Management Kit. It can also be of tremendous help to those brave rescuers who provide help to the stranded victims in difficult times.


Rural Impact


Access to electricity is a serious issue faced by majority of the rural population all over the world. Efforts are being made to change this status-quo but the problem still remains persistent. People living in those environments are majorly dependent on kerosene lamps which though providing them with basic light are indirectly affecting their health and making them vulnerable to burns and explosions.

Emissions from the use of Kerosene lamps may impair lung function and stimulate infectious illnesses such as tuberculosis, asthma, and cancer risks in the long run. Apart from the health risks, there is a permanent safety issue with using these kerosene lamps as they have been a cause of many fatal accidents till date.

Some practical problems that these people face include children trying to study and women trying to perform their day-to-day chores in light which is hardly sufficient to cater to their basic needs.

Another relevant issue faced by the rural areas is the distribution of mediocre products which hardly last for a few months, thus forcing the population to turn back to the use of kerosene lamps.

Our aim is to replace these harmful kerosene lamps with an efficient, safe and technologically advanced product so as to give those people a chance to live a safer and a healthier life.

Since cost is a major constraint for the rural populace, we have designed an alternative product called the ET-BRICK™, which will boast the same technology as the ET-Stone™ but with minor changes in some of the features and a simpler design to make it easily affordable to them. 

(*Disclaimer: Technical Details of ET-Brick will be disclosed shortly)

ET Flash Cable (The Whip)

A great product deserves a great accessory. We have also come up with a customized USB A to Micro USB cable capable of charging the product and your electronic device at a faster rate as compared to the other cables available in the market. The Whip is a carefully designed accessory that not only helps in charging electronic devices but also assists in data transfer. All in all, it is a perfect extension of ET-Stone™.

Flexi Car Mount (FCM)

The Flexi Car Mount (FCM) takes the usability factor of ET-Stone™ to the next level. You can affix the FCM to the windshield or any window of your car (using the suction cup) and pair it with ET-Stone™ using the threads given on the kickstand. The flexible FCM allows you to move the solar power bank in various angles with the help of its 2 axis swivel mechanism. The FCM gives you a cool opportunity to start using the solar charging function of ET-Stone™ while you are 'on the go'. 
The FCM, paired with ET-Stone™ can also be used in your home or any other indoor place (by attaching it to a window or a mirror) to either give light output or to achieve solar charging.

Package Includes


How will the funds be allocated..

The funds raised are going to help us to achieve the following goals:

In case we don't reach our Goal

We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible and we thoroughly respect it. We assure you that even in the case of us not reaching our goal to raise the money, you will still receive the perks that you have selected.

Perks

(*Disclaimer: To get full information about the perks kindly visit the perks column)


Timeline

Risks & Challenges

We have been working for over a year for developing ET-Stone™ and getting it ready for production. The manufacturing aspect is completely sorted and our vendors are established. We are almost ready with the molds and are currently in the process of acquiring necessary certifications for the product. ET-Stone™ comprises of components coming from countries such as USA, Italy, Korea and China which means that the only possible risk we may encounter is the uncertainty / delay in shipping of these components to our manufacturing site in Goa (India). We have ensured that this risk is mitigated by tieing up with reputed vendors and by following a well-established procurement process.

Other ways you can help us..

If ET-Stone is not for you, it maybe for your family and friends. We will be obliged if you could share our Indiegogo Campaign on your Facebook, Twitter and Google+ accounts. You can share by posting the link on top of this page on your respective accounts. If you are not that active on social media, you could also send emails to your folks with our campaign link in it. Even word of mouth can make a major difference to our campaign. We genuinely appreciate any form of help from your end. 

The images of ET-Stone™ used in the above campaign and the video comprise of both 3D renders and real time photos.

FAQ's

Q 1: Is ET-Stone™ patented?

A: The design of ET-Stone™ is copyrighted and kickstand mechanism & technology is patent pending.  

Q 2: Where is the solar bank designed and manufactured?

A: ET–Stone™ is completely designed, manufactured and assembled in India.

Q. 3: Does ET-Stone™ come in different colors?

A: As of now, ET-Stone™ will be available only in Sapphire Black (Matte Finish). We will be launching ET-Stone™ in two more colors before this fall.

Q 4: International Shipping outside of India for single and multiple units?*

A: Just make sure you add the $15 shipping fee perk while selecting your Et-Stone™ perk. We will do the rest.

Q 5: What is the advantage of buying ET-Stone™ through Indiegogo?

A: We are expecting to price ET–Stone™ at approximately $65. Through Indiegogo, we are offering our backers special discounts ranging from 10% to 30% depending on the size of the perk you select.

issues that surface out are connectivity and power outages. People are stranded
for days together without any access to light thus making them completely
helpless. Also, having mobile phones without any charge, keeps the people
disconnected from the rest of the world. This is a genuine problem faced by any
disaster struck area. At such times, a powerful tool like ET-Stone™ can prove to
be extremely handy.
ET-Stone™ being a standalone solar device, can provide essential ‘mobile
charge’ to make those emergency phone calls and almost ‘35 hours of powerful
light’ to help you survive the night, without having to rely on any other source
of electricity.
ET-Stone™ can
become an ideal addition to your personal Disaster Management Kit. It can
also be of tremendous help to those brave rescuers who provide help to the
stranded victims in difficult times.











Rural Impact




Access to electricity is a serious issue faced by majority of the rural
population all over the world. Efforts are being made to change this status-quo
but the problem still remains persistent. People living in those environments
are majorly dependent on kerosene lamps which though providing them with basic
light are indirectly affecting their health and making them vulnerable to burns
and explosions.
Emissions from the use of Kerosene lamps may
impair lung function and stimulate infectious illnesses such as tuberculosis,
asthma, and cancer risks in the long run. Apart from the health risks, there is
a permanent safety issue with using these kerosene lamps as they have been a cause
of many fatal accidents till date.
Some practical problems that these people face
include children trying to study and women trying to perform their day-to-day
chores in light which is hardly sufficient to cater to their basic needs.
Another relevant issue faced by the rural areas
is the distribution of mediocre
products which hardly last for a few months, thus forcing the population to
turn back to the use of kerosene lamps.
Our aim is to replace these harmful kerosene lamps
with an efficient, safe and technologically advanced product so as to give
those people a chance to live a safer and a healthier life.
Since cost is a major constraint for
the rural populace, we have designed an alternative product called the ET-BRICK™, which will boast the same technology as the ET-Stone™ but with minor changes
in some of the features and a simpler design to make it easily affordable to them. 



(*Disclaimer: Technical Details of
ET-Brick will be disclosed shortly)





ET Flash Cable (The Whip)







A great product
deserves a great accessory. We have also come up with
a customized USB A to Micro USB cable capable of charging the
product and your electronic device at a faster rate as
compared to the other cables available in the market. The Whip is a carefully designed accessory that not only helps in charging electronic devices
but also assists in data transfer. All in all, it is a perfect extension of ET-Stone™.



Flexi Car Mount (FCM)





The Flexi Car Mount (FCM) takes the usability factor of ET-Stone™ to the next level. You can affix the FCM to the windshield or any window of your car (using the suction cup) and pair it with ET-Stone™ using the threads given on the kickstand. The flexible FCM allows you to move the solar power bank in various angles with the help of its 2 axis swivel mechanism. The FCM gives you a cool opportunity to start using the solar charging function of ET-Stone™ while you are 'on the go'. 


The FCM, paired with ET-Stone™ can also be used in your home or any other indoor place (by attaching it to a window or a mirror) to either give light output or to achieve solar charging.






Package Includes








How will the funds be allocated..

The funds raised are going to help us to achieve the following goals:






In case we don't reach our Goal

We understand that Indiegogo backers want their
product as soon as possible and we thoroughly respect it. We assure you that
even in the case of us not reaching our goal to raise the money, you will still
receive the perks that you have selected.


Perks



(*Disclaimer: To get full information about the perks kindly visit the perks column)






Timeline




Risks & Challenges
We have been working for over a year for developing ET-Stone™
and getting it ready for production. The manufacturing aspect is completely
sorted and our vendors are established. We are almost ready with the molds and
are currently in the process of acquiring necessary certifications for the
product. ET-Stone™ comprises of components coming from countries such as USA,
Italy, Korea and China which means that the only possible risk we may encounter
is the uncertainty / delay in shipping of these components to our manufacturing
site in Goa (India). We have ensured that this risk is mitigated by tieing up
with reputed
vendors and by following a well-established
procurement process.



Other ways you can help us..


If ET-Stone is not for
you, it maybe for your family and friends. We will be obliged if you could share our Indiegogo Campaign on your Facebook, Twitter and Google+ accounts. You can share by posting the link on top of this page on your respective accounts. If you are not that active on social media, you could also send emails to your folks with our campaign link in it. Even word of mouth can make a major difference to our campaign. We genuinely appreciate any form of help from your end. 



The images of ET-Stone™ used in the above campaign and the video comprise of both 3D renders and real time photos.





FAQ's

Q 1: Is ET-Stone™ patented?

A:
The design of ET-Stone™ is copyrighted and kickstand mechanism & technology is patent pending.  
Q 2: Where is the solar bank designed and manufactured?
A:
ET–Stone™ is completely designed, manufactured and assembled in India.
Q. 3: Does ET-Stone™ come in different colors?
A: As of now, ET-Stone™ will be available only in Sapphire Black (Matte Finish). We will be launching ET-Stone™ in two more colors before this fall.
Q 4: International Shipping outside of India for single and multiple units?*
A:
Just make sure you add the $15 shipping fee perk while selecting your Et-Stone™ perk. We will do
the rest.
Q 5: What is the advantage of buying ET-Stone™ through Indiegogo?
A:
We are expecting to price ET–Stone™ at approximately $65. Through Indiegogo,
we are offering our backers special discounts ranging from 10% to 30% depending
on the size of the perk you select.

story:
Just a week to Go . We are offering Free HDkey , Tshirts and lots of gadgets to our Referrers . Please Starts Sharing this project across your social media to be a part of this Program.

Note: For perks above  $29 , Have HDkey individually laser etched to display a short message / Your Name / Your Loved ones Name. Have your return information etched into the back, add a nice message for a gift, or Giveaway HDkey with your Logo for your employees / clients . Remember you can even program the inbuilt NFC to carry your Business details that allows sharing business contact on just a tap. Available only for our contributors on Indiegogo. 

The story behind Invention!

" It was  an unplanned trekking with my best buddies.The place was great to enjoy but everything went in vain when one of my friend's phone was switched off just before he could complete an important business call . He was struck with a major business deal and disconnecting this call could have a huge negative impact with a major client. His client could probably feel he might not be interested with the deal. He was struck, So was our entire group. Everyone was helpless just staring each other on what to do .None of us had his clients number so that he could callback using any of our phones.

We somehow wanted to bring back his phone alive so that we could continue the trek. But we weren't that lucky because all our power banks were at home and there was no charging point's across miles , All we were left was a bunch of friends & their phones . Finally,  We had to cancel the trek and return back in a hurry.

We at WaferLabs , a startup based in Bangalore, India realized that there is a critical need to make emergency charging simple .  Our phone can run out dead any time as we usually don't keep a track on the battery stats . Once our phone is switched off , Our contacts / messages / notes , everything will be shut down. Imagine a person goes for an interview in some new city but once he reaches, his phone dies out of charge .  The contact details of the interviewer were on his phone . Now where should he go ? How would he find the place? Whom he shall scream for help?  the time is running really fast with pressure struck tightly in his mind !

We had seen lots of examples like this and we really wanted to bring out some solution. We held up our self with a commitment to make emergency charging even simpler. We worked ,worked and worked . Finally were successful  in coming up with a fully working prototype of a gadget that allows phone to phone charge sharing.  We thus invented HDkey - The worlds first phone to Phone Charger "

-  Ameen ,  Co-founder waferlabs


HDkey - As Featured on  : Re/Code , Economic Times , NextBigWhat, E27 , Lifehacker , Gizmodo , TechEntice , Venture Capital News , Dependent on Gadgets , Eenadu , TechBuzz , CrowdVita , SocialScientist , AndroidDaily , and More

Phone to Phone Charging Demo

Please turn on Annotations to view full video

We Love you guys for motivating us to bring out this Product :

" We usually have late working environment at our office and most of the time when we leave back after work , We realize either of our friend has missed to charge their phone . I really appreciate HDkey as sharing the battery could actually make sure my friends phone is ON, at least to a time she reaches home safely "  - Anusha S

" Sometimes even 1 % of charge in your phone means a lot, you could at least note down important numbers before your phone actually dies out of charge "
- Shruthi , Bangalore , India

" My all time experience - I forget charging my phone only when i am out of office / home for a long time . I really get frustrated when there is not even a bit of charge remaining in my phone . I feel i am still in the dark age" - Amit 

" HDkey is an interesting Idea . It could actually give a life to my friends phone in emergency needs  . " - Prakash

 " PowerBanks are bulky, It cant be carried everywhere  . That's why we have HDkey with a key holder design and kept it ultra lightweight weighing just 6 Grams " 

Charge your Phone using Another Phone !

[ Patent Pending Technology] HDkey is a phone to phone charger which can charge any micro USB device like camera , phone or any device that supports microUSB using another phone .  Now its No more a worry when you hate carrying power banks and No more a hassle when your  phone runs out of charge . Just connect your Phone to your friends phone and get your phone charging . And Nope ! your friends phone wont drain out of battery quickly.

Not Just Phones , You can charge any device which supports micro USB using your phone via HDkey phone to phone charger . All your portable device's supporting micro USB can be charged using HDkey phone to phone charger.

HDkey  Phone to Phone charger is a tiny and lightweight gadget that will charge your  phone or camera almost anywhere around the world .

Not Just Charging , HDkey charger also allows you to share HD videos / Pics with 20x bluetooth speeds , automate tasks using built in NFC along with charging your device whenever you require it the most .



The Lightweight Phone Charger ever !

Power banks ! we know it doesn't fit your pocket and yes, those bulky things will ruin your date or business meeting . That is why we have kept HDkey the lightest ever than any other product . You wont Believe it, HDkey phone charger weights just 6 grams , Yes! for real. It's the perfect travel companion and will fit in those tight spaces in your pockets very easily. It's extremely powerful gadget to stay along with you wherever  you go . Also , It can charge even larger devices like the camera or music players . So, its time to grab this useful gadget and stay charged - Always 

Size : 2.5 x 3.5 cm

weight:  6 grams (without the key holder ring )



Designed for People in Fashion

HDkey Phone to Phone charger comes with a unique and fashionable Key holder design . It can add to your daily fashion accessory and indeed a great tool to fit in your Pocket

Gadget Better Than Power Banks

Power banks are too boring in size and looks . Also we know your schedule is bit tight and you usually forget charging power banks . That is Why we have Invented HDKey phone to phone charger for you .

" HDkey charger turns people around you into Power Banks. So Power banks are all around you , You just have to plug your phone to there's " I bet you don't even require to recharge them like you do to your PowerBanks . Now it's not required to carry your phone charger or pack up your bag with power banks . HDkey Phone charger allows you to charge your phone using another phone  .It's an Awesome new device across the globe which allows on the go and hassle free charging .

Just connect your phone and your friend's phone using HDkey charger, and your phone instantly starts charging . Whats all ,  Do you still require to carry those bulky power banks ?



Better Than Wifi and Bluetooth

No matter what files you require to share with your friends, No matter whats the file size , HDkey phone to phone charger is awesome device when you need to transfer data and better than Bluetooth and Wifi Technologies. HDkey charger allows USB transfer rates which can help in seamless high speed data sharing without losing much of your battery or patience. 

We know wifi data sharing is Power Draining . Until you complete sending your friend a HDvideo, Your phone starts yelling " Low battery" and yes, Bluetooth is quite slow for any data sharing purpose .

The difference in data transfer between Bluetooth and USB is Extreme .HDkey phone to phone charger allows you with a 20x data transfer speed when compared to Bluetooth. While wifi file transfer consumes much of your battery , HDkey allows usb transfer which requires less power compared to wifi . Doesn't it sound better when you have to share GB's of data to your family and friends ?

NFC technology for Automation:

HDkey charger has a built in NFC with it. You can Automate your Tasks or write your business card on it using any NFC enabled Phone  . So the next time you have to give your contact to someone, You just need to tap HDkey charger on your friend's phone .

There are Quite vast things you can do using NFC. You can tap HDkey charger to turn your phone into low power mode ( turning off wifi , Bluetooth , etc ) or you can just turn your phone to silent whenever you  are in a meeting . All you have to do is the write the corresponding task to HDkey charger using any of the NFC writer app supporting your phone.

 " #HDkey phone to phone charger with NFC - The coolest gadget on indiegogo and a better alternative for Bulky power banks . Get your #HDkey  charger and be a part of this charging technology revolution  "

Pricing:

The HDkey charger is extremely low price offered only for early IndieGoGo backers. The pricing is much low compared to the actual price when it comes to the market. The pricing is also comparatively low when any power bank or any normal charger is considered . Give the gift of power to all your family and friends and be a part of revolution for seamless phone to phone charging and High speed data sharing gadget .



Source : Economic Times , Jan 1st 2015 ( New Years Day )



Message from Founder !

Hi guys, This is Ameen from WaferLabs - A startup by experienced engineers with strong passion to deliver the best out of technology for the people across the globe.

After experiencing frustration with the battery life of our smartphones, we thought  power banks can be a handy tool . Since power banks are quite bulky to fit in our pockets and its very often that users forget to charge them , We thought there should be a better alternative .

The inspiration comes from a day when me and my friends were on a trekking , and one of my friend's phone was switched off just before he had to attend an urgent business call . There was no power sources , No power banks around us , All we had was just a bunch of friends with mobile phones, Everyone helpless !

We decided to do something: create the world's most compact device which can allow hassle free phone to phone charging , high speed data transfer and automation using NFC , to be always carried along.

HDKey Phone to Phone Charger is a very simple product, yet so useful that we believe everybody should own one. That's why one of our main goals was to keep it affordable, lightweight and fashionable.  Its a Awesome new thing which is a must for everyone.

Our team is constantly working with various fashion designers and students to continuously refine HDkey charger in terms of its looks, feels, style and functionality. Funding this project will ultimately help speeding up the ongoing development and will help us cross the barriers to cover the engineering  , fabrication , marketing and promotion costs. We think with your support we will be able to deliver this project at the earliest possible time . HDkey will indeed be a  great product to everyone !

You can check out about HDkey phone to phone charger on our webpage  www.waferlabs.com/HDkey 

HDkey Phone to Phone Charger : Gallery


How to Charge Your Phone from your Friends Phone using HDkey Phone to phone Charger

Note: The host device needs to support on the go usb (OTG) for successful operation . However any phone that supports microUSB (type b) can be charged using host phone.

How to Share data from between two phones using HDkey Phone to Phone Charger

Note: The host device must support on the go usb for the successful operation 



About WaferLabs

Ameen , A masters holder in Electronics with expertise in hardware design and entrepreneurship started a venture 'WaferLabs' with a handpicked team of qualified professionals having strong passion to bring in innovative technology solutions over the globe . The Team behind WaferLabs includes expertise hardware professionals and tech savy individuals , professional consultants and interns. 

HDkey is designed considering various inputs / suggestions / feedback received by experienced fashion designers , college students and general public .

We have been researching on the area  which save's considerable power for portable devices . since we are concentrated into internet of things, we required a lot of professionals having expertise hands in low power designs and power optimizations, Hence large parts of our team have been concentrating into these areas. 




QA's for HDkey : The Awesome new Charger Technology

Q1 : If in case , I am charging my phone using my friends phone, Will my friends battery drain out quickly ? Is HDkey charger 100% efficient.

A : Batteries or mobile power cannot be figured accurately for efficency , There is considerable loss of charge but definitely not a scenario where charge drains very quickly . The figures are negligible but also depends on lots of other factors like - the process running on your phone , your phones hardware specification , your battery health and so on .

Q2 : Do you think asking friends phone to charge yours is a good idea? .

A : Obviously it depends on the situation. Imagine your phone is left out with zero charge and you  require your phone to stay alive for some urgent call . you dont have any power sources around you . In this scenario you can just plug your phone to another phone in order to start charging . Of course , For normal charging, You do have regular chargers and power banks . HDkey charger comes into action in cases of emergencies .

Q3 : Is every device integrated with NFC or it has some extra costs.

A : No extra costs , you can enjoy the features with every HDkey

Q4 :  Your Funding goal is just $500 , are you sure to make it out within this?

A : Since HDkey is of a new device , people wonder how things happens and keep thinking untill they get to see it working . $500 is the minimum goal we need to make HDkey happen.  Once we reach this, we will ship samples to backers and get a transparent feedback from them . Based on the feedback received , we will be refining out HDkey and enhancing it to support more features and functionality . We will be suitably rewarding the backers for the time they took  to give feedback to the community.

More Questions, We will be glad to answer , Please write us at info at waferlabs.com

Thanks



Referral Program

Get a FREE HDkey when you refer 2 backers for HDKEY !

How it works:

  1. Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.
  2. Then, visit this page on Indiegogo and look below the main featured image of HDkey to share and copy your unique URL.
  3. Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the "Link" icon or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.
  4. When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

How to track your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. Count the number of funders.

phones hardware specification , your battery health and so on .Q2 : Do you think asking friends phone to charge yours is a good idea? .A : Obviously it depends on the situation. Imagine your phone is left out with zero charge and you  require your phone to stay alive for some urgent call . you dont have any power sources around you . In this scenario you can just plug your phone to another phone in order to start charging . Of course , For normal charging, You do have regular chargers and power banks . HDkey charger comes into action in cases of emergencies .Q3 : Is every device integrated with NFC or it has some extra costs.A : No extra costs , you can enjoy the features with every HDkey Q4 :  Your Funding goal is just $500 , are you sure to make it out within this? A : Since HDkey is of a new device , people wonder how things happens and keep thinking untill they get to see it working . $500 is the minimum goal we need to make HDkey happen.  Once we reach this, we will ship samples to backers and get a transparent feedback from them . Based on the feedback received , we will be refining out HDkey and enhancing it to support more features and functionality . We will be suitably rewarding the backers for the time they took  to give feedback to the community.More Questions, We will be glad to answer , Please write us at info at waferlabs.comThanks
Referral Program
Get a FREE HDkey when you refer 2 backers for HDKEY !
How it works:

Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.

Then, visit this page on Indiegogo and look below the main featured image of HDkey to share and copy your unique URL.
Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it 
for later by clicking the "Link" icon or begin sharing on social media 
by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL 
pre-loaded.
When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll 
automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal 
URL.

How to track your results:

Log into your Indiegogo account.
Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
Select the “My Profile” option.
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
Count the number of funders.

story:
Life in America depends on written materials.

Language barriers and discrimination prevent voting access for millions of limited English speakers. Millions of multilingual speakers forget the power they have, from sharing family stories to making sense of vital documents.

We’re 18MR.org, and we’re building a translation matching app called VoterVOX.

We need your help now to start building for Fall elections!

Our solution creates grassroots, scalable access to voting.

VoterVOX is a matching app that connects multilingual Asian or Pacific Islander American volunteers with limited English speakers for fair voting access.

This app and network gets every eligible voter a ballot and voting information in their preferred language.

Here's how it works:

We're creating an ecosystem to bridge digital divides and generation gaps. By partnering with community-based organizations, we'll get in-person translation to limited English speakers where they’re at – libraries, senior centers, and social clubs. We shortcut the need for smartphones and computer classes.


One-to-one connections are the building block of strong, healthy communities

Imagine this: you’re from East San Jose, speak fluent English and Vietnamese, and believe your community should have a voice to make their opinion heard. Getting the VoterVOX app connects you to a person that a local community partners identifies as needing assistance. You meet at a library, share stories, and translate ballot terms and jargon. After you say goodbye to your new friend, they send their mail-in ballot themselves (because that is the law). You can make the process easier for others volunteers by upload your ballot translation and sharing your story. Democracy!

Who's talking about VoterVOX?


VoterVOX makes democracy accessible in every language.


But isn't democracy already accessible to everyone?

Right now, our election system is messy and discriminatory.

Imagine voting as a new citizen. It might take years after coming to the United States in order to become eligible to vote. On election day, you make it to your polling place and make it through the line – only to receive an English-language ballot that you can’t figure out. You don’t know exactly what you’re voting for, or how to correctly fill it in. Poll workers give you the cold shoulder because they can’t really understand you, either.

Frustrated and intimidated, you give up your political voice.

Even if you’re fluent in English, struggling with bureaucracy is real. Add the layer of a language barrier, and it becomes nearly impossible. Voting is particularly difficult, and since Asian American and Pacific Islander (AAPI) voters speak so many different languages and dialects, they are at special risk of being excluded.

We know that people with limited English proficiency are just as smart or smarter than people who are fluent in English – some may be our family elders. And AAPI voters want to vote, but they face barriers at every step. According to a 2012 exit poll from the Asian American Legal Defense and Education Fund, nearly 1 in 4 Asian Americans prefer to vote with help from an interpreter or translated materials. And while the Voting Rights Act mandates translated voting ballots and materials, it’s only sometimes enforced, and only applies to districts with a “significant” number of citizens, determined by the Census. Meanwhile, the last Census is already 5 years out of date, and AAPIs are the fastest-growing racial demographic. The American Community Survey estimates the number of AAPIs who speak English less than fluently at nearly 7 million individuals.

We can bridge the language and access gap by organizing multilingual volunteers around culture and community.

We’re 18MR.org. We strengthen grassroots power with technology.


In the three years since we started, we’ve won victories against giant, well-funded opponents. We’ve pioneered new ways of using new media in organizing that nobody else imagined, and we’ve built a powerful network of allied organizations working for justice nationally and in their local communities.

Translation crowdsourcing tools exist, but these digital options fall short of the needs facing voters with paper ballots. That’s why we’re creating our own custom solution through partnerships with groups who build crowdsourced translation tools, mail-in ballot support, and localization in dozens of languages.

As ambitious as it sounds, our experience and network makes VoterVOX possible. We have the cultural competency, organizing acumen, tech savvy, and legal and policy insight into voter turnout and voting rights to design, build, and deploy the usable, powerful tool our communities need.

What’s more, because volunteers cannot be paid to provide voters with language assistance, advocacy organizations like ours need to build VoterVOX.

How your money goes to fair voting access in 2016:

Our funding goal of $50,000 is entirely committed to building a basic version of VoterVOX to test this November, and propel us towards rapid iteration during the 2016 primary season.

We know tech is complicated and humans are unpredictable. We’ll be hosting workshops across the country starting now to gather user input from potential users on both sides of the translation bridge. If we start with the knowledge and needs of our community from the outset, we can roll out VoterVOX for the 2016 Presidential election in a way that models true accessibility from the ground up.



Support VoterVOX, get perks!

Join the team making democracy accessible in every language.


$28 – Only 10 prints available

Build a truly accessible tech system is hard work Here's how we'll overcome key risks and challenges:

Reaching core users

Letting limited English proficient voters know that resources to help them vote exist is a difficult task. Not only does outreach need to be translated into their language, but many LEP voters are also poor or working-class, and may not have access to the kind of technology our volunteers do. Rolling out VoterVOX means working with community organizations to identify the most effective ways of reaching these users, whether it’s through ethnic media, senior centers, or bus shelter advertisements. Designing VoterVOX means listening to, and learning from, core users themselves, through co-design workshops in communities.

Training volunteers

VoterVOX’s translator resource kits, generated by the volunteer community, help lower the barrier to volunteer translators. You don’t have to be a professional translator to help someone vote! Our relationships with youth groups, student clubs, and community organizations will help us reach, and train, volunteers.

Building accessible technology

Once limited English proficient voters have found VoterVOX, we want to be sure they can use the tool. That means making our tech accessible for people with slow internet connections, no smartphones, and disabilities. Accessible design is not impossible, but requires intention and good user testing. We’re committed to making sure the tools we build can be used by the people we are building them for, because that’s what justice looks like.


Thank you so much for supporting VoterVOX! You'll receive a receipt from our fiscal sponsor, the Citizen Engagement Lab Education Fund, via firstgiving.com.

Support VoterVOX, get perks!
Join the team making democracy accessible in every language.

$28 – Only 10 prints available



$28 – Wear pride on your sleeve
$28 – Walk the walk with two pairs of socks
$38 – Our best-seller
$48 – Stylish and way less than a new screen will cost you



$98 – Custom made, and only for VoterVOX supporters!

story:
The Best iPhone Battery Case

Provide you with extra battery power and dependable phone protection. With the iPhone battery case, designed exclusively for iPhone 6, you can stay connected, and protect your phone anytime, anywhere.

Our Advantages


LIGHTNING SYNC

With the lightning sync port this battery case offers sync capability along with its rapid charging feature. Sync up and charge your phone without removing the case. Completely sync and charge capabilities.


ULTRA THIN

The streamlined silhouette is designed to be super-slim and user-friendly. The 11mm thickness is ultra-lightweight and offers a seamless fit for your iPhone. Snap it in place and it is indistinguishable from a normal iPhone case.


NO EXTENDED BOTTOM

The newly-shortened length of (142mm) eliminates that elongated bottom-heavy design typically found in competing brands. Hand-held comfort and outstanding performance are successfully combined in this sleekly elegant battery case.

EASY CONTROL

Press and hold the On / Off button for just 3 seconds when you need to stop or start the charging option. Press once to see the status of the battery. The easy control features are designed for user convenience.

Specificatons

Dimenstion: 127.5 x 71 x 11mm
Weight: 70g
Capacity: 2400mAh
Output: 0.5-1A

FAQ

  • Is it just a Case?

This is a multi-purpose battery charging case for iPhone. It offers external battery power, user-convenience features and helps protect your phone from accidental damages.

  • This extra power life iPhone case is so small and thin. How much power is available?

The thin, lightweight battery is made with lithium-ionized polymers. This makes the battery exceptionally powerful. Full battery capacity is rated at 2400 mAh. Overall a user can expect an additional 80% of their normal mobile phone power.

  • Is the product IOS supported?

Absolutely! This battery case is fully IOS supported. The charging port on the case will work properly during the phone charging process.

  • When is the delivery date?

It is available at the end of September.Orders will be shipped from China and take on average 5 to 7 days to the United States.

UPDATE: We are happy to announce that our colorful versions of iPhone battery cases are also under development. You can pre-order the black/white one now.

The estimated shipping date: beginning of October 

The colorful versions have all the same advantages as the ones with aluminum frame. But even more it has one piece design. And even lighter(65g).


Why We Need Your Support?

To help bring us to the international market, we’re seeking to raise funds that will help us launch into mass production.

Ordering today helps us kickstart our mass production and in return, you'll be one of the first to get your best iPhone battery case. 

Money back guarantee

If you don't receive your products, you will get a full refund.

Contact Us: support@iphonebatterycase.com

Thank you for your support!

story:
Store, share, and transfer your files in one simple yet durable system. The Nayano Outrider USB flash drive allows you to quickly detach it from your keychain to wherever you need it, and then re-attach it back on, instantly. The ultimate USB flash drive has Tier 1 certified high speed USB memory with a durable metal housing, that is fast and will last. Lost drives, broken drives, and drives that take time to detach are now a thing of the past. The capless swivel design prevents lost caps, and allows for safe transporting. The innovative grip allows for easy opening. The rationale is simple:

Get a flash drive that won’t get lost and will last long, instead of spending less and having to constantly replace one. In the long run you save time, money, and peace of mind, knowing you’ll have your drive by your side.





Watch how tough the Nayano Outrider is!


See how the Nayano Outrider saved the world from terrorists!



HOW IT ALL STARTED:

Ever since purchasing my first flash drive in 2005, I have always felt the need to create a durable flash drive. Plastic drives would never last, and would always break apart. It was also a real pain to have to stick your whole keychain, with the flashdrive into a USB port. The only other option was to unscrew off the flash drive off the keychain, which itself was a nuisance.

The other problem was the cap, which would always get lost. Some drives didn't even come with caps, and dust and water would eventually get into the USB and render it unusable. Amidst all these issues, I finally got the idea to design a drive that was metal, durable, capless, and could instantly clip off and on your keychain. I didn't want to just make a good USB flash drive, I wanted to make the ULTIMATE USB flash drive, one that would solve every potential setback. And that's when I invented the Nayano Outrider.

 FAQ:

Q: What sizes are available?

A: After funding, the initial run will consist of 8 GB drives. Soon afterwards, we will additionally be offering 16 GB, 32 GB, and 64 GB drives

Q: Will you offer USB 3.0?

A: The current drives are 2.0, but have been retrofitted to fit 3.0. By next winter we hope to include 3.0 drives available.


What We Need

The drive is in a prototype stage, and it works fine. The funds raised will pay for a mold, so I can start the manufacturing process.

story:
4) Full 5:1 surround sound with built in seat bass shakers.

5) Choice of adjustable Bucket Seating

6) Built in screen options

7) Compatible with all the top driving games.

 8) Compatible with top flight games.

8) Simple plug and play in using 1 power socket, 1 USB & 1 HDMI.

9) Adjustable sensitivity independently on Steering and Pedals built into the seat.

Well this is exactly what I have achieved and can produce these initial batches for sale under £3000 all in!

With additional funding to be used on in house machining I plan to get them produced and on sale for under £2600! This includes everything listed above apart from your gaming console or PC...

Prototype

Over the last 7 months I have built 2 working prototypes and undergone many design changes in which my latest model has out-performed my best expectations for power, strength, cooling, ergonomics & motion feedback.

I have put it through it's paces by inviting friends over for racing gaming parties to give it a good thrashing in the hope I am able to literally break it! If I know where it's weakness is i'm in a position to further improve. So far we have failed in causing any damage or even coming close!

What this tells me is it's ready... It works! and all that's left to do is give it some final design polish a bit of style and a chance for others to enjoy. The all important Mechanical and Electrical aspects are performing perfectly and these won't change at all in the V1.0 version.

So all the major nail biting development work is done. I'm ready now to start full batch production and get these out there for all you causal gamers to enjoy.

Experience

My current job as an Operations Manager at an engineering company has given me valuable project management experience allowing me to structure the completion of the product in a business like way. I gave myself targets to meet, material procurement goals, further research on latest manufacturing technologies and services as well as a good records and understanding of the entire manufacturing process - start to finish.

With previous hands on experience in electronics, welding, CNC machining, laser cutting, fabrication and pretty much every type of production manufacturing process out there I feel I'm in a great position to get these motion simulator seats finalized and more besides sooner rather than later.

Indiegogo funding

A successful campaign would allow me to leave my current job to work on this full time in new unit space and assemble the first 14 platforms, I am already sending out parts for quotation, procurement and machining. I have everything I need to start manufacturing except the all important cash flow to get me up and running.

Stretch Goals

  • Goal 1 £4200 Unit Space for first 3 months.
  • Goal 2 £3500 Tooling, Jigs and Equipment.
  • Goal 3 £300 Ecommerce.
  • Goal 4 £950 Accounting and Admin.
  • Goal 5 £9200 First four Perk Motion Platforms for manufacture & delivery.
  • Goal 6 £4200 2 months personal cover leaving current employment.
  • Goal 7 £4500 Large Van for personal delivery and setup in UK.
  • Goal 8 £1600 On Insurance and product inspection Indygogo fees.
  • Goal 9 £24900 Second Batch of 10 for Perks plus fees
  • Goal 10 £TBC Any further funding would allow in house machining and further reduced raw platform costs when selling direct from our website in the future.
    Total backing required £53,350.00

    Additional funding over my setup goal would allow me to further purchase equipment for in house staff, CNC machining, Welding, Painting and larger assembly space giving me the chance to greatly reduce the price of a platform to potentially under £2600!

    I in the process of laying legitimate company foundations and currently finalizing the new website now www.caniseng.com . I'm ready to hit the ground running and with your help achieve this goal much sooner. Please help me to bring this exciting time for sim gaming and VR to everyone.

    With passion over profits I just want share my product with the world.

    Risks and personal experience

    I have been a mechanical Engineer all my working life. My job for the last 7 years has been an Operations Manager responsible for bringing various engineering projects together with a view to problem solving design issues and producing products in a cost efficient, quality and timely way. With new office based skills learnt I have been able to bring my hands on knowledge to a more professional level.

    Prior experience with hands on machining, welding, fabrication and tool making has given me practical knowledge and understanding of motion control, structural strength and fabrication. I have great experience in software programming, PLC, CNC and 3D Cad software as well as electronics and power distribution.

    Combining all my skill feels like I was destined to bring this product to market for the casual gamer. It ticks all the boxes for both my professional experience and personal interests.

    With the funds I will be building the first wave of simulators. I have personally invested thousands of pounds and hours in development bringing it to this stage. 

    The last thing I would be comfortable doing is promising an end product without proving it to myself first, the risks at this point are minimal. 

    It works and I am struggling to see how at the end of this initial funding stage any backers won't be in possession of a all in one motion simulator. The amount I need will enable me to finance the layout of the first 14 and put in place the relevant tooling and layout for further production.

    If anything fails on any of the motion platforms I will do my best personally and financially to rectify the issues. This could be any electrical or mechanical failure or even extend to a re-call for full modification and re-fit down the line. I appreciate this is V1.0 and there may be posibilities for failed parts or components.

    There is no better critic or road tester than the public and I intend to take on board any and all comments or criticism with a view for future version improvements.

    I will be having the platform independently inspected by qualified electricians, health and safety professionals and public liability insurers as part of the typical new product process.

    Feel free to pose questions and I will do my best to answer.

    yours sincerely

    Jason Daysh
story_txt:
Hi,Thanks for taking the time to check out my campaign.
Images below are 3D rendered images of the final product design which is fully representative of V1.0 build planned.

 

 
My Story
8 Months ago when I sat in front of my new G27 wheel and put on my Oculus rift DK2 I was blown away by the immersive experience of driving games in VR. I wondered where it could take us next and imagined sitting in a simulator seat feeling the lean of the corners, acceleration and braking G's.

 

So I started looking, looking for a motion simulator seat and what I 
found disappointed me! The cheapest motion platform that actually moved 
in a way I imagined cost around £16,000! It was only available for the 
PC, requires custom software and a lot of configuring. Others out there 
can go into the hundreds of thousands of pounds! Don't get me wrong, 
there are some impressive simulators out there and I have tried my hands
 on a few but was unable to find any affordable plug and play motion 
simulator seats for consoles.. 
There were other options, ones 
that seemed to go through a lot of effort to only jerk you in your seat 
giving you an almost jaw breaking road feel, others had fixed screens 
and moving seats which seemed a bit odd. Yet again for motion it always 
came back to a "PC Only" I wanted one that would sweep me through the 
corners, feel the acceleration and braking without rattling my teeth out
 my head. I thought that was it, my dream of owning my own was over.
So,
 I started to look into building my own but found there were no easy 
solutions for the casual gamer. You would need your own £1000 gaming PC 
along with additional expensive components just to get started. There is
 nothing out there available for console gamers. Nothing that is plug 
and play out of the box. I want to just turn it on, plug my wheel into 
my PS4 and press start! That's it…

So I made a wish list for what I wanted....
1) Needs to at least move, side to side - forward and back.

 
2) XBOX One, PC, or PS4 & PS3 compatible.

 3) Quality Force Feedback Wheel, pedals, Shifter. 
4) Full 5:1 surround sound with built in seat bass shakers.

 
5) Choice of adjustable Bucket Seating

 
6) Built in screen options

 
7) Compatible with all the top driving games.

 
 8) Compatible with top flight games.

 
8) Simple plug and play in using 1 power socket, 1 USB & 1 HDMI.

 
9) Adjustable sensitivity independently on Steering and Pedals built into the seat.
Well this is exactly what I have achieved and can produce these initial batches for sale under £3000 all in! 
With additional funding to be used on in house machining I plan to get them produced and on sale for under £2600! This includes everything listed above apart from your gaming console or PC...
Prototype

Over the last 7 months I have built 2 working prototypes and 
undergone many design changes in which my latest model has out-performed
 my best expectations for power, strength, cooling, ergonomics & 
motion feedback.

I have put it through it's paces by inviting friends over for racing
 gaming parties to give it a good thrashing in the hope I am able to 
literally break it! If I know where it's weakness is i'm in a position 
to further improve. So far we have failed in causing any damage or even 
coming close! 
What this tells me is it's ready... It works! and 
all that's left to do is give it some final design polish a bit of style
 and a chance for others to enjoy. The all important Mechanical and Electrical aspects are performing perfectly and these won't change at all in the V1.0 version.

So all the major nail biting development work is done. I'm ready now 
to start full batch production and get these out there for all you 
causal gamers to enjoy.

Experience
My current job as an Operations Manager at an engineering company has given me valuable project management experience allowing me to structure the completion of the product in a business like way. I gave myself targets to meet, material procurement goals, further research on latest manufacturing technologies and services as well as a good records and understanding of the entire manufacturing process - start to finish.
With previous hands on experience in electronics, welding, CNC machining, laser cutting, fabrication and pretty much every type of production manufacturing process out there I feel I'm in a great position to get these motion simulator seats finalized and more besides sooner rather than later.
Indiegogo funding
A successful campaign would allow me to leave my current job to work on this full time in new unit space and assemble the first 14 platforms, I am already sending out parts for quotation, procurement and machining. I have everything I need to start manufacturing except the all important cash flow to get me up and running.
Stretch Goals

Goal 1 £4200 Unit Space for first 3 months.
Goal 2 £3500 Tooling, Jigs and Equipment.
Goal 3 £300 Ecommerce.
Goal 4 £950 Accounting and Admin.
Goal 5 £9200 First four Perk Motion Platforms for manufacture & delivery.

Goal 6 £4200 2 months personal cover leaving current employment.
Goal 7 £4500 Large Van for personal delivery and setup in UK.

Goal 8 £1600 On Insurance and product inspection Indygogo fees.
Goal 9 £24900 Second Batch of 10 for Perks plus fees

Goal 10 £TBC Any further funding would allow in house machining and further reduced raw platform costs when selling direct from our website in the future.


Total backing required £53,350.00Additional funding over my setup goal would allow me to further purchase equipment for in house staff, CNC machining, Welding, Painting and larger assembly space giving me the chance to greatly reduce the price of a platform to potentially under £2600!
I in the process of laying legitimate company foundations and currently finalizing the new website now www.caniseng.com . I'm ready to hit the ground running and with your help achieve this goal much sooner. Please help me to bring this exciting time for sim gaming and VR to everyone.
With passion over profits I just want share my product with the world.
Risks and personal experience

I have been a mechanical Engineer all my working life. My job for the last 7 years has been an Operations Manager responsible for bringing various engineering projects together with a view to problem solving design issues and producing products in a cost efficient, quality and timely way. With new office based skills learnt I have been able to bring my hands on knowledge to a more professional level.
Prior experience with hands on machining, welding, fabrication and tool making has given me practical knowledge and understanding of motion control, structural strength and fabrication. I have great experience in software programming, PLC, CNC and 3D Cad software as well as electronics and power distribution.
Combining all my skill feels like I was destined to bring this product to market for the casual gamer. It ticks all the boxes for both my professional experience and personal interests.
With the funds I will be building the first wave of simulators. I have personally invested thousands of pounds and hours in development bringing it to this stage. 
The last thing I would be comfortable doing is promising an end product without proving it to myself first, the risks at this point are minimal. 
It works and I am struggling to see how at the end of this initial funding stage any backers won't be in possession of a all in one motion simulator. The amount I need will enable me to finance the layout of the first 14 and put in place the relevant tooling and layout for further production.
If anything fails on any of the motion platforms I will do my best personally and financially to rectify the issues. This could be any electrical or mechanical failure or even extend to a re-call for full modification and re-fit down the line. I appreciate this is V1.0 and there may be posibilities for failed parts or components.
There is no better critic or road tester than the public and I intend to take on board any and all comments or criticism with a view for future version improvements.
I will be having the platform independently inspected by qualified electricians, health and safety professionals and public liability insurers as part of the typical new product process.
Feel free to pose questions and I will do my best to answer.
yours sincerely
Jason Daysh

 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++Update 26/04/2016Laser cut plate has arrived for the first 4 platforms :D

story:
No need to find item records manually, smartphone will recognize your item by its photo!

Scan any object with mobile camera to access its inventory data, open documents, play video or attach any other actions on your mobile or desktop!



Cross platform inventory software (MacOS, Windows, Android, iOS) that can access and open item record by simply scanning it with your Smartphone camera. You don't need to search item record manually, remembering how it was named - Smartphone will automatically recognize your item by previously attached photos.


Scan your collectible item and all information and videos are automatically expanded



Cloud data sync between all your mobile and desktop devices

All Inventory data will be synced between desktop and mobile devices using web cloud. Smartphone will be able to show DB record on a smartphone itself or remotely on your desktop. Add one or several photos of your item to its DB record and smartphone will lately recognize it by a photo.

Sync your database between any devices - MacOS, Windows, Android, iOS


Add custom actions to your object

Everything you need is to attach your item photos to DB entry or files. If you already have photos of object in the DB - no further actions required. Now you can attach any external files - PDF, Text, Spreadsheets, Videos, and additional actions to your object.

Simply use your mobile to activate actions - open DB entry, open documents or spreadsheet, play video.


Just imagine:

- scan your Music CD and this album will start playing automatically;

- scan your device - and manual with specs will be shown on your screen.



In this way it will be possible to store manual, specs and invoices of your inventory.

It can be used with any objects, like DVDs, Books, tools, custom collectibles, etc.


Loan manager

Software will provide additional easy to use 'Loan manager' to track loaned items, and a lot of additional capabilities.

This will allow to do a scan of your item easily and add it to loan list in 1 click!


Inventory has never been accessed so easily!


Estimated timeline

Completion in a 3 months after Indiegogo campaign end (1st Goal).

Purchasing perks with LignUp inventory software pack, you are getting your LignUp license in 1-2 days after purchase.


Goals

$3,000 USD - Completion within 3 months after campaign

$10,000 USD - Establishing cloud based multi-device synchronization

$50,000 USD - Advanced, interactive on-the go recognition (in Virtual Reality style)

$100,000 USD - Additional 3D scanner embedded in app to create 3D models, measure items dimension when you adding new item into database.

Raise > $100,000 to open 2 additional hidden Goals.


Perks

All perks except mobile contains Multi Collector Ultimate bundle license! Visual Inventory will be integrated into Multi Collector. By getting these perks you are receiving Ultimate bundle in 24H and can start use it immediately.

LignUp Multi Collector is a powerful cross-platform software to organize any items!

Hurry up! Cost of the 'Early-bird' and 'Full-set' perks is less than cost of the LignUp Ultimate bundle!
