story:
Who are we.

A little bit about us.


We are Brailling ©, the first mobile messaging application for visually impaired people developed in Argentina.

We want to improve the life of those who can’t take advantage of today's technologies and include them.




What is it and how does it work?

Mechanical and technical demonstrations.


If you don’t know about Braille, think of six circles distributed in two columns –each one has three circles. We can do 64 different combinations in this board, and each combination is a different letter or special character.

How does it work? It's easy. On the main screen, when texting users, the Braille board shows six empty circles. The user can feel the screen -looking for the exact location of those circles- and the mobile will vibrate smoothly, showing where the circles are. When the user touches one of the circles, the mobile will vibrate more loudly.


     


At first, we have six different positions: a1 - b1; a2 - b2; a3 – b3. Each combination represents a letter or a special character that the users can form just by touching a given one.


Making the dream come true.

The person must use one of the respective commands to write a letter and enter a space, so as to write messages of certain length and send them to the receiver by touching the screen three times.


***


We can all use the app, not only blind or visually impaired people.

This application is available for the whole tech community. You can speak with people who don’t see and they can speak to you by writing a message in Braille. 
The app is going to translate what was said. It is reciprocal. You send a message in your language and, when this message shows up on the receiver's screen, this is going to be translated and read out loud by our system.


***

***

Production Timeline.


We can make the community grow, we can expand our world, open our minds and surpass expectations. 

***

Testimonial.

"Brailling is going to change the messaging system around the world."


Be a part of this and contribute to the Brailling © association. Let's make Brailling available to everyone!

***

FAQ.

ABOUT THE HARDWARE

Q: Do I need a special mobile or external hardware to use Brailling?

A: No! We're improving Brailling every day so that everyone can use it easily in every mobile. You can download the demo app for Android.

Q: Does it drain all the battery?  

A: No. The mobile is going to vibrate in different modes, and make a sound in some cases, for a better experience. You can disable these options or watch the Tutorial again if you have any doubts. These actions are not going to consume a lot of battery.

ABOUT THE SOFTWARE

Q: In how many languages is Brailling going to be?

A: At first, in English. We're from Argentina and we want to reach more countries in the future, so everyone can share this great experience. You can write in any language though* because Braille is a traditional system which lets you write in any language indeed.

*We only allow 64 combinations of letters and special characters at the moment. With your help, we're  going to improve this, expand and have the app in more languages.

Q: Does Brailling have a native screen reader?

A: No. You're going to use your regular screen reader, so you're familiar with it. You're going to write in Braille in silence and, when you have to read a message, you can use headphones to listen to it.

Q: How many opportunities and features does Brailling have for visually impaired people?

A: A lot! We're going to give you privacy when you write, not allowing others to watch your screen. You can write faster than before, in Braille. Once you're familiar with this system, you must only learn how to use our commands (you can learn pretty quickly) and you will be able to speak with anyone around the world! You can look up contacts, read old messages, write new messages and it's easy for visually impaired people.

Q: How does the Braille keyboard function?

A: It's easy. When someone writes in Braille, this is going to be automatically translated with the correspondent letter for the receiver, so that he or she can read or hear the message and respond. To write a message, you must touch the screen, without lifting the finger, and feel the vibrations. You're going to recognize the different positions from the Braille keyboard. With a few commands of Brailling, you can send the message, delete words, delete letters, write, read, look for contacts and more!

Q: How can the people who see write with Brailling?

A: The app is going to have two different interfaces: one for blinds and, the other one, for those who can see. The blinds are going to have all the advantages and anyone can use it really. If you want to change the interface, you can do it from the setup options section.


***

Brailling ©.

The deposit that the Act 11.723 and the Decree 165/94 established was made. All copyrights reserved.
Hecho el depósito que marcan la ley 11.723 y el decreto 165/94. Todos los derechos reservados.

story:
Who We Are & What We're Doing

We are a small group of (mostly!) students that have fallen in love with the Bernie Sanders campaign, movement, and grassroots political revolution community! 

The enthusiasm and positivity of this community is absolutely addictive, and – especially in a political environment known mostly for nasty personal attacks and corruption – it provides a refreshing blast of civility, maturity, and decency. 

Like many of you, we had the overwhelming sensation that being a part of this community felt really unique and special, so we created Bernie Buddy – a free mobile application that allows Bernie supporters to organize, communicate, and connect with each other! We’d love for all of you to download it, use it, and tell us what you think!

Our goal is to continue to improve and update the application throughout the election cycle to help everyone in the community have fun while organizing and spreading the word about Bernie and the revolution! 

We feel that Bernie Sanders is showing the rest of America what a truly qualified leader acts like – while his incredibly enthusiastic supporters are showing what a group of responsible adults coming together to solve serious problems looks like. 

We want everyone to know that supporting the Bernie Buddy application and the team behind it is simply supporting a fun & creative way to spread the message of restoring honesty, integrity, and character to our government.

What This Money Will Be Used For

Our primary objective is to aggressively update the application throughout the election cycle - adding many more features & improved functionality. We believe that Bernie Buddy is capable of becoming a powerful tool for organizing, communicating, and connecting with the grassroots revolution - so we're reaching out to the community to help us bring these ideas to life! 

We're raising this money to get more student developers with a diverse range of skills on our team and to help pay for some of the costs associated with providing and scaling a free mobile application (hosting, servers, etc...)

Bernie Buddy will always be free, but we do plan to eventually make money with this application. With the profits we make - after we pay our team & the other costs associated with providing the application - we are going to provide funding, promotional materials, campaign merchandise, adequate venues, and organizational support to ordinary individuals across the nation that want to host their own Bernie events & debate watch parties.

These people desperately want to inspire their friends, family, and communities but they won’t be able to pull it off without our help!

A buddy of Bernie is a buddy of ours! Want to help us assist the revolution?

Thank You

The Bernie Buddy team wants to thank everybody who viewed, shared, talked about, or donated to this campaign! This is the first mobile application that we've built together and we're really excited to see where it goes! Thanks for being a part of something that's very exciting for us, and thanks even more for doing your part to help others Feel The Bern.

Thanks for your time & we hope to see you on Bernie Buddy!

- The Bernie Buddy team

story:
What is Happy Mama?

Happy Mama is a safe, trustworthy, reliable source: a mobile app + website for stay-at-home + working moms. The Happy Mama mobile app provides stay-at-home moms the option to find short-term child care (1-2 hours) by other moms in their surrounding area. Happy Mama also provides the opportunity for stay-at-home moms to make money from home on their own terms. The Happy Mama app and website is a place for all moms to find + create group meet ups in their area, host + post about events, schedule playdates, Mommy & Me group outings (zoo trip, aquarium, park, etc) and plan group "moms night out" events with one goal in mind: to keep the mamas happy! Happy Mama will also be dedicated to the mamas who suffer from postpartum depression by providing forums, PPD information + facts, F.A.Q, alternative treatment resources, recovery tips, where to find the highest rated help in your area, as well as useful articles and blog posts -- all in one safe and secure space. 


Happy Mama Features



                

             


Of course! As a mom, safety is always my biggest concern.

Safety is our top priority at Happy Mama. 

In order for any mom to register + gain access to the Happy Mama they will first have to provide: 

Once the background check and all of the above is clear, they will have access.

None of the above information will be shared with the public, the above precautions are taken so moms are assured they are a part of a 100% safe and secure environment.



                                       


Our Campaign

The reason I am here on IndieGoGo is because I need your help. 

            

Happy Mama needs your donation.

As for funding, every dollar counts :)

A share is worth just as much as a contribution, and doing both would greatly benefit the campaign to make Happy Mama come to life. So please share this page to anyone + everyone you know. It truly means the world! 

What we need and what YOU get (PERKS)!

Depending on your donation size, you will receive a perk in return. If you scroll up, on the right side of the Happy Mama campaign page you will see the perks listed!

Why is Happy Mama a valuable resource?

  • Happy Mama is a safe, private, trustworthy (cyber) space --> only those who agree to + pass a background check will have access to the site + app to ensure a safe space where moms can interact with *only* moms
  • It will help stay-at-home moms get short breaks during their day --> being a stay at home mom is exhausting and overwhelming. Moms deserve a break just like anyone else who has a job but they are rarely given it. Read this Huffington Post article if you need a little insight into what it's really like to be a stay-at-home mom. 
  • It will provide the opportunity for stay-at-home moms to make money from home which will help them contribute to their family income, or have extra money to do things that they love! 
  • It will provide resources for those suffering from postpartum depression and allow them to have a safe space to express their emotions and meet other moms who are going through the same struggle. This will help them to feel more comfortable with PPD and encourage them to seek help and not feel alone.
  • It will create a community where moms can make new friends, learn, help, empower, trust and have each other to walk through the trenches of motherhood. 

Risks & Challenges

Like any project, there are risks involved. But, I plan to make sure that all of these risks are assessed during the development of the mobile app and website. 

What kind of risks are possible?

  • not reaching my funding goal: if this doesn't happen, I won't be giving up. All of the money that I raise will be put directly towards Happy Mama. I will continue to leave my campaign page open for donations even after the 60 day "live" campaign is up. In order to raise enough funds, I will do everything I can to spread the word about my campaign until I raise the $8,000.
  • legal issues with childcare: In order for the app + website to be developed, I will be meeting with a lawyer to figure out any and all issues that may come up with moms watching other moms children. Luckily, the registration process will help to avoid legal issues since each registrant must provide their social security #, valid credit card, drivers license and undergo a background check before being able to use Happy Mama. 

Other Ways You Can Help

                                                                                 


Background 

I'm Caroline! A stay-at-home mom of a 1 year old named Marley and creator of Happy Mama. As a stay-at-home mom who suffers with postpartum depression, I have been in search of a service or resource I could use when I am in need of short-term help or care for my daughter. I have also searched the internet in hopes of finding that perfect stay-at-home job that would allow me to contribute some extra money to our household income. I never found one that worked around my schedule and my daughters.

It took about a year of searching for these opportunities for me to realize that this dream resource was non-existent. And then there was also my postpartum depression lingering, I needed something...anything that would make my days a little bit easier and help with recovery, too. On my search, I noticed that there are barely any resources on the internet for moms with postpartum depression, and the ones that are there are very cut and dry. As a woman with PPD, all I ever wanted was a warm, inviting space where I can read about this issue, seek help (other than medicine), hear and speak to others who are in the same boat, and plan meet ups with moms in my surrounding area whether that be mommy & me outings, playdates, moms night out, or just finding other moms to relate to. All of this would have been so helpful in my recovery, but it just wasn't there. 

This searching soon led me to the creation of Happy Mama. 

I hope you enjoy this idea and I am forever grateful for your support for Happy Mama that I am so passionate about. 

With love,

Caroline Kwash
story_txt:
What is Happy Mama?



Happy Mama is a safe, trustworthy, reliable source: a mobile app + website for stay-at-home + working moms. The Happy Mama mobile app provides stay-at-home moms the option to find short-term child care (1-2 hours) by other moms in their surrounding area. Happy Mama also provides the opportunity for stay-at-home moms to make money from home on their own terms. The Happy Mama app and website is a place for all moms to find + create group meet ups in their area, host + post about events, schedule playdates, Mommy & Me group outings (zoo trip, aquarium, park, etc) and plan group "moms night out" events with one goal in mind: to keep the mamas happy! Happy Mama will also be dedicated to the mamas who suffer from postpartum depression by providing forums, PPD information + facts, F.A.Q, alternative treatment resources, recovery tips, where to find the highest rated help in your area, as well as useful articles and blog posts -- all in one safe and secure space. 

Happy Mama Features







                
             







Of course! As a mom, safety is always my biggest concern.


Safety is our top priority at Happy Mama. 
In order for any mom to register + gain access to the Happy Mama they will first have to provide: 


Once the background check and all of the above is clear, they will have access.

None of the above information will be shared with the public, the above precautions are taken so moms are assured they are a part of a 100% safe and secure environment.



                                       

Our Campaign


The reason I am here on IndieGoGo is because I need your help. 


            

Happy Mama needs your donation.

As for funding, every dollar counts :)


A share is worth just as much as a contribution, and doing both would greatly benefit the campaign to make Happy Mama come to life. So please share this page to anyone + everyone you know. It truly means the world! 

What we need and what YOU get (PERKS)!




Depending on your donation size, you will receive a perk in return. If you scroll up, on the right side of the Happy Mama campaign page you will see the perks listed!


Why is Happy Mama a valuable resource?




Happy Mama is a safe, private, trustworthy (cyber) space --> only those who agree to + pass a background check will have access to the site + app to ensure a safe space where moms can interact with *only* moms
It will help stay-at-home moms get short breaks during their day --> being a stay at home mom is exhausting and overwhelming. Moms deserve a break just like anyone else who has a job but they are rarely given it. Read this Huffington Post article if you need a little insight into what it's really like to be a stay-at-home mom. 

It will provide the opportunity for stay-at-home moms to make money from home which will help them contribute to their family income, or have extra money to do things that they love! 
It will provide resources for those suffering from postpartum depression and allow them to have a safe space to express their emotions and meet other moms who are going through the same struggle. This will help them to feel more comfortable with PPD and encourage them to seek help and not feel alone.
It will create a community where moms can make new friends, learn, help, empower, trust and have each other to walk through the trenches of motherhood.     Risks & Challenges Like any project, there are risks involved. But, I plan to make sure that all of these risks are assessed during the development of the mobile app and website. 
What kind of risks are possible?


not reaching my funding goal: if this doesn't happen, I won't be giving up. All of the money that I raise will be put directly towards Happy Mama. I will continue to leave my campaign page open for donations even after the 60 day "live" campaign is up. In order to raise enough funds, I will do everything I can to spread the word about my campaign until I raise the $8,000.
legal issues with childcare: In order for the app + website to be developed, I will be meeting with a lawyer to figure out any and all issues that may come up with moms watching other moms children. Luckily, the registration process will help to avoid legal issues since each registrant must provide their social security #, valid credit card, drivers license and undergo a background check before being able to use Happy Mama. 

    Other Ways You Can Help


                                                                                 

Background I'm Caroline! A stay-at-home mom of a 1 year old named Marley and creator of Happy Mama. As a stay-at-home mom who suffers with postpartum depression, I have been in search of a service or resource I could use when I am in need of short-term help or care for my daughter. I have also searched the internet in hopes of finding that perfect stay-at-home job that would allow me to contribute some extra money to our household income. I never found one that worked around my schedule and my daughters.It took about a year of searching for these opportunities for me to realize that this dream resource was non-existent. And then there was also my postpartum depression lingering, I needed something...anything that would make my days a little bit easier and help with recovery, too. On my search, I noticed that there are barely any resources on the internet for moms with postpartum depression, and the ones that are there are very cut and dry. As a woman with PPD, all I ever wanted was a warm, inviting space where I can read about this issue, seek help (other than medicine), hear and speak to others who are in the same boat, and plan meet ups with moms in my surrounding area whether that be mommy & me outings, playdates, moms night out, or just finding other moms to relate to. All of this would have been so helpful in my recovery, but it just wasn't there. This searching soon led me to the creation of Happy Mama. I hope you enjoy this idea and I am forever grateful for your support for Happy Mama that I am so passionate about. With love,Caroline Kwash

story:
12 VOLT LED LIGHTS PORTABLE POWER SOURCE RECHARGEABLE 3 WAY

"THE LAZERVOLT BLACKOUT RELIEF POWER BOX"

 Function and Appealing Features

"12 VOLT LED LIGHTS PORTABLE POWER SOURCE RECHARGEABLE 3 WAY" would fulfill the need for a new type of emergency power and lighting system.

The appealing features  would be its safety, ease of use, and convenience.

The main feature is to power 12 volt LED lamps. This could provide enough illumination to fully illuminate many rooms.

This emergency power system could be used to charge mobile electronics products and power 12 volt DC loads during the course of an extended power failure.

It also comes with its own set of bright, powerful, LED lights to provide emergency illumination.

It could be recharged via house current, a motor vehicle electrical system, or even a photovoltaic panel.

"LIGHT SOURCE".

In the event of a power failure, most homeowners resort to using flashlights, oil lamps, candles, and other similar items as a source of illumination.

Unfortunately, the intensity of the light produced by these devices is fairly small and capable of being provided for only relatively short periods.

As a result, normal activities, such as reading and housework or even just moving around, are substantially limited, in addition, the use of candles and oil lamps can also pose the risk of fire.

"THE LAZERVOLT BLACKOUT RELIEF POWER BOX" has been developed substantially as one possible method of overcoming some of the inconveniences associated with power outages.

Unlike an uninterruptible power supply, it would not feature an inverter and 125 volt AC outlets. Instead, it's low voltage for the safety of the children.

it would feature a 12 volt DC outlets and a pair of USB Standard A outlets. The latter could be used to charge a variety of mobile electronics products, including cell phones, tablets, etc. The former could be used to power some of the various 12 volt appliances on the market, such as some radios, low voltage camping blanket etc.


In the event of a power failure, "THE LAZERVOLT BLACKOUT RELIEF POWER BOX" using a standard extension wire connected to standard fixtures replacing the bulbs with 12 volt, could operate for an extended period of time, thereby enabling an individual to read, cook, and perform other functions. By eliminating the use of candles and oil lamps for emergency lighting purposes.


The "THE LAZERVOLT BLACKOUT RELIEF POWER BOX" could also be used to light up a backyard, patio, deck, or related area for a party & dancing or related events. It could also potentially be used at a remote campsite. Equipped with a strobe light, it could also be adapted for use in motor vehicles for roadside emergencies.

Visit www.WeTurnYourLightsOn.com


VIDEO #3 CLICK & Watch - Discovery Channel NEWS at CES Las Vegas, 2016
A picture how the LAZERVOLT lights up a hallway with a string light. It could do the same while camping giving light to several tents, Or party and dancing in the woods .

During a blackout with the LAZERVOLT you can resume normal living!

No flashlight can replace the LAZERVOLT lighting.

A vedio for the smart bulb we are offering, enjoy!!

story:
Shellback Smartphone Safes Eliminate Distracted Driving by Storing Cell Phones Out-of-Sight Inside a Closed Case
 

 

It is no secret that distracted drivers are causing thousands of unnecessary deaths and millions of accidents every year because drivers are taking their eyes off the road to read their cell phone screen's messages, social media apps and videos. 

The problem has become a true epidemic and is getting worse!

Cell Phone Distracted Driving Statistics

A recent AT&T survey reports that 98% of drivers agree that texting and driving is a very dangerous habit, but 49% of the same respondents also admitted that they still sent texts, checked social media sites and/or talked on their phones while driving.  

Did You Know That:

  • Auto accidents are the #1 cause of teen deaths
  • Cell phone use causes 1 out of 4 car accidents
  • More than 3,000 people died in accidents last year caused by distraction due to cell phones
  • In addition, cell phone distraction was a factor in over 1.6 million wrecks last year
  • Drivers are 2300% more likely to have an accident when texting while driving
  • 23% of teens feel the need to respond immediately to texts
  • Texting while driving is 6x worse than driving drunk

Please watch these videos to get a sense of how bad the epidemic has grown with regards to how many teen and adult drivers are losing their lives due to distracted drivers that are reading their cell phone screens to check out texts and smartphone apps while driving:

 

Smartphone Addiction 

AT&T, Verizon, Sprint and other mobile wireless carriers all recognize that people have a tremendous urge to see what news, messages or emails just dinged their cell phones.

Nomophobia - the fear of being without one's smartphone - is real and effects about half the population.  Constantly checking for emails, texts, tweets, and updates is a very dangerous habit - and possible addiction - that needs to be addressed.

Cell Phone Laws are Ineffective 

To combat this problem, 46 states and the District of Columbia have passed legislation that bans texting while driving, but these laws are very hard to enforce and have proven ineffective - just like corporate cell phone policies.    

Our challenge is finding a solution that allows cell phones to notify drivers of incoming calls or texts, while eliminating the temptation to take their eyes off the road.  

Introducing the Shellback Smartphone Safe

Faced with this real world problem, brothers Michael and Thomas Maguire decided to solve it. Both brothers have experience managing fleets or salespeople who drive in their territories every day. Tom has two teenage sons - one that recently received his driver's license and another who will start driver's education soon.

Their simple solution is an intelligent cell phone case that allows drivers to store their cell phones out-of-sight inside a Shellback "Smartphone Safe" and removes the urge to check their cell phone screens while driving. 

How Does a Smartphone Safe Work?

The Smartphone Safe is an intelligent cell phone case that parents or fleet managers can use to store phones out-of-site and prevent drivers from viewing their cell phone screens. Cell phones can still receive calls and messages, but drivers cannot see the phone.  

Once cell phones are paired and stored inside the Smartphone Safe, a green light on the outside of the case indicates it is now safe to drive. Real time transmissions allow parents and fleet managers to verify that drivers will experience zero cell phone distractions while out on the road.

Smartphone Safe Main Features:

 

Knowledge is Power 

The Smartphone Safe also comes with a Live Undistracted Cell Phone App that runs on both Apple iPhones and Android Smartphones. The app continuously monitors sensors inside the case to ensure that cell phones remained locked inside while the vehicle is moving.

Should the driver decide to open the case while driving it will automatically send an alert to parents or fleet managers - notifying them that the phone is now accessible.  The real time alert provides the ability to address this dangerous behavior before an accident occurs.  

The information is also stored in a database so that parents and fleet managers can review daily, weekly, monthly, or annual reports.  We can provide compliance reports for a single driver or an entire fleet of thousands of autos, trucks, school buses, vans, utility vehicles, etc. 

Smartphone Safes: the Best Monitoring Tool 

Smartphone Safes are the single best way to monitor cell phones and guarantee that cell phone safety policies are being obeyed at all times. It can also be used by driver education schools to teach kids a new methodology for driving with a cell phone. It only takes a few minutes to pull over to a safe parking spot, take the cell phone out of the case, make a call, send a text, check an email, store it back in the case and then head back out on the road safely to their next destination. Training kids and adults to keep their eyes on the road 100% of the time while driving will significantly reduce the number of accidents and deaths caused by cell phones.

Smartphone Safes vs the Competition:

There are a few cell phone apps, hardware gadgets, and driver cameras in the marketplace, but none of them prevent drivers from reading their smartphone screens. The Shellback Smartphone Safe is the ONLY product that stores the cell phone out-of-sight and effectively eliminates a driver's ability to read their cell phones while driving. 

How Do We Plan to Spend the Money

Mike and Tom spoke to countless parents and businesses which validated the need to address distracted driving.  Everyone agreed this was a growing problem - but no one had a solution. The brothers were convinced the only way to solve the problem was to eliminate the phone.  They teamed with an engineering firm, Finishline Product Development Services, to work out the design requirements, draw up cell phone case designs, engineer the case's intelligent sensors, program a cell phone app and develop the functioning prototypes.  The result of all this work is the Shellback SmartPhone Safe.

The team is now ready to go into full production and meet the market place demand. We have a contract manufacturer lined up and we are ready to place our first order that will be used to fulfill orders from this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign and generate enough revenue to conduct a follow-up equity crowdfunding campaign in 12 to 18 months.

We need $50,000 in this initial campaign to:

  • Further test of our prototypes 
  • Finalizing the manufacturing designs
  • Finalizing engineering schematics
  • Developing the dashboards 
  • Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app
  • First production run & fulfilling all of our perks 

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Designing retail packaging
  • Generating product certifications
  • Building sales and distribution channels

Please Help Us End Distracted Driving 

Contributors can help save lives of their loved ones, employees, or complete  strangers through our young driver matching program.  For every ten contributions directed to our partners - we will send one free Smartphone Safe to either PADD.org or Nikki Cline (East Surrey High School) to provide to new drivers in memory of her son Gage Edwards. Nikki, says  "It warms my heart every time I see a person or company be as passionate as I am working towards trying to prevent the avoidable tragedies that can occur from distracted driving."

    Why Should You Support Us?

    Peace of Mind. Since the onset of mobile technology, our roads have become increasingly dangerous. You no longer have the simple peace of mind knowing your loved ones are driving safely. With the Smartphone Safe you now have a simple way to prevent accidents before they happen.  

    • Help make our roads safer for everyone.  We are all aware of the distracted driving epidemic.  
    • Support our goal to help young drivers and quite possibly save lives.    
    • Knowledge is Power. No longer assume your drivers are following the rules. Be 100% sure. 

    Be the first to get one.  No other solution like it exists.  Start living undistracted now with a Shellback Smartphone Safe!

    Our Goal 

    We want to make the roads safer and help everyone live and drive undistracted.  We all know the phone is a major distraction for drivers.  Distracted driving is responsible for 25% of all accidents.  The Smartphone Safe is the solution. 

    If the phone is out-of-sight, the driver will be safer. If the driver is safer we will have less accidents. If we have less accidents we will all benefit.    

    Quite simply - our campaign hopes to prevent accidents and possibly save lives.  

    What is a Smartphone Safe?

    The Smartphone Safe is an intelligent case that secures the phone out-of-sight.  The embedded technology confirms and reports phone location and status.  

    Most distracted driving solutions today focus on the car, the driver, or apps.  The Smartphone Safe focuses on the phone.  It is the only solution that secures the phone out-of-sight and eliminates the possibility of distraction.    

    The world's only fool-proof way to eliminate distracted driving due to smartphones – the Smartphone Safe syncs with your phone and tracks when it is stored out-of-sight while driving.  It sends real time notifications whenever the phone is removed from the case while driving.   

    How Does It Work?

    The Smartphone Safe connects to your smartphone over a Bluetooth connection.  It confirms the phone is out-of-sight (the phone goes in the case), reports on device usage in real time (you will know if the case is opened or closed), and tracks data and presents it in a useful way (Cloud-based SQL database and dashboards.)   

    Once you connect Smartphone Safe to your phone, the Live Undistracted App – available on Android and iOS  will continuously monitor your phone status and let you know when the phone is removed from the case.

    Smartphone Safe Compliance Reporting 

    • Not following the rules? - The Smartphone Safe sends out an immediate alert when a driver decides to take the phone out of the case when driving.  This data allows you to take action before an accident happens.  
    • Two phones? - The Smartphone Safe can handle multiple phones.  Our patent-pending technology determines the exact phone or phones that should be in the case and notifies the driver that the phones are now safely stored for safe driving.  This could be helpful for those of us that have both a work and personal phone. 
    • Minimal Data Usage - The SPS App utilizes minimal data to track both the speed and location of the driver.  All data is tracked in the cloud and only alerts due to unsafe conditions are pushed out.   
    • Battery Technology - The Smartphone Safe comes with a fully rechargeable battery that will last up to 40 hours per charge with average use.   
    • The Case - The Smartphone Safe is made of rugged materials and guaranteed for one year.  It is dust-proof and water splash proof.  Integrated lights and audible alerts indicate when it is safe to drive.   
    • The Software - All activity is tracked in real time and uploaded to our cloud-based server.  Data is stored in  a SQL database and converted to simple to use dashboards.  Alerts are sent directly to our clients via SMS text or email. The Smartphone Safe sends out an immediate alert when a driver decides to take the phone out of the case when driving.  This data allows you to take action before an accident happens.

    Why the Name Shellback?

    US Naval sailors who have crossed the equator and gone through a special initiation ceremony are called "Shellbacks."  Our father was a proud veteran of the US Navy, a Shellback, and a steamfitter who worked on some of the greatest buildings in New York City.  He drove a fleet vehicle for most of his career.  We are confident that he would have never texted while driving - because he would have had no interest in texting at all.  But we know that he would be proud that we are trying to make the roads safer for everyone.  

    Promote Our Campaign - Earn a 10% Commission 

    Like what we're doing to make the world a safer place to drive? Please help us spread the word and raise awareness for our cause by sharing this campaign with your family, friends, and business contacts.

    To make it worth your while, we want to pay you for sharing this campaign via your social media contacts when anyone in your network buys one of our perks.    

    Click Here to Join the Shellback Sales Team

    For example, if you share our campaign link via social media account, email marketing, press releases, etc, we can track how many people visit our Indiegogo campaign and buy one of our perks. If your marketing activities sold 10 units of our main perk at $280, that would generate $2,800 of revenue for our campaign. To compensate you for your marketing efforts, we will mail you a 10% commission check for $280. 

    It's very easy. Simply click on the Facebook, Linkedin and Twitter social media sharing buttons, embed the sharing link on your blog, etc., etc. and you will receive a 10% commission check for every external perk that your marketing efforts sell. 

    To make it very easy, we've even created more that 30 different advertisements that you can post on social media. Simply, go down the list and share the ones you like. When they generate a sale, you earn a commission. 

    Commissions apply to external sales only and the 10% commission will not be applied to personal purchases of Smartphone Safes.  A minimum quota of $1,000 or more of sales is also required so that we don't have to write a large number of checks for very small commissions. Sales will be tracked with Google Analytics that is tied into the backend of this Indiegogo fundraising campaign. 

     

    # # #

The team is now ready to go into full production and meet the market place demand. We have a contract manufacturer lined up and we are ready to place our first order that will be used to fulfill orders from this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign and generate enough revenue to conduct a follow-up equity crowdfunding campaign in 12 to 18 months.
We need $50,000 in this initial campaign to:

Further test of our prototypes 
Finalizing the manufacturing designs
Finalizing engineering schematics

Developing the dashboards 
Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app
First production run & fulfilling all of our perks 

We will soon begin the process of:

Designing retail packaging
Generating product certifications
Building sales and distribution channels

Please Help Us End Distracted Driving 
Contributors can help save lives of their loved ones, employees, or complete  strangers through our young driver matching program.  For every ten contributions directed to our partners - we will send one free Smartphone Safe to either PADD.org or Nikki Cline (East Surrey High School) to provide to new drivers in memory of her son Gage Edwards. Nikki, says  "It warms my heart every time I see a person or company be as passionate as I am working towards trying to prevent the avoidable tragedies that can occur from distracted driving."


Why Should You Support Us?
Peace of Mind. Since the onset of mobile technology, our roads have become increasingly dangerous. You no longer have the simple peace of mind knowing your loved ones are driving safely. With the Smartphone Safe you now have a simple way to prevent accidents before they happen.  

Help make our roads safer for everyone.  We are all aware of the distracted driving epidemic.  
Support our goal to help young drivers and quite possibly save lives.    
Knowledge is Power. No longer assume your drivers are following the rules. Be 100% sure. 

Be the first to get one.  No other solution like it exists.  Start living undistracted now with a Shellback Smartphone Safe!

Our Goal 
We want to make the roads safer and help everyone live and drive undistracted.  We all know the phone is a major distraction for drivers.  Distracted driving is responsible for 25% of all accidents.  The Smartphone Safe is the solution. 
If the phone is out-of-sight, the driver will be safer. If the driver is safer we will have less accidents. If we have less accidents we will all benefit.    
Quite simply - our campaign hopes to prevent accidents and possibly save lives.  

What is a Smartphone Safe?
The Smartphone Safe is an intelligent case that secures the phone out-of-sight.  The embedded technology confirms and reports phone location and status.  
Most distracted driving solutions today focus on the car, the driver, or apps.  The Smartphone Safe focuses on the phone.  It is the only solution that secures the phone out-of-sight and eliminates the possibility of distraction.    
The world's only fool-proof way to eliminate distracted driving due to smartphones – the Smartphone Safe syncs with your phone and tracks when it is stored out-of-sight while driving.  It sends real time notifications whenever the phone is removed from the case while driving.   
How Does It Work?
The Smartphone Safe connects to your smartphone over a Bluetooth connection.  It confirms the phone is out-of-sight (the phone goes in the case), reports on device usage in real time (you will know if the case is opened or closed), and tracks data and presents it in a useful way (Cloud-based SQL database and dashboards.)   
Once you connect Smartphone Safe to your phone, the Live Undistracted App – available on Android and iOS  will continuously monitor your phone status and let you know when the phone is removed from the case.
Smartphone Safe Compliance Reporting 


Not following the rules? - The Smartphone Safe sends out an immediate alert when a driver decides to take the phone out of the case when driving.  This data allows you to take action before an accident happens.  

Two phones? - The Smartphone Safe can handle multiple phones.  Our patent-pending technology determines the exact phone or phones that should be in the case and notifies the driver that the phones are now safely stored for safe driving.  This could be helpful for those of us that have both a work and personal phone. 

Minimal Data Usage - The SPS App utilizes minimal data to track both the speed and location of the driver.  All data is tracked in the cloud and only alerts due to unsafe conditions are pushed out.   

Battery Technology - The Smartphone Safe comes with a fully rechargeable battery that will last up to 40 hours per charge with average use.   

The Case - The Smartphone Safe is made of rugged materials and guaranteed for one year.  It is dust-proof and water splash proof.  Integrated lights and audible alerts indicate when it is safe to drive.   

The Software - All activity is tracked in real time and uploaded to our cloud-based server.  Data is stored in  a SQL database and converted to simple to use dashboards.  Alerts are sent directly to our clients via SMS text or email. The Smartphone Safe sends out an immediate alert when a driver decides to take the phone out of the case when driving.  This data allows you to take action before an accident happens.

Why the Name Shellback?
US Naval sailors who have crossed the equator and gone through a special initiation ceremony are called "Shellbacks."  Our father was a proud veteran of the US Navy, a Shellback, and a steamfitter who worked on some of the greatest buildings in New York City.  He drove a fleet vehicle for most of his career.  We are confident that he would have never texted while driving - because he would have had no interest in texting at all.  But we know that he would be proud that we are trying to make the roads safer for everyone.  
Promote Our Campaign - Earn a 10% Commission 

Like what we're doing to make the world a safer place to drive? Please help us spread the word and raise awareness for our cause by sharing this campaign with your family, friends, and business contacts.
To make it worth your while, we want to pay you for sharing this campaign via your social media contacts when anyone in your network buys one of our perks.    
Click Here to Join the Shellback Sales Team
For example, if you share our campaign link via social media account, email marketing, press releases, etc, we can track how many people visit our Indiegogo campaign and buy one of our perks. If your marketing activities sold 10 units of our main perk at $280, that would generate $2,800 of revenue for our campaign. To compensate you for your marketing efforts, we will mail you a 10% commission check for $280. 
It's very easy. Simply click on the Facebook, Linkedin and Twitter social media sharing buttons, embed the sharing link on your blog, etc., etc. and you will receive a 10% commission check for every external perk that your marketing efforts sell. 
To make it very easy, we've even created more that 30 different advertisements that you can post on social media. Simply, go down the list and share the ones you like. When they generate a sale, you earn a commission. 
Commissions apply to external sales only and the 10% commission will not be applied to personal purchases of Smartphone Safes.  A minimum quota of $1,000 or more of sales is also required so that we don't have to write a large number of checks for very small commissions. Sales will be tracked with Google Analytics that is tied into the backend of this Indiegogo fundraising campaign. 
 
# # #

story:
Is there anything more annoying than tangled headsets?

LIFEBEADS is the worlds first cover for your headset, that makes sure it does not tangle.

LIFEBEADS is a set of beads that you put on your headset wire. The beads are equipped with a slit, making them easy to click on.

LIFEBEADS is made from durable plastic that protects the headset wire and makes it colorful at the same time. 

And LIFEBEADS won't weigh down you head, as the beads are super light.


COLORS

WHITE

LIGHT GREY

DARK GREY

BLACK

SAND

RED SAND

BLUE

GREEN

PINK

YELLOW


HOW TO PUT ON YOUR LIFEBEADS


SPECS

LIFEBEADS is small, light and durable. A set of LIFEBEADS only add 4.4 grams to your headset - so it won't weigh down your head.

WIDTH

HIGHT AND WEIGHT


TIMELINE

CLOSE UPS



WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We have developed prototypes and started small scale production. Now we need help to scale up production and further develop the product by launching more colors.

In order to scale up production and bring down the price, we need bigger and more advanced plastic molds. Also we need to redesign packaging in order to minimize cost, volume and weight. 

Furthermore we want to expand the number of colors available to 10 - See above for all colors.

When you support, you will get the worlds first headset cover that will ensure your headset does not tangle any more!

You will be the first to receive any of the new amazing colors.

As a supporter we will give you good price reductions and the privelage to be the first to receive our new colors, packaged in a new small and light box.


THE ARCHIVE

The test mold

Very first prototype

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I have already put a lot of time and money into this project, which I'm very commited to scale the product and grow it to new heights.

The risk is low, as I already have produced a number of products and have a solid proof of concept regarding production, packaging and color quality.

Color quality is a learning curve, but using 6 months on finding the correct plastic and colors.

My biggest challenge at this very moment is getting funding in order to scale the production which will bring down the price and secure optimal quality.

story:
FanWide is a social network and data platform for sports fans that organizes viewing parties for every team in every city.  FanWide is launching in Seattle on September 17th, but we need your support for us to expand nationwide this fall and bring games to your city!

FanWide was created by a group of Duke and Oregon alumni living in Seattle that loved sports watching, but were living outside of their teams’ local markets, making it hard to watch the game at a sports bar. 

Sports viewing parties are a great way for fans to connect and network with people with similar interests, and FanWide's founder Symon became friends with a few alumni who are now also part of FanWide.  The team also realized that these viewing parties were bringing in dozens – sometimes hundreds – of fans that would spend several hours at the bar, bringing them thousands of dollars in sales on otherwise quiet days.

However, there were a lot of inefficiencies in the process, as someone always had to organize it, call the bar, reserve seating and connect with all the local alumni.  Many times the bar would forget about the group, and be severely understaffed and overwhelmed.  We realized that there was a better way… and started designing FanWide as a service to connect fans and bring bars new customers every day of the week.  In January, 2016 FanWide was born!

Over the past 8 months, the team has grown to over 30 staff, and is ready to launch with the NFL and NCAA Football seasons, and will expand to support basketball, baseball, hockey and soccer.

We have a great idea and an audience of millions, but we need your help with launch.  We need funds for marketing to raise awareness so we grow our platform and expand nationwide.  Your money will go towards bringing FanWide to every city and state in the US, and then will expand into new sports, geographies, and languages.

Donate today if you are a sports fan that:

  • Wants FanWide in your area
  • Lives in a different city than your favorite team
  • You want to find a place that is guaranteed to feature your game – with sound
  • Has relocated for work
  • Is attending college in a different city
  • Is traveling on vacation or for business
  • Wants to explore a new city
  • Is looking to meet other sports fans to network socially, romantically or for business
  • Loves watching sports with other passionate fans

 

Donate today if you are a bar or restaurant that:

  • Wants FanWide in your area
  • Needs to find new customers
  • Hope to maximize your sales every day, throughout the year
  • Desires free marketing and advertising
  • Needs predictable attendance optimize staffing, service, food and drink availability, and the overall fan experience

 

We will continue to grow the network and add new features, making FanWide your source for sports watching.  Soon we will introduce "FanPoints" which are rewards showing how much of a sports fan you are.  Donate to FanWide to get points before everyone else so you are the top sports fan in your area. 

Visit www.FanWide.com to join as a sports fan or venue today!

For investments larger than $50,000, please contact us from www.FanWide.com/Contact

story:
SYS is a SOS application for every child, male, female or elderly person. This application consists of:

-A panic button
-Location service
-Geofencing
-Fall down detection
-Receive function
Short story
This application is usable for every smart device and allows you to send a distress signal to 7 relatives or friends with one push on the button. The application will send you current location, so help can be send your way. 
Internet
The application is the first application which allows you to send your location without the use of internet. 
Geofence
To secure your childeren we have intergrated a Geofence. With the Geofence you are able to define a safe zone for your child and you will be notify when he/she leaves this safe zone. 
Fall down detection
To secure your elderly person or the sporters we have at the fall down detection. If you or your father/mother get in an incident, you will send an automatic distress signal included your location to your relatives and friends. 

Why do we need your help?
We need your help to make this application usable for a larger crowd. This contains making a new application, where we can integrade all of these features. We need to upgrade and upscale our back office to make sure all of you can trust the functionality for 100%. 
What do you get? 
For as less as € 1 ($1,09) per month you have unlimited access for 3 years or 36 months, and you can program 7 contacts who will receive the distress signal. The normal price will be € 2,50 ($2,72) per month. 

How can you help? 
On the right side of the page you will see the perks. Here you can select your perk and pay via your paypall account.  

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT! LETS MAKE YOUR WORLD A SAFER PLACE!

Long story

We have seen a lot of different GPS products, which are great, but yet another device to carry around. What most of you don't know is that you already have the perfect GPS product right there with you! The smartphones we use every day, have already a built-in GPS, GPRS, WIFI and even LBS module. These devices allows us to locate our loved ones or share our location. SaveYourSelf or “SYS” as we like to call it, is able to use that data to send a distress signal, share your location, send an (automated) alert when you are involved in an incident or accident and makes it able to follow your children or elderly, when they leave their safe environment.


                                  Internet or not?

Because not everyone has a subscription for internet on their smartphone or nor internet access all the time. We have managed to build a program which allows you to send a distress signal, included your location to 7 relatives or friends, with one push on the button. This is possible with or without the use of internet. 

How does it work?

In the event of an emergency situation, the user presses the button which activates the SOS-alarm action on the SYS-app.

This action does multiple things:

At first the application checks if there's an internet connection to send the GPS and other relevant data to the SYS-servers. If this action fails or there isn't an internet connection, it uses a text message as a fallback method to send the same data to our servers.

Our server then processes the incoming data and sends a push message or text message to all the caretakers or family members and friends of the user.Our server then processes the incoming data and sends a push message or text message to all the caretakers or family members and friends of the user.

Then they can see all relevant information of the SOS-event in the SYS-app and may take action.Then they can see all relevant information of the SOS-event in the SYS-app and may take action.

Integrate in other services
We will also release a simple API, which third parties can integrate the functionality in their services.

But there is more! 

But we want to give you more! We want you, your child or the elderly to be protected in the best way we can.

To improve our application, we want to add geofencing and a fall down detection. The geofence detection allows SYS to send a notification to you when your child leaves the safe zone, as defined by you. 

We also want to add a fall down detection, which will be activated when you hit the ground, fall down the stairs or get in a different kind of accident, for example a car accident. Of course you are always able to activate an outgoing distress signal with the appropriate location when you push the emergency button. The application is both user friendly and easy to use.

                  What We Need & What You Get

Why do we need your help?
We need your help to make this application usable for a larger crowd. This contains making a new application, where we can integrade all of these features. We need to upgrade and upscale our back office to make sure all of you can trust the functionality for 100%. 

What do you get? 
For as less as € 1 per month you have unlimited access for 3 years or 36 months, and you can program 7 contacts, who will receive the distress signal. The normal price will be € 2,50 per month.


What have we done so far

With our company ‘SaveYourSelf’ we have made a senior phone (with GPS) with track and trace and support service to give the elderly a safe feeling and their relatives a peace of mind. 

We have tested a lot of GPS devices and thought: ‘’Why all the extra devices, if we have smartdevices with us already?’’. So we've built a simple but effective application for testing purposes and we have managed to send distress signals (with  GPS location) with and without the use of internet. To improve the application we want to create a better user experience,  upgrade the backup systems, and introduce extra options for those who want more.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our idea but you can't contribute to the perks, perhaps you can help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Use the Indiegogo share tools to make it even easier! 

Contact:

Do you have questions? Please contact us via info@saveyourself.nl.

Supported by:

story:
EdeN is a step forward in the evolution of Bitcoin towards a completely safe payment system that leverages the security of digital cryptocurrency and the versatility of a modern, aluminum alloy wallet that can also store your cash, and up to 5 credit cards.

Edens GPS tracking brings Peace of Mind in a World of Chaos. Ultimate security - No matter how unprotected your computer or internet connection might be, your coins will always stay safe with the EdeN All-in-one Crypto Wallet with GPS, as it never exposes your private keys.

EdeN is an isolated environment for offline transaction that utilized multiple levels of personalized security starting with a state of the art finger print scanner power button, and a FIPS 197 Military Grade Encrypted Flash Memory drive that stores your crypto, making all operations using EdeN entirely safe.

Easy to use - EdeN has a Windows, OS X, Linux, IOS, and Android friendly interface App that lets you keep track of all your holding. All you need to do is to connect your EdeN wallet to the computer, or cell phone and follow the instructions. Users can backup the whole EdeN contents on a small piece of paper and use this backup to regain access to all their coins in case of disaster, loss or theft.

For more information check us out at AD4M.COM

story:
Protect your privacy

ABOUT PRIVYCAM

 

Privycam is a webcam cover that allows you to protect your privacy in a discreet and yet stylish manner.

It just takes 5 seconds to install and there you go, you are safe.

Thinner than a credit card, you won't even notice it is here and it won't even change how your laptop closes!

PRIVYCAM FEATURES

 
100% secure Paper-thin Easy to install
Lightweight Cross-device compatible Elegant design

WHY COVER YOUR WEBCAM?

 

Because it costs less than 30 USD to hack a webcam

For a few bucks anyone can buy a hacking kit and gain control over your webcam

Because you can’t repair the damages once done

Once a hacker has captured images of you through your webcam, it is impossible to get them back and the risk of seeing those images on internet one day will then be everlasting

Peace of mind

Like a seatbelt, it is a safeguard ensuring that you are protected should anything happen

PRIVYCAM IN DETAILS

 

Size

Privycam is only 0.7mm which is thinner than a credit card! (0.76mm)
However, it is not too small to make it easy to install and use

Compatibility

Privycam has been tested on several devices e.g. Surface, Macbooks, tablets and phones - it fits seamlessly and does not change the way you use your devices

Because there are new devices every month, it is difficult for us to confirm 100% compatibility

Left or right slide?

It's entirely up to you and your device!
Could even be up or down if you got that bit of craziness in you!

Laptop closing?

Because it’s so thin, Privycam allows your laptop to seamlessly close just like it is not even there

BETTER BE SAFE THAN SORRY

 

Even The FBI, Europol and lots of white hat hackers recommend to do so

"I put a piece of tape - I have obviously a laptop, personal laptop — I put a piece of tape over the camera."
James Comey, Director of the FBI

"Cover your webcam when not in use"
Europol

"Mark Zuckerberg Covers His Laptop Camera. You Should Consider It, Too."
The New York Times

WHAT ARE THE DIFFERENCES WITH OTHER WEBCAM COVERS?

 
  • Privycam can be opened and closed - unlike a post-it
  • It's made of plastic material, hence super light and no magnets issues
  • Privycam is affordable
  • Privycam will not damage your webcam or device
  • Privycam is easy to install and use

SHARE WITH YOUR FRIENDS!

 

We already thank you for your attention and even more if you share our campaign with your network or fund our project.
Share Privycam with the people you care about and help them protect their privacy

Share Privycam
with your friends!		 Tweet about Privycam!







WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP?

 

We believe we can make a difference with Privycam, and we need your help to build some strong foundations for this adventure to become a long term success.
The main reason we need your help is of course to be able to go into production and hereafter are some of the areas we consider as priority for us and for the people that have faith in our project:

Logistics and Fulfillment

Part of the funding is to be invested early on in the logistics that will be necessary to make sure we can fulfill all your orders in a seamless and timely manner.
We have seen many crowdfunding campaigns where the logistics was not handled smoothly and backers were then left out waiting too long compared to the promises.

Therefore we identified known campaign challenges such as logistics and fulfillment and planned ahead accordingly to tackle them and show our backers how thankful we are for their support.

Future and Development

Another project of ours for Privycam is to create some customized editions with either laser engraving or printing of designs that we think you would love as another way to bring style to your privacy protection.

THE TEAM BEHIND PRIVYCAM

 

2 early 30’s frenchies that have different and yet complementary backgrounds and experience such as IT, security, technology, legal, business and more.
2 friends with a strong appetite for entrepreneurship and a common belief that making a difference through our actions matters.

The Privycam idea is born from several discussions (some more heated up than others) about this digital day and age, how secure it is and the risks. Through fact checking we became more and more aware that webcam hacking is actually a threat that is more real than we thought. Those discussions and shared values brought us together to start the Privycam adventure and we are excited about having the opportunity to bring Privycam to you.

PRESS KIT

 
Download our Press Kit

F.A.Q.

 
  • How do I contact Privycam team?
    Feel free to send us an email at hello@privycam.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible
  • Where does Privycam ship?
    Worldwide - We believe that privacy protection should be accessible to everybody regardless of the location and thus have not limited the shipping locations. For our Indiegogo campaign we have also decided to include to shipping in our perks, as another mean to thank you for your great support.
    The shipping is not included for the Business perk.
  • What kind of battery does Privycam uses?
    The best part of it, it is human powered and never runs out of juice (like a human too)!
  • When my Privycam will be shipped?
    Our plan is to start shipping during the month of October 2017. Should there be any change in the logistics and fulfilment plans, we will let you know as soon as possible for full transparency.
  • Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my Privycam?
    Because we ship globally and duties/taxes are different in each country, we cannot retain additional duties/VAT in a manner that is accurate and/or fair for each backer. Any applicable duties/VAT are therefore the responsibility of each backer. If any duties are applicable, these may be charged at the time of receiving the package. To check whether or not there are duties/VAT charged at the time of receiving your reward, please contact your local post office or customs department.

THANKS FOR BACKING US!
story_txt:
Protect your privacy



ABOUT PRIVYCAM
 

Privycam is a webcam cover that allows you to protect your privacy in a discreet and yet stylish manner.
It just takes 5 seconds to install and there you go, you are safe.
Thinner than a credit card, you won't even notice it is here and it won't even change how your laptop closes!




PRIVYCAM FEATURES
 







100% secure
Paper-thin
Easy to install







Lightweight
Cross-device compatible
Elegant design





WHY COVER YOUR WEBCAM?
 

Because it costs less than 30 USD to hack a webcam
For a few bucks anyone can buy a hacking kit and gain control over your webcam

Because you can’t repair the damages once done
Once a hacker has captured images of you through your webcam, it is impossible to get them back and the risk of seeing those images on internet one day will then be everlasting

Peace of mind
Like a seatbelt, it is a safeguard ensuring that you are protected should anything happen



PRIVYCAM IN DETAILS
 

Size

Compatibility

Because there are new devices every month, it is difficult for us to confirm 100% compatibility

It's entirely up to you and your device!Could even be up or down if you got that bit of craziness in you!

Because it’s so thin, Privycam allows your laptop to seamlessly close just like it is not even there

story:
THE BENTOSTACK POWERHUB 5000

 

THE BENTOSTACK POWERHUB 8000

 

THE USB 8 PORT TYPE-C VALET HUB

 

Brian Tong gets hands on with the BentoStack PowerHub.

 

The latest iPad and MacBook Pro Models are the most powerful to date. Equipped only with USB – C ports, multiple dongles are still needed to unleash their full functionality.

     

Type – C Hubs can help reduce dongles, but still create a mess on the workspace AND

 

are still yet another accessory that you need to store and carry with you on the go!

 

Add in tech accessories,  power banks and chargers, and you have a tech organizational nightmare.

 

UNTIL NOW ...

The world’s first all-in-one Type-C Hub, Accessory Organizer, Power Bank and Wireless Charger all layered together in an ultra-compact case that’s optimized for the workspace and ready to take on the go.

 

 

1. THE 8 PORT TYPE-C HUB

 

 

Connect your SD and Micro SD Cards, HDMI, 3.5mm Audio... 

 

USB A 3.0 and USB C 3.0 Drives

 

The top of the Hub provides magnetic storage for your Apple 2 Pencil... 

 

and can act a small desk valet.

 

 

Silicone Feet provides stability for desktop use.

 

Detachable 19cm C to C Data Cable 

Connects to iPad Pro or MacBook Pro - NOT form factor specific

 

 

 2. THE 3-WAY CHARGE COVER

(Included with the PowerHub 8000 model) 

 

Equipped with USB - C Power Delivery and USB - A Charging

 

And Certified Qi Wireless Charging - All powered by an 8000mAh battery. 

 

3. THE STORAGE COMPARTMENT 

 

 

Two adjustable dividers create dedicated storage space for tech accessories.

Keeps the workspace organized.


Hide-away design protects the ports from dust and debris during transport.​

 

 

TRAVEL READY

All compartments stack neatly together taking up minimal storage space and a silicone strap keeps everything secure during transport.

 
 
 

CUSTOMIZABLE AND FUTURE PROOF

BentoStack PowerHub belongs to BentoStack Ecosystem of Modular Components. This means any individual component fits all prior BentoStack versions AND future versions!

The BentoStack PowerHub 8000
 
The BentoStack PowerHub 5000

 

 

 

 

THE HUB

THE CHARGE COVER - 8000mAh version

THE CHARGE COVER - 5000mAh version

Battery type: Lithium-polymer rechargeable cell
Rated capacity: 5000mAh/18.5Wh
Input: DC 5V/2A (Type-C)
USB Output: DC 5V/2.4A max

Wireless Charging

Wireless Charging Standard: WPC Qi 1.2
Output: DC 5V/1A, DC 5V/2A, DC 9V/1.1A
Transmission Power: 5W, 10W max

 

 

THE DIMENSIONS

 

 

The tooling and engineering for the new Charge Cover has been completed and the initial  production run has begun. The Storage Compartment is the same as that used in the Original BentoStack, so that is ready as well. Our  focus is now on the final Hub testing and tooling!

 

 

Created by Apple Enthusiasts for Apple Enthusiasts, Function101 strives to create truly functional products with a minimalistic design that keep you organized and productive on the road and on your workspace.  

The Original BentoStack Apple Accessory Organizer was successfully launched on Indiegogo in October of 2017 raising a total of $164,000,  you can check it out here:  http://bit.ly/2OBT1jm

​Always looking to enhance the customer experience and upgrade functionality, we added a 5000 mAh Charge Cover with Qi Charging to the Original BentoStack in 2018.

Now 2 years after our first Campaign, we are back on Indiegogo with the BentoStack PowerHub to address the needs of the Pro Apple user with the goal of making your life a little more organized and a lot more productive!

 

Due to strict regulations regarding the transportation of batteries, we can only ship BentoStack PowerHubs to a limited number of countries.  

Australia, Canada, China, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong,  Hungary, Italy, Japan, Korea (Republic of), Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Singapore, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, United Kingdom, United States.

Please note that we cannot send portable chargers to remote islands, and the country lists may be modified later due to strict shipping regulations of lithium battery related products.

 Thank you.

story:
What is Wave On ?

Wave On is an App developed for Apple and Android. 

Wi Fi, Bluetooth, cell phone signal are surrounding us everyday,  almost everywhere... Using the micro wave sensor of every smart phone, tablet and computer,  Wave On estimates of the quantity of specific electromagnetic radiation you are exposed to, and for how long.

  • This App offers you a better awareness about a new kind of invisible contamination. 

  • Different settings allow combinations of visuals (Green, Orange, Red, pulses of colour) and/or audio parameters to show the different levels of micro waves in the environment. You choose how you want to know.
  • You can get daily, weekly, or monthly reports of your electromagnetic  exposure. 
  • Wave On  provides  a way of sharing the information collected in different places via the Wave On Map so you can point and share your favorite places or  areas to avoid...

    Our goal and philosophy

We created Wave On for a simple purpose: Make people aware of what's happening around them and give everybody a free choice of decision and action. It's not fair to be cooked like a popcorn in a microwave oven without knowing it...

     Production Timeline

A visual is sometime better than only words...

     why do we need your help?

Mainly to develop the software and work with our engineers / programers / designers. Since we are planing a double release, Apple and Android, we have to work on two fronts at the same time. The two platforms are quite different so two teams are involved in the process... 
Thank you.

  • About the inventor

         

Frank Darier Baziere is a professional film maker based in Canada. His passion..? spread messages of consciousness to the world through images and music.

Inventing, is also his second nature and for his first time launching an Indiegogo campaign, frank is very excited and confident about the Wave On App Project 


     Glen Hearns, PhD. 

 is an environmental consultant with experience in risk assessment. He is increasingly concerned about the exponential use of electromagnetic radiation in our society.

story:
Do you use FaceTime, Skype, Hangouts, or any other video/streaming to communicate? With Val you will look better, sound better, always have power, and your selfie arm will never get tired.

Having Val is like having a professional studio that fits in your hand.


Who agrees that you should own a Val?

  • Robert Scoble, American blogger, technical evangelist, and author
  • Jeff Needles, Business Insights Analyst at Meerkat
  • Lili Salzberg, Community Manager at Periscope
  • Daniel Terdiman, Technology Journalist for Fast Company 
  • Sarah Evans, CES 2016 Digital Correspondent for Cox Communications
  • Bill Burnett, Executive Director of the Stanford Design Program

And many more - see their thoughts below!


When do I need Val? Anytime I want my video to look and sound fantastic. 

                     Without Val                                              With Val



Val Comes with Everything You Need:


  • Spring loaded arm accommodates all android and iOS phones in both portrait and Landscape mode
  • Studio-quality LEDs on the front and back
  • Built-in Microphone
  • Speakers
  • 6,000 mAh battery


Val works with any smartphone and any orientation - landscape or portrait


It can even hold your iPad mini so you don't have to!



When Would I Use Val?


I want to look and sound better in my video

The rise in mobile video technology and unicorn apps mean everyone is their own producer. Make your videos look professional every time, no matter the conditions. 


I want to shoot longer without charging

Val's 6,000 mAh battery triples your battery life. Most phones last 1-2 hours, limiting the life you can capture on them. Val takes care of that.



I want to get away from holding the camera

Before selfies we had self-timers, and they're what gave us the classic family photos of the 80's. Your shoulder shouldn't be the focal point in the photo. Going hands free also allows us to feel closer and more connected to our remote colleagues or distant friends.


I want to professionalize my video conferencing

Val fits with your existing photography equipment, giving you stability and portability. Don't worry, at only a pound, you can still use her to take selfies.



Testimonials for Val


"I have a need for it, and I want one!". - Robert Scoble, American blogger, technical evangelist, and author. Check out his video about Val.




Check out what Sarah Evans, Digital Correspondent for Cox Communications had to say in her write up about Val at CES 2016.


“I've used countless products to hack together the "almost perfect" scenario for filming via smartphones and tablets, and NOTHING has been easier or more convenient to use.” - Sarah Evans.



Val is awesome. The perfect accessory for all of the Meerkat streamers." - Jeff Needles, Business Insights Analyst at Meerkat.




"I create mobile video everyday for a living, and I love that Val is this all-in-one solution." - John Whaley, Design Lead and Co-Founder of Vervid, on video discussing Val.


“In education, we use video all the time – to visually share best practices, and with instructional coaches and experts. Val will solve the regular challenges we face around sub quality lighting and audio. The extra battery power will allow us to be mobile in a way we are not now.  When it comes out, we want one for every class!”- Diane Tavenner, Founder and CEO of Summit Public Schools

"She is super rad!" - Lili Salzberg, Community Manager at Periscope.



We Need Your Help Because...

  • We have invested and completed all of the design and engineering - we are ready to go! We've taken Val this far, and we only need your support to push the button on manufacturing.
  • We want to prove great products can go to market through crowdfunding.
  • We believe Val will make your videos, and maybe even your life, better. 
  • We believe video is connecting the global community at large and we want to support that community. We're better together.


We Know We Can Do It Because...

We're working with the leading design firm, Speck Design, and they have been taking products to market for fortune 500's and startups alike for 20 years. Unlike many other crowdfunded products, we are experts in what it takes to take get a product in your hands on time. High quality manufacturing is expensive, and we need your support raising enough to deliver a great product, on time.


Manufacturing Timeline


FAQ's

  • How big is Val’s battery?
    • 6000 mAh  ~ 3X the charge of the iPhone 6
  • How bright are the LEDs on the front?
    • 3X LED @140 lumen
  • How bright are the LEDs on the back?
    • 2X LED @140 lumen
  • Why are there three lights on the front and two on the back?
    • The camera on the back of your phone is more powerful, and you have a flash for additionally lighting on the back if necessary. 
  • How heavy is Val?
    • About a pound
  • Do I have to use the stand?
    • No, although Val is more stable when you do.
  • What do the lights on the front indicate?
    • Battery life
  • What phones work with Val?
    • All phone up to the size of the iPhone 6S Plus
  • What are the jacks on the back of Val?
    • USB A for charging/powering your phone
    • Micro USB for charging VAL
    • 3.5mm headphone/microphone
  • How loud is Val’s speaker?
    • 2 Watts - Room-filling 
  • What materials is Val made out of?
    • Aluminum and ABS plastic.
