"I create mobile video everyday for a living, and I love that Val is this all-in-one solution." - John Whaley, Design Lead and Co-Founder of Vervid, on video discussing Val. 


 
“In
 education, we use video all the time – to visually share best 
practices, and with instructional coaches and experts. Val will solve 
the regular challenges we face around sub quality lighting and audio. 
The extra battery power will allow us to be mobile in a way we are not 
now.  When it comes out, we want one for every class!”- Diane Tavenner, Founder and CEO of Summit Public Schools

"She is super rad!" - Lili Salzberg, Community Manager at Periscope.We Need Your Help Because...

 We have invested and completed all of the design and engineering - we are ready to go! We've taken Val this far, and we only need your support to push the button on manufacturing. 
 We want to prove great products can go to market through crowdfunding.
We believe Val will make your videos, and maybe even your life, better. 

We believe video is connecting the global community at large and we want to support that community. We're better together. 
 

We Know We Can Do It Because...We're working with the leading design firm, Speck Design, and they have been taking products to market for fortune 500's and startups alike for 20 years. Unlike many other crowdfunded products, we are experts in what it takes to take get a product in your hands on time. High quality manufacturing is expensive, and we need your support raising enough to deliver a great product, on time. Manufacturing Timeline


   

 
FAQ's 


How big is Val’s battery?6000 mAh  ~ 3X the charge of the iPhone 6 

How bright are the LEDs on the front?
3X LED @140 lumen


How bright are the LEDs on the back?
 2X LED @140 lumen


Why are there three lights on the front and two on the back?The camera on the back of your phone is more powerful, and you have a flash for additionally lighting on the back if necessary. 

How heavy is Val?About a pound

Do I have to use the stand?No, although Val is more stable when you do.

What do the lights on the front indicate?Battery life

What phones work with Val?

All phone up to the size of the iPhone 6S Plus
What are the jacks on the back of Val?
USB A for charging/powering your phone
Micro USB for charging VAL
3.5mm headphone/microphone


How loud is Val’s speaker?2 Watts - Room-filling 

What materials is Val made out of?Aluminum and ABS plastic.

story:
SOLSOL, Solar hat keeps your smart devices charged up and helps reduce our carbon footprint



SOLSOL is our brand-new solution to an old painful problem: a stylish hat with solar cells that charges your dead smartphone or portable device while in the sun. That simple.

Our SOLSOL hats deliver charging power to your iPhone, iPod, Android phone and other USB charged devices such as GoPro camera’s and portable battery chargers. As long as the sun shines, you can charge or maintain the charge of your mobile tech devices. No batteries are included or needed (except the battery that is already in your device). Same goes for power cables: you’ll use your own devices’ cable, to make sure it’s the appropriate one!

The SOLSOL hat is eco-friendly too! It lets you make a small contribution toward reducing our carbon footprint.  Let natural sunlight and our LXTSOL proprietary electronic power regulator deliver clean power to your tech products.

Don’t get stuck without power again! Get a SOLSOL hat today and be a part of the Solar Power Revolution!

How it Works.


REFERRAL PROGRAM.



THE PROBLEM.

Tired of running for power outlets while enjoying a beautiful day at the park? Still driving around the block with your car waiting for your phone to charge up at a record-slow speed? Still sitting on airport floors hooked to a power outlet to text your goodbyes?

 

We’ve all been there. And we have never been big fans of power banks. They are cumbersome and bulky, too heavy for the lightweight backpacker.  In the end, charging all your personal devices adds to your carbon footprint.


THE SOLUTION.

We knew there had to be a better way to power our tech gear. Harvesting energy directly from the sun was the first part of the solution, the second part, putting that power and tech into the convenience and style of a hat.


This way, we keep our head covered from heavy sun rays AND have an extra power source to charge our portable devices!

SOLSOL hats are that simple. You plug your USB cable at the back of the hat, wear it, and walk in the sun!

The possibilities are endless. Wear SOLSOL at the beach and get some shade while you text your friends on your iPhone or read on your iPad.

Bring it to your next camping trip and recharge your GoPro while shooting alpine landscapes.

Wear it during your day while you walk at the park, or just leave it in the sunlight while you comfortably read your kindle in the shade.


THE SOLSOL COLLECTION.

Choose between different colors and patterns. Simply select your favorite perk and get ready to be one of the very first owners of a SOLSOL hat!

All of our hats are priced at $69 including taxes and shipping ($20 shipping and handling for orders outside the US). In return for your contribution, you will be the first to receive SOLSOL at a discounted price before they are offered online or at retail.  We will NOT ship any hats to any retail outlet until each pre-order hat has been shipped to each of you.  Each SOLSOL unit will include a special embroidery on the back of "SOLSOL Revolution" showing that you helped us launch the SOLSOL Revolution.  This special embroidery is only for your pre-ordered hats and will NOT be featured on any other production hats.


PERK OFFERS.


SPECIFICATIONS.

SOLSOL powers your device when in direct sunlight. Charging time when the hat is left in constant sunlight exposure vary accordingly to the device. This is because battery size differs across devices, along with how the user is using their device and how many apps are open at the same time.

Charging time using a SOLSOL hat.

●  4 X the amount of time it takes your device to charge from a wall outlet.

●  2 X the amout of time it takes your device to charge from a laptop.

Please, remember that when charging your device (smartphones especially) you have to avoid rapid intermittent sun exposure as this may actually reduce your battery charge. This happens because the screen can go on and off and suck up all the battery.

Here below are the technical specifications of SOLSOL:

●  Maximum Power at STC (Pmax) - 1.45 W

●  Optimum Operating Voltage (Vmp) - 5.2V

●  Optimum Operating Current (Imp) - 125mA - 350mA

●  Compatibility: For iPod and iPhone 5, 6, and 6S Android Smart Phones (MicroUSB Connector Models) Supports 5V input Charging with MicroUSB Connector devices

●  Material: 100% Cotton, monocrystalline solar cells, proprietary electronic power regulator - LXTSOL and wired components.

OUR PROMISE.

We promise that each pre-order will be shipped before anyone else gets shipped.  The SOLSOL hats really work and look so cool.  (just as long as the sun shines).  We promise to do everything we can to get our hats onto the heads of as many people as possible, around the World, to make a small dent in our energy crisis.

Our founder's believe that SOLSOL is not just a "Brand" name, but a "statement" for everyone who believes in clean energy, in healing our planet (reducing CO2 emissions) and making a difference "One SOLSOL At A Time".  Each individual that participates will truly help fight the good fight. Each step counts and adds up. 

We have already done the "initial leg work" spending over a year in product development working with our technology partners and suppliers (manufacturers) to deliver the SOLSOL hats.  This is not just an "idea", or "concept", or "prototype" but a "real" patented product and solution.

There are over a billion people in the world today that do not have electricity or power. The main reason is because of infrastructure and high cost. SOLSOL is the first step that will allow an individual to charge their tech device without having to have electric power or a separate battery charger. SOLSOL is not just a great product and solution! It's a Statement! The Impact is quite simple, together we all join and help heal our world, "One SOLSOL At A Time"!

THE SOLSOL TEAM.

We are Paul and Edward, founders of UniqueCreativeIdeas,LLC. We are the inventors and creators of SOLSOL hats. The name of our new product contains within it our mission, we provide SOLar SOLutions.  The Sun delivers enough solar power energy in one hour to power the entire Earth for one year, we need increased access to this energy, we need to go SOLAR!

Together, we have decades of experience in software, technology and solution products for companies ranging from top Fortune 500 companies to entrepreneurial start-ups. They have created and successfully delivered well known brands such as Hot Wheels, He-Man & The Masters of the Universe and The Original Grip Ball. They have successfully launched numerous products and are successful entrepreneurs with an excellent and successful track record in delivering consumer products to the market.

Paul Cleveland was a project engineer and later went to business school and became Sr. V.P. of Marketing. He spent a few years at LucasFilm, Sega of America and even owned his own company for a while.

Edward has been a pioneer his all life, creating products and solutions that are innovative and new technologies that ultimately delivers convenience and good works to our world.

SOLar SOLutions for people with a need and who care!

Risks & Challenges.

We at Unique Creative Ideas have experience in the manufacturing process, we know the steps to follow, the controls that we need in place, the type of suppliers needed to produce our hats and to make sure that we are sustainable for mass production.

This is not just an idea or concept: it is a product, ready for large scale manufacturing. The product has been tested and is ready to be shared with the world. We have secured not just one supplier but multiple manufacturers in case there is ever an issue with our first supplier in terms of both components being manufactured along with assembly and logistics.

Since we are running a flexible funding campaign, in case we don't meet our goal, we will still collect the funds and move forward with our production plan to deliver perks to our backers first.

Other Ways You Can Help.

If you are not able to make a financial contribution by pre-ordering a SOLSOL hat or Certificate perks, don't worry!!  You can still be a key part of the SOLSOL REVOLUTION and help spread the message and statement to your friends and family by using the Indiegogo share tools!  Tell everyone you know about this pre-order offer so they can also be one of the first.


Frequently Asked Questions.

Q:  How soon can I expect to receive my SOLSOL once I contribute my donation?

A:  Our Indiegogo campaign is for 30 days.  We will begin shipping 30 - 45 days after the close of the campaign 2016.  Please make sure to read the PERKS package carefully to decide which cap color you want to receive.  First shipments will be no later than April, 2016, just in time for Spring.

Q: How Long Does It Take the Sun To Charge SOLSOL?

A:  There is no waiting time for SOLSOL to begin to charge. First, it is not a battery. It charges the battery already in your personal device (phone). Once the sun hits it, charging kicks in. If you move in and out of the sun, charging will be intermittent.

Q:  What Type of Battery Does SOLSOL Use?  

A:  SOLSOL doesn't have a battery!  That's why it's so Cool!  SOLSOL's proprietary LXTSOL Chip along with SOLSOL's patented solar panel allows SOLSOL to charge many of your other tech devices! 

Q:  Does SOLSOL Work Without The Sun?

A:  No, SOLSOL harnesses solar energy through the use of high efficiency solar cells, so, it works only when there is sun light.  Rapid movement in and out of the sun will cause intermittent charging and could actually reduce your existing batter charge.  Solar energy is clean and renewable.

Q:  Does SOLSOL charge a battery charger ("power bank")?

A:  Yes, SOLSOL can charge Power Bank devices (spare battery devices), so that you can use your spare battery device to charge your other tech devices during the day or night.


Q:  How long will it take to charge my phone?

A:  This depends on your phone or device.  SOLSOL has a power output between 125mA - 350mA.  A regular wall outlet has an output of 1000 mA and a standard laptop has an output of 500mA.  If it takes an hour to charge your device using a wall outlet, it would take 2 hours using a laptop and 2.7 - 4.0 hours with SOLSOL.  All these times are assuming you have a battery with 0% charge remaining.  If you have, for instance, 50% charge remaining, the time to a full charge is much less.  If you have partial battery and are using your device, you can avoid further battery loss by using your SOLSOL hat.  Remember, you need to be in the sun for SOLSOL to function properly.

Q:  Does SOLSOL have to be worn to charge my iPhone or android phone?

A:  No, you can place SOLSOL on any flat surface where there is sun light or even snap it behind your backpack or even on your car's dashboard.  Note:  heavy window tinting may prevent your SOLSOL hat from charging while in your car.

Q:  Does SOLSOL have warranty?

A:  Yes, SOLSOL has a 1-year manufacturer's parts warranty on our proprietary solar panel and proprietary LXTSOL USB Outport component.  Warranty does not cover damages due to wear and tear of the cap or if you damage the solar panel.  The solar panel is NOT intended to be bent or curved.  Attempting to bend it will cause damage and void the warranty.

Q:  Is SOLSOL Waterproof?

A:  SOLSOL is water resistant.  As long as SOLSOL is not submerged in water or any type of liquid it will not get damaged.  It is, actually, just as water resistant as your phone (unless you have a totally submersible phone).  And, if you are caught in the rain, you might not be using your SOLSOL since it requires sunlight.  Please, try not to test its resistance to water.  Please take proper care of this great product.

Q:  Do I need to clean the surface area of the SOLSOL Panel?

A:  It's always recommended that prior to using SOLSOL that you wipe the surface area of the panel with a soft dry or damp cloth in case there is some dirt, finger prints, dust or other material on the panel surface.

Q:  Does the SOLSOL hat come with a charging cord?

A:  You will provide your own cord so you can be assured that it is the right one for your personal device.  Just plug your cord into the USB port in the side pocket of your hat, plug into your device, get into the sun, and you're in business.

Q:  Does the SOLSOL hat get hot or emit electromagnetic waves?

A.  The solar panel will get warm due to its being in the direct sun, just as the hat itself will warm up.  However, it will not become uncomfortable or hurt you.  No magnetic waves or magnetic field is generated.  This would happen when converting Direct Current (DC) to Alternating Current (AC) which does not happen with our hat.  The hat circuitry is strictly very low voltage and DC only.

story:
Chad & Kari are 'cksocialmedia' and we live and breath emoticons... WE LOVE THEM!!


 After years of research and development we have created the most extensive range of  emoticons for you to use wherever you want. All of our money has been spent on building a prototype, lawyers, solicitors, trademark attorneys, research and development and the list goes on. 

Help us out by pre-purchasing the new emotikidz® app... you'll love all 1,500+ emotikidz® stickers!


 

We only need USD$10,000 to finish the app and get it to market.... It's so close already. 

  • All money raised will be used for purchasing plugins, licensing, graphics and finalising the build of the app.
  • Pre-purchase the App from only $2 and you will get 1,500+ emotikidz® stickers to use direct from your keyboard everywhere from your mobile phone!

We have designed THE MOST EXTENSIVE emoticon range that can be used globally with equality... simply choose Male or Female at the push of a button.

We can even 'immortalise u' and design emotikidz® for you!



You get 1,500+ emotikidz® stickers to use directly from your keyboard on....

  • Messenger
  • MMS
  • MYO movies with 'EM3' (emotikidz® mini movie maker)
  • All Images
  • Lock Screens
  • Wallpaper
  • Contacts
  • ...and the list goes on.


Our pre-purchase packages have been created especially for Indiegogo. So get in quick before they are all snapped up!!


Share your emotikidz® purchase on FaceBook and we will give you these 20 exclusive emotikidz® (only available during this pre-purchase campaign) just to say... A MASSIVE BIG THANK YOU!




Help us get the word out on social media, #tag us anywhere @emotikidz:
  • Make some noise about our emotikidz® campaign.
  • And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

When will the app be released?
The emotkidz® app is scheduled to be released December 2016.

Will the app be available for iPhone & Android?
Yes there will be both iPhone and Android apps available.

How do you 'immortalize me'?
We contact you after the purchase and then you send us a photo of ur signature look you want to ‘immortalize', we design ur exclusive look and then we include it in the full range of emotkidz® .... so anyone, anywhere can use u as an emoticon!

Will my 'immortalize me' come as both Male & Female emotkidz®?
Yes they will. Consider yourself now the proud parent of twins...the Yin & Yang of u! You even get a copy of their birth certificate. Xx

Can I buy 'immortalize me' for someone else?
Of course you can. We will immortalize anyone!

Can I buy more than 1 'immortalize me'?
Yes you can buy as many as you like.

Can you help me with ideas to 'immortalize me'?
We have 6 categories you can choose to be immortalized in, Naughty, Nice, Food, Fitness, Traveling or Babies...and if that doesn't get the creative juices going for you we will help you one on one to get that perfect look you want to 'immortalize'

Can I get any of these amazing deals once the app is released?
No, this can only be pre-purchased on Indiegogo now for both the '$2 for 1500 AMAZING emotkidz® stickers' and 'immortalize me' deals.

Will the app be full of ads that drive me insane?
No. Never. Our promise to you is NO ADVERTISING EVER!

After years of research and development we have created the most extensive range of  emoticons for you to use wherever you want. All of our money has been spent on building a prototype, lawyers, solicitors, trademark attorneys, research and development and the list goes on. 
Help us out by pre-purchasing the new emotikidz® app... you'll love all 1,500+ emotikidz® stickers!


  






 
We only need USD$10,000 to finish the app and get it to market.... It's so close already. 
  All money raised will be used for purchasing plugins, licensing, graphics and finalising the build of the app. Pre-purchase the App from only $2 and you will get 1,500+ emotikidz® stickers to use direct from your keyboard everywhere from your mobile phone!    
We have designed THE MOST EXTENSIVE emoticon range that can be used globally with equality... simply choose Male or Female at the push of a button.
  

We can even 'immortalise u' and design emotikidz® for you!

    









You get 1,500+ emotikidz® stickers to use directly from your keyboard on....



Messenger

MMS
MYO movies with 'EM3' (emotikidz® mini movie maker)
All Images
Lock Screens
Wallpaper
Contacts
...and the list goes on.
























Our pre-purchase packages have been created especially for Indiegogo. So get in quick before they are all snapped up!!

Share
 your emotikidz® purchase on FaceBook and we will give you these 20 
exclusive emotikidz® (only available during this pre-purchase campaign) 
just to say... A MASSIVE BIG THANK YOU! 




















   




Help us get the word out on social media, #tag us anywhere @emotikidz:
 Make some noise about our emotikidz® campaign. And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.When will the app be released?The emotkidz® app is scheduled to be released December 2016.Will the app be available for iPhone & Android?Yes there will be both iPhone and Android apps available. How do you 'immortalize me'?We contact you after the purchase and then you send us a photo of ur signature look you want to ‘immortalize', we design ur exclusive look and then we include it in the full range of emotkidz® .... so anyone, anywhere can use u as an emoticon!Will my 'immortalize me' come as both Male & Female emotkidz®?Yes they will. Consider yourself now the proud parent of twins...the Yin & Yang of u! You even get a copy of their birth certificate. XxCan I buy 'immortalize me' for someone else?Of course you can. We will immortalize anyone!Can I buy more than 1 'immortalize me'?Yes you can buy as many as you like. Can you help me with ideas to 'immortalize me'?We have 6 categories you can choose to be immortalized in, Naughty, Nice, Food, Fitness, Traveling or Babies...and if that doesn't get the creative juices going for you we will help you one on one to get that perfect look you want to 'immortalize'Can I get any of these amazing deals once the app is released?No, this can only be pre-purchased on Indiegogo now for both the '$2 for 1500 AMAZING emotkidz® stickers' and 'immortalize me' deals.Will the app be full of ads that drive me insane?No. Never. Our promise to you is NO ADVERTISING EVER!

story:
UPDATE: 

Hello VX1 supporters,
A few backers have asked if we will be shipping VX1 even if our funding goal hasn’t been met? 


Our Answer: 

YES WE WILL BE MAKING & SHIPPING VX1’s as planned for all those the that have backed the project!  

The VueXL team is 100% committed to delivering. We know that getting VX1 in your hands is the best way for us as small company to get the word out. 

Sincere thank you! -Brandon & Dean


The early bird specials will not be available after the campaign ends so get them now!


Games and Videos are Enjoyed Best on a BIG Screen....


Your smartphone is now the most convenient way to play games and watch videos,but its small screen limits the viewing experience.  The VX1 uses the power of magnification to create a more immersive viewing experience.

VUEXL IN THE NEWS

"Editor and Chief has one and he absolutely loves it."

  Crowdfund This! "Blowing it up to 60 inches"

  "We're Fans!"

"Pretty Cool Device"



Entertainment without Limitations

Our goal was to build a device that could pair with the most popular smart phones and be able to create an immersive experience with your favorite mobile games and popular streaming videos services. 

VX1 Plays Nicely With Everyone =)

The VX1 and VX1+ fits most smartphones including those from popular brands such as Nokia, Samsung, Apple, Motorola, HTC and so many more. There are two sizes available VX1 for standard size smartphones and VX1+ for larger models like Note 4 & iPhone 6 plus. 

CONTENT CONTENT CONTENT! - More than 1 million games and counting:

While other wearable headsets focused on VR we set our sights to immerse the user with the games they already own and love. No special apps needed, works with with any Game or Video app that can be displayed in landscape orientation. 

VX1 Features:




Clear graphics and precision control gives you the unfair gaming advantage. 

The viewing experience is created with a special dual lens optics system with 4 different magnifications options to choose from that ensures you get a clear distortion free image.

We include 4 different magnifications to accommodate differences in each persons visual acuity.

Lens can be stored flat for making it easy to fold up and take the VX1 with you.

The Ultimate Portable Gaming Experience

For those that want the ultimate portable gaming experience. We’ve also incorporated 2 hands free options and the ability to connect accessories like headsets and wireless gamepads.

VX1’s enhanced visual clarity, precision control and connectivity allowing you to enjoy gaming with others. 


The adjustable straps that holds your phone also gives you a more secure and ergonomic grip. The bottom opening gives you full access to your touch screen.

Comfort and Privacy for Video Watching


The VX1 is made with a comfortable soft foam housing that allows it to be custom fit to you.  Also we made sure the VX1 is friendly to eye glasses wearers. 

The optional privacy panels blocks out ambient light and prying eyes so you can comfortably escape in your own personal theater.



Early Backers Get the BEST PRICE & Quick Delivery

 

Backers Perks & Add Ons:



DESIGNED & ASSEMBLED IN THE USA

It was very important to us to build relationships with US based suppliers and mfg. to make sure the VX1 was made with quality components and fair labor practices. Importing certain components was only consider if no suitable US supplier was found.

Sourcing as much as possible close to home also means we begin shipping your perks sooner and reduces our products carbon foot print compared to importing from overseas.


VueXL Team

     Brandon CruzInventor & Co-Founder


Brandon is the Inventor and Co-Founder of VueXL. He is in charge of product design and development. Prior to creating VueXL, Brandon Co-Founded ID3 Studios, an industrial design consultancy in 2001. At ID3 Studios, Brandon designs and develops products for a wide range of clients from medical products to high tech consumer electronic, from large fortune 500 companies to small start ups.    

   Dean Mondragón  Co-Founder

Dean is Co-Founder of VueXL. He is in charge of development from concept to production. Dean helps man ID3 Studios along with Brandon. At ID3 Studios, Dean deals with day to day business operations that include business development and client relations. He has worked with clients such as Mattel, Wild Planet, IO Gear, Gear Maxtor and XIM Technology.


The Evolution:

For the past year the VueXL team set out to developed a solution to make mobile entertainment more immersive.

We have spent the last year developing the VX1 and we have gone through countless hours of design, prototyping and testing.


How the funds will be spent:

55%To purchase foam, plastic parts and hardware needed

20% Labor cost to assemble and package the Perks

25% on Postage and Shipping Supplies

Risks and Challenges:

We have taken much effort to minimize risks to our backer by investing more of our time and own funds in getting VX1 ready for you.

1. Tooling, the most expensive part of most hardware projects has already completed and we have a small stock of parts already in hand to jump start production. Our molder is based in the US so more parts can be delivered in matter of weeks instead of months. The dies need to cut the foam housings have already been purchased and are ready for production.

2. Redundancy of hardware suppliers, we have found primary and back up suppliers for just about every component. In most cases we have local supplier within hour drive from our production line and another one ready to step in just in case of shortages.

3. We have had beta testing program in place since December 2014 and in that time we have made refinements to our materials and production processes to ensure you get a product that is already well developed.

Despite those precautions we cannot fully anticipate every possible challenge we may face but we promise if an issue is to occurs, backers will be the first know and we will make every effort to over come the challenge in the fastest way possible.

Project Timeline:

VX1 PUBLIC DEMOS
We've  had the pleasure of meeting some incredible people along the way.  All of which helped bring the VX1 to life. 

Join us in bring the VX1 Project to Life

1. Make a pledge and be the first to get a VX1 way below the retail price.

2. Sharing our campaign link on your social media>  http://igg.me/at/vuexl

Thank you and We hope you enjoy the Vue!

story:
Did You Miss National Ice Cream Day?

You hear them every day on the news ... Today is National (fill in the blank) Day.  If you only knew that information BEFORE, you could have made plans to observe the day.

This is why we researched and developed NationalDayCalendar.com.  Now you have this information available to you every day.


A Quick Summary of the National Day Calendar App Features:

  • Daily reminder of what National Days are being celebrated or observed today.
  • Tomorrow's National Day on the main screen.
  • Money Saving Coupons or National Day Specials to celebrate the day.
  • Calendar at a Glance to help you plan ahead.
  • Social Media Share feature including a selfie photo option.
  • Contests and much more.

Our Offer


The National Day Calendar App. 

We receive many requests each week to develop an app.  That's why we decided to put it on Indiegogo and give everyone who is interested the opportunity to be the first to have it when it becomes available on September 1.  We are also offering some amazing perks exclusively on Indiegogo.

The app will give you either a daily text or audio reminder about what day it is.  You can also just open the app to see what today is or what tomorrow brings.
 A great feature of the app is it will  let you know when and where we know of specials like free coffee on National Coffee Day.  This feature will help you enjoy our National Days even more, as well as save you money.
Some of the coupons and National Day Specials that will be offered in the coming year include:
  • Free Coffee
  • Free Pancakes
  • Free Comic Books
  • Free Bagels
  • Free Donuts
  • Free Admission to National Parks
  • Free Curly Fries
  • Free Ice Cream Cones
  • Free Shipping
  • Free Root Beer Floats
  • Free Cinnabons
  • Free Flower Seeds
  • Free Movie Rentals
  • Free Ices Tea
  • Free Admission to Museums
  • Free Slurpee's, Yogurt, Fish Fillets, Cookies, Popcorn and much more.
In addition to free items, you will receive other money saving offers.  Subscribers to our app will receive first option and special discounts on other National Day Calendar products as they become available. 
You will be able to share this information on social media.  Planning for the future is easy as well, with access to the Calendar-At-A-Glance so you can look ahead to plan upcoming celebrations.  


The Selfie feature will allow you take a photo in the app, share it on social media showing what day you are celebrating.


During our App Campaign, you can also pre-order the 2016 Printed Wall Calendars

The calendar will be a 12" x 12" (12" x 24" when opened) 24 page calendar with artwork on top and calendar on bottom.  The artwork on top will be a photo  appropriate for the time of year.   These beautiful saddle stitched calendars will be printed on 100 lb. gloss paper.

Calendars are a great gift item and will be shipped the first week in December.

Another Perk is our unique T-Shirt

Our write on wipe off T-Shirt is perfect to celebrate all those great National Days.  Simply use a washable marker and you can reuse this shirt over and over again.


One additional perk is the opportunity to pre-order the National Day Cookbook.

120 glossy pages.

Spiral bound so it lays flat when you use it.

Over 250 tried and true recipes including main dishes, breakfast items, breads, soups, sides and desserts .

Recipe difficulty levels from beginner to advanced.

Kids in the kitchen recipes.


Our History

Hi. We are National Day Calendar. We are a couple of individuals who had an idea to research all the unique National Days and post our findings on one website.  We are continuing our research into National Weeks, National Months and International Days.   We are humbled by the fact that so many people follow us including many in the media.  The site, www.NationalDayCalendar.com has been a hobby but due too the explosive growth, we have to find ways to cover costs.  The app idea comes from thousands of requests to develop one.  Our goal is to provide a great tool for you as well as fund the website..

Your contribution will help improve our website as well as add additional features.  

Help us spread the word about this campaign.  Tell your friends, family, neighbors and business associates about us.  Share us on Facebook, Twitter and any other social media.  Use the Indiegogo share tools to help us get the word out.

Thank you from all of us at National Day Calendar.

story:
Memory + Charging Kit for iPhone Features

•    4 in 1 Modular design: Connect modules to all iPhone & Car Mount System
•    +3 mm Slim Design: One-piece build that complements your phone's clean lines
•    Easy to Share: Share Micro SD card data to your iPad.
•    High Speed Charging: Dual Mode (qi+PMA) Wireless Charging Technology
•    Magnetic Battery Pack: Connect backup batteries 3200mA by Smart Connector I/O for iPhone 6 & 7 series

 

Car Mount Charging Kit for iPhone

 

Color Scheme

 

Memory Card Slot for iPhone

 

Magnetic Battery Pack for iPhone 

 

Duo-tone Design

 

Share Memory Card data to iPad

 

Apple Certified Lightning Connector 

 

Dual Mode Wireless Charging Performance

 

MFi Certified Products

https://mfi.apple.com/MFiWeb/getAPS

 

Product Matrix

 

Specifications

WIR-074 WSD for iPhone 7

•Micro SD 30MB/sec Read ; 18MB/sec Write

•Output : Lightning 5V 1.4A (Max)

•Wireless Charging: Qi/PMA Compatible

•Dimensions : 5.82 x 2.75 x 0.39 (in.) 148 x 70 x 10 (mm)

WIR-075 WSD for iPhone 7 Plus

•Dimensions : 6.61 x 3.18 x 0.39 (in.) 168 x 81 x 10.1 (mm)

•Weight : 0.08 lb (35 g)

Accessories: WCH-3200 / WPB-3200 / WTU-050

 

Magnetic Battery Car Mount for iPhone 7 & 7 Plus

Features

*Cable Free Charging Technology™

*Special Edition for Uber & Google Map System

*5V/1.5A high speed charging (1Mins Charge 1%)

*Apple MFi Certified

Specifications

Model:  WCH-074 for iPhone 7

               WCH-075 for iPhone 7 Plus

Input: Micro USB 5V 0.5-3.0A

Output : 5V 1.5A (Max)

Li-Ion Battery 3.85V 3320mA

Dims: 125 x 60 x 8(mm) Weight: 93.5g

Operating Temperature Range (C): -40 to 85

Global 2 Years Warranties / Made in Taiwan

 

Product Journey

 

Who's talking about Fusion new products NOW?

 

 

Risks & Challenges

There are so many Fake Apple accessories on the market. It causes so many damage or fire. We just want to offer a certified & alternative solution for iPhone users. We should do something to against this unfair & cheating behavior by actions.

We are a team of qualified & passionate Electrical & Software engineers. Though Fusion memory + charging kit for iPhone  is a first of its kind product with several new functionalities, most of the technology we use is well known and used in other products. There are many products out there that have any one of our three functionalities. Our challenge lies in integrating these three functionalities in one case & most importantly, to pass Apple MFi (Made for iPhone) certificate. After all, what is the use of a case that has a ton of functionality but is bulky & uncomfortable to use? So we have trimmed down the battery size to 3200 mAh in order to accommodate the circuit board of the memory slot. We have done the initial product testing & are confident of delivering the output as promised. Rest assured, we have done our homework. We will make sure our product reaches your expectations.

How to Identify Apple certified products, you could find "Made for iPhone" symbol on the box or check below website link:

https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204566

 

Estimated Delivery

All products are expected to ship according to the shipment month mentioned in respective reward. We do not expect any of these to change. We have tied up with the finest manufacturers worldwide who will be able to ship within 60 days of successful project funding. Their supply capability is over 1000 cases per month. However the dates may shift under uncontrolled circumstances like huge & unprecedented demand. But that will only improve the product quality & standards. Rest assured, we will have you updated much prior if there are any changes in plans.

​

Why we need your help

We have fully functional samples of the Memory+Charging Kit for iPhone now that will soon be ready for production. Though we have big ambitions, we are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs.  Placing an order of multiple thousands of units is beyond our grasp.  

This is where you come in.  You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the hands of our customers. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with enhance your iPhone to be a real amazing features within extra 3.0 mm slim case, the best craftsmanship & quality iPhone accessories in the world. Thanks to support Fusion INDIEGOGO project.

Our challenge lies in integrating these three functionalities in one case & most importantly, to pass Apple MFi (Made for iPhone) certificate. After all, what is the use of a case that has a ton of functionality but is bulky & uncomfortable to use? So we have trimmed down the battery size to 3200 mAh in order to accommodate the circuit board of the memory slot. We have done the initial product testing & are confident of delivering the output as promised. Rest assured, we have done our homework. We will make sure our product reaches your expectations.How to Identify Apple certified products, you could find "Made for iPhone" symbol on the box or check below website link:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204566 Estimated DeliveryAll products are expected to ship according to the shipment month mentioned in respective reward. We do not expect any of these to change. We have tied up with the finest manufacturers worldwide who will be able to ship within 60 days of successful project funding. Their supply capability is over 1000 cases per month. However the dates may shift under uncontrolled circumstances like huge & unprecedented demand. But that will only improve the product quality & standards. Rest assured, we will have you updated much prior if there are any changes in plans.​
Why we need your helpWe have fully functional samples of the Memory+Charging Kit for iPhone now that will soon be ready for production. Though we have big ambitions, we are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs.  Placing an order of multiple thousands of units is beyond our grasp.  This is where you come in.  You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the hands of our customers. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with enhance your iPhone to be a real amazing features within extra 3.0 mm slim case, the best craftsmanship & quality iPhone accessories in the world. Thanks to support Fusion INDIEGOGO project.

story:
Meet The FireFly

The FireFly is the world's most innovative powerbank, combining a high capacity powerbank, bright LED lamp, and a high quality Bluetooth speaker...All In One! 

The FireFly gives you the power to charge up devices, have light and great sounding wireless music anywhere you go! The perfect combination for outdoor events, camping or even power outages!

The FireFly is even waterproof up to a level IP65...meaning that it can be used outside in the rain or similar wet conditions (although it can not be completely submersed underwater.)


As Seen In





Extreme Charging

    The PowerBank contains an 8800mAh rechargeable battery and has the
    power to charge FOUR smartphones from 0-100%.

    It also features a fast charging 2.1A USB port, which provides 2x faster
    charging than a standard USB port.

    The PowerBank can also provide up to 170 hours of lighting from the built in LED Lamp!

    Bright LED Lamp

    The LED lamp produces 450 lumens, which equals the brightness of a 40 watt incandescent light bulb.

    The LED lamp creates light that shines up to 20 meters away!


    High Quality Bluetooth Speaker

    The Bluetooth speaker has less than .05% distortion, giving you excellent sound quality. This gives you the ability to really enjoy your favorite music or podcasts from any Bluetooth capable device, such a cellphone, mp3 player, tablet, laptop, etc.

    The Bluetooth speaker also allows you to to have hands free calling from your cellphone.


    Easily Recharges


     Quick and easy recharging is another fantastic feature of the FireFly. The Powerbank can be easily recharged from a solar panel, ac outlet, car USB, laptop or similar device.  A 10 watt solar panel will charge the powerbank from 0-100% in only 4.5 hours! (*Solar panel not included.)

     

    The Perks

    We have several perks for backers available...one of which is the FireBug flexible LED light!

    The FireBug flexible LED light goes perfectly with the FireFly. It can be used in addition to the FireFly for MORE light or...It can be used by itself when you need concentrated light for activities such as reading, etc.

    Comes with a 10 foot USB cord to reach where you need it to go.










    The FireFly Team

    We are a small company located in the beautiful State of Utah and we are proud to bring the Firefly to life!!

    Our founder, Tammy Bates is an entrepreneur who successfully created a startup company in the field of solar energy. She has several years experience in product development and manufacturing.

    Tammy's constant companion, Buddy the Airedale, is said to be the actual "brains" behind all of her successful endeavors...

    Our marketing & IT analyst, Carrie Lundberg has several year experience in her related field and is valuable part of our team!


    Where Are We In The Process

    We have been working diligently on product development to create the highest quality system possible. We are now ready to start bringing the FireFly to market.

    The money raised through our Indiegogo campaign will be used to get the manufacturing process up and going so we can get the FireFly in your hands!

    The company has a project shipping date of November 2016 for all Perks.

    Risks & Challenges

    We're confident about the timeline that we have established and believe that we will stay on track. However, in the event that we run into an unexpected delay we will inform you immediately.

story:
What is RABBITcharger?
We believe that phone and tablet chargers should be as inspired as the devices that they charge and that charging should be easy and reliable. That is why we created RABBITcharger.

We have grown accustomed to losing messy charging cables and have come to expect that we will lose our chargers to friends, siblings, children, colleagues, etc.

RABBITcharger is the first charger that secures to any standard duplex outlet, has a retractable charging cable that gets rid of clutter, and has swappable charging tips for Android and iOS devices. Better still, it can simultaneously charge two devices with one cable while delivering up to 2.4 amps to each charging tip. That's plenty of power for even the biggest phones and tablets!

Patent-pending RABBITcharger eliminates forever the question of who took your charger or where you left it last. Since RABBITcharger is an all-in-one charging station that secures to any standard duplex outlet, there is no more carrying around charging cables or adapters or wondering where you left them. Once you install your RABBITcharger, you will have everything you need, when you need it. And there is no clutter with RABBITcharger's retractable cable!


RABBITcharger Overview: 

  • Installs in seconds to any standard duplex outlet
  • Retractable 28" charging cable
  • Dual micro-USB charging tips and (2) swappable iOS-compatible charging tips capable of delivering up to 2.4 amps to each charging tip.
  • LED perimeter light indicates when RABBITcharger is charging a device.

Not only did we want RABBITcharger to be convenient and easy to use, but it also had to be safe, quick, and simple to install. There is no electrical expertise required to install RABBITcharger.  It only takes 15 seconds to install!


First, remove the cover plate screw from your standard duplex outlet while leaving the cover plate in place. Then, plug in RABBITcharger, install its screw, and snap on the RABBITcharger cover plate. Now, you're ready to start charging your devices!

Whether you have a horizontal or vertical outlet, whether the ground is up or down on your outlet, RABBITcharger installs into any standard duplex outlet no matter its orientation. 

RABBITcharger is compatible with any standard duplex outlet. While we will be expanding the range of outlets into which RABBITcharger can be installed, the current model is not compatible with decor or Ground Fault Circuit Interrupter (GFCI) outlets.  In short, if your outlet looks like this one, then your house is ready for RABBITchargers.


PARTS TESTING 
In order to ensure that we would be using the highest quality parts and slimmest cables available, we conducted tests on dozens of cables. Our cables need to withstand a number of retractions, and the slimmest cables allow RABBITcharger to extend as far as possible without creating a bulky device. 

The cable that won was a cable that withstood over 15,000 retraction cycles before we stopped the test! It didn't ever fail or break during testing; we just had to move on to other tasks!

PROTOTYPING

After completing our engineering and design work, we started prototyping to ensure that the look, feel, and function of RABBITcharger reflected our demanding vision. After a few tweaks and a few prototypes, we are ready to start manufacturing.


MANUFACTURING


Even more importantly than being able to deliver RABBITcharger quickly, safety has remained our highest priority. RABBITcharger will be tested and receive its UL Listing at the factory to ensure that it meets the highest standards for safety.

REWARDS
When you back our Indiegogo, you will receive a RABBITcharger that has (2) built-in micro-USB charging tips PLUS (2) swappable iOS compatible charging tips.  In addition, a RABBITcharger screw comes with each unit so that you can install it quickly and safely into your standard duplex outlets.

Whether you currently charge your devices in your dining room, bedroom, kitchen, office or living room, having RABBITcharger at each of these locations will make it more convenient, and you will always have a free outlet for all of your other stuff. The more RABBITchargers you get, the more you save! Get one for every room... give them as gifts!

story:
Introducing ProDock TAB & ProDock LT


What is ProDock TAB?

ProDock TAB wirelessly connects your Windows 10 tablet or laptop, your Windows 10 Continuum smartphone, or your Android device to a 10.1" tablet with a TOUCHSCREEN! That's right! Utilizing Miracast & UIBC, you can enlarge your phone or use Continuum for a Surface like experience and save hundreds!Learn More/Specs


What is ProDock LT?

ProDock LT uses the power of your phone, tablet, mini PC, or any other device and adds a large 14" HD screen, keyboard, and battery.

ProDock LT comes in three versions. LT, Wireless, Wireless 2.

LT

A wired version that is compatible with any device and any OS!  ProDock LT utilizes modern USB-C technology and provides seamless video and HID connections. Plug and Play! No Bluetooth pairing, or expensive bulky adaptors. Don't have USB-C? ProDock LT also has a full size HDMI input and full size USB 3.0 connections. Learn More/Specs

Wireless

ProDock Wireless is, as you guessed, a wireless version of LT! ProDock Wireless includes all the features of LT with no wires (obviously). Learn More/Specs

Wireless 2

Our newest product, specifically designed for iOS devices or older smartphones and devices without UIBC support. How do I know? Learn More/Specs


Visit ProDockLT.com to see all our latest products, features, and specs.


Why ProDock?


Affordability

Starting at a projected retail price of only $149, you can save hundreds by not buying a Surface, iPad Pro, expensive laptop, bulky accessories, adaptors, cords, battery packs, carrying cases, and more... Plus, always free shipping in USA.


Versatility

All ProDock items (except Wireless 2) also act as USB hubs. Plug in your wired USB printer, flash drive, keyboard, mouse, etc. for a truly versatile and productive experience.


Cloud Storage Problems... SOLVED!

Cloud storage, in theory, allows you to access all your documents, videos, files, and music on any device. In the real world, though, it's not always that easy. Unreliable WiFi, spotty data coverage, or expensive data plans can make cloud storage impractical. Living in Montana has made those problems very real for us. Have you ever regretted not downloading a file in advance? Have you ever forgotten what device the original file is stored on? With ProDock you never have to worry about that. Modern smartphones now have incredible storage capabilities, 64gb, 128gb, 256gb, and more! For the average user that is more than enough storage. We envision a world where cloud storage is just a backup.

                                                      


Other Cool Uses

Connect your Surface or Mac Book using USB-C or HDMI and use ProDock as a second screen, keyboard, and trackpad.

Plug in a Roku, Amazon Fire, or other media player to watch the latest flix on the go!


Add a Rasberry Pi, or mini PC, or any other OS to build your own full functioning laptop.

   


The possibilities are endless...



What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise enough to start retail production in Aug/Sept 2016 with deliveries starting October 2016. All preorders through Indiegogo are expected to be delivered by the Holiday Season 2016.

    • Contribute now and be the first to receive ProDock.
    • These are not just CGI concepts.
    • Real world testing has already been started. We need your support to get preproduction models into the hands of more testers. See one of them now.
    • All of our products are designed and assembled in Montana, USA! As production ramps up, we will need to increase the size of our facility, hire more local employees to handle production, business, shipping, and customer service.

The Future

Here at ProDock we envision a bright future with a one device concept. Besides perfecting our existing products, we have some concepts in the works that make that one device future possible, no matter your needs.

These include:

  • In Car Entertainment ("ProDock InDash" already in development)
  • More touchscreen support
  • Products with HD+ and 4K support
  • Home Entertainment
  • x86 based full version Windows 10 Phone
  • And more... Keep checking back for more updates

About Us

ProDock was founded by Darren and Rowena Lunson.

Between the both of them, they have over 30 years of experience.​

Rowena has been working with broadcasting technologies since joining the Journalism and Mass Media classes in middle school. Since then she has worked on various broadcast projects. These include home and commercial AV projects, such as installing large, portable video walls. She also composed and played the background music to our videos.

​Darren has been in the IT world since disassembling his father's first Tandy PC back in the early 90's. He has worked on various IT projects through high school and college. He has experience designing and implementing custom AV solutions for automotive applications, commercial displays, and custom home theaters. He also designs and assembles media playback PCs and devices.

story:
Completely personalized with any image or photo. From now on you can keep a picture of your children, partner, pet, favorite holiday place or business logo always with you, or use a standard design.

Is an innovative, custom phone case. The back consists of a unique material that sticks to flat surfaces.

Press the cover on a window, and finally you can make a photo where you appear with both hands. The cover  makes it easy to take a picture with your best friend, your baby, or together with your pet. From now on you no longer need another person to take a picture. Press your cover  in time elapse mode on a window and make brilliant videos of thunderstorms or a sunrise while you sleep.


You can adapt the cover  directly on your Smartphone, but it fits as well on a Smartphone case with a smooth surface.

cover  have to be tailored for each model of Smartphone, it is the intentention to supply cover  for most of the existing models in the world, however some models might be unknown and can not be supplied.


The cover  protects the back of your Smartphone against minor bumps but it also protects you if you wish.

Add a small text to the photo you sent in with a telephone number or Facebook account in case of loss and recover your phone, a telephone number in case of emergency, a phone number of a parent in case of children, a message with a possible allergy or any other possible information that you would like to give in case of emergency. The cover  gives people with certain chronicle health problems more self confidence when going out on the street and even more it might save lives. As well it is a great solution for security apps. Without any installation your Smartphone will keep an eye on your surroundings while you sleep or go out for a moment.



The cover is being made with the best materials and provides Smartphones with a soft and non sticky touch. 

The image you sent us is being printed on the inside of the acrylic formula and does not disappear with the pass of the time. If your cover loses capacity of adherence just clean it with a humid cloth and it will stick again as it did the first day.

story:
A Truly Ready to Use 2-Way BLE Controller with 16 pre-configured I/Os. No programming required*



*** NEWS UPDATE ***

New Video Demo on YouTube: Integrating RedBlue into standard robotic arm in just 3 mins!

Watch our new video demo: https://youtu.be/AW0n3y1QYL8

How to turn a standard robotic arm into a smartphone controlled robotic arm in 3 mins. Using an iPhone to control a robotic arm wireless with the RedBlue BLE Bluetooth module! 


*********************


The Simplest Multi-Functional BLE Turnkey Solution for Everyone



RedBlue module is a multi-purpose & versatile Bluetooth 4.0 LE turnkey solution. When we develop the RedBlue series, we wanted more people to unleash their creativity and speed up BLE product development by making the RedBlue modules as versatile as possible and, most importantly, eliminating the biggest barrier to most people - MCU programming!


The Missing Link Between Your Smartphone & External Electronic Components


16 Simple-to-Use, Multi-Purpose Control & Sensing I/Os

Each RedBlue module has combination of 16 multi-purpose I/Os that bound to cover most common applications like, triggering switches/buttons, buzzers, LEDs; varying motor speed, dimming LED; detecting manual or sensor switches; measuring voltage levels of analog sensors like potentiometer, photo sensors, analog accelerometers, thermo sensors; controlling up to 8 RC/robotic servos to perform complicated motions, just to name a few. And above all, all 16 input/output channels works right away without a single line of programming.


Two Versions - RedBlue 902 & RedBlue 904

Our RedBlue 900 series currently has two versions: RedBlue 902 & RedBlue 904. RedBlue 902 has more general purpose I/Os than RedBlue 904. RedBlue 904 is more robotic oriented because it has 8 servo channels.

So if you have more sensors to monitor, have to trigger / control more switches/buttons, need more PWM channels to regulate current (e.g. LED dimming / motor speed control), then RedBlue 902 should be the best option. But if your project is robotic or RC model control, you will likely need to control servos or electronic speed controller (ESC), then RedBlue 904 is the Best choice for your.


Accepts a Variety of Battery or Power Source for Wider Applications


The RedBlue module consumes very little power and accept 3V to 5V input voltage. This makes the module ready for a variety of power sources such as:

  • Single coin cell (e.g. 2032, 2025)
  • Single Li-Po battery
  • 3-4 NiMH/NiCd rechargeable batteries
  • 2-3 AAA or other 1.5V batteries
  • USB power supply/adaptor


Small & Light Weight

The RedBlue module measures only 23.9 x 35mm (0.95 x 1.4inches) and weights only 3.3g (0.12 oz).

  • Dimensions: 23.9mm x 35mm (0.95” x 1.35”)
  • Weight: 3.3g (0.12 oz)

Together with it’s low power and low voltage requirements, you can build very light weight & compact Bluetooth LE controlled gadgets, robots or even flying models. Or you can also easily embed the RedBlue module inside most existing products like home appliances, power sockets, lamps and toys, etc.



*Free RedBlue App to Control & Monitor Everything Connected



Multiple Interface for Different Purposes

The free RedBlue App has a “Full Control Interface” for each RedBlue model which allows you to control and monitor everything connected to your RedBlue 900 modules WITHOUT any programming. Apart from the general purpose “Full Control Interface”, we are also implementing customized control interfaces for some common but specific applications. For example, there will be X-Y control interface for applications like RC car control.

Using RedBlue for your innovation is far much easier than using Arduino vs Raspberry Pi in most applications

Easy-Connection Kit

While you can wire your I/Os and sensors directly to the RedBlue module for compactness. We understand that connection flexibility is the key to speed up your product development & testing stages. That’s why each RedBlue module comes with a dedicated extension board and cables for quick & easy connection. The extension board interfaces every I/Os into industry standard 2.00mm pitch pin sockets. Soldering is virtually not required while you do your testing.



RedBlue Library for App Developers

If you know mobile App development, you can implement more advanced AI or complicated algorithms/calculations as if all those sensor/switch inputs and servo, motor, LED outputs etc are connected directly to your smartphone!

Imagine you can also put your smartphone right on you robots & gadgets, utilize your smartphone’s built-in features like compass, camera face detection, motion sensors, GPS and desktop class processing power to auto-guide & control your RedBlue module outputs accordingly.

English Like Library Functions - No Low Level Programming
We have been working hard to make the RedBlue library (currently iOS version only, Android version will come later) as developer friendly as possible. You can actually control the RedBlue module with English like functions such as


[myRedBlueController turnOnSwitch1For902];

or

[myRedBlueController setPWM2DutyCycleFor902To:50];

Our RedBlue library handle all those “non-sense” low level hex, UUID, data conversion for you. This allows you to concentrate on implementing your unique features rather than dealing with those trivial I/O controls.

Open Source Sample Code
Fully functional Open Source sample codes and full projects will be available to drastically speed up your own App development!


Get Yourself Ready. Turn Your Great BLE 4.0 Project Concept into Reality - for your Own Crowdfunding and Changing the World

There are endless possibilities when you combine the wireless flexibility, low power consumption of Bluetooth 4.0 LE with the high penetration rate of powerful smartphones.  

Your great ideas might turn into the next big Indigogo crowdfunding campaign and change the world. However, great idea comes and goes if you’re not ready to realize it & grasp it. That’s why you need the most ready-to-use BLE module like the RedBlue module which significantly reduce your preparation barrier and effort so that you can instantly focus on implementing the innovative part of your project concepts!


What You Get

Our cloud funding perks offers upto 45% discount for early bird order plus accessories you need to try out your RedBlue module instantly:


Specifications

RedBlue 902 & 904 Module

  • Dimensions (WxLxH): 23.9mm x 35mm x 8.5mm (0.94” x 1.38” x 0.33”)
  • Weight: 3.3g (0.12 oz)
  • PCB Thickness: 0.047"/1.2mm
  • Supply voltage: 3V-5V
  • Operating temp.: -45, +85oC


RedBlue 902 I/Os

  • Switch Outputs: 4
  • Switch Inputs: 4
  • Analog Inputs: 4
  • PWM Outputs: 4
  • Reference Voltage Output: 2 @3.0V
  • Switch I/O levels: 3V
  • Analog Input Resolution: 13-bit
  • PWM Output Frequency: 980Hz
  • PWM Output Resolution: 8-bit

RedBlue 904 I/Os

  • Switch Outputs: 2
  • Switch Inputs: 2
  • Analog Inputs: 2
  • PWM Outputs: 2
  • Reference Voltage Output: 2 @3.0V
  • Switch I/O levels: 3V
  • Analog Input Resolution: 13-bit
  • PWM Output Frequency: 980Hz
  • PWM Output Resolution: 8-bit
  • Servo Output Range: 0.5ms - 2.4ms

Other Information - RedBlue 902 & 904 Module

  • Storage temp.: -40, +125oC
  • Power Supply Socket: 2-pins, 2mm pitch JST male socket
  • I/O Sockets: 2x10-pin, 1.5mm pitch JST male sockets
  • BLE Chip: TI - Suitable for Systems Targeting Compliance With Worldwide Radio Frequency Regulations: ETSI EN 300 328 and EN 300 440 Class 2 (Europe), FCC CFR47 Part 15 (US), and ARIB STD-T66 (Japan); High Transmit power 0dBm; Very high Receiver Sensitivity -94dBm

Extension Board - For RedBlue 902 or 904

  • Dimensions (WxLxH): 26mm x 34mm (1.02” x 1.34”)
  • PCB Thickness: 0.047"/1.2mm
  • Extension Cable Connectors: 2x10-pin, 1.5mm pitch JST male sockets
  • I/O sockets: 2.54mm pitch

Extension Cables

  • 1 set: 2 cables
  • Length (with sockets): 93mm/3.66"
  • Length (w/o sockets): 102mm/4"
  • Gender: Dual Female
  • Socket Pitch: 1.5mm pitch JST

Power Cable for the RedBlue Series

  • 1 piece
  • Length (with socket): 151mm/5.9"
  • Length (w/o sockets): 145mm/5.7"
  • Connector Pitch: 2mm JST female

Battery holder for 3 x AAA cells with Switch

  • 1 piece
  • Wire Leads: Black (-) and Red (+)
  • On/Off Switch: YES; Slide Switch
  • Cover Screw: YES; Included
  • Dimension (mm): 64.0(L) x 37.0(W) x 15.0(H)
  • Dimension (in): 2.52(L) x 1.46(W) x 0.59(H)

Quick Test Kit Accessories

  • Jumpers for Input Switch Test: 4 pieces; Open top; 2.54mm pitch
  • Jumper Dimension (mm): 4.98(W) x 5.97(H) x 2.45(D); 
  • Jumper Dimension (in): 0.19(W) x 0.24(H) x 0.10(D)
  • LED: 1xRed; 1xGreen; 1xBlue

FAQ

1. Why is it called RedBlue?
It’s boring to see almost every Bluetooth related items in blue. So we simply add the “counterpart” color red.

2. Why did you make the RedBlue module?
After working in the mobile App, educational and engineering industries for years, we found that many people, even young students, have had some great innovative ideas in mind that can utilize the low power, low cost, compact BLE technology and the high penetration of smartphones. They usually have the required skill to build their own electronics or even coding Apps. What they lack is a ready to use wireless foundation for them to build upon. The mission of our RedBlue project was trying to remove the most technically demanding barrier - the wireless linkage between your smartphone & DIY gadgets.

3. Which RedBlue Model should I choose?
If you are not sure which RedBlue module to get, then ask yourself any of the following simple questions:

i) Do you need servo control?
If not, then go for RedBlue 902. Otherwise, go for 904.

ii) Are you planing to start a robotic project?
If so, you’ll likely need servo control. Thus go for RedBlue 904.

iii) Are you going to start a home automation type project?
If so, you might want to get the RedBlue 902 module. 902 has more sensor inputs and switch controls for you to turn lights or other devices on/off.

4. What is the current status of the ready-to-use RedBlue Control App?
The latest RedBlue Control App is currently fully working as seen on the video and we are almost ready to submit the App to the App Store. The only uncertainty that may delay the release of the RedBlue Control App is the App Store review process. But since we have already had experience in successfully publishing nearly 100 Apps, including BLE related Apps for our customers, we don’t expect there will be significant issue. And the sample code we will provide to our backers will always be an instant backup for App developers.

5. What is the current status of the RedBlue Module?
We have already had working pre-production RedBlue hardware modules on hand. As seen on the video. So there should be no problem on the module production process. However, since we are not sure at this stage how many units we need to produce, component sourcing lead time could be the main possible risk that may delay the RedBlue module delivery. We shall be able to project a more concrete sourcing lead time near the end of this campaign.

6. Other question?
Please contact us at support@kratos-digital.com


Timeline



About

The RedBlue project team is a 2 brother team, YL & YK. 

Though respectively holding a PhD and MPhil degree, the 2 brothers had the tradition of bringing sophisticated technologies “down to earth” for more people to enjoy.

Apps created by the 2 brother team have already been enjoyed by over a million users.

For example, this team is the creator behind few iOS Apps that achieved remarkable international success, including:


   


- Glow Doodle :  Achieved 5th Top Paid position in both US & UK App Store as early as 2010. This app allows everyone including kids & adults to doodle with razor sharp neon glowing effect. Before that, such visual effect could only be done by professional graphics designers. The App is widely used in elementary & pre-schools. 

- G FORCE : Sophisticated one-touch g-sensor calibration made possible by clever implementation of engineering know hows. Turns every iPhone into a vehicle g meter which, according to our professional user feedback, is as accurate as a $3,000 professional equipment yet with less setup hassle

Other Apps including the first ever action recognition game released on the grand opening of Apple App Store. The game is also the first to allow high score players to "sign" their name with finger instead of typing, Free hand sketched stickman recognition and completely free hand sketched TicTacToe AI App. 

Making Professional Hobby a Toy for Everyone to Enjoy

YL was also the aero engineering professional among the team who made the first “toy grade” all terrine RC flyer, Air Hogs StormLauncher, possible. Before that, all terrine RC flyer were only for advanced hobbyists. 

In the Crowdfunding World

Actually, RedBlue was also the breeding seed for one of the successfully crowdfunded smart cups. RedBlue greatly reduced the turnaround time for the proof-of-concept prototype development of the App connected smart cup.

Did you know the rapid prototyping machine in our R&D Lab is the crowdfunded FormLabs Form 1 too!





.

story:
NOW available ONLINE @ 

www.chera.asia

 

The ONLY High End Dock on this planet that's Simple & Elegant.

 

  • Strong and most stable, your device can be easily docked and undocked single handed.
 
 

 

  • Unlike other docks, The Great pyramid dock does not arrest the devices’ speakers so you can listen to music without compromising the quality
  • Also it does not prevent you from connecting the headphones to the jack (except for the iPhone 7 & iPhone 7 plus)


 

  • You can view the phone at a comfortable angle as you charge

 

  • The Dock comes with a Micro Suction Sticker on the bottom 'Made in Japan', non-slip temporary fixation material, its easy to stick and tear repeatedly at almost all flat surfaces.

  • There two screw holes at the bottom to fasten the dock with your 2 xM6 screws, you can secure them to tables at restaurants and café

First of its Kind

  • The dock is a minuscule of the Khufu Pyramid,  a long standing and oldest man made structure on earth

 

  • Manufactured using Triangular Aluminium Bar with Aluminium Alloy 6063, the pyramids are cut with an efficient manufacturing process with almost zero raw material wastage, the remaining material is used to produce another product

 

  • The dock’s base is 76 mm x 76 mm, and height 40+ mm (almost exact degree of angle of the Great Pyramid Khufu)

 

  • The dock weighs 280 grams +/-. Nevertheless, provides stability to hold any type of device

 

ONLY AVAILABLE MODEL for Lightning Charger

 

Use your own ONLY original Apple Lightning Cable, its only cable thats compatible with this dock.

 
 
@ Living Room
 
@ Cafe
 
@ Conference Room
 
 

Thanks a lot for your interests. Pls. don't forget to Share it if you like it.

story:
ROTO is a brand new retractable sync-and-charge cable with its own unique magnetic design, focusing on high convenience and comfort for the users.

It doesn't need a place in your pocket or purse. ROTO can comfortably hang around anything and anywhere you are comfortable with.



ROTO is an Israeli Start-Up company with a team of ideators, product developers, logistic managers and strategists. We are starting with this crowd-funding campaign to introduce our very first product "ROTO" (named after its company name) to the world wide cell phone users. We are passionate about developing a full line of high quality, comfortable, fashionable and affordable iPhone and Android phone accessories and cater to the world wide cell phone users.



This initial launch of our ROTO will be the start of a full line of smart tech accessories and we are positive that ROTO will have its strong presence in the tech sector of highly convenient products.


Your generous funding will help us get started with our goal to provide innovative solutions to the various real life problems of the electronic gadget users. Your funding will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and world wide delivery. More importantly, you get the chance to be one of the first users of the ROTO.

In addition, we will allocate funds to expand the possibilities of the usage for retail consumers, as well as enterprise solutions of the ROTO. And, based on your feedback we will also invest in further customization of this first version of the ROTO and create additional products and services that will compliment it. So, many more ROTOs to follow this ROTO.

The ROTO needs pledging but above all, it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do, then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page), and help us spread the word and get things started!




If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us here

fashionable and affordable iPhone and Android phone accessories and 
cater to the world wide cell phone users. 







This initial launch of our ROTO will be the start of a full line of smart tech accessories and we are positive that ROTO will have its strong presence in the tech sector of highly convenient products. 


Your generous funding will help us get started with our goal to provide innovative solutions to the various real life problems of the electronic gadget users. Your funding will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and world wide delivery. More importantly, you get the chance to be one of the first users of the ROTO. 


In addition, we will allocate funds to expand the possibilities of the usage for retail consumers, as well as enterprise solutions of the ROTO. And, based on your feedback we will also invest in further customization of this first version of the ROTO and create additional products and services that will compliment it. So, many more ROTOs to follow this ROTO.
The ROTO needs pledging but above all, it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do, then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page), and help us spread the word and get things started!









If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us here

story:
Let’s talk about plants

Did you know the best way to water plants is keeping the soil moist?

Did you know the worst way to water the plant is pouring the plant with water?

Did you know that sunshine destroys the plant because of it’s microscopic trait of water drops poured on the plant?

About 40% of the poured water vaporizes. Instead, if we keep the soil near the root moist, less water will be used and also the plant will not be exposed to being destroyed by life giving sunshine.

This is exactly what S.Pot will accomplish for you.


Abilities of S.Pot

The most important mission of S.Pot, is caring for your beloved flower and plant. Because of watering from below, there will be no waste of water, and if produced in other versions, there will be no need for sunshine either.

In the next versions of S.Pot, in addition to soil moist, soil temperature and needed light to grow, will be set and controlled.


S.Pot sensors

Humidity sensor

Temperature sensor

Ambient light sensor


Design of body

S.Pot body is designed by professional designing software, and every detail and material of body are similar to finished product.

In designing, we tried to make the most similar pot to the ones exist in every apartment.

We tried to make It’s body material most similar to the pots that have white enamel coatings.

However, with a first look, you recognize it’s difference and modernity in comparison to other pots.


Electronic design

In designing and manufacturing electronic parts, we tried to consider every need of pot, now and in the future. For example, besides controlling and monitoring soil moist, other environmental factors such as temperature and light will be expanded too.

In S.Pot, there are Bluetooth and Wireless chips, and in case your S.Pot has the ability to monitor the pot via smartphones, you can monitor all of your S.Pot activities, and monitor the plant growing precisely.

Also, if your S.Pot can connect to the internet, you can control all of your pots through internet and web panels, and enable/disable automatic activities of pots that you’ve previously connected to your account.


What is S.Pot consisting of ?

Different parts of S.Pot in general and briefly are body, battery, sensors, electronic circuits, high pressure pump to supply the water to nuzzles, and last the nuzzles themselves.

Nuzzles are detachable and you can detach them when you’re not using the pot. This increases the nuzzle life and keeps them and their roots cleaner.


S.Pot made for who ?

Everyone that likes to grow and keep flowers and plants in their apartment, will loves S.Pot

By using S.Pot, you can have a little garden in your house or on your desk.

Even the thought of it is beautiful that having a beautiful flower showing off on the table while watching television.


S.Pot project timeline

In June 2014, we had the sparkle of such project.

In August 2014, we started researching about plant and how to keep them.

In August 2014, we had an overview of our idea.

In September 2014, the S.Pot system programming has been started.

In November 2014, the programming has been finished and we started to design the electronic circuit.

In December 2014, the electronic circuit has been deigned.

In January 2015, the primary electronic circuit has been built and successfully tested.

In February 2015, the 3D designation of S.Pot has started and some pages had been created in social networks.

In March 2015, 3D designation of S.Pot has finished

In April 2015, Indiegogo campaign has been started


What we need & what you get

so far we’ve tried everything that was possible with low cost.

But for greater work, the cost will be high. In order to finish the project and manufacture S.Pot commercially, we need your help.

We hope you enjoy all the advances and growing of project as well, and be sure that this project belongs to whom all supported it with love and continue to do so.

We’ve tried to consider the most appealing rewards for backers.

Considering physical value, we’ve tried that all the gifts worth more than the pledges cost.


Where do we stand now ?

Now all the 3D and electronic circuits designing and also monitoring system programming and operational systems of S.Pot has been finished, and we are waiting for your help to launch the mass production of this project.


What are our Plans ?

Reach 50K$: commercial manufacturing of rectangular S.Pot : 12*12*23 Cm

Reach 300K$: commercial manufacturing of triangular shape

Reach 500K$: replacing non-detachable magnetic charger with the present one

Reach 75K$: adding automatic smart light exposure system using LED’s that their light is the most similar to sunlight.

Reach 1000K$: adding the ability to connect S.Pot to smart phones via Bluetooth and wireless, in order to monitor and control the pots which are connected to the phone, and also adding web-based panel for monitoring and remote-controlling the pots placed in house and in the workplace.


Rewards for backers

We’ve tried our best to consider the most useful and appealing rewards in order to show our gratitude for their help.


Risks & Challenges

Every idea that is en route to be an amazing product, may encounter obstacles in It’s advancement. However, we will do our best to fight these obstacles of advancement, to convert this wonderful idea to an amazing product.

Even if the campaign is not successfully funded, I promise you that we will produce this.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t support us with money, please share our campaign and social pages link to introduce us to your friends.

Also we will be grateful if you like the S.Pot page on Facebook, and follow it on Twitter.


S.Pot social network pages:

    

https://www.twitter.com/smartpotsocial

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Smartpotsocial/1031516573531171
