story:
The Slivver Story: 

Entrepreneur Tony M. Galazin was making a purchase in an Apple Store. He was given an iPod to sign with his finger and noticed a visible layer of grime and grease on the surface. He realized that dirty public touch screens were becoming unavoidable and we needed a solution to the health risks they posed. To solve this problem, Slivver was invented.

Slivver is a credit card sleeve that doubles as an antimicrobial stylus, or touch screen pen. Just slide it onto any credit card and hold it in your hand to activate it. Slivver uses state of the art, conductive plastic so you can swipe, tap, and sign without using your finger. It is available in five bold colors that make staying healthy a fashion statement.

Touch screens are everywhere today, but these unavoidable new devices have an untold story of contamination.  Common wisdom says that we should not touch the toilet seat or the bottom of a shoe because they are dirty, but we have yet to understand the health risks of touch screens. Public touch screens are constantly used by sick cashiers, waiters, and customers, making them ideal surfaces for transferring disease. Scientific studies confirm this concern.      

The Impact


Slivver will be made in the USA from state-of-the-art, conductive resins that activate touch screens by touching you. This way, you can use touch screens without touching them at all. All while supporting local manufacturing.  Slivver is essential to the public as we move forward in a tech dominating society with more antibiotic resistant super-viruses everyday. Protecting ourselves against infectious disease is a priority that will gain even more significance as we continue to use screens as a means of completing transactions and communication. As a generation, it is imperative that we each take individual strides to assist in safely using the technology that is provided to us.

5% of all proceeds go to charity

In acknowledgment of all of your help we are eager to give back. We are passionate about extending the impact of Slivver's launch by having a percentage of sales go charity. With the money you contribute we will be able to donate to the color-coded charities above. By raising these funds you are not only helping us, but you are helping others. 

Dimensions

Raising $24,000

Research & Development:

In order to develop the thinnest most sleek design it is imperative to have the ability to test out different versions of Slivver. By working with various manufacturers to perfect the final design of Slivver I will be able to efficiently move ahead without setbacks down the road. 

Production & Inventory:

While the majority of Slivver sales will be online there will be a percentage sold via retail. That being said it is crucial that there are over at least 1,000 units of inventory at all times to supply both retail outlets as well as online orders. 

Marketing & Advertising Strategy:

We all know how important social media is in the launch of any product or service. Targeting all ages we will use various social media platforms to appeal to users of all demographics. More broadly we are passionate about using alternative marketing methods to gain exposure to those who are not on the internet through marketing campaigns that give mass exposure such as billboards, mass mailings, advertorials and press.

story:
Refit Card: Your Best Pal for Advanced and Portable Health Management.

Check and monitor your health – Anytime and anywhere using smartphone.

As the Refit Card project kick starts, we have exciting offers for you.
For only $29, you will receive this Hi-Tech Refit Card with free software app. to be used with your smartphone.
This device is so portable to use that you can just get going with your health check-up instantly at any time and any location using your smartphone.


  • Smartphone-Based battery-less NFC health monitoring system.
  • Measurement of ECG, heartrate and stress levels on the smartphone app.
  • Stress management by mind color, mind music and inspiring proverb content.
  • Love-index measurement between lovers.
  • Free downloadable 'Refit Card' app. in Google Play Store.
  • Saving the measured data and SNS sharing through Refit Card mobile app.


     

Over years, it has been observed that heart diseases are increasingly taking over your health and alarming your life span intensively. It is a known fact that the expenses for treating any heart ailment are always sky-high and its management is much more difficult.

In view of this, our team has come up with a detailed assessment and extensive research over a long time. Hence, we developed this immensely intelligent device to be used with your smartphone with very low selling cost.

The set of features this absolutely trendy card has will surely thrill you. It has been a great journey in designing and strategizing this amazing technology.

     


Track your ECG, Heartrate at any given time and place by just attaching Refit Card to your smartphone and get going.

It is easy to understand, record and monitor results instantly and accurately.

     

STRESS MANAGEMENT is made so easy to handle now with continuous monitoring of stress levels at any time. In just 30 seconds, note and record your stress trends and analyze your health instantly.

At the end of 30 seconds of stress measurement, your readings are automatically saved indicating stress level being high or normal.

     

Holding the Refit Card attached to your smartphone, follow the instructions for inhaling and exhaling on the screen.

After the analysis, the result is indicated as a color with your present condition and needful suggestions.

     

When you hold Refit Card attached to your smartphone, your stress level is analyzed as musical tones in 30 seconds.

Once the reading is taken, it is saved and you can listen to the tuning of your health in the form of music.

     

This icon is also one the crucial part of Refit Card software which takes a note of your recorded health condition and gives you valuable suggestions in the form of inspiring proverbs.

It enriches your thought process significantly in such a way that you feel motivated for a long time.

     

Marriage/Relationships are special and most of the times a key to happiness. Hence, adding joy to it and making it more entertaining and joyful is a mutual responsibility.

To create that fun, you can add up our love-index to your life using Refit Card and see the entertainment it can create for you.

Using Refit Card, a couple can measure who loves more enriching life with fun and enhanced bonding.

Couple can just hold the Refit Card attached to the smartphone by one hand and use another hand for holding each other. Now let the Refit Card do the magic. 

     

After you note all your readings, you can check them any time using record function. Your readings will be systematically saved in your smartphone.

The recording function gives you three options 1) Delete 2) E-mail 3) Share.

Making it much efficient and portable enough to carry it anywhere and use in any situation and at any place.

     

Set your profile so that you can be visible to others while sharing the results with them.

Especially, when you have to e-mail your results to a doctor for immediate recognition and analysis.

There are other essential options to this function which are : 

1) Sound: ON/OFF options for app. sounds provided.

2) Our apps: This is the link to all Solmitech apps. which can be easily downloaded in Google Play Store.

3) Share: You can share this app. with others and make them aware of your experience.

4) Support: You can contact us anytime for any queries or information. We will be more than happy to help you. This option will lead you to the Q&A page of our web-site. (www.solmitech.com) 

If the app. does not work sometimes, just detach the Refit Card from the smartphone about 10 centimeters away and measure back again in next few seconds.

Make sure that your fingers have a proper contact with the sensing electrodes which are at the back of the Refit Card.


The Solmitech team consists of a small group of highly enthusiastic, innovative, multi-talented and visionary members who strive each day to ensure they deliver the best of their skills and knowledge to excel in their respective roles. 

Every member aspires to become a pioneer in his respective domain by making sure they have proper motivation aligned with skills to perform their best on each project they get involved in. 

Every day at Solmitech is a packed with zeal to solve new problems and related challenges to achieve unique solutions. 

One such project is ‘Refit Card’ which has been a great experience for all the members to create a unique but simple product changing millions of lives with intelligent technology. We always try our best to include entertainment as a major part of the products we develop. They are portable to use, engaging and fun with systematic approach to balance lifestyle and fitness management.

  • Which smartphones can be used with Refit Card?

Samsung – Galaxy S4, Galaxy S4 LTE – A, Galaxy Note3, Galaxy Note 2, Galaxy Note 3 Neo, Galaxy S5, Galaxy S5 LET – A, Galaxy Alfa, Galaxy Note 4, Galaxy S6.

LG – G2, VIEW3, Nexus 5, G Prex, G PRO2, G3, G3 BIT, G3 Cat 6.

Pentek – Bega Secret Note, Bega Ion 2. 

  • What roles can Refit Card play to upgrade my lifestyle and improve health?

Refit Card can be your best friend to manage your fitness and heart health perfectly at any time and any place. 

Just use simple steps and keep update of well-being very easily. It will help you maintain your lifestyle through its entertaining software which will engage you significantly over long time.

  • Is there any expiry of the card?

There is no expiry of the Refit Card as long as it is handled effectively. It has absolutely no further expenses after purchase because of its battery-less technology.

  • Any precautionary measures to be taken care of?

You can use Refit Card in any portable manner without any problems but it is advised to keep it away from dust and any mishandling for keeping the measurements accurate.

  • Is it possible to contact for any functioning issues?

Yes absolutely. Though you will not witness any functioning issues as our products are usually tested and certified under tough qualifying standards but still you can contact us anytime for any kind of information or problems. Please leave us an e-mail (hello@solmitech.com) and we will get back to you as early as possible.

  • Any software update required?

You can download all the latest versions of Refit Card software on Google Play Store always for free.

If any changes in the software, we will update it instantly in the Google Play Store.

  • Can I download any Solmitech apps and games from Google Play Store?

Yes. You can download any of our apps and games from Google Play Store absolutely free of cost.

  •  How many colors are available?

Refit Card will be available in four colors which are: 1) White 2) Sky blue 3) Orange 4) Yellow.

It has been a great journey for the entire team since the idea generation of the Refit Card to its actual realization. Managing all the technical parameters and its requirements in balance with the cost at each stage of its making has been a major challenge and a memorable experience.

In designing and manufacturing products like Refit Card, there is always a risk to make sure whether it is possible to completely justify the features of the designed product to be fully incorporated in the manufactured one. Risks at both financial and technical aspects have always been crucial and a matter of great focus and effective process alignment. Until now, it has been a success in maintaining all the aspects in control and we are firm to keep every portion in line in the future as well.

It is our responsibility to keep up the customer expectations and deliver as best as we can. Your support for this project will encourage us to keep our spirits high and development many other innovative products which can enhance lifestyles and paving a path for better living in a most portable and entertaining way.

Any precautionary measures to be taken care of?

You can use Refit Card in any portable manner without any problems but it is advised to keep it away from dust and any mishandling for keeping the measurements accurate.


Is it possible to contact for any functioning issues?

Yes absolutely. Though you will not witness any functioning issues as our products are usually tested and certified under tough qualifying standards but still you can contact us anytime for any kind of information or problems. Please leave us an e-mail (hello@solmitech.com) and we will get back to you as early as possible.


Any software update required?


You can download all the latest versions of Refit Card software on Google Play Store always for free.
If any changes in the software, we will update it instantly in the Google Play Store.



Can I download any Solmitech apps and games from Google Play Store?

Yes. You can download any of our apps and games from Google Play Store absolutely free of cost.



 How many colors are available?

Refit Card will be available in four colors which are: 1) White 2) Sky blue 3) Orange 4) Yellow.


It has been a great journey for the entire team since the idea generation of the Refit Card to its actual realization. Managing all the technical parameters and its requirements in balance with the cost at each stage of its making has been a major challenge and a memorable experience.
In designing and manufacturing products like Refit Card, there is always a risk to make sure whether it is possible to completely justify the features of the designed product to be fully incorporated in the manufactured one. Risks at both financial and technical aspects have always been crucial and a matter of great focus and effective process alignment. Until now, it has been a success in maintaining all the aspects in control and we are firm to keep every portion in line in the future as well.
It is our responsibility to keep up the customer expectations and deliver as best as we can. Your support for this project will encourage us to keep our spirits high and development many other innovative products which can enhance lifestyles and paving a path for better living in a most portable and entertaining way.

story:
中文介紹 | 贊助方案 | Indiegogo 贊助教學| 贏得獎品!


The Story behind LifeDock

Pause for a moment and take a look around. Whether you are at work or at home, you are probably surrounded by lifeless inanimate objects. It does not have to be that way! What’s missing is the presence of green luscious plants. Since smart devices have become indispensable from our lives, combining plants with the charging station is the perfect solution. Let LifeDock bring a breath of fresh air into your lives! 


Why plants?

According to some researches, having indoor plants provides numerous benefits. Plants can:

  1. Beautify the indoor space
  2. Enhance physical and mental health
  3. Eliminate harmful toxins from the air
  4. Reduce stress and relief eye strain
  5. Boost creativity and sharpen focus
  6. Provide a sense of accomplishment and satisfaction through the process of cultivating plants


Decorate your home or office with different plants. Whenever you take out a plant container to water it and give it sunlight, you can place another container with a different plant. Your space never has to look the same again!


LifeDock in 6 sentences:

  1. You will always have the benefits of plants
  2. Home/office will never look the same! Interchange plant containers as often as you want, based on either your mood or the seasonality!
  3. Smart phones/devices will always be fully charged
  4. One hand removal of device
  5. No screws, no fuss!
  6. Elegant and space saving, looks great even without the phone!



Concept & Design

The idea behind LifeDock is to simply combine function and form. The minimalist charging stations on the market are very minimal but the usefulness stops there. We want a charging station that does more. Since having plants around provides so many benefits, combining the two made absolute sense.


Our very first prototype is a bit bigger. In order to save space, we redesigned it into a slimmer version.  

First Prototype with iPhone 6:

Second Prototype with iPhone 6:


Design Revisions

Our goal is to bring LifeDock into life (see what I did there?) at a reasonable price, but without compromising quality.  In May to June, we have met and spoken with quite a few manufacturers. All of them indicated that this particular design will be difficult to make. The trapezoid container poses the most complications. Thus we had to make revisions to make the whole design more rectangular instead of trapezoidal. The final product would look more like the pictures in "Features & Materials".




Features & Materials

 



LifeDock's base will be created from our aluminum die-casting mold, and then undergo CNC porcessing to acheieve a smooth finish. The container will be made of glass and the clear walls acrylic. 

Besides charging, the main feature of LifeDock is the container for plant placement. Aside from that, LifeDock’s first clear wall acts as backrest to support the smart devices. Two clear pads of different thickness will also be provided to ensure that your device can rest comfortably on the clear wall, whether you use a case or not. 

The two clear walls allow unobstructed view of the plants, letting you admire their beauty from all angles. The open design, in the sense that it’s not enclosed, facilitates easy removal of the container, enabling you to interchange one for another. (Alternating containers with different plants in it is recommended, since plants need to get enough sunlight and be watered as well!) 


Two pieces of “sticky pads” will go on bottom of the docking station. We chose to use sticky pads to allow one hand removal of the phone. The sticky pads can be wiped with a wet cloth to restore its stickiness.

The following have been tested: 

  • Apple: iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus
  • Android: LG G3, LG G4, Samsung S6 Edge, Samsung S6, Samsung A7, Samsung E7, Samsung E5, Asus Zenfone 2, HTC Butterfly
  • Tablets: iPad Air, iPad mini

We tested LifeDock with an iPhone 6 Plus that uses the Spigen Tough Armor protective case as well. If your case is similar to the Spigen Tough Armor case or something slimmer, it will work with the LifeDock!


What's included with each LifeDock unit?

Each LifeDock comes with one container, one adapter designed for Apple Lightning USB cable, two clear pads(for wall), and two sticky pads(for bottom). (The Apple Lightning USB cable is not included.)  

The Android adapter and micro USB cable will be included with all LifeDocks once the stretch goal is met.


Available Colors:

                                                                  Arctic Silver

                                                              Stealth Black

                                     Blazing Gold (Available once Stretch Goal met)




Perks & Plants:

*Sora Edge Workshop - In the initial Skype session you can tell us about the idea you have in mind. We will then work on the sketches and show them to you . Give us your feedback and we will make the necessary changes. (There would be a total of two revision rounds.) The end result will be solely yours and you can take it to the next stage! 


We want to thank you!!!

We want to thank you for taking the time to look at our campaign and backing it! With your help and support, LifeDock will become a reality. 

We do need your help along the way though! Please share about us on social media sites such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, and Pinterest. If you visit forums that relates to plants or technology, please post something about LifeDock to let more people know. Even spreading the word to tell your family and friends will help tremendously. For anyone that helps, we want to reward you! 

How to participate in the referral contest? Easy! Anyone with an Indiegogo account can participate. (If you don't have one, sign up for free with Facebook or an email address.)

  1. Log in to your Indiegogo account
  2. Go to LifeDock's page at http://igg.me/at/lifedock
  3. Click on "Link" on the left of the LifeDock main video
  4. Copy your unique URL then click ok
  5. Share that URL with your family/friends
You can check your referral status anytime from your account. For more information, please visit:
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest

*Rewards such as LifeDock, Glass Container, and iPad will be given out once the campaign is fully funded.

How the money will be used

Up to now we have spent more than $4,000 making the prototypes and procuring various materials. With your support we can make LifeDock a reality. A great percentage, about 60%, of the goal will be used to pay for the molds that will be used to create LifeDock. The rest of the money will be used to cover other expenses, such as production costs, material costs, and packaging costs. 


Fulfillment 

Manufacturing: We are based in Taiwan, thus we looked for manufacturers that are in Taiwan as well. It would be easier for us to communicate with them, as well as supervise the process to ensure that we are satisfied with the end result. We will be working with a die casting mold manufacturer that has extensive experience and been making products for many internationally well known brands with a wide assortment of products. We have personally visited their factory and inspected the products they made and are positive they can deliver excellent end product. 

Plants: Air plants will be supplied by The Air Plant Shop (www.airplantshop.com) and succulents by The Succulent Source (www.thesucculentsource.com). Once LifeDock is ready to ship we will coordinate with the plant suppliers so that hopefully you will receive LifeDock and the plants around the same time!

Assembly, Packaging & Logistics: The products will be assembled by the manufacturer but packaged by our team. In the process, we will inspect each and every one of the products to ensure that they are all good to go! We will also handle the logistics ourselves as well. Once the LifeDocks are packaged, they will be shipped out via Taiwan Post Office and individual tracking number will be provided to all backers.                       

 

Risks & Challenges
Volume – It is difficult to gauge ahead of time where the Indiegogo campaign will take us. If we see huge volume by campaign’s end, the timeline may be pushed back a little bit. However, we will still strive to deliver the goods on time!
Manufacturing - We have met and spoken with quite a bit of manufacturers. From the meetings, we have learned of the kinks and flaws from our initial designs and have hence tweaked the product design so that manufacturing process can be smooth. If there were any manufacturing issues overlooked by the manufacturers, we will make sure the matter can be worked out. 

Meeting the timeline – Our number one priority is to deliver quality products to you on time. Unexpected and unforeseen challenges sometimes do arise and that may affect the timeline. We will do our very best to overcome any obstacles that come our way and will keep the contributors constantly updated!



Our Story

Sora Edge is made up of a team of three: Alec, Felipe, and Joey. Alec is our lead designer, the quiet one with lots of ideas up in his mind. Felipe used to be an auditor but believes that he can better serve the world by coming up with great product ideas instead of crunching numbers! Joey is in charge of our sales as well as product development. We wants to bring interesting and unique products to the public at an affordable price. Sora Edge was founded in August of 2014. The three of us have been long time friends and we decided to work together to bring our visions to the world. At the core of Sora Edge, we believe that form and function are equally important, and neither should be sacrificed for one another. We want to bring a wide assortment of interesting products to the world and we are taking our very first step right here at Indiegogo!    

               

                               Alec                                    Felipe                                   Joey

FAQ

Can I pledge to get additional LifeDocks for any perk level?
Yes, for each additional LifeDock, add the Price and Shipping from your chosen Perk! (Add as Additional Gift after you click on your perk.)
Perk                                          Price                          Shipping*
Super Early Bird                   $35                             $12                         
Early Bird                                $40                             $12                                
Regular                                    $45                             $12
LifeDock Bundle                   $45                             $12
2 LifeDocks Early Bird        $39(1 LifeDock)     $12
2 LifeDocks                            $43(1 LifeDock)     $12
Special Edition                      $120                           $12
Family/Friend Bundle        $42(1 LifeDock)     $12
*The shipping fee is a direct reflection of the weight. Since LifeDock is made of aluminum and glass, it's quite heavy!

How do I care for the plants?
The plants that you purchase will come with care information.

Why aren't plants offered to contributors in other countries?
We would love to offer plants to all backers from around the globe! However, due to the complex issues of import/export regulations, we decided to offer plants to those in the US only.

For example, if I want 1 succulent plant, 2 air plants, and 1 extra container, how much Additional Gift do I have to pay?
Since air plants and succulents are supplied by two separate plant nurseries, the first plant from each nursery will always be $13. (This includes shipping and handling from the nurseries.) Thus, you will add $13(succulent) + $13(first air plant) + $4(second air plant) + $7(container) to arrive at $37 total!

story:
Summary

Developer OS is a new Linux OS geared for developer to make it easier to write software for Linux. By simplifying the development process, I hope to increase the number of people who can contribute to our platform. To do this, I need your support so that I can work on Builder full time. I'm asking for $20,000 to cover my costs for the next 11-12 months while I implement Developer's core features.

Over the last few of years, I've worked with people trying to get started developing for Linux. Almost universally, I found that getting started was the single hardest problem. I want builder to be the easiest way to get started.

I've worked on virtual machines, databases, graphics tool-kits, compiler tools, and programming languages. I think that puts me in a unique position to be successful in a project as large and complicated as an IDE. I hope you'll agree and contribute to my campaign.

  • Faster work flow.
  • All the tools builtin to do the job.
  • Open-source, so free for all.

Complete

Developer OS comes with everything you need to run your organisation, school, home or enterprise. All the essential applications, like an office suite, browsers, email and media apps come pre-installed and thousands of tools.  

We are working on a large cloud server to hold all your projects in the cloud, chat with team members in real-time. Also a remote system suitable for team sharing, having the ability to take control of your co-workers computer for fixes and development practices. Also this Developer OS will come with a IDE that's never been since on the market, ADVkit is a IDE that powerful and make your project easier to handle. 


Why use DevOS for development?

  • The fastest route from development to deployment on desktop, mobile, server or cloud
  • The desktop of choice for developers at some of the world’s leading technology companies
  • The broadest and best development tools and libraries
  • Lightweight to either run natively or in a VM, on a PC or a Mac

  • Ideal for any resource-intensive environment, from data mining to large-scale financial modelling


All the tools developers need

Whether your team uses Python, Ruby, Node.js or Java, no operating system comes with the tool sets than Developer OS. Everything your developers need is just a click or an apt-get away.

story:
Hi I'm Khalid Gindeel

I'm the director of the International Nuba Mountain Association in Cairo, a community organization doing activism  among the Nuba refugees here in Cairo.
 If you don't know anything about the Nuba mountain people from Sudan, its okay. Most people don't, which is why we're starting our campaign to pay for a lap top  and internet services for our outreach, community organizing, and getting the first Nuba refugee news paper off the ground here in Cairo.
So a little bit about where we're from: we're facing genocide back home in Nuba mountain region of South Kordofan, Sudan. 
Omar Bashir, The President of Sudan who is wanted by the International Criminal Court for his crimes against humanity in Darfur, has ordered his air force to bomb our homes and burned crops. Fighters under him have committed rape and indiscriminate killings of women and children.  
1) We want the General Secretary of the United Nations to visit Nuba and we want the genocide to stop. 
2) We fled the genocide and war only to come across discrimination low wages and racially motivated violence here in Cairo. Here in Cairo, we’ve been illegally evicted from our homes. Women have been raped. Police brutality is a huge problem for us here in Egypt. 
Presently Egypt hosts over 30,000 Sudanese refugees. Some of us are here alone. Some of us are here with family. All of us are trying to survive. 
We want the world to know what’s happening with the Ethnic cleansing in South Kordofan and our trials here.
 You  can help us do that.   Lap top costs $500. Internet costs $500 for a year here in Cairo.We’re not asking for a fortune, but that for most refugees here in Egypt that money is a fortune. 

Here is a little reading about whats happening to us back in Sudan

http://www.nytimes.com/2015/06/21/opinion/sunday/nicholas-kristof-a-rain-of-bombs-in-the-nuba-mountains.html?_r=0

http://nubareports.org/

If you're interested in knowing a little more, here's a little reading about our lives in Cairo.

http://www.dailynewsegypt.com/2014/12/01/racism-violence-exploitation-afflict-life-sudanese-refugees-cairo/


We’re not asking for a helping hand but a chance for us to help ourselves.
story_txt:
Hi I'm Khalid Gindeel
I'm the director of the International Nuba Mountain Association in Cairo, a community organization doing activism  among the Nuba refugees here in Cairo.
 If you don't know anything about the Nuba mountain people from Sudan, its okay. Most people don't, which is why we're starting our campaign to pay for a lap top  and internet services for our outreach, community organizing, and getting the first Nuba refugee news paper off the ground here in Cairo.
So a little bit about where we're from: we're facing genocide back home in Nuba mountain region of South Kordofan, Sudan. 
Omar Bashir, The President of Sudan who is wanted by the International Criminal Court for his crimes against humanity in Darfur, has ordered his air force to bomb our homes and burned crops. Fighters under him have committed rape and indiscriminate killings of women and children.  
1) We want the General Secretary of the United Nations to visit Nuba and we want the genocide to stop. 
2) We fled the genocide and war only to come across discrimination low wages and racially motivated violence here in Cairo. Here in Cairo, we’ve been illegally evicted from our homes. Women have been raped. Police brutality is a huge problem for us here in Egypt. 

Presently Egypt hosts over 30,000 Sudanese refugees. Some of us are here alone. Some of us are here with family. All of us are trying to survive. 
We want the world to know what’s happening with the Ethnic cleansing in South Kordofan and our trials here.
 You  can help us do that.   Lap top costs $500. Internet costs $500 for a year here in Cairo.We’re not asking for a fortune, but that for most refugees here in Egypt that money is a fortune. 

Here is a little reading about whats happening to us back in Sudan
http://www.nytimes.com/2015/06/21/opinion/sunday/nicholas-kristof-a-rain-of-bombs-in-the-nuba-mountains.html?_r=0
http://nubareports.org/

If you're interested in knowing a little more, here's a little reading about our lives in Cairo.

http://www.dailynewsegypt.com/2014/12/01/racism-violence-exploitation-afflict-life-sudanese-refugees-cairo/

We’re not asking for a helping hand but a chance for us to help ourselves.

story:
We have tested most of the Android TV boxes on the market, including Jynxbox, GBox, Little Black Box, Nexobox, Exoon and most of the cheap no name Android boxes.  The M8 Beats Them ALL!!! At An Unbelievable Price Point.  We have taken the best Android box and fully programmed it for you to use.  We also include a setup guide that walks you through which addons to use and tips and tricks to make the most of your Android TV box.  Now comes with latest version of XBMC - 13.2.

M8 is the Hottest quad core smart TV box:

1.Amlogic S802 Cortex A9 2.0GHz Quad Core

2.Quad Core Mali-450 3D GPU

3.DDR3 RAM 2GB,Nand Flash 8GB

4.Built-in 2.4G/5.8G Dual Band WIFI Mould with External Antenna

5.Bluetooth 4.0

6.4K UHD Hardware Decoding

7.Kodi 14.0 Pre-installed Full Loaded

8.All Aluminum Housing looks high-end with LED display


  Q & A

Is there any monthly fees?

Absolutely no monthly fees with these boxes.

 

Do I need to update the box?

No, all of the addons in XBMC will update automatically as addon updates come out.

 

Does the box go down or need to be reprogrammed?

No.  These are not affected by any down time and all of the content available on them is openly shared on the internet for free.  If you ever run into a problem with the box we are here to help you fix it.

 

What other languages are available for live TV on these besides English?

We spent alot of time testing the best English addons and putting them on this box, and decided to include addons for international TV as well.  We have addons for watching: Arabic, Portuguese, Spanish, Polish, Indian, Pakistani, Italian, Greek and many more.  There is over 100 countries supported in this box.  If your unsure if we support your language, just ask and we can let you know.

 

The M8 has  HDMI output to turn your TV to a multifunctional smart TV: a media player, an internet browser with big view, a photo viewer, a game player, a music player, a huge size screen ebook/emegazine/newspaper reader, an online video TV, and it is a revolutionary entertainment on your TV, it provides a new family television entertainment experience, TV is smart from now on.

How is our box so inexpensive?

For those of you know what an Android TV Box is and does you know that they are readily available. And even if you're just doing your research now for the first time! The underlying premise of our campaign is not to bring you new technology, but rather top of the line technology at an unbeatable price. Our company produces in BULK and that is how we offer you such an unbelievable price point. For $30 you will get a top of the line FULLY LOADED Android TV Box

What About Shipping?

Canada & U.S-Add $10

International-Add $15

Simple as that! We still encourage you to try and beat this price!

story:
Overview

World's best Active Noise Cancelling technology, audiophile sound quality, touch control, incredible long battery life, headphone to headphone sharing functionality, super easy wired charging and a form factor with a purposeful design. Meet the the T-30 headphones by Kryptic.

The Story behind the project 

Sound and silence in perfection was our goal. Our inspiration for this combination came from the three-movement composition by composer John Cage.

His bold work gave us the courage to create a bold and exceptional pair of headphones. Naming our first Kryptic Headphones T-30 is a homage and standing ovation to his remarkable work.

Enjoy sound and silence from the one and only John Cage

Risk and Challenges for the project. 

Aftersales is a crucial element of every physical product. Since we are an experienced audio tech team with existing structures, we have a complete after sales process in place that will take care of you and your  T-30 headphones. 

Not only will we take care of your product when repair is needed, but we are able to get original spare parts from our productions to ensure that your Kryptic T-30 is always perfect, even when fixed.

Risks and challenges

We have rich experience in designing, developing and manufacturing audio technology. This experience makes us very confident that we will fully deliver the Kryptic T-30 at exceptional quality and within our timeline. We do however, want to remark that even the most well planned manufacturing process can meet unpredictable hiccups.

All parts, technologies, chips and materials are produced in our home state of Texas. The market for resistor and capacitor sometimes experiences unstable conditions. This is not new to us and we know how to handle those situations and have a back-up plan.

We have thoroughly tested the  Kryptic T-30s with iOS, Android and Windows systems to ensure perfect connectivity.

With this in mind, the entire Kryptic  team and our suppliers will continue to develop the  Kryptic T-30 at the highest possible standards, so that you can enjoy them every time.

About the Kryptic T-30

 

 

As featured in the press

"After painstakingly looking at every detail of the T-30 for about a month, we were truly satisfied with the pre-production samples. Our team had no complaints whatsoever. The sound quality, the active noise filtering and all the major features put the top branded headphones to shame"

                                                  The Tech Moe Group.

"The ANC feature in the T-30 are simply not a joke. Spoiler! You can't hear any outside noise with the ANC on. One thing we also loved was the superior sound quality, even at maxed volumes. They really put some extra work in these. Kudos to the team for such a great product" 

 

​

 

ANC mode or ambient mode? You decide.

Enough time to enjoy whatever 

Specs 

Whats in the box?

1. T-30 headphones  2. USB charging cable  3. 1/4" stereo plug adapter aux cable  4. Aux cable

5. Hard protective case  6. Instructions manual 

Rigorously put to the test

story:
Why we need Wasila

Religion  can make bridges. Wasila ia an application for mobile phones to facilitate religious tourism. It offers a platform for the basic services that every tourist needs.

It is very simple to use with only three buttons. It will be available in English, Arabic, Persian and Urdu. Other languages may be added later on.

Button 1: FIND PEOPLE  Find people (contact, friends, family, and children). This will make life easy especially for families with children and elderly. The app will use a strong satellite-based navigation system with high-quality maps. 

Button 2: FIND POINTS OF INTERESTS  Find points of interest (hotels, restaurants, hospitals…and all what a tourist need during his/her stay). The app will allow the tourist to use different filters to sort information, free of charge services can be sorted out and shown on high quality annotated maps. 

Button 3: Find TRANSPORT FACILITIES  Find transport (bus/train terminals, private transport, airports and much more). Transport can be a problem when a huge number of people heading to one destination and again back to their homes. This app will connect charity service provider with tourists. In future stages, it will allow payment.

In addition to maps and routes, finding routes between two points (the tourist can choose the route according to his/her needs. A map will appear with all points of interests on the rout making it easy to use. The tourists can share his/her routs with family and friends. Updates in case of congestions will be available in future versions of the app.

What have we done until now

What we are showing above is user experience i.e. interface that enable you to understand how the project will work. We are going to hire professional programmers to help us develop the project in phases. The first phase will be basic design including 4 cities (scheduled to finish in October 2019). The second phase will add payment and booking functions (scheduled to finish in October 2019). 

Risks and challenges

The biggest risk facing the project is under-financing. We aim to provide a top quality application that will enable tourists to access the services, book and pay for these services. This means that a professional team of programmers must be hired and updated technologies be used. This is expensive. 
Some of these financial challenges are already tackled by the founder. With a generous backing from crowdfunding and some investors, the project can certainly make it.

People behind this project

The founder of Sumer.dk is Alaa El-Hussuna.

Dr. Alaa El-Hussuna obtained his medical degree in Baghdad-Iraq in 1996, his surgical specialization in Copenhagen-Denmark in 2013, master degree in information technology from IT University, Copenhagen- Denmark in 2003 and Ph.D in surgery Aalborg-Denmark 2018.

Dr. El-Hussuna led many national and international research projects.

He is the lead of first open source research project in medicine and surgery. The #OpenSourceResearch has attracted thousands of interactions from the 5 continents with contributions from 40 scientists.

“IBDResponse” project involved two universities, 9 departments in 3 hospitals in addition to 2 laboratories with a competitive budget of more than 100.000 euro.

Dr. El-Hussuna led the European society of coloproctology prospective audit in 2017 with the participation of more than 1700 collaborators from 360 hospitals in 57 countries around the world.

When asked why he started Sumer, Dr. El-Hussuna frequently quotes Gandhi:

“I want the cultures of all the lands to be blown about my house as freely as possible. But I refuse to be blown off my feet by any.”

This means that a professional team of programmers must be hired and updated technologies be used. This is expensive. Some of these financial challenges are already tackled by the founder. With a generous backing from crowdfunding and some investors, the project can certainly make it.People behind this projectThe founder of Sumer.dk is Alaa El-Hussuna.Dr. Alaa El-Hussuna obtained his medical degree in Baghdad-Iraq in 1996, his surgical specialization in Copenhagen-Denmark in 2013, master degree in information technology from IT University, Copenhagen- Denmark in 2003 and Ph.D in surgery Aalborg-Denmark 2018.Dr. El-Hussuna led many national and international research projects.He is the lead of first open source research project in medicine and surgery. The #OpenSourceResearch has attracted thousands of interactions from the 5 continents with contributions from 40 scientists.“IBDResponse” project involved two universities, 9 departments in 3 hospitals in addition to 2 laboratories with a competitive budget of more than 100.000 euro.Dr. El-Hussuna led the European society of coloproctology prospective audit in 2017 with the participation of more than 1700 collaborators from 360 hospitals in 57 countries around the world.When asked why he started Sumer, Dr. El-Hussuna frequently quotes Gandhi:“I want the cultures of all the lands to be blown about my house as freely as possible. But I refuse to be blown off my feet by any.”
